atk-s0504a:251_6: parinibbāyati, ayaṃ antarāparinibbāyī nāma. Yo pana avihādīsu ādito pañcakappasatādibhedaṃ
atk-s0504a:251_7: āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma. Yo asaṅkhārena
atk-s0504a:251_8: adhimattappayogaṃ akatvā appadukkhena akasirena parinibbāyati, ayaṃ asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī
atk-s0504a:251_9: nāma. Yo pana sasaṅkhārena adhimattappayogaṃ katvā dukkhena kicchena kasirena parinibbāyati,
atk-s0504a:251_10: ayaṃ sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī nāma. Itaro pana avihādīsu uddhaṃvāhitabhāvena uddhamassa
atk-s0504a:251_11: taṇhāsotaṃ, vaṭṭasotaṃ, maggasotameva vāti uddhaṃsoto. Avihādīsu uppajjitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0504a:251_12: pattuṃ asakkonto tattha tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena akaniṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0504a:252_0: Ettha ca uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī, na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī,
atk-s0504a:252_1: na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmīti catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Yo avihato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0504a:252_2: cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī
atk-s0504a:252_3: nāma. Yo pana heṭṭhā tayo devaloke sodhetvā sudassīdevaloke ṭhatvā parinibbāyati,
atk-s0504a:252_4: ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo ito akaniṭṭhameva gantvā parinibbāyati,
atk-s0504a:252_5: ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo pana heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva
atk-s0504a:252_6: parinibbāyati, ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto, na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāmāti.
atk-s0504a:253_0: Tattha avihesu uppajjitvā kappasatato uddhaṃ parinibbāyiko, dvinnaṃ kappasatānaṃ
atk-s0504a:253_1: matthake parinibbāyiko, pañcakappasate asampatte parinibbāyikoti tayo antarāparinibbāyino.
atk-s0504a:253_2: Vuttañhetaṃ “upapannaṃ vā samanantarā appattaṃ vā vemajjha”nti. Vā-saddena hi pattamattopi
atk-s0504a:253_3: saṅgahitoti. Evaṃ tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyī eko uddhaṃsoto.
atk-s0504a:253_4: Tesu asaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañca, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañcāti dasa honti. Tathā
atk-s0504a:253_5: atappāsudassāsudassīsūti cattāro dasakā cattārīsaṃ akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsotassa abhāvato
atk-s0504a:253_6: tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyīti asaṅkhāraparinibbāyino cattāro,
atk-s0504a:253_7: sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino cattāroti aṭṭha, evamete aṭṭhacattārīsaṃ anāgāmino. Te sabbepi
atk-s0504a:256_0: 7. Sattame sabbanti anavasesaṃ. Anavasesavācako hi ayaṃ sabba-saddo. So yena yena
atk-s0504a:256_1: sambandhaṃ gacchati, tassa tassa anavasesataṃ dīpeti; yathā “sabbaṃ rūpaṃ, sabbā
atk-s0504a:256_2: vedanā, sabbasakkāyapariyāpannesu dhammesū”ti. So panāyaṃ sabba-saddo sappadesanippadesavisayatāya
atk-s0504a:256_3: duvidho. Tathā hesa sabbasabbaṃ, padesasabbaṃ, āyatanasabbaṃ, sakkāyasabbanti catūsu
atk-s0504a:256_4: visayesu diṭṭhappayogo. Tattha “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe
atk-s0504a:256_5: āpāthamāgacchantī”tiādīsu sabbasabbasmiṃ āgato. “Sabbesaṃ vo, sāriputtā, subhāsitaṃ
atk-s0504a:256_6: pariyāyenā”tiādīsu padesasabbasmiṃ. “Sabbaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi, cakkhuñceva
atk-s0504a:256_7: rūpañca…pe…. Manañceva dhamme cā”ti ettha āyatanasabbasmiṃ. “Sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:256_8: vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī”tiādīsu sakkāyasabbasmiṃ. Tattha sabbasabbasmiṃ āgato nippadesavisayo,
atk-s0504a:256_9: itaresu tīsupi āgato sappadesavisayo. Idha pana sakkāyasabbasmiṃ veditabbo. Vipassanāya
atk-s0504a:256_10: ārammaṇabhūtā tebhūmakadhammā hi idha “sabba”nti anavasesato gahitā.
atk-s0504a:257_0: Anabhijānanti “ime dhammā kusalā, ime akusalā, ime sāvajjā, ime anavajjā”tiādinā
atk-s0504a:257_1: “ime pañcakkhandhā, imāni dvādasāyatanāni, imā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
atk-s0504a:257_2: ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo ariyasacca”nti ca ādinā sabbe abhiññeyye dhamme aviparītasabhāvato
atk-s0504a:257_3: anabhijānanto abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena na jānanto. Aparijānanti na parijānanto. Yo hi
atk-s0504a:257_4: sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammajātaṃ parijānāti, so tīhi pariññāhi parijānāti – ñātapariññāya,
atk-s0504a:257_5: tīraṇapariññāya, pahānapariññāya. Tattha katamā ñātapariññā? Sabbaṃ tebhūmakaṃ nāmarūpaṃ
atk-s0504a:257_6: – “idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito bhiyyo. Idaṃ nāmaṃ, ettakaṃ nāmaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti
atk-s0504a:257_8: vavatthapeti. Tassa avijjādikañca paccayaṃ pariggaṇhāti. Ayaṃ ñātapariññā. Katamā
atk-s0504a:257_9: tīraṇapariññā? Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā taṃ sabbaṃ tīreti aniccato dukkhato rogatoti dvācattālīsāya
atk-s0504a:257_10: ākārehi. Ayaṃ tīraṇapariññā. Katamā pahānapariññā? Evaṃ tīrayitvā aggamaggena sabbasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:258_1: kalāpasammasanādianulomapariyosānā vā paññā tīraṇapariññā. Ariyamaggena pajahanaṃ
atk-s0504a:258_2: pahānapariññā. Yo sabbaṃ parijānāti, so imāhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānāti. Idha pana
atk-s0504a:258_3: virāgappahānānaṃ paṭikkhepavasena visuṃ gahitattā ñātapariññāya tīraṇapariññāya ca
atk-s0504a:258_4: vasena parijānanā veditabbā. Yo panevaṃ na parijānāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “aparijāna”nti.
atk-s0504a:259_0: Tattha cittaṃ avirājayanti tasmiṃ abhiññeyyavisese pariññeyye attano cittasantānaṃ
atk-s0504a:259_1: na virājayaṃ, na virajjanto; yathā tattha rāgo na hoti, evaṃ virāgānupassanaṃ na
atk-s0504a:259_2: uppādentoti attho. Appajahanti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya tattha pahātabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0504a:259_3: kilesavaṭṭaṃ anavasesato na pajahanto. Yathā cetaṃ, evaṃ abhijānanādayopi missakamaggavasena
atk-s0504a:259_4: veditabbā. Pubbabhāge hi nānācittavasena ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi kamena abhijānanādīni
atk-s0504a:259_5: sampādetvā maggakāle ekakkhaṇeneva kiccavasena taṃ sabbaṃ nipphādentaṃ ekameva ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:259_6: pavattatīti. Abhabbo dukkhakkhayāyāti nibbānāya sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa khepanāya
atk-s0504a:259_7: na bhabbo, nālaṃ na samatthoti attho.
atk-s0504a:260_0: Sabbañca khoti ettha ca-saddo byatireke, kho-saddo avadhāraṇe. Tadubhayena abhijānanādito
atk-s0504a:260_1: laddhabbaṃ visesaṃ dukkhakkhayassa ca ekantakāraṇaṃ dīpeti. Abhijānanādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0504a:260_2: taṃ vuttameva. Tattha pana paṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ, idha vidhānavasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:260_3: Ayameva viseso. Apica abhijānanti upādānakkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ sarūpato
atk-s0504a:260_4: paccayato ca ñāṇassa abhimukhīkaraṇavasena abhijānanto hutvā abhāvākārādipariggahena
atk-s0504a:260_5: taṃ aniccādilakkhaṇehi paricchijjamānavasena parijānanto. Virājayanti sammadevassa
atk-s0504a:260_7: karonto tattha aṇumattampi rāgaṃ anuppādento. Pajahanti vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāsahitāya
atk-s0504a:260_8: maggapaññāya samudayapakkhiyaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ pajahanto samucchindanto. Bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyāti
atk-s0504a:260_9: evaṃ kilesamalappahāneneva sabbassa kammavaṭṭassa parikkhīṇattā anavasesavipākavaṭṭakhepanāya
atk-s0504a:261_0: Yo sabbaṃ sabbato ñatvāti yo yuttayogo āraddhavipassako sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammajātaṃ
atk-s0504a:261_1: sabbato sabbabhāgena kusalādikkhandhādivibhāgato dukkhādipīḷanādivibhāgato ca. Atha
atk-s0504a:261_2: vā sabbatoti sabbasmā kakkhaḷaphusanādilakkhaṇādito aniccādito cāti sabbākārato jānitvā
atk-s0504a:261_3: vipassanāpubbaṅgamena maggañāṇena paṭivijjhitvā, vipassanāñāṇeneva vā jānanahetu.
atk-s0504a:261_4: Sabbatthesu na rajjatīti sabbesu atītādivasena anekabhedabhinnesu sakkāyadhammesu
atk-s0504a:261_5: na rajjati, ariyamaggādhigamena rāgaṃ na janeti. Imināssa taṇhāgāhassa abhāvaṃ dassento
atk-s0504a:261_6: taṃ nimittattā diṭṭhamānaggāhānaṃ “etaṃ mama esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti imassa micchāgāhattayassapi
atk-s0504a:261_7: abhāvaṃ dasseti. Sa veti ettha sa-iti nipātamattaṃ. Ve-ti byattaṃ, ekaṃsenāti vā
atk-s0504a:261_8: etasmiṃ atthe nipāto. Sabbapariññāti sabbaparijānanato, yathāvuttassa sabbassa abhisamayavasena
atk-s0504a:261_9: parijānanato. Soti yathāvutto yogāvacaro, ariyo eva vā. Sabbadukkhamupaccagāti sabbaṃ
atk-s0504a:264_0: 8. Aṭṭhame apubbaṃ natthi, kevalaṃ mānavasena desanā pavattā. Gāthāsu pana mānupetā
atk-s0504a:264_1: ayaṃ pajāti kammakilesehi pajāyatīti pajāti laddhanāmā ime sattā maññanalakkhaṇena
atk-s0504a:264_2: mānena upetā upagatā. Mānaganthā bhave ratāti kimikīṭapaṭaṅgādiattabhāvepi mānena
atk-s0504a:264_3: ganthitā mānasaṃyojanena saṃyuttā. Tato eva dīgharattaṃ paribhāvitāhaṃkāravasena
atk-s0504a:264_5: ca kāmādibhave ratā. Mānaṃ aparijānantāti mānaṃ tīhi pariññāhi na parijānantā. Arahattamaggañāṇena
atk-s0504a:264_6: vā anatikkamantā, “mānaṃ apariññāyā”ti keci paṭhanti. Āgantāro punabbhavanti puna
atk-s0504a:264_7: āyātiṃ upapattibhavaṃ. Punappunaṃ bhavanato vā punabbhavasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ aparāparaṃ
atk-s0504a:264_8: parivattanavasena gantāro upagantāro honti, bhavato na parimuccantīti attho. Ye ca
atk-s0504a:264_9: mānaṃ pahantvāna, vimuttā mānasaṅkhayeti ye pana arahattamaggena sabbaso mānaṃ pajahitvā
atk-s0504a:264_10: mānassa accantasaṅkhayabhūte arahattaphale nibbāne vā tadekaṭṭhasabbakilesavimuttiyā
atk-s0504a:264_11: vimuttā suṭṭhu muttā. Te mānaganthābhibhuno, sabbadukkhamupaccagunti te parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā
atk-s0504a:264_12: arahanto sabbaso mānaganthaṃ mānasaṃyojanaṃ samucchedappahānena abhibhavitvā ṭhitā,
atk-s0504a:264_13: anavasesaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkamiṃsūti attho. Evametasmiṃ sattamasutte ca arahattaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0504a:267: 9-10. Navamadasamesu apubbaṃ natthi. Desanāvilāsavasena tathā bujjhanakānaṃ veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vā tathā desitānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:272: 11-13. Dutiyavaggepi paṭhamādīni tīṇi suttāni vuttanayāneva, tathā desanākāraṇampi vuttameva.
atk-s0504a:274_0: 14. Catutthe – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādīsu na-kāro paṭisedhattho. Ahanti bhagavā attānaṃ
atk-s0504a:274_1: niddisati. Aññanti idāni vattabbaavijjānīvaraṇato aññaṃ. Ekanīvaraṇampīti ekanīvaraṇadhammampi.
atk-s0504a:274_2: Samanupassāmīti dve samanupassanā – diṭṭhisamanupassanā ca ñāṇasamanupassanā ca.
atk-s0504a:274_3: Tattha “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā āgatā ayaṃ diṭṭhisamanupassanā nāma. “Aniccato
atk-s0504a:274_4: samanupassati, no niccato”tiādinā pana āgatā ayaṃ ñāṇasamanupassanā nāma. Idhāpi
atk-s0504a:274_5: ñāṇasamanupassanāva adhippetā. “Samanupassāmī”ti ca padassa na-kārena sambandho.
atk-s0504a:274_6: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “ahaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātena samantacakkhunā sabbadhamme
atk-s0504a:274_7: hatthāmalakaṃ viya olokentopi aññaṃ ekanīvaraṇampi na samanupassāmī”ti.
atk-s0504a:275_0: Yena nīvaraṇena nivutā pajā dīgharattaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsarantīti yena nīvaraṇakasabhāvattā
atk-s0504a:275_1: nīvaraṇena dhammasabhāvaṃ jānituṃ passituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ adatvā chādetvā pariyonandhitvā
atk-s0504a:275_2: ṭhānena andhakārena nivutā sattā anādimatasaṃsāre aparimāṇe kappe mahantesu ceva
atk-s0504a:275_3: khuddakesu ca bhavādīsu aparāparuppattivasena sabbato dhāvanti ceva saṃsaranti, ca.
atk-s0504a:275_5: Kilesānaṃ balavabhāvena vā sandhāvanaṃ, dubbalabhāvena saṃsaraṇaṃ. Khaṇikamaraṇavasena
atk-s0504a:275_6: vā ekajātiyaṃ sandhāvanaṃ, vohāramaraṇavasena anekāsu jātīsu saṃsaraṇaṃ. Cittavasena
atk-s0504a:275_7: vā sandhāvanaṃ, “cittamassa vidhāvatī”ti hi vuttaṃ, kammavasena saṃsaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0504a:276_0: Yathayidanti yathā idaṃ. Ya-kāro padasandhikaro, sandhivasena rassattaṃ. Avijjānīvaraṇanti
atk-s0504a:276_1: ettha pūretuṃ ayuttaṭṭhena kāyaduccaritādi avindiyaṃ nāma, aladdhabbanti attho. Taṃ
atk-s0504a:276_2: avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjā. Viparītato kāyasucaritādi vindiyaṃ nāma, taṃ vindiyaṃ
atk-s0504a:276_3: na vindatīti avijjā. Khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:276_4: indriyānaṃ ādhipateyyaṭṭhaṃ, saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:276_5: catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā. Antavirahite saṃsāre satte javāpetīti
atk-s0504a:276_6: vā avijjā, paramatthato vā avijjamānesu itthipurisādīsu javati pavattati, vijjamānesu
atk-s0504a:276_7: khandhādīsu na javati, na pavattatīti avijjā. Apica cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ
atk-s0504a:276_8: paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannānañca dhammānaṃ chādanatopi avijjā. Avijjāva nīvaraṇanti avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0504a:277_0: Avijjānīvaraṇena hi, bhikkhave, nivutā pajā dīgharattaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsarantīti
atk-s0504a:277_1: idaṃ purimasseva daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Purimaṃ vā – “yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, avijjānīvaraṇa”nti
atk-s0504a:277_2: evaṃ opammadassanavasena vuttaṃ, idaṃ nīvaraṇānubhāvadassanavasena. Kasmā panettha
atk-s0504a:277_3: avijjāva evaṃ vuttā, na aññe dhammāti? Ādīnavapaṭicchādanena kāmacchandādīnaṃ visesappaccayabhāvato.
atk-s0504a:277_4: Tathā hi tāya paṭicchāditādīnave visaye kāmacchandādayo pavattanti.
atk-s0504a:278_0: Natthaññoti ādikā gāthā vuttassa avuttassa ca atthassa saṅgaṇhanavasena bhāsitā.
atk-s0504a:278_1: Tattha nivutāti nivāritā paliguṇṭhitā, paṭicchāditāti attho. Ahorattanti divā ceva
atk-s0504a:278_2: rattiñca, sabbakālanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā mohena āvutāti yena pakārena avijjānīvaraṇasaṅkhātena
atk-s0504a:278_3: mohena āvutā paṭicchāditā suviññeyyampi ajānantiyo pajā saṃsāre saṃsaranti, tathārūpo
atk-s0504a:278_4: añño ekadhammopi ekanīvaraṇampi natthīti yojetabbaṃ. Ye ca mohaṃ pahantvāna, tamokhandhaṃ
atk-s0504a:278_5: padālayunti ye pana ariyasāvakā pubbabhāge tadaṅgādippahānavasena, heṭṭhimamaggehi
atk-s0504a:278_6: vā taṃtaṃmaggavajjhaṃ mohaṃ pajahitvā aggamaggena vajirūpamañāṇena mohasaṅkhātameva
atk-s0504a:278_7: tamorāsiṃ padālayiṃsu, anavasesato samucchindiṃsu. Na te puna saṃsarantīti te arahanto –
atk-s0504a:281_0: Evaṃ vutte imasmiṃ saṃsāre na saṃsaranti na paribbhamanti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Hetu tesaṃ
atk-s0504a:281_1: na vijjati, yasmā saṃsārassa hetu mūlakāraṇaṃ avijjā, sā tesaṃ na vijjati, sabbaso
atk-s0504a:284_0: 15. Pañcame yassa vijjati, taṃ puggalaṃ dukkhehi, kammaṃ vā vipākehi, bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāse
atk-s0504a:284_1: vā bhavantarādīhi saṃyojetīti saṃyojanaṃ. Taṇhāyanaṭṭhena taṇhā, tasati sayaṃ paritasati,
atk-s0504a:284_2: tasanti vā etāyāti taṇhā. Saññuttāti cakkhādīsu abhinivesavatthūsu baddhā. Sesaṃ
atk-s0504a:284_3: vuttanayameva. Kāmañcettha avijjāyapi saṃyojanabhāvo taṇhāya ca nīvaraṇabhāvo atthiyeva,
atk-s0504a:284_4: tathāpi avijjāya paṭicchāditādīnavehi bhavehi taṇhā satte saṃyojetīti imassa visesassa
atk-s0504a:284_5: dassanatthaṃ purimasutte avijjā nīvaraṇabhāvena, idha ca taṇhā saṃyojanabhāveneva
atk-s0504a:284_6: vuttā. Kiñca nīvaraṇasaṃyojanappadhānassa dassanatthaṃ. Yathā hi nīvaraṇabhāvena
atk-s0504a:284_7: avijjā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ padhānabhūtā pubbaṅgamā ca, evaṃ saṃyojanabhāvena nesaṃ
atk-s0504a:284_8: taṇhāti tadadhīnappadhānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ suttadvaye evamete dhammā vuttā. Apica visesena
atk-s0504a:284_9: avijjā nibbānasukhaṃ nivāretīti “nīvaraṇa”nti vuttā, taṇhā saṃsāradukkhena satte
atk-s0504a:285_0: Dassanagamanantarāyakaraṇato vā vijjācaraṇavipakkhato dvayaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ. Vijjāya
atk-s0504a:285_1: hi ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā avijjā nibbānadassanassa aviparītadassanassa ca visesato antarāyakarā,
atk-s0504a:285_2: caraṇadhammānaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā taṇhā gamanassa sammāpaṭipattiyā antarāyakarāti;
atk-s0504a:285_3: evamayaṃ avijjāya nivuto andhīkato taṇhāya saṃvuto baddho assutavā puthujjano andho
atk-s0504a:285_4: viya baddho mahākantāraṃ, saṃsārakantāraṃ nātivattati. Anatthuppattihetudvayadassanatthampi
atk-s0504a:285_5: dvayaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ. Avijjāgato hi puggalo bālabhāvena atthaṃ parihāpeti, anatthañca
atk-s0504a:285_6: attano karoti, akusalo viya āturo asappāyakiriyāya. Jānantopi bālo bālabhāvena atthaṃ
atk-s0504a:285_7: parihāpeti, anatthañca karoti jānanto viya rogī asappāyasevī. Makkaṭālepopamasuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:286_0: Paṭiccasamuppādassa mūlakāraṇadassanatthampettha dvayaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ. Visesena hi
atk-s0504a:286_1: sammohassa balavabhāvato avijjākhettaṃ atīto addhā, patthanāya balavabhāvato taṇhākhettaṃ
atk-s0504a:286_2: anāgato addhā. Tathā hi bālajano sammohabahulo atītamanusocati, tassa avijjāpaccayā
atk-s0504a:286_3: saṅkhārāti sabbaṃ netabbaṃ. Patthanābahulo anāgataṃ pajappati, tassa taṇhāpaccayā
atk-s0504a:286_4: upādānantiādi sabbaṃ netabbaṃ. Teneva tāsaṃ pubbantāharaṇena aparantapaṭisandhānena
atk-s0504a:287_0: Gāthāsu taṇhādutiyoti taṇhāsahāyo. Taṇhā hi nirudakakantāre marīcikāya udakasaññā
atk-s0504a:287_1: viya pipāsābhibhūtaṃ appaṭikāradukkhābhibhūtampi sattaṃ assādasandassanavasena sahāyakiccaṃ
atk-s0504a:287_2: karontī bhavādīsu anibbindaṃ katvā paribbhamāpeti, tasmā taṇhā purisassa “dutiyā”ti
atk-s0504a:287_3: vuttā. Nanu ca aññepi kilesādayo bhavābhinibbattiyā paccayāva? Saccametaṃ, na pana
atk-s0504a:287_4: tathā visesappaccayo yathā taṇhā. Tathā hi sā kusalehi vinā akusalehi, kāmāvacarādikusalehi
atk-s0504a:287_5: ca vinā rūpāvacarādikusalehi bhavanibbattiyā visesappaccayo, yato samudayasaccanti
atk-s0504a:287_6: vuccatīti. Itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti itthabhāvo ca aññathābhāvo ca itthabhāvaññathābhāvo.
atk-s0504a:287_7: So etassa atthīti itthabhāvaññathābhāvo saṃsāro, taṃ tattha itthabhāvo manussattaṃ,
atk-s0504a:287_8: aññathābhāvo tato avasiṭṭhasattāvāsā. Itthabhāvo vā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppanno
atk-s0504a:287_9: attabhāvo, aññathābhāvo anāgatattabhāvo. Evarūpo vā aññopi attabhāvo itthabhāvo,
atk-s0504a:287_10: na evarūpo aññathābhāvo. Taṃ itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṃ saṃsāraṃ khandhadhātuāyatanapaṭipāṭiṃ
atk-s0504a:288_0: Etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā, taṇhaṃ dukkhassa sambhavanti etaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sambhavaṃ
atk-s0504a:288_1: samudayaṃ taṇhaṃ ādīnavaṃ ādīnavato ñatvāti attho. Atha vā etamādīnavaṃ ñatvāti etaṃ
atk-s0504a:288_2: yathāvuttaṃ saṃsāranātivattanaṃ ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā. Taṇhaṃ dukkhassa sambhavanti
atk-s0504a:288_3: taṇhañca vuttanayena vaṭṭadukkhassa padhānakāraṇanti ñatvā. Vītataṇho anādāno, sato
atk-s0504a:288_4: bhikkhu, paribbajeti evaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0504a:288_5: taṇhaṃ vigamento aggamaggena sabbaso vītataṇho vigatataṇho, tato eva catūsu upādānesu
atk-s0504a:288_6: kassacipi abhāvena āyatiṃ paṭisandhisaṅkhātassa vā ādānassa abhāvena anādāno, sativepullappattiyā
atk-s0504a:288_7: sabbattha satokāritāya sato bhinnakileso bhikkhu paribbaje careyya, khandhaparinibbānena
atk-s0504a:291: 16. Chaṭṭhe sekhassāti ettha kenaṭṭhena sekho? Sekkhadhammapaṭilābhato sekho. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:292: “Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sekho hotīti? Idha, bhikkhu, sekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti…pe… sekhena sammāsamādhinā samannāgato hoti. Ettāvatā kho, bhikkhu, sekho hotī”ti.
atk-s0504a:294_0: “Sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccati. Kiñca sikkhati? Adhisīlampi sikkhati,
atk-s0504a:294_1: adhicittampi sikkhati, adhipaññampi sikkhati. Sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:295_0: Yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomappaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro
atk-s0504a:295_1: bhojane mattaññū jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0504a:295_2: bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati – “ajja vā sve vā aññataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ adhigamissāmī”ti,
atk-s0504a:295_3: sopi vuccati sikkhatīti sekhoti. Imasmiṃ atthe na paṭivijjhantova sekho adhippeto,
atk-s0504a:295_4: atha kho kalyāṇaputhujjanopi. Appattaṃ mānasaṃ etenāti appattamānaso. Mānasanti “antalikkhacaro
atk-s0504a:295_5: pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti ettha rāgo mānasanti vutto. “Cittaṃ mano mānasa”nti
atk-s0504a:295_6: ettha cittaṃ. “Appattamānaso sekho, kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā”ti ettha arahattaṃ. Idhāpi
atk-s0504a:295_7: arahattameva adhippetaṃ. Tena appattaarahattassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:296_0: Anuttaranti seṭṭhaṃ, asadisanti attho. Catūhi yogehi khemaṃ anupaddutanti yogakkhemaṃ,
atk-s0504a:296_1: arahattameva adhippetaṃ. Patthayamānassāti dve patthanā taṇhāpatthanā, kusalacchandapatthanā
atk-s0504a:296_2: ca. “Patthayamānassa hi jappitāni, pavedhitaṃ vāpi pakappitesū”ti ettha taṇhāpatthanā.
atk-s0504a:299_0: Ettha kattukamyatākusalacchandapatthanā, ayameva idhādhippetā. Tena patthayamānassāti
atk-s0504a:299_1: taṃ yogakkhemaṃ gantukāmassa tanninnassa tappoṇassa tappabbhārassāti attho. Viharatoti
atk-s0504a:299_2: ekaṃ iriyāpathadukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0504a:299_3: harato. Atha vā “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti adhimuccanto saddhāya viharatī”tiādinā niddesanayena
atk-s0504a:299_4: cettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ajjhattikanti niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte ajjhatte bhavaṃ ajjhattikaṃ.
atk-s0504a:299_5: Aṅganti kāraṇaṃ. Iti karitvāti evaṃ katvā. Na aññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmīti ettha
atk-s0504a:299_6: ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ attano santāne samuṭṭhitaṃ kāraṇanti katvā
atk-s0504a:299_7: aññaṃ ekakāraṇampi na samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bahūpakāraṃ, yathayidaṃ yoniso manasikāroti
atk-s0504a:299_8: upāyamanasikāro, pathamanasikāro, aniccādīsu aniccādinayeneva manasikāro, aniccānulomikena
atk-s0504a:299_9: vā cittassa āvaṭṭanā anvāvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro. Ayaṃ yoniso manasikāro.
atk-s0504a:300_0: Idāni yoniso manasikārassa ānubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yoniso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu manasi
atk-s0504a:300_1: karonto akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yoniso manasi karontoti
atk-s0504a:300_2: “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṃ,
atk-s0504a:300_3: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca”nti catūsu ariyasaccesu yoniso manasikāraṃ pavattento.
atk-s0504a:301_0: Tatrāyaṃ atthavibhāvanā – yadipi idaṃ suttaṃ avisesena sekkhapuggalavasena āgataṃ,
atk-s0504a:301_1: catumaggasādhāraṇavasena pana saṅkhepeneva kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathayissāma. Yo catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko
atk-s0504a:301_2: yogāvacaro “taṇhāvajjā tebhūmakā khandhā dukkhaṃ, taṇhā samudayo, ubhinnaṃ appavatti
atk-s0504a:301_3: nirodho, nirodhasampāpako maggo”ti evaṃ pubbe eva ācariyasantike uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhāno.
atk-s0504a:301_4: So aparena samayena vipassanāmaggaṃ samāruḷho samāno tebhūmake khandhe “idaṃ dukkha”nti
atk-s0504a:301_5: yoniso manasi karoti, upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca. Vipassanā
atk-s0504a:301_6: hi idha manasikārasīsena vuttā. Yā panāyaṃ tassa dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā purimabhavikā
atk-s0504a:301_7: taṇhā, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti yoniso manasi karoti. Yasmā pana idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ayañca
atk-s0504a:301_8: samudayo idaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti na pavattanti, tasmā yadidaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma,
atk-s0504a:301_9: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti yoniso manasi karoti. Nirodhasampāpakaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ,
atk-s0504a:301_10: “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yoniso manasi karoti, upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0504a:302_0: Tatrāyaṃ upāyo – abhiniveso nāma khandhe hoti, na vivaṭṭe, tasmā ayamattho – “imasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:302_1: kāye pathavīdhātu, āpodhātū”tiādinā nayena cattāri mahābhūtāni tadanusārena upādārūpāni
atk-s0504a:302_2: ca pariggahetvā “ayaṃ rūpakkhandho”ti vavatthapeti. Taṃ vavatthāpayato uppanne tadārammaṇe
atk-s0504a:302_3: cittacetasikadhamme “ime cattāro arūpakkhandhā”ti vavatthapeti. Tato “ime pañcakkhandhā
atk-s0504a:302_4: dukkha”nti vavatthapeti. Te pana saṅkhepato nāmañca rūpañcāti dve bhāgā honti. Idañca
atk-s0504a:302_5: nāmarūpaṃ sahetu sappaccayaṃ uppajjati, tassa ayaṃ avijjābhavataṇhādiko hetu, ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:302_6: āhārādiko paccayoti hetuppaccaye vavatthapeti. So tesaṃ paccayānañca paccayuppannānañca
atk-s0504a:302_7: yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā “ime dhammā ahutvā bhavanti, hutvā nirujjhanti,
atk-s0504a:302_8: tasmā aniccā”ti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropeti, “udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā dukkhā”ti dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:303_0: Evaṃ tilakkhaṇāni āropetvā vipassanto udayabbayañāṇuppattiyā uppanne obhāsādike vipassanupakkilese
atk-s0504a:303_2: vavatthapetvā puna udayabbayañāṇaṃ paṭipāṭiyā bhaṅgañāṇādīni ca uppādento sotāpattimaggādayo
atk-s0504a:303_3: pāpuṇāti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri saccāni ekappaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhati, ekābhisamayena
atk-s0504a:303_4: abhisameti. Tattha dukkhaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto, samudayaṃ pahānappaṭivedhena
atk-s0504a:303_5: paṭivijjhanto sabbaṃ akusalaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto
atk-s0504a:303_6: maggaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto sabbaṃ kusalaṃ bhāveti. Ariyamaggo hi nippariyāyato
atk-s0504a:303_7: kucchitasalanādiatthena kusalo, tasmiñca bhāvite sabbepi kusalā anavajjabodhipakkhiyadhammā
atk-s0504a:303_8: bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti. Evaṃ yoniso manasi karonto akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ
atk-s0504a:303_9: bhāveti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karoti, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti
atk-s0504a:303_10: yoniso manasi karotī”tiādi. Aparampi vuttaṃ “yoniso manasikārasampannassetaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:303_11: bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ – ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessati, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
atk-s0504a:304_0: Yoniso manasikāroti gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – sikkhati, sikkhāpadāni tassa atthi,
atk-s0504a:304_1: sikkhanasīloti vā sekho. Saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhatīti bhikkhu. Tassa sekhassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0504a:304_2: uttamatthassa arahattassa pattiyā adhigamāya yathā yoniso manasikāro, evaṃ bahukāro
atk-s0504a:304_3: bahūpakāro añño koci dhammo natthi. Kasmā? Yasmā yoniso upāyena manasikāraṃ purakkhatvā
atk-s0504a:304_4: padahaṃ catubbidhasammappadhānavasena padahanto, khayaṃ dukkhassa pāpuṇe saṃkilesavaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0504a:304_5: parikkhayaṃ pariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇe adhigaccheyya, tasmā yoniso manasikāro bahukāroti.
atk-s0504a:307_0: 17. Sattame bāhiranti ajjhattasantānato bahi bhavaṃ. Kalyāṇamittatāti yassa sīlādiguṇasampanno
atk-s0504a:307_1: aghassa ghātā, hitassa vidhātā sabbākārena upakārako mitto hoti, so puggalo kalyāṇamitto,
atk-s0504a:307_2: tassa bhāvo kalyāṇamittatā. Tatrāyaṃ kalyāṇamitto pakatiyā saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno
atk-s0504a:307_3: sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
atk-s0504a:307_4: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ, tena sammāsambodhihetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0504a:307_5: sattesu hitasukhesitaṃ na pariccajati, sīlasampattiyā sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti garu
atk-s0504a:307_6: ca bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo, sutasampattiyā khandhāyatanasaccapaṭiccasamuppādādikānaṃ
atk-s0504a:307_7: gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti, cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto
atk-s0504a:307_8: asaṃsaṭṭho, vīriyasampattiyā attano paresañca hitappaṭipattiyaṃ āraddhavīriyo hoti,
atk-s0504a:307_9: satisampattiyā upaṭṭhitassati hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatampi
atk-s0504a:307_10: cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā, samādhisampattiyā avikkhitto hoti samāhito ekaggacitto,
atk-s0504a:307_11: paññāsampattiyā aviparītaṃ pajānāti. So satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanto
atk-s0504a:307_12: paññāya sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā samādhinā tattha abyaggacitto hutvā
atk-s0504a:307_13: vīriyena satte ahitato nisedhetvā ekantahite niyojeti. Tenevāha –
atk-s0504a:309: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no cāṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:310_0: Kalyāṇamitto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetīti kalyāṇamitto
atk-s0504a:310_1: puggalo kalyāṇamittaṃ nissāya kammassakatāñāṇaṃ uppādeti, uppannaṃ saddhaṃ phātiṃ
atk-s0504a:310_2: karoti, saddhājāto upasaṅkamati upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇāti. Taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate
atk-s0504a:310_3: saddhaṃ paṭilabhati, tena saddhāpaṭilābhena gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajjaṃ anutiṭṭhati,
atk-s0504a:310_4: catupārisuddhisīlaṃ sampādeti, yathābalaṃ dhutadhamme samādāya vattati, dasakathāvatthulābhī
atk-s0504a:310_5: hoti, āraddhavīriyo viharati upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ
atk-s0504a:310_6: dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto, nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggādhigamena
atk-s0504a:310_7: sabbaṃ akusalaṃ samucchindati, sabbañca kusalaṃ bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gamento vaḍḍheti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:311_2: aṇumattesu vajjesu, bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhissati, sikkhāpadesu’.
atk-s0504a:312_1: ekantanibbidāya…pe… nibbānāya saṃvattati. Seyyathidaṃ – appicchakathā, santuṭṭhikathā,
atk-s0504a:312_2: pavivekakathā, asaṃsaggakathā, vīriyārambhakathā, sīlakathā, samādhikathā…pe… vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā.
atk-s0504a:312_3: Evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī’.
atk-s0504a:313_1: dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu’.
atk-s0504a:314: “Kalyāṇamittassetaṃ…pe… kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa ‘yaṃ paññavā bhavissati, udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā”’ti.
atk-s0504a:316: “Mamañhi, ānanda, kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti, jarādhammā sattā jarāya parimuccantī”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:317: Tena vuttaṃ – “kalyāṇamitto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
atk-s0504a:318_0: Gāthāya sappatissoti patissavasaṅkhātena saha patissenāti sappatisso, kalyāṇamittassa
atk-s0504a:318_1: ovādaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchako subbacoti attho. Atha vā hitasukhe patiṭṭhāpanena pati
atk-s0504a:318_2: isetīti patisso, ovādadāyako. Garuādarayogena tena patissena saha vattatīti sappatisso,
atk-s0504a:318_3: garūsu garucittīkārabahulo. Sagāravoti chabbidhenapi gāravena yutto. Karaṃ mittānaṃ
atk-s0504a:318_4: vacananti kalyāṇamittānaṃ ovādaṃ karonto yathovādaṃ paṭipajjanto. Sampajānoti sattaṭṭhāniyena
atk-s0504a:318_5: sampajaññena samannāgato. Patissatoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ, gametuṃ samatthāya satiyā
atk-s0504a:318_6: patissato satokārī. Anupubbenāti sīlādivisuddhipaṭipāṭiyā, tattha ca vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0504a:318_7: ceva maggapaṭipāṭiyā ca. Sabbasaṃyojanakkhayanti kāmarāgasaṃyojanādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ
atk-s0504a:318_9: arahattaṃ, tassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānameva vā. Pāpuṇe adhigaccheyyāti attho. Iti
atk-s0504a:318_10: imesu dvīsu suttesu ariyamaggādhigamassa satthārā padhānaṅgaṃ nāma gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:321_0: 18. Aṭṭhame ekadhammoti kataroyaṃ suttanikkhepo? Aṭṭhuppattiko. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepakathā
atk-s0504a:321_1: – devadatto hi ajātasattuṃ duggahaṇaṃ gāhāpetvā tassa pitaraṃ rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ
atk-s0504a:321_2: tena mārāpetvāpi abhimāre payojetvāpi silāpavijjhanena lohituppādakammaṃ katvāpi
atk-s0504a:321_3: na tāvatā pākaṭo jāto, nāḷāgiriṃ vissajjetvā pana pākaṭo jāto. Atha mahājano “evarūpampi
atk-s0504a:321_4: nāma pāpaṃ gahetvā rājā vicaratī”ti kolāhalaṃ akāsi, mahāghoso ahosi. Taṃ sutvā rājā
atk-s0504a:321_5: attanā dīyamānāni pañca thālipākasatāni pacchindāpesi, upaṭṭhānampissa nāgamāsi.
atk-s0504a:321_6: Nāgarāpi kulaṃ upagatassa kaṭacchubhattampissa nādaṃsu. So parihīnalābhasakkāro kohaññena
atk-s0504a:321_7: jīvitukāmo satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācitvā “alaṃ, devadatta, yo icchati,
atk-s0504a:321_8: so āraññiko hotū”tiādinā bhagavatā paṭikkhitto tehi pañcahi vatthūhi bālaṃ lūkhappasannaṃ
atk-s0504a:321_9: janaṃ saññāpento pañcasate vajjiputtake salākaṃ gāhāpetvā saṅghaṃ bhinditvāva te
atk-s0504a:321_10: ādāya gayāsīsaṃ agamāsi. Atha dve aggasāvakā satthu āṇāya tattha gantvā dhammaṃ desetvā
atk-s0504a:321_11: te ariyaphale patiṭṭhāpetvā ānayiṃsu. Ye panassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa laddhiṃ
atk-s0504a:321_12: rocetvā tatheva paggayha ṭhitā saṅghe bhijjante bhinne ca samanuññā ahesuṃ, tesaṃ
atk-s0504a:322_0: Devadattopi na cirasseva rogābhibhūto bāḷhagilāno maraṇakāle “satthāraṃ vandissāmī”ti
atk-s0504a:322_1: mañcakasivikāya nīyamāno jetavanapokkharaṇitīre ṭhapito pathaviyā vivare dinne patitvā
atk-s0504a:322_2: avīcimhi nibbatti, yojanasatiko cassa attabhāvo ahosi kappaṭṭhiyo tālakkhandhaparimāṇehi
atk-s0504a:322_3: ayasūlehi vinividdho. Devadattapakkhikāni ca pañcamattāni kulasatāni tassa laddhiyaṃ
atk-s0504a:322_4: ṭhitāni saha bandhavehi niraye nibbattāni. Ekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0504a:322_5: samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, devadattena saṅghaṃ bhindantena bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti. Atha
atk-s0504a:322_6: satthā dhammasabhaṃ upagantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0504a:322_7: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte saṅghabhede ādīnavaṃ dassento imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0504a:322_8: Keci pana bhaṇanti “devadattassa tappakkhikānañca tathā niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā
atk-s0504a:322_9: saṅghabhede ādīnavaṃ dassento bhagavā attano ajjhāsayeneva imaṃ suttaṃ desesī”ti.
atk-s0504a:323_0: Tattha ekadhammoti eko akusalo mahāsāvajjadhammo. Loketi sattaloke. Uppajjamāno uppajjatīti
atk-s0504a:323_1: ettha bhedasaṃvattanikesu bhaṇḍanādīsu saṅghe uppannesupi “dhammo adhammo”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:323_2: aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūsu yassa kassaci dīpanavasena voharantesupi tattha rucijananatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:323_3: anussāventesupi anussāvetvā salākāya gāhitāyapi saṅghabhedo uppajjamāno nāma hoti,
atk-s0504a:323_4: salākāya pana gāhitāya cattāro vā atirekā vā yadā āveṇikaṃ uddesaṃ vā saṅghakammaṃ
atk-s0504a:323_5: vā karonti, tadā saṅghabhedo uppajjati nāma. Kate pana tasmiṃ saṅghabhedo uppanno
atk-s0504a:323_6: nāma? Kammaṃ, uddeso, vohāro, anussāvanā, salākaggāhoti imesu hi pañcasu saṅghassa
atk-s0504a:323_7: bhedakāraṇesu kammaṃ vā uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ, vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhā pana pubbabhāgāti.
atk-s0504a:324_1: asukhāya, apāyūpapattihetubhāvena anatthāya. Akusaladhammavasena vā ahitāya, hitamattassapi
atk-s0504a:324_2: abhāvā sugatiyampi nibbattanakakāyikacetasikadukkhāya uppajjatīti sambandho. Devamanussānanti
atk-s0504a:324_3: idaṃ “bahuno janassā”ti vuttesu ukkaṭṭhapuggalaniddeso. Aparo nayo – bahujanāhitāyāti
atk-s0504a:324_6: Anatthāyāti paramatthapaṭikkhepāya. Nibbānañhi paramattho, tato uttariṃ attho natthi.
atk-s0504a:324_7: Ahitāyāti maggapaṭikkhepāya. Nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttariṃ hitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0504a:324_8: Dukkhāyāti ariyasukhavirādhanena vaṭṭadukkhatāya. Ye hi ariyasukhato viraddhā taṃ
atk-s0504a:324_9: adhigantuṃ abhabbā, te vaṭṭadukkhe paribbhamanti, ariyasukhato ca uttariṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0504a:324_10: nāma natthi. Vuttañhetaṃ “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti.
atk-s0504a:325_0: Idāni “saṅghabhedo”ti sarūpato dassetvā tassa ahitādīnaṃ ekantahetubhāvaṃ pakāsetuṃ
atk-s0504a:325_1: “saṅghe kho pana, bhikkhave, bhinne”tiādimāha. Tattha bhinneti nimittatthe bhummaṃ
atk-s0504a:325_2: yathā “adhanānaṃ dhane ananuppadīyamāne”ti, bhedahetūti attho. Aññamaññaṃ bhaṇḍanānīti
atk-s0504a:325_3: catunnaṃ parisānaṃ tappakkhikānañca “eso dhammo, neso dhammo”ti aññamaññaṃ vivadanāni.
atk-s0504a:325_4: Bhaṇḍanañhi kalahassa pubbabhāgo. Paribhāsāti “idañcidañca vo anatthaṃ karissāmā”ti
atk-s0504a:325_5: bhayuppādanavasena tajjanā. Parikkhepāti jātiādivasena parito khepā, dasahi akkosavatthūhi
atk-s0504a:325_7: tasmiṃ saṅghabhede, tannimitte vā bhaṇḍanādike. Appasannāti ratanattayaguṇānaṃ anabhiññā.
atk-s0504a:325_8: Na pasīdantīti “dhammacārino samacārino”tiādinā yvāyaṃ bhikkhūsu pasādanākāro, tathā
atk-s0504a:325_9: na pasīdanti, tesaṃ vā sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ na maññanti. Tathā ca dhamme satthari
atk-s0504a:325_10: ca appasannāva honti. Ekaccānaṃ aññathattanti puthujjanānaṃ aviruḷhasaddhānaṃ pasādaññathattaṃ.
atk-s0504a:326_0: Gāthāyaṃ āpāyikotiādīsu apāye nibbattanārahatāya āpāyiko. Tatthapi avīcisaṅkhāte
atk-s0504a:326_1: mahāniraye uppajjatīti nerayiko. Ekaṃ antarakappaṃ paripuṇṇameva katvā tattha tiṭṭhatīti
atk-s0504a:326_2: kappaṭṭho. Saṅghabhedasaṅkhāte vagge ratoti vaggarato. Adhammiyatāya adhammo. Bhedakaravatthūhi
atk-s0504a:326_3: saṅghabhedasaṅkhāte eva ca adhamme ṭhitoti adhammaṭṭho. Yogakkhemā padhaṃsatīti yogakkhemato
atk-s0504a:326_4: hitato padhaṃsati parihāyati, catūhi vā yogehi anupaddutattā yogakkhemaṃ nāma arahattaṃ
atk-s0504a:326_5: nibbānañca, tato panassa dhaṃsane vattabbameva natthi. Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññato saṃhataṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:326_6: saṅghaṃ, tato eva ekakammādividhānayogena samaggaṃ sahitaṃ. Bhetvānāti pubbe vuttalakkhaṇena
atk-s0504a:326_7: saṅghabhedena bhinditvā. Kappanti āyukappaṃ. So panettha antarakappova. Nirayamhīti avīcimahānirayamhi.
atk-s0504a:329_0: 19. Navame ekadhammoti eko kusaladhammo anavajjadhammo. “Ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo”tiādinā
atk-s0504a:329_1: sace saṅghe vivādo uppajjeyya, tattha dhammakāmena viññunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ
atk-s0504a:329_2: “ṭhānaṃ kho, panetaṃ vijjati, yadidaṃ vivādo vaḍḍhamāno saṅgharājiyā vā saṅghabhedāya
atk-s0504a:329_3: vā saṃvatteyyā”ti. Sace taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attanā paggahetvā ṭhito, aggiṃ akkantena
atk-s0504a:329_4: viya sahasā tato oramitabbaṃ. Atha parehi taṃ paggahitaṃ sayañcetaṃ sakkoti vūpasametuṃ,
atk-s0504a:329_5: ussāhajāto hutvā dūrampi gantvā tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ, yathā taṃ vūpasammati. Sace
atk-s0504a:329_6: pana sayaṃ na sakkoti, so ca vivādo uparūpari vaḍḍhateva, na vūpasammati. Ye tattha
atk-s0504a:329_7: patirūpā sikkhākāmā sabrahmacārino, te ussāhetvā yena dhammena yena vinayena yena
atk-s0504a:329_8: satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ yathā vūpasammati, tathā vūpasametabbaṃ. Evaṃ vūpasamentassa
atk-s0504a:329_9: yo saṅghasāmaggikaro kusalo dhammo, ayamettha ekadhammoti adhippeto. So hi ubhatopakkhiyānaṃ
atk-s0504a:329_10: dveḷhakajātānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, tesaṃ anuvattanavasena ṭhitānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ
atk-s0504a:329_11: upāsikānaṃ tesaṃ ārakkhadevatānaṃ yāvadeva brahmānampi uppajjanārahaṃ ahitaṃ dukkhāvahaṃ
atk-s0504a:329_12: saṃkilesadhammaṃ apanetvā mahato puññarāsissa kusalābhisandassa hetubhāvato sadevakassa
atk-s0504a:329_13: lokassa hitasukhāvaho hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “ekadhammo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati
atk-s0504a:329_14: bahujanahitāyā”tiādi. Tassattho anantarasutte vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. Saṅghasāmaggīti
atk-s0504a:329_15: saṅghassa samaggabhāvo bhedābhāvo ekakammatā ekuddesatā ca.
atk-s0504a:330_0: Gāthāyaṃ sukhā saṅghassa sāmaggīti sukhassa paccayabhāvato sāmaggī sukhāti vuttā.
atk-s0504a:330_2: anuggaṇhanaṃ sāmaggianurūpaṃ, yathā te sāmaggiṃ na vijahanti, tathā gahaṇaṃ ṭhapanaṃ
atk-s0504a:330_3: anubalappadānanti attho. Saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ katvānāti bhinnaṃ saṅghaṃ rājipattaṃ vā
atk-s0504a:330_4: samaggaṃ sahitaṃ katvā. Kappanti āyukappameva. Saggamhi modatīti kāmāvacaradevaloke
atk-s0504a:330_5: aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi abhibhavitvā dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanto icchitanipphattiyāva
atk-s0504a:333_0: 20. Dasamassa kā uppatti? Aṭṭhuppattiyeva. Ekadivasaṃ kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:333_1: sannisinnā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, idhekacco bahuṃ puññakammaṃ karoti, ekacco
atk-s0504a:333_2: bahuṃ pāpakammaṃ, ekacco ubhayavomissakaṃ karoti. Tattha vomissakārino kīdiso abhisamparāyo”ti?
atk-s0504a:333_3: Atha satthā dhammasabhaṃ upaganvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno taṃ kathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0504a:333_4: “bhikkhave, maraṇāsannakāle saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa duggati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti dassento imāya
atk-s0504a:334_0: Tattha idhāti desāpadese nipāto. Svāyaṃ katthaci padesaṃ upādāya vuccati “idheva
atk-s0504a:334_1: tiṭṭhamānassa, devabhūtassa me sato”tiādīsu. Katthaci sāsanaṃ upādāya “idheva, bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:334_2: samaṇo idha dutiyo samaṇo”tiādīsu. Katthaci padapūraṇamatte “idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:334_3: bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito”tiādīsu. Katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati “idha tathāgato loke
atk-s0504a:334_4: uppajjatī”tiādīsu. Idhāpi loke eva daṭṭhabbo. Ekaccanti ekaṃ, aññataranti attho.
atk-s0504a:334_5: Puggalanti sattaṃ. So hi yathāpaccayaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ tabbipākānañca pūraṇato maraṇavasena
atk-s0504a:334_6: galanato ca puggaloti vuccati. Paduṭṭhacittanti padosena āghātena duṭṭhacittaṃ. Atha
atk-s0504a:334_7: vā paduṭṭhacittanti dosena rāgādinā padūsitacittaṃ. Ettha ca ekaccanti idaṃ paduṭṭhacittassa
atk-s0504a:334_8: puggalassa visesanaṃ. Yassa hi paṭisandhidāyakakammaṃ okāsamakāsi, so tathā vutto.
atk-s0504a:334_9: Yassa ca akusalappavattito cittaṃ nivattetvā kusalavasena otāretuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ
atk-s0504a:334_10: āsannamaraṇo. Evanti idāni vattabbākāraṃ dasseti. Cetasāti attano cittena cetopariyañāṇena.
atk-s0504a:334_11: Cetoti tassa puggalassa cittaṃ. Pariccāti paricchinditvā pajānāmi. Nanu ca yathākammupagañāṇassāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:334_12: visayoti? Saccametaṃ, tadā pavattamānaakusalacittavasena panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:335_0: Imamhi cāyaṃ samayeti imasmiṃ kāle, imāyaṃ vā paccayasāmaggiyaṃ, ayaṃ puggalo javanavīthiyā
atk-s0504a:335_1: aparabhāge kālaṃ kareyya ceti attho. Na hi javanakkhaṇe kālaṃkiriyā atthi. Yathābhataṃ
atk-s0504a:335_2: nikkhitto evaṃ nirayeti yathā ābhataṃ kiñci āharitvā ṭhapitaṃ, evaṃ attano kammunā
atk-s0504a:335_3: nikkhitto niraye ṭhapito evāti attho. Kāyassa bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā.
atk-s0504a:335_4: Paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇe. Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti
atk-s0504a:335_5: jīvitindriyassa upacchedā. Paraṃ maraṇāti cutito uddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:336_0: Apāyantiādi sabbaṃ nirayasseva vevacanaṃ. Nirayo hi ayasaṅkhātā sukhā apetoti apāyo;
atk-s0504a:336_1: saggamokkhahetubhūtā vā puññasammatā ayā apetotipi apāyo. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti
atk-s0504a:336_2: duggati; dosabahulattā vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatītipi duggati. Vivasā nipatanti
atk-s0504a:336_3: ettha dukkaṭakammakārino, vinassantā vā ettha nipatanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti
atk-s0504a:336_4: vinipāto. Natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti nirassādaṭṭhena nirayo. Atha vā apāyaggahaṇena
atk-s0504a:336_5: tiracchānayoni vuccati. Tiracchānayoni hi apāyo sugatito apetattā, na duggati mahesakkhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:336_6: nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. Duggatiggahaṇena pettivisayo. So hi apāyo ceva duggati
atk-s0504a:336_7: ca sugatito apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā, na vinipāto asurasadisaṃ avinipātattā.
atk-s0504a:336_8: Vinipātaggahaṇena asurakāyo. So hi yathāvuttena atthena apāyo ceva duggati ca, sabbasampattisamussayehi
atk-s0504a:336_9: vinipatitattā vinipātoti ca vuccati. Nirayaggahaṇena avīciādianekappakāro nirayova
atk-s0504a:336_10: vuccati. Idha pana sabbapadehipi nirayova vutto. Upapajjantīti paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0504a:337_0: Gāthāsu paṭhamagāthā saṅgītikāle dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi ṭhapitā. Ñatvānāti pubbakālakiriyā.
atk-s0504a:337_1: Ñāṇapubbakañhi byākaraṇaṃ. Hetuattho vā tvā-saddo yathā “sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī”ti,
atk-s0504a:337_2: jānanahetūti attho. Buddho, bhikkhūnaṃ santiketi buddho bhagavā attano santike bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0504a:337_3: etaṃ parato dvīhi gāthāhi vuccamānaṃ atthaṃ byākāsi. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:342_1: ca pasannamānasaṃ. Sugatinti sundaraṃ gatiṃ, sukhassa vā gatinti sugatiṃ. Sagganti
atk-s0504a:342_2: rūpādisampattīhi suṭṭhu agganti saggaṃ. Lokanti lokiyanti ettha puññapāpaphalāni,
atk-s0504a:342_3: lujjanaṭṭheneva vā lokaṃ. Ettha ca sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhati, saggaggahaṇena
atk-s0504a:345_0: 22. Dutiye mā, bhikkhave, puññānanti ettha māti paṭisedhe nipāto. Puññasaddo “kusalānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:345_1: bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ samādānahetu evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu puññaphale āgato.
atk-s0504a:345_5: puññakiriyavatthu, bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthū”tiādīsu kusalacetanāyaṃ. Idha pana
atk-s0504a:345_6: tebhūmakakusaladhamme veditabbo. Bhāyitthāti ettha duvidhaṃ bhayaṃ ñāṇabhayaṃ, sārajjabhayanti.
atk-s0504a:345_7: Tattha “yepi te, bhikkhave, devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu
atk-s0504a:345_8: ciraṭṭhitikā, tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ
atk-s0504a:345_9: āpajjantī”tiādīsu āgataṃ ñāṇabhayaṃ. “Ahudeva bhayaṃ, ahu chambhitattaṃ, ahu lomahaṃso”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:345_10: āgataṃ sārajjabhayaṃ. Idhāpi sārajjabhayameva. Ayañhettha attho – bhikkhave, dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0504a:345_11: kāyavacīsaṃyamo vattapaṭivattapūraṇaṃ ekāsanaṃ, ekaseyyaṃ, indriyadamo, dhutadhammehi
atk-s0504a:345_12: cittassa niggaho, satisampajaññaṃ, kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena vīriyārambhoti evamādīni
atk-s0504a:345_13: yāni bhikkhunā, nirantaraṃ pavattetabbāni puññāni, tehi mā bhāyittha, mā bhayaṃ santāsaṃ
atk-s0504a:345_15: puññehi mā bhāyitthāti. Nissakke hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:346_0: Idāni tato abhāyitabbabhāve kāraṇaṃ dassento “sukhasseta”ntiādimāha. Tattha sukhasaddo
atk-s0504a:346_1: “sukho buddhānaṃ uppādo, sukhā virāgatā loke”tiādīsu sukhamūle āgato. “Yasmā ca kho,
atk-s0504a:346_2: mahāli, rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkanta”ntiādīsu sukhārammaṇe. “Yāvañcidaṃ,
atk-s0504a:346_3: bhikkhave, na sukaraṃ akkhānena pāpuṇituṃ yāva sukhā saggā”tiādīsu sukhapaccayaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0504a:346_5: abyāpajje. “Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”ntiādīsu nibbāne. “Sukhassa ca pahānā”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:346_7: “Dvepi mayā, ānanda, vedanā vuttā pariyāyena sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:346_8: iṭṭhasukhe. “Sukho vipāko puññāna”ntiādīsu sukhavipāke. Idhāpi iṭṭhavipāke eva daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:346_9: Iṭṭhassātiādīsu esitabbato aniṭṭhapaṭikkhepato ca iṭṭhassa, kamanīyato manasmiñca
atk-s0504a:346_10: kamanato pavisanato kantassa, piyāyitabbato santappanato ca piyassa, mānanīyato manassa
atk-s0504a:346_11: pavaḍḍhanato ca manāpassāti attho veditabbo. Yadidaṃ puññānīti “puññānī”ti yadidaṃ
atk-s0504a:346_12: vacanaṃ, etaṃ sukhassa iṭṭhassa vipākassa adhivacanaṃ nāmaṃ, sukhameva taṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0504a:346_13: puññanti phalena kāraṇassa abhedūpacāraṃ vadati. Tena katūpacitānaṃ puññānaṃ avassaṃbhāviphalaṃ
atk-s0504a:346_14: sutvā appamattena sakkaccaṃ puññāni kātabbānīti puññakiriyāyaṃ niyojeti, ādarañca
atk-s0504a:347_0: Idāni attanā sunettakāle katena puññakammena dīgharattaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ bhavantarapaṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0504a:347_1: uḷāratamaṃ puññavipākaṃ udāharitvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto “abhijānāmi kho panāha”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:347_2: Tattha abhijānāmīti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānāmi, paccakkhato bujjhāmi. Dīgharattanti
atk-s0504a:347_3: cirakālaṃ. Puññānanti dānādikusaladhammānaṃ. Satta vassānīti satta saṃvaccharāni.
atk-s0504a:347_4: Mettacittanti mijjatīti mettā, siniyhatīti attho. Mitte bhavā, mittassa vā esā pavattītipi
atk-s0504a:347_5: mettā. Lakkhaṇādito pana hitākārappavattilakkhaṇā, hitūpasaṃhārarasā, āghātavinayapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0504a:347_6: sattānaṃ manāpabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā. Byāpādūpasamo etissā sampatti, sinehāsambhavo
atk-s0504a:347_7: vipatti. Sā etassa atthīti mettacittaṃ. Bhāvetvāti mettāsahagataṃ cittaṃ, cittasīsena
atk-s0504a:347_8: samādhi vuttoti mettāsamādhiṃ mettābrahmavihāraṃ uppādetvā ceva vaḍḍhetvā ca. Satta
atk-s0504a:347_9: saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappeti satta mahākappe. Saṃvaṭṭa-vivaṭṭaggahaṇeneva hi saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyi-vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyinopi
atk-s0504a:347_10: gahitā. Imaṃ lokanti kāmalokaṃ. Saṃvaṭṭamāne sudanti saṃvaṭṭamāne. Sudanti nipātamattaṃ
atk-s0504a:347_11: vinassamāneti attho. “Saṃvattamāne suda”nti ca paṭhanti. Kappeti kāle. Kappasīsena
atk-s0504a:347_12: hi kālo vutto. Kāle khīyamāne kappopi khīyateva. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:349_2: ābhassarūpago homi. Vivaṭṭamāneti saṇṭhahamāne, jāyamāneti attho. Suññaṃ brahmavimānaṃ
atk-s0504a:349_3: upapajjāmīti kassaci sattassa tattha nibbattassa abhāvato suññaṃ, yaṃ paṭhamajjhānabhūmisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0504a:349_4: brahmavimānaṃ ādito nibbattaṃ, taṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena upapajjāmi upemi. Brahmāti
atk-s0504a:349_5: kāmāvacarasattehi seṭṭhaṭṭhena tathā tathā brūhitaguṇatāya brahmavihārato nibbattaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:349_6: ca brahmā. Brahmapārisajjabrahmapurohitehi mahanto brahmāti mahābrahmā. Tato eva
atk-s0504a:349_7: te abhibhavitvā ṭhitattā abhibhū. Tehi kenaci guṇena na abhibhūtoti anabhibhūto.
atk-s0504a:349_8: Aññadatthūti ekaṃsavacane nipāto. Dasoti dassanasīlo, so atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ
atk-s0504a:349_9: dassanasamattho, abhiññāṇena passitabbaṃ passāmīti attho. Sesabrahmānaṃ iddhipādabhāvanābalena
atk-s0504a:349_10: attano cittañca mama vase vattemīti vasavattī homīti yojetabbaṃ. Tadā kira bodhisatto
atk-s0504a:349_11: aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīpi samāno tathā sattahitaṃ attano pāramiparipūraṇañca olokento
atk-s0504a:349_12: tāsu eva dvīsu jhānabhūmīsu nikantiṃ uppādetvā mettābrahmavihāravasena aparāparaṃ
atk-s0504a:350_0: Evaṃ bhagavā rūpāvacarapuññassa vipākamahantataṃ pakāsetvā idāni kāmāvacarapuññassāpi
atk-s0504a:350_1: taṃ dassento “chattiṃsakkhattu”ntiādimāha. Tattha sakko ahosinti chattiṃsa vāre aññattha
atk-s0504a:350_2: anupapajjitvā nirantaraṃ sakko devānamindo tāvatiṃsadevarājā ahosi. Rājā ahosintiādīsu
atk-s0504a:350_3: catūhi acchariyadhammehi catūhi ca saṅgahavatthūhi lokaṃ rañjetīti rājā. Cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0504a:350_4: vatteti, catūhi sampatticakkehi vattati, tehi ca paraṃ vatteti, parahitāya ca iriyāpathacakkānaṃ
atk-s0504a:350_5: vatto etasmiṃ atthīti cakkavattī. Rājāti cettha sāmaññaṃ, cakkavattīti visesaṃ. Dhammena
atk-s0504a:350_6: caratīti dhammiko. Ñāyena samena vattatīti attho. Dhammeneva rajjaṃ labhitvā rājā
atk-s0504a:350_7: jātoti dhammarājā. Parahitadhammacaraṇena vā dhammiko, attahitadhammacaraṇena dhammarājā,
atk-s0504a:350_8: caturantāya issaroti cāturanto, catusamuddantāya catubbidhadīpavibhūsitāya ca pathaviyā
atk-s0504a:350_9: issaroti attho. Ajjhattaṃ kopādipaccatthike, bahiddhā ca sabbarājāno adaṇḍena asatthena
atk-s0504a:350_10: vijesīti vijitāvī. Janapade thāvarabhāvaṃ dhuvabhāvaṃ patto, na sakkā kenaci tato
atk-s0504a:350_11: cāletuṃ janapado vā tamhi thāvariyappatto anuyutto sakammanirato acalo asampavedhīti
atk-s0504a:351_0: Cakkaratanaṃ, hatthiratanaṃ, assaratanaṃ, maṇiratanaṃ, itthiratanaṃ, gahapatiratanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:351_1: pariṇāyakaratananti imehi sattahi ratanehi samupetoti sattaratanasamannāgato. Tesu
atk-s0504a:351_2: hi rājā cakkavatti cakkaratanena ajitaṃ jināti, hatthiassaratanehi vijite sukheneva
atk-s0504a:351_4: Paṭhamena cassa ussāhasattiyogo, pacchimena mantasattiyogo, hatthiassagahapatiratanehi
atk-s0504a:351_5: pabhūsattiyogo suparipuṇṇo hoti, itthimaṇiratanehi tividhasattiyogaphalaṃ. So itthimaṇiratanehi
atk-s0504a:351_6: paribhogasukhamanubhavati, sesehi upabhogasukhaṃ. Visesato cassa purimāni tīṇi adosakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvena
atk-s0504a:352_0: Etadahosīti attano sampattiyo paccavekkhantassa pacchime cakkavattikāle etaṃ “kissa
atk-s0504a:352_1: nu kho me idaṃ kammassa phala”ntiādikaṃ ahosi. Sabbatthakameva tasmiṃ tasmimpi bhave
atk-s0504a:352_2: etadahosiyeva. Tatthāyaṃ cakkavattikālavasena yojanā. Evaṃmahiddhikoti maṇiratanahatthiratanādippamukhāya
atk-s0504a:352_4: cakkaratanādisamannāgamena kassacipi pīḷaṃ akarontova sabbarājūhi sirasā sampaṭicchitasāsanavehāsagamanādīhi
atk-s0504a:352_5: evaṃ mahānubhāvo. Dānassāti annādideyyadhammapariccāgassa. Damassāti cakkhādiindriyadamanassa
atk-s0504a:352_6: ceva samādhānavasena rāgādikilesadamanassa ca. Saṃyamassāti kāyavacīsaṃyamassa. Tattha
atk-s0504a:352_7: yaṃ samādhānavasena kilesadamanaṃ, taṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puññaṃ, tañca kho mettābrahmavihārabhūtaṃ
atk-s0504a:352_8: idhādhippetaṃ. Tasmiñca upacārappanābhedena duvidhe yaṃ appanāppattaṃ, tenassa yathāvuttāsu
atk-s0504a:352_9: dvīsu jhānabhūmīsu upapatti ahosi. Itarena tividhenāpi yathārahaṃ pattacakkavattiādibhāvoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:353_0: Iti bhagavā attānaṃ kāyasakkhi katvā puññānaṃ vipākamahantataṃ pakāsetvā idāni tamevatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:353_1: gāthābandhena dassento “puññamevā”tiādimāha. Tattha puññameva so sikkheyyāti yo atthakāmo
atk-s0504a:353_2: kulaputto, so puññaphalanibbattanato, attano santānaṃ punanato ca “puñña”nti laddhanāmaṃ
atk-s0504a:353_3: tividhaṃ kusalameva sikkheyya niveseyya upacineyya pasaveyyāti attho. Āyatagganti
atk-s0504a:353_4: vipulaphalatāya uḷāraphalatāya āyataggaṃ, piyamanāpaphalatāya vā āyatiṃ uttamanti
atk-s0504a:353_5: āyataggaṃ, āyena vā yonisomanasikārādippaccayena uḷāratamena agganti āyataggaṃ. Takāro
atk-s0504a:353_6: padasandhikaro. Atha vā āyena puññaphalena aggaṃ padhānanti āyataggaṃ. Tato eva sukhudrayaṃ
atk-s0504a:354_0: Katamaṃ pana taṃ puññaṃ, kathañca naṃ sikkheyyāti āha “dānañca samacariyañca, mettacittañca
atk-s0504a:354_1: bhāvaye”ti. Tattha samacariyanti kāyavisamādīni vajjetvā kāyasamādicaritaṃ, suvisuddhaṃ
atk-s0504a:354_2: sīlanti attho. Bhāvayeti attano santāne uppādeyya vaḍḍheyya. Ete dhammeti ete dānādike
atk-s0504a:354_3: sucaritadhamme. Sukhasamuddayeti sukhānisaṃse, ānisaṃsaphalampi nesaṃ sukhamevāti
atk-s0504a:354_4: dasseti. Abyāpajjaṃ sukhaṃ lokanti kāmacchandādibyāpādavirahitattā abyāpajjaṃ niddukkhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:354_5: parapīḷābhāve pana vattabbaṃ natthi. Jhānasamāpattivasena sukhabahulattā sukhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:354_6: ekantasukhañca brahmalokaṃ jhānapuññānaṃ, itarapuññānaṃ pana tadaññaṃ sampattibhavasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0504a:354_7: sukhaṃ lokaṃ paṇḍito sappañño upapajjati upeti. Iti imasmiṃ sutte gāthāsu ca vaṭṭasampatti eva kathitā.
atk-s0504a:357_0: 23. Tatiye bhāvitoti uppādito ca vaḍḍhito ca. Bahulīkatoti punappunaṃ kato. Atthoti
atk-s0504a:357_1: hitaṃ. Tañhi araṇīyato upagantabbato atthoti vuccati. Samadhigayha tiṭṭhatīti sammā
atk-s0504a:357_2: pariggahetvā avijahitvā vattati. Diṭṭhadhammikanti diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto
atk-s0504a:357_3: attabhāvo, diṭṭhadhamme bhavaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ, idhalokapariyāpannanti attho. Samparāyikanti
atk-s0504a:357_4: dhammavasena samparetabbato samparāyo, paraloko, samparāye bhavaṃ samparāyikaṃ, paralokapariyāpannanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:358_0: Ko panesa diṭṭhadhammiko nāma attho, ko vā samparāyikoti? Saṅkhepena tāva yaṃ idhalokasukhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:358_1: yañcetarahi idhalokasukhāvahaṃ, ayaṃ diṭṭhadhammiko attho. Seyyathidaṃ – gahaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:358_2: tāva idha yaṃ kiñci vittūpakaraṇaṃ, anākulakammantatā, ārogyasaṃvidhānaṃ, vatthuvisadakiriyāyogavihitāni
atk-s0504a:358_3: sippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānāni saṅgahitaparijanatāti evamādi. Pabbajitānaṃ pana ye ime
atk-s0504a:358_5: tattha ca saṅkhāya paṭisevanā, saṅkhāya parivajjanā, vatthuvisadakiriyā, appicchatā,
atk-s0504a:358_7: pana ubhayesaṃ sādhāraṇā ubhayānurūpā cāti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:359: Appamādoti ettha appamādo pamādappaṭipakkhato veditabbo. Ko panesa pamādo nāma? Pamajjanākāro. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:360_0: “Tattha katamo pamādo? Kāyaduccarite vā vacīduccarite vā manoduccarite vā pañcasu
atk-s0504a:360_1: vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo vossaggānuppādanaṃ kusalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya
atk-s0504a:360_3: nikkhittadhuratā anāsevanā abhāvanā abahulīkammaṃ anadhiṭṭhānaṃ ananuyogopamādo.
atk-s0504a:360_4: Yo evarūpo pamādo pamajjanā pamajjitattaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati pamādo”ti.
atk-s0504a:361_0: Tasmā vuttappaṭipakkhato appamādo veditabbo. Atthato hi so satiyā avippavāso, niccaṃ
atk-s0504a:361_1: upaṭṭhitassatiyā etaṃ nāmaṃ. Apare pana “satisampajaññayogena pavattā cattāro arūpino
atk-s0504a:362_0: “Bhāvito bahūlīkato”ti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ panāyaṃ appamādo bhāvetabboti? Na appamādabhāvanā
atk-s0504a:362_1: nāma visuṃ ekabhāvanā atthi. Yā hi kāci puññakiriyā kusalakiriyā, sabbā sā appamādabhāvanātveva
atk-s0504a:362_2: veditabbā. Visesato pana vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ kāyikavācasikasaṃvarañca
atk-s0504a:362_3: upādāya sabbā sīlabhāvanā, sabbā samādhibhāvanā, sabbā paññābhāvanā, sabbā kusalabhāvanā,
atk-s0504a:362_4: anavajjabhāvanā, appamādabhāvanāti veditabbā. “Appamādo”ti hi idaṃ mahantaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0504a:362_5: dīpeti, mahantaṃ atthaṃ pariggahetvā tiṭṭhati. Sakalampi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0504a:362_6: āharitvā appamādapadassa atthaṃ katvā kathento dhammakathiko “atitthena pakkhando”ti
atk-s0504a:362_7: na vattabbo. Kasmā? Appamādapadassa mahantabhāvato. Tathā hi sammāsambuddho kusinārāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:362_8: yamakasālānamantare parinibbānasamaye nipanno abhisambodhito paṭṭhāya pañcacattālīsāya
atk-s0504a:362_9: vassesu attanā bhāsitaṃ dhammaṃ ekena padena saṅgahetvā dassento – “appamādena sampādethā”ti
atk-s0504a:363_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici jaṅgalānaṃ pāṇānaṃ padajātāni, sabbāni tāni hatthipade
atk-s0504a:363_1: samodhānaṃ gacchanti, hatthipadaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati yadidaṃ mahantaṭṭhena; evameva
atk-s0504a:363_2: kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbete appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā,
atk-s0504a:364_0: Gāthāsu appamādaṃ pasaṃsantīti dānādipuññakiriyāsu appamādaṃ appamajjanaṃ paṇḍitā
atk-s0504a:364_1: sappaññā buddhādayo pasaṃsanti, vaṇṇenti thomenti. Kasmā? Yasmā appamatto ubho atthe
atk-s0504a:364_2: adhigaṇhāti paṇḍito. Ke pana te ubho atthāti āha – “diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo
atk-s0504a:364_3: cattho samparāyiko”ti, evamettha padayojanā veditabbā. Idhāpi diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo
atk-s0504a:364_4: atthoti gahaṭṭhassa tāva “anavajjāni kammāni, anākulā ca kammantā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0504a:364_5: vutto kasigorakkhādividhinā laddhabbo attho, pabbajitassa pana avippaṭisārādiattho
atk-s0504a:364_6: veditabbo. Yo cattho samparāyikoti pana ubhayesampi dhammacariyāva vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:364_7: Atthābhisamayāti duvidhassapi atthassa hitassa paṭilābhā, laddhabbena samiti saṅgati
atk-s0504a:364_8: samodhānanti samayo, lābho. Samayo eva abhisamayo, abhimukhabhāvena vā samayo abhisamayoti
atk-s0504a:364_9: evamettha abhisamayo veditabbo. Dhitisampannattā dhīro. Tatiyena cettha attha-saddena
atk-s0504a:364_10: paramatthassa nibbānassāpi saṅgaho veditabbo. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Iti imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0504a:364_11: vaṭṭasampatti eva kathitā. Gāthāyaṃ pana vivaṭṭassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0504a:366: Appamattā na mīyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
atk-s0504a:374_0: 24. Catutthe ekapuggalassāti ettha puggaloti ayaṃ vohārakathā. Buddhassa hi bhagavato
atk-s0504a:374_1: duvidhā desanā sammutidesanā ca paramatthadesanā cāti. Tattha “puggalo, satto, itthī,
atk-s0504a:374_2: puriso, khattiyo, brāhmaṇo, devo, māro”ti evarūpā sammutidesanā. “Aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:374_3: anattā, khandhā, dhātu, āyatanā, satipaṭṭhānā”ti evarūpā paramatthadesanā. Tattha
atk-s0504a:374_4: bhagavā ye sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvā visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā, nesaṃ sammutidesanaṃ
atk-s0504a:374_5: deseti. Ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṃ sutvā visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā, tesaṃ
atk-s0504a:375_0: Tatthāyaṃ upamā – yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanako ācariyo
atk-s0504a:375_1: ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṃ jānanti, tesaṃ damiḷabhāsāya ācikkhati. Ye andhakabhāsādīsu
atk-s0504a:375_2: aññatarāya, tesaṃ tāya tāya bhāsāya. Evaṃ te māṇavakā chekaṃ byattaṃ ācariyamāgamma
atk-s0504a:375_3: khippameva sippaṃ uggaṇhanti. Tattha ācariyo viya buddho bhagavā, tayo vedā viya
atk-s0504a:375_4: kathetabbabhāve ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni, desabhāsākosallamiva sammutiparamatthakosallaṃ,
atk-s0504a:375_5: nānādesabhāsā māṇavakā viya sammutiparamatthavasena paṭivijjhanasamatthā veneyyā,
atk-s0504a:375_6: ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṃ viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasena desanā
atk-s0504a:382_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti – hirottappadīpanatthaṃ, kammassakatādīpanatthaṃ,
atk-s0504a:382_3: hiriyanti ottappantī”ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti, sammohaṃ āpajjati, paṭisattu
atk-s0504a:382_4: vā hoti – “kimidaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanāni hiriyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti? “Itthī hiriyati
atk-s0504a:382_5: ottappati, puriso, khattiyo, brāhmaṇo, devo, māro”ti pana vutte jānāti, na sammohaṃ
atk-s0504a:382_6: āpajjati, na paṭisattu vā hoti. Tasmā bhagavā hirottappadīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0504a:383: “Khandhā kammassakā, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā kammassakatādīpanatthampi puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0504a:384_0: “Veḷuvanādayo mahāvihārā khandhehi kārāpitā, dhātūhi āyatanehī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0504a:384_1: Tathā “khandhā mātaraṃ jīvitā voropenti, pitaraṃ, arahantaṃ, ruhiruppādakammaṃ, saṅghabhedakammaṃ
atk-s0504a:384_2: karonti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. “Khandhā mettāyanti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti
atk-s0504a:384_3: vuttepi eseva nayo. “Khandhā pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi
atk-s0504a:384_4: eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṃ ānantariyadīpanatthaṃ brahmavihāradīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:385_0: “Khandhā dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti, sammohaṃ
atk-s0504a:385_1: āpajjati, paṭisattu vā hoti “kimidaṃ khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni paṭiggaṇhanti nāmā”ti?
atk-s0504a:385_2: “Puggalā paṭiggaṇhantī”ti pana vutte jānāti, na sammohaṃ āpajjati, na paṭisattu vā
atk-s0504a:385_3: hoti. Tasmā bhagavā dakkhiṇāvisuddhidīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0504a:386_0: Lokasammutiñca buddhā bhagavanto na pajahanti, lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyā lokābhilāpe
atk-s0504a:386_1: ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti. Tasmā bhagavā lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi puggalakathaṃ
atk-s0504a:386_2: katheti. So idhāpi lokavohāravasena desetabbamatthaṃ dassento “ekapuggalassā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:387_0: Tattha ekapuggalassāti ekasattassa. Kappanti mahākappaṃ. Yadipi accantasaṃyoge idaṃ
atk-s0504a:387_1: upayogavacanaṃ, yattha pana sattānaṃ sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ sambhavati, tassa vasena
atk-s0504a:387_3: attho. Aṭṭhipuñjoti aṭṭhisamūho. Aṭṭhirāsīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Keci pana “kaṭippamāṇato
atk-s0504a:387_4: heṭṭhā samūho kaṅkalo nāma, tato upari yāva tālappamāṇaṃ puñjo, tato upari rāsī”ti
atk-s0504a:387_5: vadanti. Taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Sabbametaṃ samūhasseva pariyāyavacanaṃ vepullasseva
atk-s0504a:388_0: Sace saṃhārako assāti avippakiraṇavasena saṃharitvā ṭhapetā koci yadi siyāti parikappanavasena
atk-s0504a:388_1: vadati. Sambhatañca na vinasseyyāti tathā kenaci sambhatañca taṃ aṭṭhikaṅkalaṃ antaradhānābhāvena
atk-s0504a:388_2: pūtibhūtaṃ cuṇṇavicuṇṇañca ahutvā sace na vinasseyyāti parikappanavaseneva vadati.
atk-s0504a:388_3: Ayañhettha attho – bhikkhave, ekassa sattassa kammakilesehi aparāparuppattivasena
atk-s0504a:388_4: ekaṃ mahākappaṃ sandhāvantassa saṃsarantassa evaṃ mahāaṭṭhisañcayo bhaveyya, ārohapariṇāhehi
atk-s0504a:388_5: yattakoyaṃ vepullapabbato. Sace panassa koci saṃharitvā ṭhapetā bhaveyya, sambhatañca
atk-s0504a:388_6: taṃ sace avinassantaṃ tiṭṭheyyāti. Ayañca nayo nibbutappadīpe viya bhijjanasabhāve
atk-s0504a:388_7: kaḷevaranikkheparahite opapātikattabhāve sabbena sabbaṃ anaṭṭhike ca khuddakattabhāve
atk-s0504a:388_8: vajjetvā vutto. Keci pana “parikappanavasena imassa nayassa āhaṭattā tesampi yadi
atk-s0504a:388_9: siyā aṭṭhikaṅkalo, tenāpi saheva ayaṃ aṭṭhipuñjaparimāṇo vutto”ti vadanti. Apare
atk-s0504a:388_10: pana “nayidamevaṃ labbhamānasseva aṭṭhipuñjassa vasena sabbaññutaññāṇena paricchinditvā
atk-s0504a:388_11: imassa parimāṇassa vuttatā. Tasmā vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo”ti.
atk-s0504a:389_0: Gāthāsu mahesināti mahante sīlakkhandhādayo esati gavesatīti mahesī, sammāsambuddho.
atk-s0504a:389_1: “Iti vuttaṃ mahesinā”ti ca bhagavā “dasabalasamannāgato, bhikkhave, tathāgato”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:389_2: viya attānaṃ aññaṃ viya katvā dasseti. Vepulloti rājagahaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitesu pañcasu
atk-s0504a:389_3: pabbatesu vipulabhāvato vepulloti laddhanāmo. Tato eva mahā, ṭhitadisābhāgavasena
atk-s0504a:389_4: uttaro gijjhakūṭassa. Giribbajeti giribbajapuranāmakassa rājagahassa samīpe.
atk-s0504a:390_1: puthujjanassa ayamīdisī kaṭasivaḍḍhanā”ti vaṭṭe ādīnavaṃ dassetvā idāni yesaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ
atk-s0504a:390_2: ananubodhā appaṭivedhā andhaputhujjanassa evaṃ kaṭasivaḍḍhanā, tāni ariyasaccāni
atk-s0504a:390_3: diṭṭhavato ariyapuggalassa ayaṃ natthīti dassento “yato ca ariyasaccānī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:391_0: Tattha yatoti yadā. Ariyasaccānīti araṇīyato ariyāni, avitathabhāvena saccāni cāti
atk-s0504a:391_1: ariyasaccāni, ariyabhāvakarāni vā saccāni ariyasaccāni, ariyehi vā buddhādīhi paṭivijjhitabbāni
atk-s0504a:391_2: saccāni ariyasaccāni. Atha vā ariyassa saccāni ariyasaccāni. Sadevakena hi lokena
atk-s0504a:391_3: saraṇanti araṇīyato ariyo bhagavā, tena sayambhuñāṇena diṭṭhattā tassa saccānīti
atk-s0504a:391_4: ariyasaccāni. Sammappaññāya passatīti sammā hetunā ñāyena vipassanāpaññāsahitāya
atk-s0504a:391_7: tucchabhāvato ca dukkhaṃ. Dukkhaṃ samuppajjati etenāti dukkhasamuppādo, dukkhasamudayo.
atk-s0504a:391_8: Dukkhaṃ atikkamati etena ārammaṇappaccayabhūtena, ettha vāti dukkhassa atikkamo,
atk-s0504a:391_9: nibbānaṃ. Ārakattā kilesehi araṇīyato ca ariyo. Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ
atk-s0504a:391_10: vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko. Mārento kilese gacchati, nibbānatthikehi maggīyati, sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ
atk-s0504a:391_11: maggatīti maggo. Tato eva dukkhassa upasamaṃ nirodhaṃ gacchatīti dukkhūpasamagāmī.
atk-s0504a:392_0: Sa sattakkhattuṃ paramaṃ, sandhāvitvāna puggaloti so evaṃ catusaccadassāvī ariyapuggalo
atk-s0504a:392_1: sotāpanno sabbamudindriyo samāno sattavāraparamaṃyeva bhavādīsu aparāparuppattivasena
atk-s0504a:392_2: sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā. Ekabījī, kolaṃkolo, sattakkhattuparamoti indriyānaṃ tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena
atk-s0504a:392_3: tayo hi sotāpannā. Tesu sabbamudindriyassa vasenidaṃ vuttaṃ “sa sattakkhattuṃ paramaṃ,
atk-s0504a:392_4: sandhāvitvānā”ti. Dukkhassantakaro hotīti vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro pariyosānakaro
atk-s0504a:392_5: hoti. Kathaṃ? Sabbasaṃyojanakkhayā anupubbena aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā niravasesānaṃ
atk-s0504a:392_6: saṃyojanānaṃ khepanāti arahattaphaleneva desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0504a:395_0: 25. Pañcame ekadhammaṃ atītassāti kā uppatti? Bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahālābhasakkāro
atk-s0504a:395_1: uppajji, titthiyānaṃ parihāyi. Te hatalābhasakkārā nippabhā nittejā issāpakatā ciñcamāṇavikaṃ
atk-s0504a:395_2: nāma paribbājikaṃ uyyojesuṃ – “ehi, tvaṃ bhagini, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhassū”ti.
atk-s0504a:395_3: Sā bhagavantaṃ catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desentaṃ upagantvā abhūtena abbhācikkhitvā
atk-s0504a:395_4: sakkenassā abhūtabhāve pakāsite mahājanena “dhī kāḷakaṇṇī”ti vihārato nikkaḍḍhāpitā
atk-s0504a:395_5: pathaviyā vivare dinne avīcijālānaṃ indhanaṃ hutvāva avīciniraye nibbatti, bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0504a:395_6: titthiyānaṃ lābhasakkāro parihāyi. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0504a:395_7: ciñcamāṇavikā evaṃ uḷāraguṇaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ abhūtena akkositvā
atk-s0504a:395_8: mahāvināsaṃ pattā”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0504a:395_9: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi sā maṃ abhūtena akkositvā
atk-s0504a:395_10: mahāvināsaṃ pattāyevā”ti mahāpadumajātakampi vitthāretvā upari dhammaṃ desento imissā
atk-s0504a:396_0: Tattha ekadhammanti ekaṃ vacīsaccasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ. Atītassāti yā sā aṭṭha anariyavohāre
atk-s0504a:396_1: vajjetvā aṭṭhasu ariyavohāresu patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ “saccaṃ, bhaṇe, nālika”nti ariyehi
atk-s0504a:396_2: ṭhapitā mariyādā, taṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitassa. Puriso eva puggaloti purisapuggalo, tassa.
atk-s0504a:396_3: Akaraṇīyanti kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ. Sampajānamusāvādī hi puggalo kiñci pāpakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0504a:396_4: “idaṃ nāma tayā kata”nti vutte “na mayā kata”nti musāvādeneva pariharissati. Evañca
atk-s0504a:396_5: paṭipajjanto kiñci pāpakammaṃ karotiyeva, na tattha lajjati saccamariyādāya samatikkantattā.
atk-s0504a:396_6: Tena vuttaṃ “katamaṃ ekadhammaṃ, yadidaṃ, bhikkhave, sampajānamusāvādo”ti.
atk-s0504a:397_0: Gāthāyaṃ musāvādissāti musā abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ paresaṃ viññāpanavasena vadanasīlassa.
atk-s0504a:397_1: Yassa dasasu vacanesu ekampi saccaṃ natthi, evarūpe vattabbameva natthi. Jantunoti
atk-s0504a:397_2: sattassa. Satto hi jāyanaṭṭhena “jantū”ti vuccati. Vitiṇṇaparalokassāti vissaṭṭhaparalokassa.
atk-s0504a:397_3: Īdiso hi manussasampatti devalokasampatti avasāne nibbānasampattīti imā tissopi sampattiyo
atk-s0504a:397_4: na passati. Natthi pāpanti tassa tādisassa idaṃ nāma pāpaṃ na kattabbanti natthīti.
atk-s0504a:400_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe evañceti ettha evanti upamākāre nipāto, ceti parikappane. Sattāti rūpādīsu
atk-s0504a:400_1: sattā visattā. Jāneyyunti bujjheyyuṃ. Dānasaṃvibhāgassāti yāya hi cetanāya annādideyyadhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:400_2: saṃharitvā anukampāpūjāsu aññataravasena paresaṃ dīyati, taṃ dānaṃ. Yāya pana attanā
atk-s0504a:400_3: paribhuñjitabbabhāvena gahitavatthussa ekadeso saṃvibhajitvā dīyati, ayaṃ saṃvibhāgo.
atk-s0504a:400_4: Vipākanti phalaṃ. Yathāhaṃ jānāmīti yathā ahaṃ jānāmi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tiracchānagatassapi
atk-s0504a:400_5: dānaṃ datvā attabhāvasate pavattasukhavipaccanavasena sataguṇā dakkhiṇā hotīti evamādinā,
atk-s0504a:400_6: bhikkhave, yena pakārena ahaṃ dānassa saṃvibhāgassa ca vipākaṃ kammavipākaṃ ñāṇabalena
atk-s0504a:400_7: paccakkhato jānāmi, evaṃ ime sattā yadi jāneyyunti. Na adatvā bhuñjeyyunti yaṃ bhuñjitabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0504a:400_8: attano atthi, tato paresaṃ na adatvā macchariyacittena ca taṇhālobhavasena ca bhuñjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:400_9: datvāva bhuñjeyyuṃ. Na ca nesaṃ maccheramalaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyyāti attano
atk-s0504a:400_11: upakkilesabhūtānaṃ kaṇhadhammānaṃ aññataraṃ maccheramalaṃ. Atha vā yathāvuttamaccherañceva
atk-s0504a:400_12: aññampi dānantarāyakaraṃ issālobhadosādimalañca nesaṃ sattānaṃ cittaṃ yathā dānacetanā
atk-s0504a:400_13: na pavattati, na vā suparisuddhā hoti, evaṃ pariyādāya parito gahetvā abhibhavitvā
atk-s0504a:400_14: na tiṭṭheyya. Ko hi sammadeva dānaphalaṃ jānanto attano citte maccheramalassa okāsaṃ dadeyya.
atk-s0504a:401_0: Yopi nesaṃ assa carimo ālopoti nesaṃ sattānaṃ yo sabbapacchimako ālopo siyā. Carimaṃ
atk-s0504a:401_1: kabaḷanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ime sattā pakatiyā yattakehi ālopehi
atk-s0504a:401_2: sayaṃ yāpeyyuṃ, tesu ekameva ālopaṃ attano atthāya ṭhapetvā tadaññe sabbe ālope āgatāgatānaṃ
atk-s0504a:401_3: atthikānaṃ datvā yo ṭhapito ālopo assa, so idha carimo ālopo nāma. Tatopi na asaṃvibhajitvā
atk-s0504a:401_4: bhuñjeyyuṃ, sace nesaṃ paṭiggāhakā assūti nesaṃ sattānaṃ paṭiggāhakā yadi siyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:401_5: tatopi yathāvuttacarimālopatopi saṃvibhajitvāva ekadesaṃ datvāva bhuñjeyyuṃ, yathāhaṃ
atk-s0504a:401_6: dānasaṃvibhāgassa vipākaṃ paccakkhato jānāmi, evaṃ yadi jāneyyunti. Yasmā ca khotiādinā
atk-s0504a:401_7: kammaphalassa appaccakkhabhāvato evamete sattā dānasaṃvibhāgesu na pavattantīti yathādhippetamatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:401_8: kāraṇena sampaṭipādeti. Eteneva tesaṃ tadaññapuññesu ca appaṭipattiyā apuññesu ca
atk-s0504a:402_0: Gāthāsu yathāvuttaṃ mahesināti mahesinā bhagavatā “tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā
atk-s0504a:402_1: dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā’ tiādinā, idheva vā “evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyu”ntiādinā yathāvuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:402_2: ñāṇacārena taṃ yathāvuttaṃ cittaṃ ñātanti attho. Vipākaṃ saṃvibhāgassāti saṃvibhāgassapi
atk-s0504a:402_3: vipākaṃ, ko pana vādo dānassa. Yathā hoti mahapphalanti yathā so vipāko mahantaṃ
atk-s0504a:402_4: phalaṃ hoti, evaṃ ime sattā yadi jāneyyunti sambandho. Vineyya maccheramalanti macchariyamalaṃ
atk-s0504a:402_5: apanetvā kammaphalasaddhāya ratanattayasaddhāya ca visesato pasannena cittena yesu
atk-s0504a:402_6: kilesehi ārakattā ariyesu sīlādiguṇasampannesu dinnaṃ appakampi dānaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-s0504a:403_0: Mahapphalabhāvakaraṇato dakkhiṇaṃ arahantīti dakkhiṇeyyā, sammāpaṭipannā, tesu dakkhiṇeyyesu.
atk-s0504a:403_1: Dakkhiṇaṃ paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbaṃ deyyadhammaṃ yathā taṃ dānaṃ hoti mahādānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:403_2: evaṃ datvā. Atha vā bahuno annaṃ datvā, kathaṃ pana annaṃ dātabbanti āha “dakkhiṇeyyesu
atk-s0504a:403_3: dakkhiṇa”nti. Ito manussattā manussattabhāvato cutā paṭisandhivasena saggaṃ gacchanti
atk-s0504a:403_4: dāyakā. Kāmakāminoti kāmetabbānaṃ uḷārānaṃ devabhogānaṃ paṭiladdharūpavibhavena kammunā
atk-s0504a:403_5: upagamane sādhukāritāya kāmakāmino sabbakāmasamaṅgino. Modanti yathāruci paricārentīti attho.
atk-s0504a:406: 27. Sattame yāni kānicīti anavasesapariyādānaṃ. Opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūnīti
atk-s0504a:407_0: Tesaṃ niyamanaṃ. Tattha upadhi vuccanti khandhā, upadhissa karaṇaṃ sīlaṃ etesaṃ,
atk-s0504a:407_1: upadhippayojanāni vā opadhikāni. Sampattibhave attabhāvajanakāni paṭisandhipavattivipākadāyakāni.
atk-s0504a:407_2: Puññakiriyavatthūnīti puññakiriyā ca tā tesaṃ tesaṃ phalānisaṃsānaṃ vatthūni cāti
atk-s0504a:407_3: puññakiriyavatthūni. Tāni pana saṅkhepato dānamayaṃ, sīlamayaṃ, bhāvanāmayanti tividhāni
atk-s0504a:407_4: honti. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato tikanipātavaṇṇanāyaṃ āvi bhavissati. Mettāya
atk-s0504a:407_6: hi vutte upacāropi labbhati appanāpi, “cetovimuttī”ti pana vutte appanājhānameva
atk-s0504a:407_7: labbhati. Tañhi nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhammato cittassa suṭṭhu vimuttibhāvena cetovimuttīti
atk-s0504a:407_8: vuccati. Kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasinti mettābrahmavihārassa soḷasabhāgaṃ opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni
atk-s0504a:407_9: na agghanti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – mettāya cetovimuttiyā yo vipāko, taṃ soḷasa koṭṭhāse
atk-s0504a:407_10: katvā tato ekaṃ puna soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā tattha yo ekakoṭṭhāso, na taṃ aññāni opadhikāni
atk-s0504a:407_11: puññakiriyavatthūni agghantīti. Adhiggahetvāti abhibhavitvā. Bhāsateti upakkilesavisuddhiyā
atk-s0504a:407_12: dippati. Tapateti tato eva anavasese paṭipakkhadhamme santapati. Virocatīti ubhayasampattiyā
atk-s0504a:407_13: virocati. Mettā hi cetovimutti candālokasaṅkhātā vigatūpakkilesā juṇhā viya dippati,
atk-s0504a:407_14: ātapo viya andhakāraṃ paccanīkadhamme vidhamantī tapati, osadhitārakā viya vijjotamānā virocati ca.
atk-s0504a:408_0: Seyyathāpīti opammadassanatthe nipāto. Tārakarūpānanti jotīnaṃ. Candiyāti candassa
atk-s0504a:408_1: ayanti candī, tassā candiyā, pabhāya juṇhāyāti attho. Vassānanti vassānaṃ bahuvasena
atk-s0504a:408_2: laddhavohārassa utuno. Pacchime māseti kattikamāse. Saradasamayeti saradakāle. Assayujakattikamāsā
atk-s0504a:408_3: hi loke “saradautū”ti vuccanti. Viddheti ubbiddhe, meghavigamena dūrībhūteti attho.
atk-s0504a:408_4: Tenevāha “vigatavalāhake”ti. Deveti ākāse. Nabhaṃ abbhussakkamānoti udayaṭṭhānato
atk-s0504a:408_5: ākāsaṃ ullaṅghanto. Tamagatanti tamaṃ. Abhivihaccāti abhihantvā vidhamitvā. Osadhitārakāti
atk-s0504a:408_6: ussannā pabhā etāya dhīyati, osadhīnaṃ vā anubalappadāyikattā osadhīti laddhanāmā tārakā.
atk-s0504a:409_0: Etthāha – kasmā pana bhagavatā samānepi opadhikabhāve mettā itarehi opadhikapuññehi
atk-s0504a:409_1: visesetvā vuttāti? Vuccate – seṭṭhaṭṭhena niddosabhāvena ca sattesu suppaṭipattibhāvato.
atk-s0504a:409_2: Seṭṭhā hi ete vihārā, sabbasattesu sammāpaṭipattibhūtāni yadidaṃ mettājhānāni. Yathā
atk-s0504a:409_3: ca brahmāno niddosacittā viharanti, evaṃ etehi samannāgatā yogino brahmasamāva hutvā
atk-s0504a:409_4: viharanti. Tathā hime “brahmavihārā”ti vuccanti. Iti seṭṭhaṭṭhena niddosabhāvena
atk-s0504a:409_5: ca sattesu suppaṭipattibhāvato mettāva itarehi opadhikapuññehi visesetvā vuttā.
atk-s0504a:410_0: Evampi kasmā mettāva evaṃ visesetvā vuttā? Itaresaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
atk-s0504a:410_1: dānādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ kalyāṇadhammānaṃ paripūrikattā ca. Ayañhi sattesu hitākārappavattilakkhaṇā
atk-s0504a:410_2: mettā, hitūpasaṃhārasā, āghātavinayapaccupaṭṭhānā. Yadi anodhiso bhāvitā bahulīkatā,
atk-s0504a:410_3: atha sukheneva karuṇādibhāvanā sampajjantīti mettā itaresaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:410_4: Tathā hi sattesu hitajjhāsayatāya sati nesaṃ dukkhāsahanatā, sampattivisesānaṃ ciraṭṭhitikāmatā,
atk-s0504a:410_5: pakkhapātābhāvena sabbattha samappavattacittatā ca sukheneva ijjhanti. Evañca sakalalokahitasukhavidhānādhimuttā
atk-s0504a:410_6: mahābodhisattā “imassa dātabbaṃ, imassa na dātabba”nti uttamavicayavasena vibhāgaṃ
atk-s0504a:410_7: akatvā sabbasattānaṃ niravasesasukhanidānaṃ dānaṃ denti, hitasukhatthameva nesaṃ
atk-s0504a:410_8: sīlaṃ samādiyanti, sīlaparipūraṇatthaṃ nekkhammaṃ bhajanti, tesaṃ hitasukhesu asammohatthāya
atk-s0504a:410_9: paññaṃ pariyodapenti, hitasukhābhivaḍḍhanatthameva daḷhaṃ vīriyamārabhanti, uttamavīriyavasena
atk-s0504a:410_10: vīrabhāvaṃ pattāpi sattānaṃ nānappakāraṃ hitajjhāsayeneva aparādhaṃ khamanti, “idaṃ
atk-s0504a:410_11: vo dassāma, karissāmā”tiādinā kataṃ paṭiññātaṃ na visaṃvādenti, tesaṃ hitasukhāyeva
atk-s0504a:410_12: acalādhiṭṭhānā honti. Tesu acalāya mettāya pubbakārino hitajjhāsayeneva nesaṃ vippakāre
atk-s0504a:410_13: udāsīnā honti, pubbakāritāyapi na paccupakāramāsisantīti. Evaṃ te pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0504a:410_15: sabbepi kalyāṇadhamme paripūrenti. Evaṃ dānādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ kalyāṇadhammānaṃ pāripūrikā
atk-s0504a:410_16: mettāti ca imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ sā itarehi visesetvā vuttā.
atk-s0504a:411_0: Apica mettāya itarehi opadhikapuññehi mahānubhāvatā velāmasuttena dīpetabbā. Tattha
atk-s0504a:411_1: hi yathā nāma mahatā velāmassa dānato ekassa sotāpannassa dānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:411_2: evaṃ sotāpannasatato ekassa sakadāgāmissa dānaṃ…pe… paccekabuddhasatato bhagavato,
atk-s0504a:411_3: tatopi buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dānaṃ, tatopi cātuddisassa saṅghassa vihāradānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:411_4: tatopi saraṇagamanaṃ, tatopi sīlasamādānaṃ, tatopi gaddūhanamattaṃ kālaṃ mettābhāvanā
atk-s0504a:412_0: “Yaṃ gahapati velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ. Yo cekaṃ diṭṭhisampannaṃ bhojeyya,
atk-s0504a:412_1: idaṃ tato mahapphalataraṃ. Yo ca sataṃ diṭṭhisampannaṃ bhojeyya…pe… surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā
atk-s0504a:412_2: veramaṇiṃ. Yo ca antamaso gaddūhanamattampi mettacittaṃ bhāveyya, idaṃ tato mahapphalatara”nti.
atk-s0504a:413_0: Mahaggatapuññabhāvena panassā parittapuññato sātisayatāya vattabbameva natthi. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0504a:413_1: “yaṃ pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ, na taṃ tatrāvasissati, na taṃ tatrāvatiṭṭhatī”ti. Kāmāvacarakammañhi
atk-s0504a:413_2: pamāṇakataṃ nāma, mahaggatakammaṃ pana pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odhisakānodhisakapharaṇavasena
atk-s0504a:413_3: vaḍḍhitvā katattā appamāṇakataṃ nāma. Kāmāvacarakammaṃ tassa mahaggatakammassa antarā
atk-s0504a:413_4: laggituṃ vā taṃ kammaṃ abhibhavitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ gahetvā ṭhātuṃ vā na
atk-s0504a:413_5: sakkoti, atha kho mahaggatakammameva taṃ parittakammaṃ mahogho viya parittaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0504a:413_6: abhibhavitvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati, tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sayameva brahmasahabyataṃ
atk-s0504a:414_0: Gāthāsu yoti yo koci gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā. Mettanti mettājhānaṃ. Appamāṇanti
atk-s0504a:414_1: bhāvanāvasena ārammaṇavasena ca appamāṇaṃ. Asubhabhāvanādayo viya hi ārammaṇe ekadesaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:414_2: akatvā anavasesapharaṇavasena anodhisopharaṇavasena ca appamāṇārammaṇatāya paguṇabhāvanāvasena
atk-s0504a:414_3: appamāṇaṃ. Tanū saṃyojanā hontīti mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sammasitvā heṭṭhime ariyamagge
atk-s0504a:414_4: adhigacchantassa sukheneva paṭighasaṃyojanādayo pahīyamānā tanū honti. Tenāha “passato
atk-s0504a:414_5: upadhikkhaya”nti. “Upadhikkhayo”ti hi nibbānaṃ vuccati. Tañcassa sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena
atk-s0504a:414_6: maggañāṇena passati. Atha vā tanū saṃyojanā hontīti mettājhānapadaṭṭhānāya vipassanāya
atk-s0504a:414_7: anukkamena upadhikkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ patvā taṃ passato pageva dasapi saṃyojanā
atk-s0504a:414_8: tanū honti, pahīyantīti attho. Atha vā tanū saṃyojanā hontīti paṭigho ceva paṭighasampayuttasaṃyojanā
atk-s0504a:414_9: ca tanukā honti. Passato upadhikkhayanti tesaṃyeva kilesūpadhīnaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0504a:414_10: mettaṃ adhigamavasena passanta ssāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:415_0: Evaṃ kilesappahānaṃ nibbānādhigamañca mettābhāvanāya sikhāppattamānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0504a:415_1: idāni aññe ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “ekampi ce”tiādimāha. Tattha aduṭṭhacittoti mettābalena
atk-s0504a:415_2: suṭṭhu vikkhambhitabyāpādatāya byāpādena adūsitacitto. Mettāyatīti hitapharaṇavasena
atk-s0504a:415_3: mettaṃ karoti. Kusaloti atisayena kusalavā mahāpuñño, paṭighādianatthavigamena vo.
atk-s0504a:415_4: Khemī tenāti tena mettāyitena. Sabbe ca pāṇeti casaddo byatireke. Manasānukampanti
atk-s0504a:415_5: cittena anukampanto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ekasattavisayāpi tāva mettā mahākusalarāsi,
atk-s0504a:415_6: sabbe pana pāṇe attano piyaputtaṃ viya hitapharaṇena manasā anukampanto pahūtaṃ bahuṃ
atk-s0504a:415_7: anappakaṃ apariyantaṃ catusaṭṭhimahākappepi attano vipākappabandhaṃ pavattetuṃ samatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:415_8: uḷārapuññaṃ ariyo parisuddhacitto puggalo pakaroti nipphādeti.
atk-s0504a:416_0: Sattasaṇḍanti sattasaṅkhātena saṇḍena samannāgataṃ bharitaṃ, sattehi aviraḷaṃ ākiṇṇamanussanti
atk-s0504a:416_1: attho. Vijitvāti adaṇḍena asatthena dhammeneva vijinitvā. Rājisayoti isisadisā dhammikarājāno.
atk-s0504a:417_0: Assamedhantiādīsu porāṇakarājakāle kira sassamedhaṃ, purisamedhaṃ, sammāpāsaṃ, vācāpeyyanti
atk-s0504a:417_1: cattāri saṅgahavatthūni ahesuṃ, yehi rājāno lokaṃ saṅgaṇhiṃsu. Tattha nipphannasassato
atk-s0504a:417_2: dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ sassamedhaṃ nāma, sassasampādane, medhāvitāti attho. Mahāyodhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:417_3: chamāsikaṃ bhattavetanānuppadānaṃ purisamedhaṃ nāma, purisasaṅgaṇhane medhāvitāti
atk-s0504a:417_4: attho. Daliddamanussānaṃ potthake lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ
atk-s0504a:417_5: sammāpāsaṃ nāma. Tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti, tasmā
atk-s0504a:417_6: “sammāpāsa”nti vuccati. “Tāta mātulā”tiādinā pana saṇhavācāya saṅgahaṇaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ
atk-s0504a:417_7: nāma, peyyavajjaṃ piyavācatāti attho. Evaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0504a:417_8: iddhañceva hoti phītañca pahūtaannapānaṃ khemaṃ nirabbudaṃ. Manussā mudā modamānā
atk-s0504a:417_9: ure putte naccentā apārutagharā viharanti. Idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato “niraggaḷa”nti
atk-s0504a:417_10: vuccati. Ayaṃ porāṇikā paveṇi, ayaṃ porāṇikā pakati.
atk-s0504a:418_0: Aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ
atk-s0504a:418_1: parivattentā uddhammūlaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhantiādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu.
atk-s0504a:421_0: Tattha assamettha medhanti bādhentīti assamedho. Dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa
atk-s0504a:421_1: ekasmiṃ pacchimadivase eva sattanavutipañcapasusataghātabhīsanassa ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca
