atk-s0504a:421_2: purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Purisamettha medhanti
atk-s0504a:421_3: bādhentīti purisamedho. Catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃbhūmiyā assamedhe
atk-s0504a:421_4: vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sammamettha pāsanti khipantīti sammāpāso.
atk-s0504a:421_5: Yugacchiggaḷe pavesanadaṇḍakasaṅkhātaṃ sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā
atk-s0504a:421_6: saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena
atk-s0504a:421_7: yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ vājamettha pivantīti vājapeyyo. Ekena pariyaññena
atk-s0504a:421_8: sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beḷuvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ
atk-s0504a:421_9: adhivacanaṃ. Natthi ettha aggaḷoti niraggaḷo. Navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ
atk-s0504a:421_10: bhūmiyā purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa assamedhavikappassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:422_0: Candappabhāti candappabhāya. Tāragaṇāva sabbeti yathā sabbepi tārāgaṇā candimasobhāya
atk-s0504a:422_1: soḷasimpi kalaṃ nāgghanti, evaṃ te assamedhādayo yaññā mettacittassa vuttalakkhaṇena
atk-s0504a:422_2: subhāvitassa soḷasimpi kalaṃ nānubhavanti, na pāpuṇanti, nāgghantīti attho.
atk-s0504a:423_0: Idāni aparepi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike mettābhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “yo na hantī”tiādi
atk-s0504a:423_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha yoti mettābrahmavihārabhāvanānuyutto puggalo. Na hantīti teneva mettābhāvanānubhāvena
atk-s0504a:423_2: dūravikkhambhitabyāpādatāya na kañci sattaṃ hiṃsati, leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi na vibādhati
atk-s0504a:423_3: vā. Na ghātetīti paraṃ samādapetvā na satte hanāpeti na vibādhāpeti ca. Na jinātīti
atk-s0504a:423_4: sārambhaviggāhikakathādivasena na kañci jināti sārambhasseva abhāvato, jānikaraṇavasena
atk-s0504a:423_5: vā aḍḍakaraṇādinā na kañci jināti. Na jāpayeti parepi payojetvā paresaṃ dhanajāniṃ
atk-s0504a:423_6: na kārāpeyya. Mettaṃsoti mettāmayacittakoṭṭhāso, mettāya vā aṃso avijahanaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:423_7: avayavabhūtoti mettaṃso. Sabbabhūtesūti sabbasattesu. Tato eva veraṃ tassa na kenacīti
atk-s0504a:423_8: akusalaveraṃ tassa kenacipi kāraṇena natthi, puggalaverasaṅkhāto virodho kenaci purisena
atk-s0504a:424_0: Evametasmiṃ ekakanipāte paṭipāṭiyā terasasu suttesu sikkhāsuttadvaye cāti pannarasasu
atk-s0504a:424_1: suttesu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, nīvaraṇasuttaṃ saṃyojanasuttaṃ appamādasuttaṃ aṭṭhisañcayasuttanti
atk-s0504a:424_2: etesu catūsu suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ. Itaresu pana vaṭṭameva kathitanti.
atk-s0504a:432_0: 28. Dukanipātassa paṭhame dvīhīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Dhammehīti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:432_1: Dvīhi dhammehīti dvīhi akusaladhammehi. Samannāgatoti yutto. Diṭṭheva dhammeti imasmiṃyeva
atk-s0504a:432_2: attabhāve. Dukkhaṃ viharatīti catūsupi iriyāpathesu kilesadukkhena ceva kāyikacetasikadukkhena
atk-s0504a:432_3: ca dukkhaṃ viharati. Savighātanti cittūpaghātena ceva kāyūpaghātena ca savighātaṃ.
atk-s0504a:432_4: Saupāyāsanti kilesūpāyāsena ceva sarīrakhedena ca balavaāyāsavasena saupāyāsaṃ. Sapariḷāhanti
atk-s0504a:432_5: kilesapariḷāhena ceva kāyapariḷāhena ca sapariḷāhaṃ. Kāyassa bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā.
atk-s0504a:432_6: Paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇe. Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti
atk-s0504a:432_7: jīvitindriyupacchedā. Paraṃ maraṇāti cutito uddhaṃ. Duggati pāṭikaṅkhāti duggatisaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0504a:432_8: catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ aññatarā gati icchitabbā, avassaṃbhāvinīti attho.
atk-s0504a:433_0: Aguttadvāroti apihitadvāro. Kattha pana aguttadvāroti āha “indriyesū”ti. Tena manacchaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:433_1: indriyānaṃ asaṃvaramāha. Paṭiggahaṇaparibhogavasena bhojane mattaṃ na jānātīti bhojane
atk-s0504a:434_0: Kathaṃ indriyesu aguttadvāratā, kathaṃ vā guttadvāratāti? Kiñcāpi hi cakkhundriye
atk-s0504a:434_1: saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi. Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ
atk-s0504a:434_2: vā uppajjati. Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati, tadā bhavaṅge
atk-s0504a:434_3: dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyāmanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā
atk-s0504a:434_4: nirujjhati, tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ, tato vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ,
atk-s0504a:434_6: voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tadanantaraṃ javanaṃ javati.
atk-s0504a:434_7: Tathāpi neva bhavaṅgasamaye, na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro
atk-s0504a:434_8: vā atthi, javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti
atk-s0504a:434_9: vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati, asaṃvaro hoti. Evaṃ hontopi so “cakkhudvāre asaṃvaro”ti
atk-s0504a:434_10: vuccati. Kasmā? Yasmā tasmiṃ sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni
atk-s0504a:434_11: vīthicittānipi. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo
atk-s0504a:434_12: susaṃvutā tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti. Nagaradvārehi
atk-s0504a:434_13: pavisitvā corā yadicchanti, taṃ hareyyuṃ. Evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:434_14: asaṃvare satidvārampi aguttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:434_15: pana asati javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni
atk-s0504a:434_16: vīthicittānipi. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā nagaradvāresu saṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārādayo
atk-s0504a:434_17: asaṃvutā, tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti. Nagaradvāresu
atk-s0504a:434_18: hi pihitesu corānaṃ paveso natthi. Evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ
atk-s0504a:434_19: hoti, bhavaṅgampi, āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi. Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi
atk-s0504a:434_20: “cakkhudvāre saṃvaro”ti vuccati. Sesadvāresupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ indriyesu aguttadvāratā,
atk-s0504a:435_0: Kathaṃ pana bhojane amattaññū, kathaṃ vā mattaññūti? Yo hi puggalo mahiccho hutvā
atk-s0504a:435_1: paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ na jānāti. Mahicchapuggalo hi yathā nāma kacchapuṭavāṇijo piḷandhanabhaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0504a:435_2: hatthena gahetvā ucchaṅgepi pakkhipitabbayuttakaṃ pakkhipitvā mahājanassa passantasseva
atk-s0504a:435_3: “asukaṃ gaṇhatha, asukaṃ gaṇhathā”ti mukhena ugghoseti, evameva appamattakampi attano
atk-s0504a:435_4: sīlaṃ vā ganthaṃ vā dhutaṅgaguṇaṃ vā antamaso araññavāsamattakampi mahājanassa jānantasseva
atk-s0504a:435_5: sambhāveti, sambhāvetvā ca pana sakaṭehipi upanīte paccaye “ala”nti avatvā paṭiggaṇhāti.
atk-s0504a:435_6: Tayo hi pūretuṃ na sakkā aggi upādānena, samuddo udakena, mahiccho paccayehīti –
atk-s0504a:437: Bahuke paccaye dinne, tayopete na pūrayeti”.
atk-s0504a:438_0: Mahicchapuggalo hi vijātamātuyāpi manaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti. Evarūpo hi anuppannaṃ
atk-s0504a:438_1: lābhaṃ na uppādeti, uppannalābhato ca parihāyati. Evaṃ tāva paṭiggahaṇe amattaññū
atk-s0504a:438_2: hoti. Yo pana dhammena samena laddhampi āhāraṃ gadhito mucchito ajjhopanno anādīnavadassāvī
atk-s0504a:438_4: aññataro viya ayoniso anupāyena yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ paribhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ
atk-s0504a:438_5: passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati. Ayaṃ paribhoge amattaññū nāma.
atk-s0504a:439_0: Yo pana “yadipi deyyadhammo bahu hoti, dāyako appaṃ dātukāmo, dāyakassa vasena appaṃ
atk-s0504a:439_1: gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammo appo, dāyako bahuṃ dātukāmo, deyyadhammassa vasena appaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0504a:439_2: Deyyadhammo bahu, dāyakopi bahuṃ dātukāmo, attano thāmaṃ ñatvā pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhātī”ti
atk-s0504a:439_3: evaṃ vuttassa paṭiggahaṇe pamāṇajānanassa ceva, “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti,
atk-s0504a:439_4: neva davāya, na madāyā”tiādinā “laddhañca piṇḍapātaṃ agadhito amucchito anajjhopanno
atk-s0504a:439_5: ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjatī”ti ca ādinā nayena vuttassa paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0504a:439_7: ca vasena bhojane mattaññū hoti, ayaṃ bhojane mattaññū nāma. Evaṃ bhojane amattaññutā
atk-s0504a:440_0: Gāthāsu pana cakkhuntiādīsu cakkhatīti cakkhu, rūpaṃ assādeti, samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ
atk-s0504a:440_1: viya hotīti vā attho. Suṇātīti sotaṃ. Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Jīvitanimittaṃ āhāraraso
atk-s0504a:440_2: jīvitaṃ, taṃ avhāyatīti jivhā. Kucchitānaṃ āyoti kāyo. Manate vijānātīti mano. Porāṇā
atk-s0504a:440_3: panāhu munātīti mano, nāḷiyā minamāno viya mahātulāya dhārayamāno viya ca ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:440_4: vijānātīti attho. Evaṃ tāvettha padattho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:441_0: Bhāvatthato pana duvidhaṃ cakkhu – maṃsacakkhu ca paññācakkhu ca. Tesu buddhacakkhu,
atk-s0504a:441_1: samantacakkhu, ñāṇacakkhu, dibbacakkhu, dhammacakkhūti pañcavidhaṃ paññācakkhu. Tattha
atk-s0504a:441_2: “addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento”ti idaṃ buddhacakkhu
atk-s0504a:441_3: nāma. “Samantacakkhu vuccati sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti idaṃ samantacakkhu nāma. “Cakkhuṃ
atk-s0504a:441_4: udapādī”ti idaṃ ñāṇacakkhu nāma. “Addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā”ti
atk-s0504a:441_5: idaṃ dibbacakkhu nāma. “Virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggattayasaṅkhātaṃ dhammacakkhu nāma.
atk-s0504a:442_0: Maṃsacakkhupi duvidhaṃ – sasambhāracakkhu, pasādacakkhūti. Tattha yvāyaṃ akkhikūpake
atk-s0504a:442_1: patiṭṭhito heṭṭhā akkhikūpakaṭṭhikena, upari bhamukaṭṭhikena, ubhato akkhikūṭehi,
atk-s0504a:442_2: anto matthaluṅgena, bahiddhā akkhilomehi paricchinno maṃsapiṇḍo, saṅkhepato catasso
atk-s0504a:442_3: dhātuyo – vaṇṇo, gandho, raso, ojāsambhavo saṇṭhānaṃ jīvitaṃ bhāvo kāyapasādo cakkhupasādoti
atk-s0504a:442_4: cuddasa sambhārā. Vitthārato catasso dhātuyo taṃnissitā vaṇṇagandharasaojāsaṇṭhānasambhavāti
atk-s0504a:442_5: imāni dasa catusamuṭṭhānikattā cattālīsaṃ honti, jīvitaṃ bhāvo kāyapasādo cakkhupasādoti
atk-s0504a:442_6: cattāri ekantakammasamuṭṭhānevāti imesaṃ catucattālīsāya rūpānaṃ vasena catucattālīsa
atk-s0504a:442_7: sambhārā. Yaṃ loke “setaṃ vaṭṭaṃ puthulaṃ visaṭaṃ vipulaṃ cakkhū”ti sañjānanto na
atk-s0504a:442_8: cakkhuṃ sañjānāti, vatthuṃ cakkhuto sañjānāti, yo maṃsapiṇḍo akkhikūpake patiṭṭhito
atk-s0504a:442_9: nhārusuttakena matthaluṅgena ābaddho, yattha setampi atthi kaṇhampi lohitakampi pathavīpi
atk-s0504a:442_10: āpopi tejopi vāyopi. Yaṃ semhussadattā setaṃ, pittussadattā kaṇhaṃ, ruhirussadattā
atk-s0504a:442_11: lohitakaṃ, pathavussadattā patthaddhaṃ, āpussadattā paggharati, tejussadattā pariḍayhati,
atk-s0504a:442_12: vāyussadattā sambhamati, idaṃ sasambhāracakkhu nāma. Yo pana ettha sito ettha paṭibaddho
atk-s0504a:442_13: catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo, idaṃ pasādacakkhu nāma. Idañhi cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:443_0: Sotādīsupi sotaṃ dibbasotaṃ, maṃsasotanti duvidhaṃ. Ettha “dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya
atk-s0504a:443_1: atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇātī”ti idaṃ dibbasotaṃ nāma. Maṃsasotaṃ pana sasambhārasotaṃ
atk-s0504a:443_2: pasādasotanti duvidhantiādi sabbaṃ cakkhumhi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, tathā ghānajivhā.
atk-s0504a:443_3: Kāyo pana copanakāyo, karajakāyo, samūhakāyo, pasādakāyotiādinā bahuvidho. Tattha –
atk-s0504a:445_0: Ayaṃ copanakāyo nāma. “Imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminātī”ti ayaṃ karajakāyo nāma.
atk-s0504a:445_1: Samūhakāyo pana viññāṇādisamūhavasena anekavidho āgato. Tathā hi “cha ime, āvuso,
atk-s0504a:445_4: aniccato anupassati, āpokāyaṃ tejokāyaṃ vāyokāyaṃ kesakāyaṃ lomakāya”ntiādīsu pathavādisamūho.
atk-s0504a:445_5: “Kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā”ti ayaṃ pasādakāyo. Idhāpi pasādakāyo veditabbo. So
atk-s0504a:445_6: hi kāyaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvena pavattati. Manoti pana kiñcāpi
atk-s0504a:445_7: sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ vuccati, tathāpi dvārabhāvassa idhādhippetattā dvārabhūtaṃ sāvajjanaṃ
atk-s0504a:446_0: Etāni yassa dvārāni aguttāni ca bhikkhunoti yassa bhikkhuno etāni manacchaṭṭhāni
atk-s0504a:446_1: dvārāni sativossaggena pamādaṃ āpannattā satikavāṭena apihitāni. Bhojanamhi…pe… adhigacchatīti
atk-s0504a:446_2: so bhikkhu vuttanayena bhojane amattaññū indriyesu ca saṃvararahito diṭṭhadhammikañca
atk-s0504a:446_4: icchāvighātavasena ca cetodukkhanti sabbathāpi dukkhameva adhigacchati pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0504a:446_5: Yasmā cetadevaṃ, tasmā duvidhenapi dukkhagginā idhaloke ca paraloke ca ḍayhamānena
atk-s0504a:446_6: kāyena ḍayhamānena cetasā divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ niccakālameva tādiso puggalo dukkhameva
atk-s0504a:446_7: viharati, na tassa sukhavihārassa sambhavo, vaṭṭadukkhānatikkame pana vattabbameva natthīti.
atk-s0504a:452_0: 30. Tatiye tapanīyāti idha ceva samparāye ca tapanti vibādhenti viheṭhentīti tapanīyā.
atk-s0504a:452_1: Tapanaṃ vā dukkhaṃ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye ca tassa uppādanena ceva anubalappadānena
atk-s0504a:452_2: ca hitāti tapanīyā. Atha vā tapanti tenāti tapanaṃ, pacchānutāpo, vippaṭisāroti attho,
atk-s0504a:452_3: tassa hetubhāvato hitāti tapanīyā. Akatakalyāṇoti akataṃ kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ puññaṃ
atk-s0504a:452_4: etenāti akatakalyāṇo. Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Puññañhi pavattihitatāya
atk-s0504a:452_5: āyatiṃsukhatāya ca bhaddakaṭṭhena kalyāṇanti ca kucchitasalanādiatthena kusalanti
atk-s0504a:452_6: ca dukkhabhīrūnaṃ saṃsārabhīrūnañca rakkhanaṭṭhena bhīruttāṇanti ca vuccati. Katapāpoti
atk-s0504a:452_7: kataṃ upacitaṃ pāpaṃ etenāti katapāpo. Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Akusalakammañhi
atk-s0504a:452_8: lāmakaṭṭhena pāpanti ca attano pavattikkhaṇe vipākakkhaṇe ca ghorasabhāvatāya luddanti
atk-s0504a:452_9: ca kilesehi dūsitabhāvena kibbisanti ca vuccati. Iti bhagavā “dve dhammā tapanīyā”ti
atk-s0504a:452_10: dhammādhiṭṭhānena uddisitvā akataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ katañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena
atk-s0504a:452_11: niddisi. Idāni tesaṃ tapanīyabhāvaṃ dassento “so akataṃ me kalyāṇantipi tappati,
atk-s0504a:452_12: kataṃ me pāpantipi tappatī”ti āha. Cittasantāsena tappati anutappati anusocatīti attho.
atk-s0504a:453_0: Gāthāsu duṭṭhu caritaṃ, kilesapūtikattā vā duṭṭhaṃ caritanti duccaritaṃ. Kāyena duccaritaṃ,
atk-s0504a:453_1: kāyato vā pavattaṃ duccaritaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ. Evaṃ vacīmanoduccaritānipi daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0504a:453_2: Imāni ca kāyaduccaritādīni kammapathappattāni adhippetānīti yaṃ na kammapathappattaṃ
atk-s0504a:453_3: akusalajātaṃ, taṃ sandhāyāha “yañcaññaṃ dosasañhita”nti. Tassattho – yampi ca aññaṃ
atk-s0504a:453_4: kammapathabhāvaṃ appattattā nippariyāyena kāyakammādisaṅkhaṃ na labhati, rāgādikilesasaṃsaṭṭhattā
atk-s0504a:453_5: dosasahitaṃ akusalaṃ tampi katvāti attho. Nirayanti niratiatthena nirassādaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:453_6: vā nirayanti laddhanāmaṃ sabbampi duggatiṃ, ayasaṅkhātasukhappaṭikkhepena vā sabbattha
atk-s0504a:453_7: sugatiduggatīsu nirayadukkhaṃ. So tādiso puggalo upagacchatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:454_0: Ettha ca kāyaduccaritassa tapanīyabhāve nando yakkho nando māṇavako nando goghātako
atk-s0504a:454_1: dve bhātikāti etesaṃ vatthūni kathetabbāni. Te kira gāviṃ vadhitvā maṃsaṃ dve koṭṭhāse
atk-s0504a:454_2: akaṃsu. Tato kaniṭṭho jeṭṭhaṃ āha – “mayhaṃ dārakā bahū, imāni me antāni dehī”ti.
atk-s0504a:454_3: Atha naṃ jeṭṭho – “sabbaṃ maṃsaṃ dvedhā vibhattaṃ, puna kimaggahesī”ti paharitvā
atk-s0504a:454_4: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi. Nivattitvā ca naṃ olokento mataṃ disvā “bhāriyaṃ vata mayā
atk-s0504a:454_5: kataṃ, svāhaṃ akāraṇeneva naṃ māresi”nti cittaṃ uppādesi. Athassa balavavippaṭisāro
atk-s0504a:454_6: uppajji. So ṭhitaṭṭhānepi nisinnaṭṭhānepi tadeva kammaṃ āvajjeti, cittassādaṃ na
atk-s0504a:454_7: labhati, asitapītakhāyitampissa sarīre ojaṃ na pharati, aṭṭhicammamattameva ahosi.
atk-s0504a:454_8: Atha naṃ eko thero pucchi “upāsaka, tvaṃ ativiya kiso aṭṭhicammamatto jāto, kīdiso
atk-s0504a:454_9: te rogo, udāhu atthi kiñci tapanīyaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti? So “āma, bhante”ti sabbaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0504a:454_10: Athassa so “bhāriyaṃ te, upāsaka, kammaṃ kataṃ, anaparādhaṭṭhāne aparaddha”nti āha.
atk-s0504a:454_11: So teneva kammunā kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti. Vacīduccaritassa pana suppabuddhasakkakokālikaciñcamāṇavikādīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:460_0: 32. Pañcame pāpakena ca sīlenāti pāpakaṃ nāma sīlaṃ sīlabhedakaro asaṃvaroti vadanti.
atk-s0504a:460_1: Tattha yadi asaṃvaro asīlameva taṃdussīlyabhāvato, kathaṃ sīlanti vuccati? Tatthāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:460_2: adhippāyo siyā – yathā nāma loke adiṭṭhaṃ “diṭṭha”nti vuccati, asīlavā “sīlavā”ti,
atk-s0504a:460_3: evamidhāpi asīlampi asaṃvaropi “sīla”nti voharīyati. Atha vā “katame ca, thapati,
atk-s0504a:460_4: akusalā sīlā? Akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ, akusalaṃ vacīkammaṃ, pāpako ājīvo”ti vacanato
atk-s0504a:460_5: akusaladhammesupi attheva sīlasamaññā, tasmā paricayavasena sabhāvasiddhi viya pakatibhūto
atk-s0504a:460_6: sabbo samācāro “sīla”nti vuccati. Tattha yaṃ akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalaṃ lāmakaṃ,
atk-s0504a:460_7: taṃ sandhāyāha “pāpakena ca sīlenā”ti. Pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyāti sabbāpi micchādiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0504a:460_8: pāpikāva. Visesato pana ahetukadiṭṭhi, akiriyadiṭṭhi, natthikadiṭṭhīti imā tividhā
atk-s0504a:460_9: diṭṭhiyo pāpikatarā. Tattha pāpakena sīlena samannāgato puggalo payogavipanno hoti,
atk-s0504a:460_10: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato āsayavipanno hoti, evaṃ payogāsayavipanno puggalo nirayūpago
atk-s0504a:460_11: hotiyeva. Tena vuttaṃ “imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṃ
atk-s0504a:460_12: nikkhitto, evaṃ niraye”ti. Ettha ca “dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato”ti idaṃ lakkhaṇavacanaṃ
atk-s0504a:460_13: daṭṭhabbaṃ, na tantiniddeso. Yathā taṃ loke “yadime byādhitā siyuṃ, imesaṃ idaṃ bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0504a:460_14: dātabba”nti. Aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu eseva nayo. Duppaññoti nippañño.
atk-s0504a:463_0: 33. Chaṭṭhe bhaddakena ca sīlenāti kāyasucaritādicatupārisuddhisīlena. Tañhi akhaṇḍādisīlabhāvena
atk-s0504a:463_2: Bhaddikāya ca diṭṭhiyāti kammassakatāñāṇena ceva kammapathasammādiṭṭhiyā ca. Tattha
atk-s0504a:463_3: bhaddakena sīlena payogasampanno hoti, bhaddikāya diṭṭhiyā āsayasampanno. Iti payogāsayasampanno
atk-s0504a:463_4: puggalo saggūpago hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “imehi, kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato
atk-s0504a:463_5: puggalo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto, evaṃ sagge”ti. Sappaññoti paññavā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0504a:466_0: 34. Sattame anātāpīti kilesānaṃ ātāpanaṭṭhena ātāpo, vīriyaṃ, so etassa atthīti ātāpī,
atk-s0504a:466_1: na ātāpī anātāpī, sammappadhānavirahito kusītoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ottāpo vuccati pāputrāso,
atk-s0504a:466_2: so etassa atthīti ottāpī, na ottāpī anottāpī, ottāparahito. Atha vā ātāpappaṭipakkho
atk-s0504a:466_3: anātāpo, kosajjaṃ so assa atthīti anātāpī. Yaṃ “na ottapati ottappitabbena, na ottapati
atk-s0504a:466_4: pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ anottappaṃ anottāpo.
atk-s0504a:466_5: So assa atthīti anottāpīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:467_0: Abhabboti anaraho. Sambodhāyāti ariyamaggatthāya. Nibbānāyāti kilesānaṃ accantavūpasamāya
atk-s0504a:467_1: amatamahānibbānāya. Anuttarassa yogakkhemassāti arahattaphalassa. Tañhi uttaritarassa
atk-s0504a:467_2: abhāvato anuttaraṃ, catūhi yogehi anupaddutattā khemaṃ nibbhayanti yogakkhemanti
atk-s0504a:467_3: ca vuccati. Adhigamāyāti pattiyā. Ātāpīti vīriyavā. So hi “āraddhavīriyo viharati
atk-s0504a:467_4: akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo
atk-s0504a:467_5: anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesū”ti evaṃ vuttena vīriyārambhena samannāgato kilesānaṃ
atk-s0504a:467_6: accantameva ātāpanasīloti ātāpī. Ottāpīti “yaṃ ottapati ottappitabbena, ottapati
atk-s0504a:467_7: pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā”ti evaṃ vuttena ottappena samannāgatattā
atk-s0504a:467_8: ottapanasīloti ottappī. Ayañhi ottāpīti vutto. Tadavinābhāvato hiriyā ca samannāgato
atk-s0504a:467_9: eva hotīti hirottappasampanno aṇumattepi vajje bhayadassāvī sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti.
atk-s0504a:467_10: Iccassa sīlasampadā dassitā. Ātāpīti iminā nayenassa kilesaparitāpitādīpanena samathavipassanābhāvanānuyuttatā
atk-s0504a:467_11: dassitā. Yathāvuttañca vīriyaṃ saddhāsatisamādhipaññāhi vinā na hotīti vimuttiparipācakāni
atk-s0504a:467_12: saddhāpañcamāni indriyāni atthato vuttāneva honti. Tesu ca siddhesu anicce aniccasaññā,
atk-s0504a:467_13: anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā, nirodhasaññāti
atk-s0504a:467_14: cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā siddhā evāti. Evaṃ imehi dvīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa
atk-s0504a:467_15: lokiyānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññānaṃ sijjhanato maggaphalanibbānādhigamassa bhabbataṃ dassento
atk-s0504a:468_1: pāpadhammehi sito sambandho yuttoti kusīto. Kucchitaṃ vā sīdati sammāpaṭipattito
atk-s0504a:468_2: avasīdatīti kusīto, da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Hīnavīriyoti nibbīriyo, catūsupi iriyāpathesu
atk-s0504a:468_4: kāyālasiyassa middhassa ca abhiṇhappavattiyā thinamiddhabahulo. Pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya
atk-s0504a:468_5: hiriyā abhāvena tappaṭipakkhena ahirikena samannāgatattā ca ahiriko. Hirottappavīriyānaṃ
atk-s0504a:468_6: abhāveneva sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ natthi etassa ādaroti anādaro. Ubhayathāpi tathā dhammapuggalena
atk-s0504a:468_7: duvidhakiriyākaraṇena anādaro. Phuṭṭhunti phusituṃ. Sambodhimuttamanti sambodhisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0504a:469_0: Satimāti cirakatacirabhāsitānaṃ anussaraṇe samatthassa satinepakkassa bhāvena catusatipaṭṭhānayogena
atk-s0504a:469_2: ca nepakkena samannāgatattā nipako. Jhāyīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena
atk-s0504a:469_3: cāti dvīhipi jhānehi jhāyī. Appamattoti “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇiyehi
atk-s0504a:469_4: dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”tiādinā nayena kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya appamatto. Saṃyojanaṃ
atk-s0504a:469_5: jātijarāya chetvāti jātiyā ceva jarāya ca satte saṃyojetīti saṃyojananti laddhanāmaṃ
atk-s0504a:469_6: kāmarāgādikaṃ dasavidhampi kilesajātaṃ anusayasamugghātavasena mūlato chinditvā.
atk-s0504a:469_7: Atha vā saṃyojanaṃ jātijarāya chetvāti jātijarāya saṃyojanaṃ chinditvā. Yassa hi
atk-s0504a:469_8: saṃyojanāni acchinnāni, tassa jātijarāya acchedo asamugghātova. Yassa pana tāni chinnāni,
atk-s0504a:469_9: tassa jātijarāpi chinnāva kāraṇassa samugghātitattā. Tasmā saṃyojanaṃ chindanto eva
atk-s0504a:469_10: jātijarāpi chindati. Tena vuttaṃ “saṃyojanaṃ jātijarāya chetvā”ti. Idheva sambodhimanuttaraṃ
atk-s0504a:469_11: phuseti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve aggamaggaṃ arahattaṃ vā phuse pāpuṇeyya.
atk-s0504a:472_0: 35. Aṭṭhame nayidanti ettha naiti paṭisedhe nipāto, tassa “vussatī”ti iminā sambandho,
atk-s0504a:472_1: yakāro padasandhikaro. Idaṃ-saddo “ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharāmi
atk-s0504a:472_2: subhagavane sālarājamūle”tiādīsu nipātamattaṃ. “Idaṃ kho taṃ, bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ
atk-s0504a:475: Ādīsu vakkhamāne āsannapaccakkhe. Idhāpi vakkhamāneyeva āsannapaccakkhe daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:491: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
atk-s0504a:493: Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti. –
atk-s0504a:494_0: Imasmiṃ aṅkurapetavatthusmiṃ veyyāvacce. “Idaṃ kho taṃ, bhikkhave, tittiriyaṃ nāma
atk-s0504a:494_1: brahmacariyaṃ ahosī”ti imasmiṃ tittirajātake pañcasikkhāpadasīle. “Taṃ kho pana,
atk-s0504a:494_2: pañcasikha, brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya…pe… yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā”ti
atk-s0504a:494_3: imasmiṃ mahāgovindasutte brahmavihāre. “Pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti, mayamettha
atk-s0504a:498: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti. –
atk-s0504a:499: Mahādhammapālajātake sadārasantose. “Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritā – tapassī sudaṃ homī”ti lomahaṃsasutte vīriye.
atk-s0504a:502_0: Nimijātake attadamanavasena kate aṭṭhaṅgikauposathe. “Idaṃ kho pana, pañcasikha,
atk-s0504a:502_1: brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya…pe… ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti mahāgovindasutteyeva
atk-s0504a:502_2: ariyamagge. “Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ
atk-s0504a:502_3: yāva devamanussehi suppakāsita”nti pāsādikasutte sikkhattayasaṅgahe sakalasmiṃ sāsane.
atk-s0504a:503_0: Vussatīti vasīyati, carīyatīti attho. Janakuhanatthanti “aho ayyo sīlavā vattasampanno
atk-s0504a:503_1: appiccho santuṭṭho mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”tiādinā janassa sattalokassa vimhāpanatthaṃ.
atk-s0504a:503_2: Janalapanatthanti “evarūpassa nāma ayyassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī”ti pasannacittehi
atk-s0504a:503_5: sīle-svevassa paripūrakārī”ti sīlānisaṃsabhāvena vutto catupaccayalābho, yo ca catunnaṃ
atk-s0504a:503_6: paccayānaṃ sakkaccadānasaṅkhāto ādarabahumānagarukaraṇasaṅkhāto ca sakkāro, yo ca
atk-s0504a:503_8: siloko brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ diṭṭhadhammiko ānisaṃso, tadatthaṃ. Iti maṃ jano
atk-s0504a:503_9: jānātūti “evaṃ brahmacariyavāse sati ‘ayaṃ sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo’tiādinā maṃ jano
atk-s0504a:503_10: jānātu sambhāvetū”ti attano santaguṇavasena sambhāvanatthampi na idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0504a:504_1: tividhena kuhanavatthunā kuhanabhāvena janassa vimhāpanatthaṃ. Janalapanatthanti
atk-s0504a:504_2: pāpicchasseva sato paccayatthaṃ parikathobhāsādivasena lapanabhāvena upalāpanabhāvena
atk-s0504a:504_3: vā janassa lapanatthaṃ. Lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsatthanti pāpicchasseva sato lābhādigarutāya
atk-s0504a:504_4: lābhasakkārasilokasaṅkhātassa ānisaṃsaudayassa nipphādanatthaṃ. Iti maṃ jano jānātūti
atk-s0504a:504_5: pāpicchasseva sato asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyena ‘iti evaṃ maṃ jano jānātū’ti na
atk-s0504a:504_6: idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti evamettha atthaṃ vadanti. Purimoyeva pana attho sārataro.
atk-s0504a:505_0: Atha khoti ettha athāti aññadatthe nipāto, khoti avadhāraṇe. Tena kuhanādito aññadatthāyeva
atk-s0504a:505_1: pana idaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti dasseti. Idāni taṃ payojanaṃ dassento
atk-s0504a:505_2: “saṃvaratthañceva pahānatthañcā”ti āha. Tattha pañcavidho saṃvaro – pātimokkhasaṃvaro,
atk-s0504a:506_0: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti hi ādinā nayena āgato ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:506_1: pātimokkhasaṃvaro nāma, yo sīlasaṃvaroti ca pavuccati. “Rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye
atk-s0504a:511_0: Āgato ayaṃ ñāṇasaṃvaro. “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”tiādinā nayena āgato ayaṃ khantisaṃvaro.
atk-s0504a:511_1: “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā nayena āgato ayaṃ vīriyasaṃvaro. Atthato
atk-s0504a:511_2: pana pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pajahanavasena, vattapaṭivattānaṃ karaṇavasena ca pavattā cetanā
atk-s0504a:511_3: viratiyo ca. Saṅkhepato sabbo kāyavacīsaṃyamo, vitthārato sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:511_4: avītikkamo sīlasaṃvaro. Sati eva satisaṃvaro, satippadhānā vā kusalā khandhā. Ñāṇameva
atk-s0504a:511_5: ñāṇasaṃvaro. Adhivāsanavasena adoso, adosappadhānā vā tathā pavattā kusalā khandhā
atk-s0504a:511_6: khantisaṃvaro, paññāti eke. Kāmavitakkādīnaṃ anadhivāsanavasena pavattaṃ vīriyameva
atk-s0504a:511_7: vīriyasaṃvaro. Tesu paṭhamo kāyaduccaritādidussīlyassa saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, dutiyo
atk-s0504a:511_8: muṭṭhassaccassa, tatiyo aññāṇassa, catuttho akkhantiyā, pañcamo kosajjassa saṃvaraṇato
atk-s0504a:511_9: pidahanato saṃvaroti veditabbo. Evametassa saṃvarassa atthāya saṃvaratthaṃ, saṃvaranipphādanatthanti attho.
atk-s0504a:512_1: paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ, nissaraṇappahānanti. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā ekakanipāte
atk-s0504a:512_2: paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva. Tassa pana pañcavidhassapi tathā tathā rāgādikilesānaṃ
atk-s0504a:512_3: paṭinissajjanaṭṭhena samatikkamanaṭṭhena vā pahānassa atthāya pahānatthaṃ, pahānasādhanatthanti
atk-s0504a:512_4: attho. Tattha saṃvarena kilesānaṃ cittasantāne pavesananivāraṇaṃ pahānena pavesananivāraṇañceva
atk-s0504a:512_5: samugghāto cāti vadanti. Ubhayenāpi pana yathārahaṃ ubhayaṃ sampajjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:512_6: Sīlādidhammā eva hi saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, pajahanato pahānanti.
atk-s0504a:513_0: Gāthāsu anītihanti ītiyo vuccanti upaddavā – diṭṭhadhammikā ca samparāyikā ca. Ītiyo
atk-s0504a:513_1: hanati vināseti pajahatīti ītihaṃ, anu ītihanti anītihaṃ, sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca.
atk-s0504a:513_2: Atha vā ītīhi anatthehi saddhiṃ hananti gacchanti pavattantīti ītihā, taṇhādiupakkilesā.
atk-s0504a:513_3: Natthi ettha ītihāti anītihaṃ. Ītihā vā yathāvuttenaṭṭhena titthiyasamayā, tappaṭipakkhato
atk-s0504a:513_4: idaṃ anītihaṃ. “Anitiha”ntipi pāṭho. Tassattho – “itihāya”nti dhammesu anekaṃsaggāhabhāvato
atk-s0504a:513_5: vicikicchā itihaṃ nāma, sammāsambuddhappaveditattā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ
atk-s0504a:513_6: nikkaṅkhabhāvasādhanato natthi ettha itihanti anitihaṃ, aparappaccayanti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0504a:514_0: Nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ogadhaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ pāraṃ gacchatīti nibbānogadhagāmī, vimuttirasattā
atk-s0504a:514_1: ekanteneva nibbānasampāpakoti attho. Taṃ nibbānogadhagāminaṃ brahmacariyaṃ. Soti
atk-s0504a:514_2: yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhinditvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0504a:514_3: so bhagavā adesayi desesi. Nibbānogadhoti vā ariyamaggo vuccati. Tena vinā nibbānogāhanassa
atk-s0504a:514_4: asambhavato tassa ca nibbānaṃ anālambitvā appavattanato, tañca taṃ ekantaṃ gacchatīti
atk-s0504a:514_5: nibbānogadhagāmī. Atha vā nibbānogadhagāminanti nibbānassa antogāminaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:514_6: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā tassa anto eva vattati pavattatīti. Mahattehīti mahāātumehi
atk-s0504a:514_7: uḷārajjhāsayehi. Mahantaṃ nibbānaṃ, mahante vā sīlakkhandhādike esanti gavesantīti
atk-s0504a:514_8: mahesino buddhādayo ariyā. Tehi anuyāto paṭipanno. Yathā buddhena desitanti yathā
atk-s0504a:514_9: abhiññeyyādidhamme abhiññeyyādibhāveneva sammāsambuddhena mayā desitaṃ, evaṃ ye etaṃ
atk-s0504a:514_10: maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadatthaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyañca paṭipajjanti. Te diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthehi
atk-s0504a:514_11: yathārahaṃ anusāsantassa satthu mayhaṃ sāsanakārino ovādappaṭikarā sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0504a:514_12: antaṃ pariyantaṃ appavattiṃ karissanti, dukkhassa vā antaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarissantīti.
atk-s0504a:517_0: 36. Navame abhiññatthanti kusalādivibhāgena khandhādivibhāgena ca sabbadhamme abhivisiṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:517_1: ñāṇena aviparītato jānanatthaṃ. Pariññatthanti tebhūmakadhamme “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā
atk-s0504a:517_4: pana vinā na pavattatīti pahānādayopi idha gahitāti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ anantarasutte vuttatthameva.
atk-s0504a:520_0: 37. Dasame sukhasomanassabahuloti ettha sukhanti kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ, somanassanti cetasikaṃ.
atk-s0504a:520_1: Tasmā yassa kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pavattati, so sukhasomanassabahuloti
atk-s0504a:520_2: vutto. Yonīti “catasso kho imā, sāriputta, yoniyo”tiādīsu khandhakoṭṭhāso yonīti
atk-s0504a:520_3: āgato. “Yoni hesā, bhūmija, phalassa adhigamāyā”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0504a:521: “Na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhava”nti ca. ;
atk-s0504a:522_0: “Tamenaṃ kammajā vātā nibbattitvā uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ samparivattetvā mātu yonimukhe
atk-s0504a:522_1: sampaṭipādentī”ti ca ādīsu passāvamaggo. Idha pana kāraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Assāti anena.
atk-s0504a:522_2: Āraddhāti paṭṭhapitā paggahitā paripuṇṇā sampāditā vā.
atk-s0504a:523_0: Āsavānaṃ khayāyāti ettha āsavantīti āsavā, cakkhutopi…pe… manatopi savanti pavattantīti
atk-s0504a:523_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammato yāva gotrabhū, okāsato yāva bhavaggā savantīti vā āsavā. Ete
atk-s0504a:523_2: dhamme etañca okāsaṃ anto karitvā pavattantīti attho. Antokaraṇattho hi ayaṃ ākāro.
atk-s0504a:523_3: Cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madirādayo āsavā viyātipi āsavā. Loke hi cirapārivāsikā madirādayo
atk-s0504a:523_4: āsavāti vuccanti. Yadi ca cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena āsavā, ete eva bhavituṃ arahanti.
atk-s0504a:523_5: Vuttaṃ hetaṃ – “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya, ito pubbe avijjā nāhosī”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:523_6: Āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā. Purimāni cettha nibbacanāni yattha
atk-s0504a:523_7: kilesā āsavāti āgatā, tattha yujjanti; pacchimaṃ kammepi. Na kevalañca kammakilesā
atk-s0504a:523_8: eva āsavā, apica kho nānappakārā upaddavāpi. Abhidhamme hi “cattāro āsavā – kāmāsavo,
atk-s0504a:523_9: bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavo”ti kāmarāgādayo kilesā āsavāti āgatā. Suttepi “nāhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:523_10: cunda, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā
atk-s0504a:526: Te mayhaṃ, āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
atk-s0504a:527_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā. “Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya
atk-s0504a:528_0: Te panete āsavā vinaye “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ
atk-s0504a:528_1: paṭighātāyā”ti dvedhā āgatā. Saḷāyatane “tayome, āvuso, āsavā – kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo,
atk-s0504a:528_2: avijjāsavo”ti tidhā āgatā. Tathā aññesu suttantesu. Abhidhamme teyeva diṭṭhāsavena
atk-s0504a:528_3: saddhiṃ catudhā āgatā. Nibbedhikapariyāye pana “atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā nirayagamanīyā,
atk-s0504a:528_4: atthi āsavā tiracchānayonigamanīyā, atthi āsavā pettivisayagamanīyā, atthi āsavā
atk-s0504a:528_5: manussalokagamanīyā, atthi āsavā devalokagamanīyā”ti pañcadhā āgatā. Kammameva cettha
atk-s0504a:528_6: āsavāti adhippetaṃ. Chakkanipāte “atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā”tiādinā
atk-s0504a:528_7: nayena chadhā āgatā. Sabbāsavapariyāye teyeva dassanapahātabbehi dhammehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0504a:528_8: sattadhā āgatā. Idha pana abhidhammapariyāyena cattāro āsavā adhippetāti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:529_0: Khayāyāti ettha pana “yo āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhāna”nti
atk-s0504a:529_1: āsavānaṃ sarasabhedo āsavānaṃ khayoti vutto. “Jānato ahaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ
atk-s0504a:529_2: khayaṃ vadāmī”ti ettha āsavānaṃ khīṇākāro natthibhāvo accantaṃ asamuppādo āsavakkhayoti vutto.
atk-s0504a:531: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. –
atk-s0504a:532: Ettha ariyamaggo āsavakkhayoti vutto. “Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”ti ettha phalaṃ.
atk-s0504a:534: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. –
atk-s0504a:535: Ettha nibbānaṃ. Idha pana phalaṃ sandhāya “āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti vuttaṃ, arahattaphalatthāyāti attho.
atk-s0504a:536_0: Saṃvejanīyesu ṭhānesūti saṃvegajanakesu jātiādīsu saṃvegavatthūsu. Jāti, jarā, byādhi,
atk-s0504a:536_1: maraṇaṃ, apāyadukkhaṃ, atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:536_2: paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhanti imāni hi saṃvegavatthūni saṃvejanīyaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0504a:536_3: nāma. Apica “āditto lokasannivāso uyyutto payāto kummaggappaṭipanno, upanīyati loko
atk-s0504a:536_4: addhuvo, atāṇo loko anabhissaro, assako loko, sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, ūno loko atitto
atk-s0504a:536_5: taṇhādāso”tievamādīni cettha saṃvejanīyaṭṭhānānīti veditabbāni. Saṃvejanenāti jātiādisaṃvegavatthūni
atk-s0504a:536_6: paṭicca uppannabhayasaṅkhātena saṃvejanena. Atthato pana sahottappañāṇaṃ saṃvego nāma.
atk-s0504a:537_1: “Saṃvejitvā”ti ca paṭhanti. Yoniso padhānenāti upāyapadhānena, sammāvāyāmenāti attho.
atk-s0504a:537_2: So hi yathā akusalā dhammā pahīyanti, kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, evaṃ
atk-s0504a:537_3: padahanato uttamabhāvasādhanato ca “padhāna”nti vuccati. Tattha saṃvegena bhavādīsu
atk-s0504a:537_4: kiñci tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ apassanto tattha anolīyanto alaggamānaso tappaṭipakkhena
atk-s0504a:537_5: ca vinivattitavisaññito aññadatthu nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro.
atk-s0504a:537_7: yuttappayutto sabbasmimpi saṅkhāragate nibbindati virajjati, vipassanaṃ ussukkāpeti.
atk-s0504a:537_8: Tattha yadidaṃ yonisomanasikārabahulo visuddhāsayappayogo samathavipassanāsu yuttappayutto,
atk-s0504a:537_9: tenassa diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulatā veditabbā. Yaṃ panāyaṃ samathe patiṭṭhito
atk-s0504a:537_10: vipassanāya yuttappayutto sabbasmimpi saṅkhāragate nibbindati virajjati, vipassanaṃ
atk-s0504a:537_11: ussukkāpeti, tenassa yoni āraddhā āsavānaṃ khayāyāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:538_0: Gāthāsu saṃvijjethevāti saṃvijjeyya eva saṃvegaṃ kareyya eva. “Saṃvijjitvānā”ti ca
atk-s0504a:538_1: paṭhanti. Vuttanayena saṃviggo hutvāti attho. Paṇḍitoti sappañño, tihetukapaṭisandhīti
atk-s0504a:538_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Paññāya samavekkhiyāti saṃvegavatthūni saṃvijjanavasena paññāya sammā
atk-s0504a:538_3: avekkhiya. Atha vā paññāya sammā avekkhitvāti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthameva.
atk-s0504a:544: 38. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame tathāgataṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha tathāgata-saddo tāva sattavohārasammāsambuddhādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa “hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”tiādīsu sattavohāre.
atk-s0504a:553_0: Ādīsu saṅghe. Idha pana sammāsambuddhe. Tasmā tathāgatanti ettha aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi
atk-s0504a:553_1: bhagavā tathāgatoti vuccati. Katamehi aṭṭhahi? Tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti
atk-s0504a:553_2: tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti
atk-s0504a:553_3: tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato,
atk-s0504a:554_0: Kathaṃ bhagavā tathā āgatoti tathāgato? Yathā yena abhinīhārena dānapāramiṃ pūretvā
atk-s0504a:554_2: pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0504a:554_4: imāni pañca mahāpariccāgāni pariccajitvā yathā vipassiādayo sammāsambuddhā āgatā,
atk-s0504a:554_5: tathā amhākaṃ bhagavāpi āgatoti tathāgato. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:560_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijātāva vipassiādayo samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0504a:560_1: patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukhā sattapadavītihārena gatā, tathā amhākaṃ bhagavāpi gatoti
atk-s0504a:570_0: Kathaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato? Sabbesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ salakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0504a:570_1: sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ, tathaṃ, avitathaṃ, ñāṇagatiyā āgato, avirajjhitvā patto, anubuddhoti
atk-s0504a:574_0: Kathaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato? Tathadhammā nāma cattāri
atk-s0504a:574_1: ariyasaccāni. Yathāha “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Katamāni
atk-s0504a:574_2: cattāri? Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti
atk-s0504a:574_3: vitthāro. Tāni ca bhagavā abhisambuddho, tasmāpi tathānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:574_4: Abhisambuddhattho hi ettha gata-saddo. Evaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:575_0: Kathaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato? Yaṃ sadevake loke…pe… sadevamanussāya pajāya aparimāṇāsu
atk-s0504a:575_1: lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma
atk-s0504a:575_2: atthi, taṃ bhagavā sabbākārato jānāti passati. Evaṃ jānatā passatā cānena taṃ iṭṭhādivasena
atk-s0504a:575_3: vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:575_4: yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ
atk-s0504a:575_5: pītaka”ntiādinā nayena anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ
atk-s0504a:575_6: tathameva hoti, vitathaṃ natthi. Esa nayo sotadvārādīsu āpāthamāgacchantesu saddādīsu.
atk-s0504a:576_0: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ
atk-s0504a:576_1: pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi…pe… tamahaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, taṃ
atk-s0504a:576_2: tathāgatassa viditaṃ, taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0504a:577: Evaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato. Ettha tathadassiatthe tathāgatoti padassa sambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:578_0: Kathaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato? Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0504a:578_1: yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi, etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇakāle
atk-s0504a:578_2: yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ suttageyyādi, sabbaṃ taṃ parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ rāgamadādinimmadanaṃ
atk-s0504a:579_0: “Yañca, cunda, rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṃ
atk-s0504a:579_1: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0504a:579_2: sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti, no aññathā. Tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:580_0: Gadaattho hi ettha gatasaddo. Evaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato. Apica āgadanaṃ āgado,
atk-s0504a:580_1: vacananti attho. Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti,
atk-s0504a:581_0: Kathaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato? Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi, kāyassapi vācā.
atk-s0504a:581_1: Tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. Evaṃbhūtassa cassa yathā
atk-s0504a:581_2: vācā, kāyopi tathā gato pavatto. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatāti tathāgato. Tenāha
atk-s0504a:581_3: “yathāvādī, bhikkhave, tathāgato tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī. Iti yathāvādī tathākārī,
atk-s0504a:581_4: yathākārī tathāvādī. Tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti. Evaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:582_0: Kathaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato? Yasmā bhagavā upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ
atk-s0504a:582_1: karitvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi
atk-s0504a:582_2: paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0504a:582_3: atha kho atulo appameyyo anuttaro devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā
atk-s0504a:583: “Sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… manussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso vasavattī, tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:584_0: Tatrāyaṃ padasiddhi – agado viya agado, desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo ca. Tena hesa
atk-s0504a:584_1: mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe, sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca lokaṃ
atk-s0504a:584_2: abhibhavati. Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto yathāvutto agado etassāti dakārassa
atk-s0504a:584_3: takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo. Evaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:585_0: Apica tathāya gatoti tathāgato, tathaṃ gatoti tathāgato. Tattha sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya
atk-s0504a:585_1: tathāya gato avagatoti tathāgato, lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti
atk-s0504a:585_2: tathāgato, lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato adhigatoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ
atk-s0504a:585_3: paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgato. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0504a:586_0: “Loko, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho. Lokasmā tathāgato visaṃyutto. Lokasamudayo,
atk-s0504a:586_1: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasamudayo tathāgatassa pahīno. Lokanirodho,
atk-s0504a:586_2: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokanirodho tathāgatassa sacchikato. Lokanirodhagāminī
atk-s0504a:586_3: paṭipadā, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā tathāgatassa
atk-s0504a:586_4: bhāvitā. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa…pe… sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddhaṃ. Tasmā
atk-s0504a:587_0: Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato. Tathāya āgatoti tathāgato, tathāya
atk-s0504a:587_1: gatoti tathāgato, tathāni āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathāvidhoti
atk-s0504a:587_2: tathāgato, tathāpavattikoti tathāgato, tathehi āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatabhāvena tathāgatoti.
atk-s0504a:588: Kathaṃ tathāya āgatoti tathāgato? Yā sā bhagavatā sumedhabhūtena dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle –
atk-s0504a:592_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ abhinīhāraṃ sampādentena “ahaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ tiṇṇo
atk-s0504a:592_1: tāressāmi, mutto mocessāmi, danto damessāmi, assattho assāsessāmi, parinibbuto parinibbāpessāmi,
atk-s0504a:592_2: suddho sodhessāmi, buddho bodhessāmī”ti mahāpaṭiññā pavattitā. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:601_0: Taṃ panetaṃ mahāpaṭiññaṃ sakalassapi buddhakaradhammasamudāyassa pavicayapaccavekkhaṇasamādānānaṃ
atk-s0504a:601_1: kāraṇabhūtaṃ avisaṃvādento lokanātho yasmā mahākappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri
atk-s0504a:601_2: asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesato dānapāramiādayo samatiṃsapāramiyo
atk-s0504a:601_3: pūretvā, aṅgapariccāgādayo pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā, saccādhiṭṭhānādīni cattāri
atk-s0504a:601_5: ukkaṃsāpetvā, buddhicariyaṃ paramakoṭiṃ pāpetvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhi;
atk-s0504a:601_6: tasmā tasseva sā mahāpaṭiññā tathā avitathā anaññathā, na tassa vālaggamattampi vitathaṃ
atk-s0504a:601_7: atthi. Tathā hi dīpaṅkaro dasabalo koṇḍañño, maṅgalo…pe… kassapo bhagavāti ime catuvīsati
atk-s0504a:601_8: sammāsambuddhā paṭipāṭiyā uppannā “buddho bhavissatī”ti naṃ byākariṃsu. Evaṃ catuvīsatiyā
atk-s0504a:601_9: buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo ye te katābhinīhārehi bodhisattehi laddhabbā ānisaṃsā,
atk-s0504a:601_10: te labhitvāva āgatoti tāya yathāvuttāya mahāpaṭiññāya tathāya abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0504a:601_11: āgato adhigatoti tathāgato. Evaṃ tathāya āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:602_0: Kathaṃ tathāya gatoti tathāgato? Yāyaṃ mahākaruṇā lokanāthassa, yāya mahādukkhasambādhappaṭipannaṃ
atk-s0504a:602_1: sattanikāyaṃ disvā “tassa natthañño koci paṭisaraṇaṃ, ahameva naṃ ito saṃsāradukkhato
atk-s0504a:602_2: mutto mocessāmī”ti samussāhitamānaso mahābhinīhāraṃ akāsi. Katvā ca yathāpaṇidhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:602_3: sakalalokahitasampādanāya ussukkamāpanno attano kāyajīvitanirapekkho paresaṃ sotapathagamanamattenapi
atk-s0504a:602_4: cittutrāsasamuppādikā atidukkarā dukkaracariyā samācaranto yathā mahābodhisattānaṃ
atk-s0504a:602_5: paṭipatti hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na hoti, atha kho uttari visesabhāgiyāva
atk-s0504a:602_6: hoti, tathā paṭipajjamāno anupubbena niravasese bodhisambhāre samānetvā abhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0504a:602_7: pāpuṇi. Tato parañca tāyeva mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso pavivekaratiṃ paramañca
atk-s0504a:602_8: santaṃ vimokkhasukhaṃ pahāya bālajanabahule loke tehi samuppāditaṃ sammānāvamānavippakāraṃ
atk-s0504a:602_9: agaṇetvā veneyyajanavinayanena niravasesaṃ buddhakiccaṃ niṭṭhapesi. Tatra yo bhagavato
atk-s0504a:602_10: sattesu mahākaruṇāya samokkamanākāro, so parato āvi bhavissati. Yathā buddhabhūtassa
atk-s0504a:602_11: lokanāthassa sattesu mahākaruṇā, evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassapi mahābhinīhārakālādīsūti
atk-s0504a:602_12: sabbattha sabbadā ca ekasadisatāya tathāva sā avitathā anaññathā. Tasmā tīsupi avatthāsu
atk-s0504a:602_13: sabbasattesu samānarasāya tathāya mahākaruṇāya sakalalokahitāya gato paṭipannoti
atk-s0504a:603_0: Kathaṃ tathāni āgatoti tathāgato? Tathāni nāma cattāri ariyamaggañāṇāni. Tāni hi
atk-s0504a:603_1: “idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo, ayaṃ dukkhanirodho, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī
atk-s0504a:603_3: ariyasaccānaṃ, dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho, samudayassa
atk-s0504a:603_4: āyūhanaṭṭho nidānaṭṭho saṃyogaṭṭho palibodhaṭṭho, nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho vivekaṭṭho
atk-s0504a:603_5: asaṅkhataṭṭho amataṭṭho, maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetvaṭṭho dassanaṭṭho adhipateyyaṭṭhotiādīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:603_8: sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni, tāni bhagavā
atk-s0504a:603_9: anaññaneyyo sayameva āgato adhigato, tasmā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:604_0: Yathā ca maggañāṇāni, evaṃ bhagavato tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni catupaṭisambhidāñāṇāni
atk-s0504a:605_0: Tatrāyaṃ vibhāvanā – yañhi kiñci aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ hīnādibhedabhinnānaṃ
atk-s0504a:605_1: hīnādibhedabhinnāsu atītāsu khandhāyatanadhātūsu sabhāvakiccādi avatthāvisesādi khandhapaṭibaddhanāmagottādi
atk-s0504a:605_2: ca jānitabbaṃ. Anindriyabaddhesu ca atisukhumatirohitavidūradesesu rūpadhammesu yo
atk-s0504a:605_4: tattha sabbattheva hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalako viya paccakkhato asaṅgamappaṭihataṃ
atk-s0504a:605_5: bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tathā anāgatāsu paccuppannāsu cāti imāni tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:606: “Atītaṃse buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ, anāgataṃse buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ, paccuppannaṃse buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇa”nti.
atk-s0504a:607_0: Tāni panetāni tattha tattha dhammānaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni
atk-s0504a:607_1: avitathāni anaññathāni, tāni bhagavā sayambhuñāṇena adhigañchi. Evaṃ tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:609: “Atthe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dhamme ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā”ti.
atk-s0504a:610_0: Ettha ca hetuanusārena araṇīyato adhigantabbato ca saṅkhepato hetuphalaṃ attho nāma.
atk-s0504a:610_1: Pabhedato pana yaṃkiñci paccayuppannaṃ, nibbānaṃ, bhāsitattho, vipāko, kiriyāti ime
atk-s0504a:610_2: pañca dhammā attho. Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:610_3: atthapaṭisambhidā. Dhammoti saṅkhepato paccayo. So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vidahati
atk-s0504a:610_4: pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca, tasmā dhammoti vuccati. Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako
atk-s0504a:610_5: hetu, ariyamaggo, bhāsitaṃ, kusalaṃ, akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammo, taṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:610_6: paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:611: “Dukkhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti.
atk-s0504a:612_0: Atha vā hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā. Ye dhammā
atk-s0504a:612_1: jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā, imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0504a:612_2: Yamhā dhammā te dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā, tesu dhammesu
atk-s0504a:612_3: ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Jarāmaraṇe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, jarāmaraṇasamudaye
atk-s0504a:612_4: ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Jarāmaraṇanirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiyā
atk-s0504a:612_5: paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Jātiyā, bhave, upādāne, taṇhāya, vedanāya, phasse,
atk-s0504a:612_6: saḷāyatane, nāmarūpe, viññāṇe, saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, saṅkhārasamudaye
atk-s0504a:612_7: ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Saṅkhāranirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, saṅkhāranirodhagāminiyā
atk-s0504a:613_0: “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti – suttaṃ, geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati dhammapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0504a:613_1: So tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti – ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṃ imassa
atk-s0504a:614_0: “Katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ
atk-s0504a:614_1: ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:614_2: samaye phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hoti. Ime dhammā kusalā. Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā,
atk-s0504a:615_0: Tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca sabhāvanirutti abyabhicāravohāro abhilāpo, tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe
atk-s0504a:615_1: māgadhikāya sabbasattānaṃ mūlabhāsāya “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti, ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti
atk-s0504a:615_2: pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā. Yathāvuttesu tesu ñāṇesu gocarakiccādivasena
atk-s0504a:615_3: vitthārato pavattaṃ sabbampi ñāṇamārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ ñāṇe pabhedagataṃ
atk-s0504a:615_4: ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Iti imāni cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni sayameva bhagavatā
atk-s0504a:615_5: adhigatāni atthadhammādike tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attano visaye avisaṃvādanavasena aviparītākārappavattiyā
atk-s0504a:615_6: tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:616_0: Tathā yaṃ kiñci ñeyyaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavatā sabbākārena ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ adhigataṃ
atk-s0504a:616_1: abhisambuddhaṃ. Tathā hissa abhiññeyyā dhammā abhiññeyyato buddhā, pariññeyyā dhammā
atk-s0504a:616_2: pariññeyyato buddhā, pahātabbā dhammā pahātabbato buddhā, sacchikātabbā dhammā sacchikātabbato
atk-s0504a:616_3: buddhā, bhāvetabbā dhammā bhāvetabbato buddhā, yato naṃ koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā
atk-s0504a:616_4: devo vā māro vā brahmā vā “ime nāma te dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0504a:617_0: Yaṃ kiñci pahātabbaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavatā anavasesato bodhimūleyeva pahīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:617_1: anuppattidhammaṃ, na tassa pahānāya uttari karaṇīyaṃ atthi. Tathā hissa lobhadosamohaviparītamanasikāraahirikānottappathinamiddha-
atk-s0504a:617_6: saha vāsanāya pahīnaṃ samucchinnaṃ samūhataṃ, yato naṃ koci samaṇo vā…pe… brahmā
atk-s0504a:617_7: vā “ime nāma te kilesā appahīnā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0504a:618_0: Ye cime bhagavatā kammavipākakilesūpavādaāṇāvītikkamappabhedā antarāyikā dhammā vuttā,
atk-s0504a:618_1: alameva te ekantena antarāyāya, yato naṃ koci samaṇo vā…pe… brahmā vā “nālaṃ te paṭisevato
atk-s0504a:618_2: antarāyāyā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0504a:619_0: Yo ca bhagavatā niravasesavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāya sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅgaho sattakoṭṭhāsiko
atk-s0504a:619_1: sattatiṃsappabhedo ariyamaggapubbaṅgamo anuttaro niyyānadhammo desito, so ekanteneva
atk-s0504a:619_2: niyyāti paṭipannassa vaṭṭadukkhato, yato naṃ koci samaṇo vā…pe… brahmā vā “niyyānadhammo
atk-s0504a:619_3: tayā desito na niyyātī”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0504a:619_4: – “sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti vitthāro. Evametāni
atk-s0504a:619_6: bhagavato catuvesārajjañāṇāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:620_0: Tathā nirayagati, tiracchānagati, petagati, manussagati, devagatīti pañca gatiyo.
atk-s0504a:620_1: Tāsu sañjīvādayo aṭṭha mahānirayā, kukkuḷādayo soḷasa ussadanirayā, lokantarikanirayo
atk-s0504a:620_2: cāti sabbepime ekantadukkhatāya nirassādaṭṭhena nirayā ca, sakakammunā gantabbato
atk-s0504a:620_3: gati cāti nirayagati. Tibbandhakārasītanarakāpi etesveva antogadhā kimikīṭapaṭaṅgasarīsapapakkhisoṇasiṅgālādayo
atk-s0504a:620_4: tiriyaṃ añchitabhāvena tiracchānā nāma. Te eva gatīti tiracchānagati. Khuppipāsitaparadattūpajīvinijjhāmataṇhikādayo
atk-s0504a:620_5: dukkhabahulatāya pakaṭṭhasukhato itā vigatāti petā, te eva gatīti petagati. Kālakañcikādiasurāpi
atk-s0504a:620_6: etesveva antogadhā. Parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ jambudīpādicatumahādīpavāsino manaso
atk-s0504a:620_7: ussannatāya manussā, te eva gatīti manussagati. Cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagāti
atk-s0504a:620_8: ime chabbīsati devanikāyā dibbanti attano iddhānubhāvena kīḷanti jotenti cāti devā,
atk-s0504a:621_0: Tā panetā gatiyo yasmā taṃtaṃkammanibbatto upapattibhavaviseso, tasmā atthato vipākakkhandhā
atk-s0504a:621_1: kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. Tattha “ayaṃ nāma gati nāma iminā kammunā jāyati, tassa kammassa
atk-s0504a:621_2: paccayavisesehi evaṃ vibhāgabhinnattā visuṃ ete sattanikāyā evaṃ vibhāgabhinnā”ti
atk-s0504a:621_3: yathāsakaṃhetuphalavibhāgaparicchindanavasena ṭhānaso hetuso bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0504a:622_0: “Pañca kho imā, sāriputta, gatiyo. Katamā pañca? Nirayo, tiracchānayoni, pettivisayo,
atk-s0504a:622_1: manussā, devā. Nirayañcāhaṃ, sāriputta, pajānāmi, nirayagāmiñca maggaṃ, nirayagāminiñca
atk-s0504a:622_2: paṭipadaṃ; yathā paṭipanno ca kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ
atk-s0504a:623: Tāni panetāni bhagavato ñāṇāni tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visaye aviparītākārappavattiyā avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:624_1: paññāsāya ākārehi pavattaṃ bhagavato indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “saddho
atk-s0504a:624_2: puggalo apparajakkho, assaddho puggalo mahārajakkho”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0504a:625_0: Yañca “ayaṃ puggalo apparajakkho, ayaṃ sassatadiṭṭhiko, ayaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiko, ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:625_1: anulomikāyaṃ khantiyaṃ ṭhito, ayaṃ yathābhūtañāṇe ṭhito, ayaṃ kāmāsayo, na nekkhammādiāsayo,
atk-s0504a:625_2: ayaṃ nekkhammāsayo, na kāmādiāsayo”tiādinā “imassa kāmarāgo ativiya thāmagato, na
atk-s0504a:625_3: paṭighādiko, imassa paṭigho ativiya thāmagato, na kāmarāgādiko”tiādinā “imassa puññābhisaṅkhāro
atk-s0504a:625_4: adhiko, na apuññābhisaṅkhāro na āneñjābhisaṅkhāro, imassa apuññābhisaṅkhāro adhiko,
atk-s0504a:625_5: na puññābhisaṅkhāro na āneñjābhisaṅkhāro, imassa āneñjābhisaṅkhāro adhiko, na puññābhisaṅkhāro
atk-s0504a:625_6: na apuññābhisaṅkhāro. Imassa kāyasucaritaṃ adhikaṃ, imassa vacīsucaritaṃ, imassa
atk-s0504a:625_7: manosucaritaṃ. Ayaṃ hīnādhimuttiko, ayaṃ paṇītādhimuttiko, ayaṃ kammāvaraṇena samannāgato,
atk-s0504a:625_8: ayaṃ kilesāvaraṇena samannāgato, ayaṃ vipākāvaraṇena samannāgato, ayaṃ na kammāvaraṇena
atk-s0504a:625_9: samannāgato, na kilesāvaraṇena, na vipākāvaraṇena samannāgato”tiādinā ca sattānaṃ
atk-s0504a:625_10: āsayādīnaṃ yathābhūtaṃ vibhāvanākārappavattaṃ bhagavato āsayānusayañāṇaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0504a:626: “Idha tathāgato sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ jānāti, caritaṃ jānāti, adhimuttiṃ jānāti, bhabbābhabbe satte jānātī”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:627_2: vividhavikubbaniddhinimmāpanakaṃ bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyañāṇaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0504a:628_0: “Idha tathāgato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karoti asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi. Uparimakāyato aggikkhandho
atk-s0504a:628_1: pavattati, heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati. Heṭṭhimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0504a:629_0: Yañca rāgādīhi jātiādīhi ca anekehi dukkhadhammehi upaddutaṃ sattanikāyaṃ tato nīharitukāmatāvasena
atk-s0504a:629_1: nānānayehi pavattassa bhagavato mahākaruṇokkamanassa paccayabhūtaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiñāṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:630_0: “Katamaṃ tathāgatassa mahākaruṇāsamāpattiñāṇaṃ? Bahukehi ākārehi passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:630_1: bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati, āditto lokasannivāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:632_0: Yaṃ pana yāvatā dhammadhātu, yattakaṃ ñātabbaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatādi, tassa sabbassa
atk-s0504a:632_1: paropadesena vinā sabbākārato paṭijānanasamatthaṃ ākaṅkhāmattappaṭibaddhavutti anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:632_3: tatthāvaraṇābhāvatova nissaṅgappavattiṃ upādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti ca vuccati. Ayamettha
atk-s0504a:632_4: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana parato āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0504a:633: Evametāni bhagavato cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni aviparītākārappavattiyā yathāsakaṃvisayassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:634_2: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo”ti evaṃ sarūpato yāyaṃ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānā līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:634_3: anekesaṃ upaddavānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā satiādibhedā dhammasāmaggī, yāya ariyasāvako
atk-s0504a:634_4: bujjhati, kilesaniddāya uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā saccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā
atk-s0504a:634_5: sacchikaroti, sā dhammasāmaggī “bodhī”ti vuccati, tassā bodhiyā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā.
atk-s0504a:634_6: Ariyasāvako vā yathāvuttāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā “bodhī”ti vuccati. Tassa
atk-s0504a:634_7: bodhissa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti evaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇato, upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇo satisambojjhaṅgo,
atk-s0504a:635_0: “Tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? Idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena
atk-s0504a:635_1: samannāgato, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā”tiādinā sattannaṃ
atk-s0504a:635_2: bojjhaṅgānaṃ aññamaññūpakāravasena ekakkhaṇe pavattidassanato. “Tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo?
atk-s0504a:635_3: Atthi ajjhattaṃ dhammesu sati, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu satī”tiādinā tesaṃ visayavibhāvanāpavattidassanato.
atk-s0504a:635_4: “Tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti
atk-s0504a:635_6: “Tattha katame satta bojjhaṅgā? Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti…pe…
atk-s0504a:635_7: tasmiṃ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti, satisambojjhaṅgo…pe… upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo. Tattha
atk-s0504a:635_8: katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? Yā sati anussatī”tiādinā chanavutiyā nayasahassavibhāgehīti
atk-s0504a:635_9: evaṃ nānākārato pavattāni bhagavato bojjhaṅgavibhāvanañāṇāni tassa tassa atthassa
atk-s0504a:635_10: avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:636_0: Tathā “tattha katamaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ? Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-s0504a:636_1: maggo, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti evaṃ sarūpato. Sabbakilesehi
atk-s0504a:636_2: ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo. Ariyānaṃ aṭṭhavidhattā
atk-s0504a:636_3: nibbānādhigamāya ekantakāraṇattā ca aṭṭhaṅgiko. Kilese mārento gacchati, atthikehi
atk-s0504a:636_4: maggīyati, sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggayatīti maggoti evaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇato. “Sammādassanalakkhaṇā
atk-s0504a:636_8: evaṃ visesalakkhaṇato. Sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0504a:636_9: micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tappaṭicchādakamohavidhamanena
atk-s0504a:636_10: asammohato sampayuttadhamme ca passati, tathā sammāsaṅkappādayopi micchāsaṅkappādīni
atk-s0504a:636_12: ca karontīti evaṃ kiccavibhāgato. Sammādiṭṭhi pubbabhāge nānakkhaṇā visuṃ dukkhādiārammaṇā
atk-s0504a:636_13: hutvā maggakāle ekakkhaṇā nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni
atk-s0504a:636_14: cattāri nāmāni labhati. Sammāsaṅkappādayopi pubbabhāge nānakkhaṇā nānārammaṇā, maggakāle
atk-s0504a:636_15: ekakkhaṇā ekārammaṇā, tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato “nekkhammasaṅkappo”tiādīni tīṇi
atk-s0504a:636_16: nāmāni labhati. Sammāvācādayo tayo pubbabhāge “musāvādā veramaṇī”tiādivibhāgā viratiyopi
atk-s0504a:636_17: cetanāyopi hutvā maggakkhaṇe viratiyova, sammāvāyāmasatiyo kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0504a:636_18: cattāri nāmāni labhanti. Sammāsamādhi pana maggakkhaṇepi paṭhamajjhānādivasena nānā
atk-s0504a:636_19: evāti evaṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgesu pavattivibhāgato. “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0504a:636_20: bhāveti vivekanissita”ntiādinā bhāvanāvidhito. “Tattha katamo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo? Idha,
atk-s0504a:636_21: bhikkhu, yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti…pe… dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ,
atk-s0504a:636_22: tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo hoti – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo”tiādinā caturāsītiyā
atk-s0504a:636_23: nayasahassavibhāgehīti evaṃ anekākārato pavattāni bhagavato ariyamaggavibhāvanañāṇāni
atk-s0504a:636_24: atthassa avisaṃvādanato sabbānipi tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:637_0: Tathā paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā ca nirodhasamāpattīti etāsu anupaṭipāṭiyā viharitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:637_2: yathārahaṃ sampayogavasena ca pavattāni bhagavato ñāṇāni tadatthasiddhiyā tathāni
atk-s0504a:637_3: avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato. Tathā “idaṃ imassa
atk-s0504a:637_4: ṭhānaṃ, idaṃ aṭṭhāna”nti aviparītaṃ tassa tassa phalassa kāraṇākāraṇajānanaṃ, tesaṃ
atk-s0504a:637_5: tesaṃ sattānaṃ atītādibhedabhinnassa kammasamādānassa anavasesato yathābhūtaṃ vipākantarajānanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:637_6: āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva tassa tassa sattassa “ayaṃ nirayagāminī paṭipadā…pe… ayaṃ nibbānagāminī
atk-s0504a:637_8: nānāsabhāvañca tassa lokassa “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imasmiṃ dhammappabandhe
atk-s0504a:637_9: ayaṃ viseso jāyatī”tiādinā nayena yathābhūtaṃ dhātunānattajānanaṃ, saddhādiindriyānaṃ
atk-s0504a:637_10: tikkhamudutājānanaṃ saṃkilesādīhi saddhiṃ jhānavimokkhādijānanaṃ, sattānaṃ aparimāṇāsu
atk-s0504a:637_11: jātīsu tappaṭibandhena saddhiṃ anavasesato pubbenivutthakkhandhasantatijānanaṃ hīnādivibhāgehi
atk-s0504a:637_12: saddhiṃ cutipaṭisandhijānanaṃ, “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva catusaccajānananti
atk-s0504a:637_13: imāni bhagavato dasabalañāṇāni avirajjhitvā yathāsakaṃvisayāvagāhanato yathādhippetatthasādhanato
atk-s0504a:637_14: ca yathābhūtavuttiyā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:638: “Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:640_0: Yathā cetesampi ñāṇānaṃ vasena, evaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānādivibhāvanañāṇādianantāparimeyyabhedānaṃ
atk-s0504a:640_1: anaññasādhāraṇānaṃ paññāvisesānaṃ vasena bhagavā tathāni ñāṇāni āgato adhigatoti
atk-s0504a:641_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yā tā bhagavato abhijātiabhisambodhidhammavinayapaññāpanaanupādisesanibbānadhātuyo,
atk-s0504a:641_1: tā tathā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yadatthaṃ tā lokanāthena abhipatthitā pavattitā ca, tadatthassa
atk-s0504a:641_2: ekantasiddhiyā avisaṃvādanato aviparītatthavuttiyā tathā avitathā anaññathā. Tathā
atk-s0504a:641_3: hi ayaṃ bhagavā bodhisattabhūto samatiṃsapāramiparipūraṇādikaṃ vuttappakāraṃ sabbabuddhattahetuṃ
atk-s0504a:641_4: sampādetvā tusitapure ṭhito buddhakolāhalaṃ sutvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi ekato
atk-s0504a:644_0: Āyācito uppannapubbanimitto pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā “idāni ahaṃ manussayoniyaṃ
atk-s0504a:644_1: uppajjitvā abhisambujjhissāmī”ti āsāḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ sakyarājakule mahāmāyāya deviyā
atk-s0504a:644_2: kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasa māse devamanussehi mahatā parihārena parihariyamāno
atk-s0504a:645_0: Abhijātikkhaṇe panassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakkhaṇe viya dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni pāturahesuṃ,
atk-s0504a:645_1: ayaṃ dasasahassilokadhātu saṃkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu
atk-s0504a:645_2: aparimāṇo obhāso phari, tassa, taṃ siriṃ daṭṭhukāmā viya andhā cakkhūni paṭilabhiṃsu,
atk-s0504a:645_3: badhirā saddaṃ suṇiṃsu, mūgā samālapiṃsu, khujjā ujugattā ahesuṃ, paṅgulā padasā
atk-s0504a:645_4: gamanaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu, bandhanagatā sabbasattā andubandhanādīhi mucciṃsu, sabbanarakesu
atk-s0504a:645_5: aggi nibbāyi, pettivisaye khuppipāsā vūpasami, tiracchānānaṃ bhayaṃ nāhosi, sabbasattānaṃ
atk-s0504a:645_6: rogo vūpasami, sabbasattā piyaṃvadā ahesuṃ, madhurenākārena assā hasiṃsu, vāraṇā
atk-s0504a:645_7: gajjiṃsu, sabbatūriyāni sakasakaninnādaṃ muñciṃsu, aghaṭṭitāni eva manussānaṃ hatthūpagādīni
atk-s0504a:645_8: ābharaṇāni madhurenākārena saddaṃ muñciṃsu, sabbadisā vippasannā ahesuṃ, sattānaṃ
atk-s0504a:645_9: sukhaṃ uppādayamāno mudusītalavāto vāyi, akālamegho vassi, pathavitopi udakaṃ ubbhijjitvā
atk-s0504a:645_10: vissandi, pakkhino ākāsagamanaṃ vijahiṃsu, nadiyo asandamānā aṭṭhaṃsu, mahāsamudde
atk-s0504a:645_11: madhuraṃ udakaṃ ahosi, upakkilesavinimutte sūriye dippamāne eva ākāsagatā sabbā jotiyo
atk-s0504a:645_12: jotiṃsu, ṭhapetvā arūpāvacare deve avasesā sabbe devā sabbe ca nerayikā dissamānarūpā
atk-s0504a:645_13: ahesuṃ, tarukuṭṭakavāṭaselādayo anāvaraṇabhūtā ahesuṃ, sattānaṃ cutūpapātā nāhesuṃ,
atk-s0504a:645_14: sabbaṃ aniṭṭhagandhaṃ abhibhavitvā dibbagandho pavāyi, sabbe phalūpagā rukkhā phaladharā
atk-s0504a:645_15: sampajjiṃsu, mahāsamuddo sabbatthakameva pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannatalo ahosi,
atk-s0504a:645_16: thalajajalajādīni sabbapupphāni pupphiṃsu, rukkhānaṃ khandhesu khandhapadumāni, sākhāsu
atk-s0504a:645_17: sākhāpadumāni, latāsu latāpadumāni, pupphiṃsu, mahītalasilātalāni bhinditvā uparūpari
atk-s0504a:645_18: satta satta hutvā daṇḍapadumāni nāma nikkhamiṃsu, ākāse olambakapadumāni nibbattiṃsu,
atk-s0504a:645_19: samantato pupphavassaṃ vassi ākāse dibbatūriyāni vajjiṃsu, sakaladasasahassilokadhātu
atk-s0504a:645_20: vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamālāguḷaṃ viya, uppīḷetvā pavattamālākalāpo viya, alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0504a:645_21: mālāsanaṃ viya ca ekamālāmālinī vipphurantavāḷabījanī pupphadhūpagandhaparivāsitā
atk-s0504a:645_22: paramasobhaggappattā ahosi, tāni ca pubbanimittāni upari adhigatānaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ
atk-s0504a:645_23: nimittabhūtāni eva ahesuṃ. Evaṃ anekacchariyapātubhāvā ayaṃ abhijāti yadatthaṃ tena
atk-s0504a:645_24: abhipatthitā, tassā abhisambodhiyā ekantasiddhiyā tathāva ahosi avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0504a:646_0: Tathā ye buddhaveneyyā bodhaneyyabandhavā, te sabbepi anavasesato sayameva bhagavatā
atk-s0504a:646_1: vinītā. Ye ca sāvakaveneyyā dhammaveneyyā ca, tepi sāvakādīhi vinītā vinayaṃ gacchanti
atk-s0504a:646_2: gamissanti cāti yadatthaṃ bhagavatā abhisambodhi abhipatthitā, tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyā
atk-s0504a:647_0: Apica yassa yassa ñeyyadhammassa yo yo sabhāvo bujjhitabbo, so so hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ
atk-s0504a:647_1: viya āvajjanamattapaṭibaddhena attano ñāṇena aviparītaṃ anavasesato bhagavatā abhisambuddhoti
atk-s0504a:648_0: Tathā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ tathā tathā desetabbappakāraṃ, tesaṃ tesañca sattānaṃ
atk-s0504a:648_1: āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiṃ sammadeva oloketvā dhammataṃ avijahanteneva paññattinayaṃ
atk-s0504a:648_2: vohāramattaṃ anatidhāvanteneva ca dhammataṃ vibhāventena yathāparādhaṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0504a:648_3: yathādhammañca anusāsantena bhagavatā veneyyā vinītā ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpitāti dhammavinayapaññāpanāpissa
atk-s0504a:648_4: tadatthasiddhiyā yathābhūtavuttiyā ca tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0504a:649_0: Tathā yā sā bhagavatā anuppattā pathaviyādiphassavedanādirūpārūpasabhāvanimuttā lujjanapalujjanabhāvābhāvato
atk-s0504a:649_1: lokasabhāvātītā tamasā visaṃsaṭṭhattā kenaci anobhāsanīyā lokasabhāvābhāvato eva
atk-s0504a:649_3: upādīnaṃ lesamattassāpi abhāvato “anupādisesā”tipi vuccati. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0504a:650_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatanaṃ, yattha neva pathavī na āpo na tejo na vāyo na ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
atk-s0504a:650_1: na viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ na ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nāyaṃ loko na
atk-s0504a:650_2: paro loko na ca ubho candimasūriyā. Tamahaṃ, bhikkhave, neva āgatiṃ vadāmi na gatiṃ
atk-s0504a:650_3: na ṭhitiṃ na cutiṃ na upapattiṃ; appatiṭṭhaṃ appavattaṃ anārammaṇamevetaṃ esevanto dukkhassā”ti.
atk-s0504a:651_0: Sā sabbesampi upādānakkhandhānaṃ atthaṅgamo sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ samatho, sabbūpadhīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:651_1: paṭinissaggo, sabbadukkhānaṃ vūpasamo, sabbālayānaṃ samugghāto, sabbavaṭṭānaṃ upacchedo,
atk-s0504a:651_2: accantasantilakkhaṇāti yathāvuttasabhāvassa kadācipi avisaṃvādanato tathā avitathā
atk-s0504a:651_3: anaññathā. Evametā abhijātiādikā tathā gato upagato adhigato paṭipanno pattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:652_0: Kathaṃ tathāvidhoti tathāgato? Yathāvidhā purimakā sammāsambuddhā, ayampi bhagavā
atk-s0504a:652_1: tathāvidho. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathāvidhā te bhagavanto maggasīlena, phalasīlena, sabbenapi
atk-s0504a:652_3: maggapaññāya, phalapaññāya, sabbāyapi lokiyalokuttarapaññāya, devasikaṃ vaḷañjitabbehi
atk-s0504a:652_6: pana anantāparimāṇabhedehi acinteyyānubhāvehi sakalasabbaññuguṇehi, ayampi amhākaṃ
atk-s0504a:652_7: bhagavā tathāvidho. Sabbesañhi sammāsambuddhānaṃ āyuvemattaṃ, sarīrappamāṇavemattaṃ,
atk-s0504a:652_8: kulavemattaṃ, dukkaracariyāvemattaṃ, rasmivemattanti imehi pañcahi vemattehi siyā
atk-s0504a:652_9: vemattaṃ, na pana sīlavisuddhiādīsu visuddhīsu samathavipassanāpaṭipattiyaṃ attanā
atk-s0504a:652_10: paṭividdhaguṇesu ca kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ atthi, atha kho majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya
atk-s0504a:652_11: aññaṃmaññaṃ nibbisesā te buddhā bhagavanto. Tasmā yathāvidhā purimakā sammāsambuddhā,
atk-s0504a:652_12: ayampi bhagavā tathāvidho. Evaṃ tathāvidhoti tathāgato. Vidhattho cettha gatasaddo.
atk-s0504a:652_13: Tathā hi lokiyā vidhayuttagatasadde pakāratthe vadanti.
atk-s0504a:653_0: Kathaṃ tathāpavattikoti tathāgato? Anaññasādhāraṇena iddhānubhāvena samannāgatattā
atk-s0504a:653_2: kāyappavattiyādīnaṃ katthaci paṭighātābhāvato yathāruci tathā gataṃ gati gamanaṃ
atk-s0504a:653_3: kāyavacīcittappavatti etassāti tathāgato. Evaṃ tathāpavattikoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:654_0: Kathaṃ tathehi agatoti tathāgato? Bodhisambhārasambharaṇe tappaṭipakkhappavattisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0504a:654_1: natthi etassa gatanti agato. So panassa agatabhāvo maccheradānapāramiādīsu aviparītaṃ
atk-s0504a:655_0: Atha vā kilesābhisaṅkhārappavattisaṅkhātaṃ khandhappavattisaṅkhātameva vā pañcasupi
atk-s0504a:655_1: gatīsu gataṃ gamanaṃ etassa natthīti agato. Saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānappattiyā
atk-s0504a:655_2: svāyamassa agatabhāvo tathehi ariyamaggañāṇehīti evampi bhagavā tathehi āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:656_0: Kathaṃ tathāgatabhāvena tathāgato? Tathāgatabhāvenāti ca tathāgatassa sabbhāvena,
atk-s0504a:656_1: atthitāyāti attho. Ko panesa tathāgato, yassa atthitāya bhagavā tathāgatoti vuccatīti?
atk-s0504a:656_2: Saddhammo. Saddhammo hi ariyamaggo tāva yathā yuganaddhasamathavipassanābalena anavasesakilesapakkhaṃ
atk-s0504a:656_3: samūhanantena samucchedappahānavasena gantabbaṃ, tathā gato. Phaladhammo yathā attano
atk-s0504a:656_4: maggānurūpaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānavasena gantabbaṃ, tathā gato pavatto. Nibbānadhammo
atk-s0504a:656_5: pana yathā gato paññāya paṭividdho sakalavaṭṭadukkhavūpasamāya sampajjati, buddhādīhi
atk-s0504a:656_6: tathā gato sacchikatoti tathāgato. Pariyattidhammopi yathā purimabuddhehi suttageyyādivasena
atk-s0504a:656_7: pavattiādippakāsanavasena ca veneyyānaṃ āsayādianurūpaṃ pavattito, amhākampi bhagavatā
atk-s0504a:656_8: tathā gato gadito pavattitoti vā tathāgato. Yathā bhagavatā desito, tathā bhagavato
atk-s0504a:656_9: sāvakehi gato avagatoti tathāgato. Evaṃ sabbopi saddhammo tathāgato. Tenāha sakko
atk-s0504a:656_10: devānamindo “tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ, dhammaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotū”ti. Svāssa
atk-s0504a:657_0: Yathā ca dhammo, evaṃ ariyasaṅghopi, yathā attahitāya parahitāya ca paṭipannehi suvisuddhaṃ
atk-s0504a:657_1: pubbabhāgasamathavipassanāpaṭipadaṃ purakkhatvā tena tena maggena gantabbaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0504a:657_2: taṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato. Yathā vā bhagavatā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādinayo desito,
atk-s0504a:657_3: tathā ca buddhattā tathā gadanato ca tathāgato. Tenāha sakko devarājā – “tathāgataṃ
atk-s0504a:657_4: devamanussapūjitaṃ, saṅghaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotū”ti, svāssa sāvakabhūto atthīti
atk-s0504a:658_0: Idampi tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvadīpane mukhamattakameva, sabbākārena pana tathāgatova
atk-s0504a:658_1: tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya. Idañhi tathāgatapadaṃ mahatthaṃ, mahāgatikaṃ,
atk-s0504a:658_2: mahāvisayaṃ, tassa appamādapadassa viya tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ yuttito atthabhāvena
atk-s0504a:708_0: Arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhanti ettha arahāti padassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Sammā sāmañca
atk-s0504a:708_1: sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhaṃ. Yaṃkiñci ñeyyaṃ nāma, tassa sabbassapi
atk-s0504a:708_2: sabbākārato aviparītato sayameva abhisambuddhattāti vuttaṃ hoti. Imināssa paropadesarahitassa
atk-s0504a:709_0: Nanu ca sabbaññutaññāṇato aññaṃ anāvaraṇaṃ, aññathā cha asādhāraṇāni ñāṇāni buddhañāṇānīti
atk-s0504a:709_1: vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti? Na virujjhati, visayappavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:709_2: ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā. Ekameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammavisayatāya
atk-s0504a:709_3: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgacāramupādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti
atk-s0504a:710: “Sabbaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhataṃ anavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Tattha āvaraṇaṃ natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa”ntiādi.
atk-s0504a:711_0: Tasmā natthi nesaṃ atthato bhedo, ekantenevetaṃ evamicchitabbaṃ. Aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṃ
atk-s0504a:711_1: sādhāraṇatā asabbadhammārammaṇatā ca āpajjeyya. Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumattampi
atk-s0504a:711_2: āvaraṇaṃ atthi, anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṃ na pavattati
atk-s0504a:711_3: tatthāvaraṇasabbhāvato anāvaraṇabhāvoyeva na siyā. Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:711_4: sabbaññutaññāṇato, idha pana sabbattha appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva
atk-s0504a:711_5: adhippetaṃ, tassevādhigamena bhagavā sabbaññū sabbavidū sammāsambuddhoti vuccati,
atk-s0504a:711_6: na sakiṃyeva sabbadhammāvabodhato. Tathā ca vuttaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ –
atk-s0504a:712: “Vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti.
atk-s0504a:713: Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṃ samatthatā ahosīti.
atk-s0504a:714_0: Etthāha – kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, udāhu
atk-s0504a:714_1: kamenāti? Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, atītānāgatappaccupannaajjhattabahiddhādibhedabhinnānaṃ
atk-s0504a:714_2: saṅkhatadhammānaṃ asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṃ
atk-s0504a:714_3: pekkhantassa viya visayavibhāgenāvabodho na siyā, tathā ca sati “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti
atk-s0504a:714_4: vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā
atk-s0504a:714_5: hontīti āpajjati. Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0504a:714_6: buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tena te sabbavidūti vuccanti. Evañca katvā –
atk-s0504a:716_0: “Idampi vacanaṃ suvuttaṃ hotī”ti vadanti, tesampi vuttadosānātivatti, ṭhitalakkhaṇārammaṇatāya
atk-s0504a:716_1: ca atītānāgatasammutidhammānaṃ tadabhāvato, ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṃ siyā.
atk-s0504a:716_2: Tasmā sakiṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati.
atk-s0504a:717_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti? Evampi na yujjati. Na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena
atk-s0504a:717_1: disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho
atk-s0504a:717_2: sambhavati apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa. Ye pana “atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa
atk-s0504a:717_3: ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā,
atk-s0504a:717_4: tañca ñāṇaṃ na anumānikaṃ saṃsayābhāvato. Saṃsayānubaddhañhi loke anumānañāṇa”nti
atk-s0504a:717_5: vadanti, tesampi na yuttaṃ. Sabbassa hi apaccakkhabhāve atthassa avisaṃvādanena ñeyyassa
atk-s0504a:717_6: ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato.
atk-s0504a:717_7: Yañhi taṃ sesaṃ, taṃ apaccakkhanti. Atha tampi paccakkhaṃ, tassa sesabhāvo pana na
atk-s0504a:717_8: siyāti sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā? Avisayavicārabhāvato. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0504a:718: “Buddhavisayo, bhikkhave, acinteyyo, na cintetabbo; yo cinteyya, ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
atk-s0504a:719_0: Idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ – yaṃkiñci bhagavatā ñātuṃ icchitaṃ sakalamekadeso vā,
atk-s0504a:719_1: tattha appaṭihatavuttitāya paccakkhato ñāṇaṃ pavattati, niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato,
atk-s0504a:719_2: ñātuṃ icchitassa sakalassa avisayabhāvato tassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā,
atk-s0504a:719_3: ekanteneva sā icchitabbā “sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanapaṭibaddhā, ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhā,
atk-s0504a:720_0: Nanu ca etasmimpi pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ, tadā sakimeva sakalavisayatāya
atk-s0504a:720_1: anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānātivattiyevāti? Na, tassa
atk-s0504a:720_2: visodhitattā. Visodhito hi so buddhavisayo acinteyyoti. Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamavuttitāya
atk-s0504a:720_3: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā, tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi
atk-s0504a:720_4: taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha
atk-s0504a:720_5: acinteyyaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:720_6: ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ ñeyyanti evamekajjhaṃ visuṃ visuṃ sakiṃ
atk-s0504a:720_7: kamena ca icchānurūpaṃ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho bhagavā.
atk-s0504a:721_0: Dve vitakkāti dve sammā vitakkā. Tattha vitakkenti etena, sayaṃ vā vitakketi, vitakkanamattameva
atk-s0504a:721_1: vāti vitakko. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇābhiniropanalakkhaṇo, āhananapariyāhananaraso, ārammaṇe
atk-s0504a:721_2: cittassa ānayanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Visayabhedena pana taṃ dvidhā katvā vuttaṃ “dve vitakkā”ti.
atk-s0504a:721_3: Samudācarantīti samaṃ sammā ca uddhamuddhaṃ mariyādāya caranti. Mariyādattho hi ayamākāro,
atk-s0504a:721_4: tena ca yogena “tathāgataṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddha”nti idaṃ sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:721_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa attano visaye samaṃ sammā
atk-s0504a:721_6: ca aññamaññaṃ mariyādaṃ anatikkamantā uddhamuddhaṃ bahulaṃ abhiṇhaṃ caranti pavattantīti.
atk-s0504a:722_0: Ko pana nesaṃ visayo, kā vā mariyādā, kathañca taṃ anatikkamitvā te uddhamuddhaṃ
atk-s0504a:722_1: bahulaṃ abhiṇhaṃ niccaṃ pavattantīti? Vuccate – khemavitakko, pavivekavitakkoti ime
atk-s0504a:722_2: dve vitakkāyeva. Tesu khemavitakko tāva bhagavato visesena karuṇāsampayutto, mettāmuditāsampayuttopi
atk-s0504a:722_3: labbhateva, tasmā so mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā mettādisamāpattiyā ca pubbaṅgamo sampayutto
atk-s0504a:722_4: ca veditabbo. Pavivekavitakko pana phalasamāpattiyā pubbaṅgamo sampayutto ca, dibbavihārādivasenāpi
atk-s0504a:722_5: labbhateva. Iti nesaṃ vitakko visayo, tasmā ekasmiṃ santāne bahulaṃ pavattamānānampi
atk-s0504a:722_6: kālena kālaṃ savisayasmiṃyeva caraṇato natthi mariyādā, na saṅkarena vutti.
atk-s0504a:723_0: Tattha khemavitakko bhagavato karuṇokkamanādinā vibhāvetabbo, pavivekavitakko samāpattīhi.
atk-s0504a:723_1: Tatrāyaṃ vibhāvanā – “ayaṃ loko santāpajāto dukkhapareto”tiādinā rāgaggiādīhi lokasannivāsassa
atk-s0504a:724_0: “Bahūhi ākārehi passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati,
atk-s0504a:724_1: āditto lokasannivāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.
atk-s0504a:724_2: Uyyutto, payāto, kummaggapaṭipanno, upanīyati loko addhuvo, atāṇo loko anabhissaro,
atk-s0504a:724_3: assako loko, sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso.
atk-s0504a:725_0: “Atāyano lokasannivāso, aleṇo, asaraṇo, asaraṇībhūto, uddhato loko avūpasanto, sasallo
atk-s0504a:725_2: avijjāgato lokasannivāso aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho tantākulakajāto kulāguṇṭhikajāto
atk-s0504a:725_3: muñjapabbajabhūto apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattatīti passantānaṃ, avijjāvisadosasaṃlitto
atk-s0504a:726: “Taṇhāsaṅghāṭapaṭimukko, taṇhājālena otthaṭo, taṇhāsotena vuyhati, taṇhāsaṃyojanena saṃyutto, taṇhānusayena anusaṭo, taṇhāsantāpena santappati, taṇhāpariḷāhena pariḍayhati.
