atk-s0504a:727: “Diṭṭhisaṅghāṭapaṭimukko, diṭṭhijālena otthaṭo, diṭṭhisotena vuyhati, diṭṭhisaṃyojanena saṃyutto, diṭṭhānusayena anusaṭo, diṭṭhisantāpena santappati, diṭṭhipariḷāhena pariḍayhati.
atk-s0504a:728: “Jātiyā anugato, jarāya anusaṭo, byādhinā abhibhūto, maraṇena abbhāhato, dukkhe patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0504a:729_2: baddho, mahāsambādhapaṭipanno, mahāpalibodhena palibuddho, mahāpapāte patito, mahākantārapaṭipanno,
atk-s0504a:730_0: “Abbhāhato lokasannivāso, āditto lokasannivāso rāgagginā, dosagginā, mohagginā jātiyā…pe…
atk-s0504a:730_1: upāyāsehi, unnītako lokasannivāso haññati niccamatāṇo pattadaṇḍo takkaro, vajjabandhanabaddho
atk-s0504a:730_2: āghātanapaccupaṭṭhito, anātho lokasannivāso paramakāruññataṃ patto, dukkhābhitunno
atk-s0504a:731: “Andho, acakkhuko, hatanetto, apariṇāyako, vipathapakkhando, añjasāparaddho, mahoghapakkhando.
atk-s0504a:732_0: “Dvīhi diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhito, tīhi duccaritehi vippaṭipanno, catūhi yogehi yojito,
atk-s0504a:732_1: catūhi ganthehi ganthito, catūhi upādānehi upādīyati, pañcagatisamāruḷho, pañcahi
atk-s0504a:732_2: kāmaguṇehi rajjati, pañcahi nīvaraṇehi otthaṭo, chahi vivādamūlehi vivadati, chahi
atk-s0504a:732_3: taṇhākāyehi rajjati, chahi diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhito, sattahi anusayehi anusaṭo,
atk-s0504a:732_4: sattahi saṃyojanehi saṃyutto, sattahi mānehi unnato, aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi samparivattati,
atk-s0504a:732_5: aṭṭhahi micchattehi niyato, aṭṭhahi purisadosehi dussati, navahi āghātavatthūhi āghātito,
atk-s0504a:732_6: navahi mānehi unnato, navahi taṇhāmūlakehi dhammehi rajjati, dasahi kilesavatthūhi
atk-s0504a:732_7: kilissati, dasahi āghātavatthūhi āghātito, dasahi akusalakammapathehi samannāgato,
atk-s0504a:732_8: dasahi saṃyojanehi saṃyutto, dasahi micchattehi niyato, dasavatthukāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato,
atk-s0504a:732_9: dasavatthukāya antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato, aṭṭhasatataṇhāpapañcehi papañcito,
atk-s0504a:732_10: dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhito lokasannivāsoti sampassantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ
atk-s0504a:733_0: “Ahañcamhi tiṇṇo, loko ca atiṇṇo. Ahañcamhi mutto, loko ca amutto. Ahañcamhi danto,
atk-s0504a:733_1: loko ca adanto. Ahañcamhi santo, loko ca asanto. Ahañcamhi assattho, loko ca anassattho.
atk-s0504a:733_2: Ahañcamhi parinibbuto, loko ca aparinibbuto. Pahomi khvāhaṃ tiṇṇo tāretuṃ, mutto
atk-s0504a:733_3: mocetuṃ, danto dametuṃ, santo sametuṃ, assattho assāsetuṃ, parinibbuto pare ca parinibbāpetunti
atk-s0504a:733_4: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:734_0: Imināva nayena bhagavato sattesu mettāokkamanañca vibhāvetabbaṃ. Karuṇāvisayassa
atk-s0504a:734_1: hi dukkhassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sukhaṃ sattesu upasaṃharantī mettāpi pavattatīti idha
atk-s0504a:734_3: tassa dibbavihāraariyavihāresu pubbabhāgassa paṭhamajjhānassa paccavekkhaṇāya ca
atk-s0504a:734_4: vasena pavatti veditabbā. Tattha ye te bhagavato devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakavasena catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā
atk-s0504a:734_5: samāpattivihārā, yesaṃ purecaraṇabhāvena pavattaṃ samādhicariyānugataṃ ñāṇacariyānugataṃ
atk-s0504a:734_7: bhagavato pavivekavitakkassa bahulaṃ pavatti veditabbā. Ayañca attho mahāsaccakasuttenapi
atk-s0504a:735: “So kho ahaṃ, aggivessana, tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi, sannisādemi, yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī”ti.
atk-s0504a:736_0: Idañhi bhagavā “samaṇo gotamo abhirūpo pāsādiko suphusitaṃ dantāvaraṇaṃ, jivhā tanukā,
atk-s0504a:736_1: madhuraṃ vacanaṃ, tena parisaṃ rañjento maññe vicarati, citte panassa ekaggatā natthi,
atk-s0504a:736_2: yo evaṃ saññattibahulo caratī”ti saccakena nigaṇṭhaputtena vitakkite avassaṃ sahoḍhaṃ
atk-s0504a:736_3: coraṃ gaṇhanto viya “na aggivessana tathāgato parisaṃ rañjento saññattibahulo vicarati,
atk-s0504a:736_4: cakkavāḷapariyantāyapi parisāya dhammaṃ deseti, asallīno anupalitto ekattaṃ ekavihārisuññatāphalasamāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0504a:737_0: Bhagavā hi yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ deti, dhammaṃ vā paccavekkhati, tasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:737_1: khaṇe pubbabhāgena kālaṃ paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ assāsavāre passāsavāre samāpajjati,
atk-s0504a:737_2: sādhukārasaddanigghose avicchinneyeva dhammapaccavekkhaṇāya ca pariyosāne samāpattito
atk-s0504a:737_3: vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti. Buddhānañhi bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko,
atk-s0504a:737_4: assāsavāre passāsavāre samāpattiyo samāpajjanti. Evaṃ yathāvuttasamāpattīnaṃ sapubbabhāgānaṃ
atk-s0504a:737_5: vasena bhagavato khemavitakkassa pavivekavitakkassa ca bahulappavatti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:738_1: ca ānubhāvena kutocipi bhayābhāvato taṃsamaṅgī khemappatto ca viharati, tato ca sabbassapi
atk-s0504a:738_2: sabbadāpi khemameva hoti abhayameva. Tasmā duvidhopi ubhayesaṃ khemaṅkaroti khemavitakko.
atk-s0504a:738_3: Yassa pana kāmavitakkādisaṃkilesapahānassa nekkhammavitakkassa ānubhāvena kāyaviveko,
atk-s0504a:738_4: cittaviveko, upadhivivekoti tividho; tadaṅgaviveko, vikkhambhanaviveko, samucchedaviveko,
atk-s0504a:738_5: paṭippassaddhiviveko, nissaraṇavivekoti pañcavidho ca viveko pāripūriṃ gacchati.
atk-s0504a:738_6: So yathārahaṃ ārammaṇato sampayogato ca pavivekasahagato vitakkoti pavivekavitakko.
atk-s0504a:738_7: Ete ca dve vitakkā evaṃ vibhattavisayāpi samānā ādikammikānaṃ aññamaññūpakārāya sambhavanti.
atk-s0504a:738_8: Yathā hi khemavitakkassa pavivekavitakko anuppannassa uppādāya uppannassa bhiyyobhāvāya
atk-s0504a:738_9: vepullāya hoti, evaṃ pavivekavitakkassapi khemavitakko. Na hi vūpakaṭṭhakāyacittānamantarena
atk-s0504a:738_10: mettāvihārādayo sambhavanti byāpādādippahānena ca vinā cittavivekādīnaṃ asambhavoyevāti
atk-s0504a:738_11: aññamaññassa bahūpakārā ete dhammā daṭṭhabbā. Bhagavato pana sabbaso pahīnasaṃkilesassa
atk-s0504a:738_12: lokahitatthāya evaṃ khemavitakko ca pavivekavitakko ca assāsavāramattepi hitasukhamāvahantiyevāti.
atk-s0504a:738_13: Khemo ca vitakko paviveko ca vitakkoti sambandhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:739_0: Evaṃ uddiṭṭhe dve vitakke niddisituṃ “abyāpajjhārāmo”tiādimāha. Tattha abyāpajjhanaṃ
atk-s0504a:739_1: kassaci adukkhanaṃ abyāpajjho, so āramitabbato ārāmo etassāti abyāpajjhārāmo. Abyāpajjhe
atk-s0504a:739_2: rato sevanavasena niratoti abyāpajjharato. Esevāti eso eva. Iriyāyāti kiriyāya, kāyavacīpayogenāti
atk-s0504a:739_3: attho. Na kañci byābādhemīti hīnādīsu kañcipi sattaṃ taṇhātasādiyogato tasaṃ vā tadabhāvato
atk-s0504a:739_4: pahīnasabbakilesavipphanditattā thāvaraṃ vā na bādhemi na dukkhāpemi. Karuṇajjhāsayo
atk-s0504a:739_6: Tena avihiṃsāvitakkaṃ abyāpādavitakkañca dasseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ‘ahaṃ imāya
atk-s0504a:739_7: iriyāya imāya paṭipattiyā evaṃ sammā paṭipajjanto evaṃ samāpattivihārehi viharanto
atk-s0504a:739_8: evaṃ puññatthikehi katāni sakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāni adhivāsento sattesu
atk-s0504a:739_9: na kañci byābādhemi, apica kho diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthappabhedaṃ hitasukhameva
atk-s0504a:740_0: Yaṃ akusalaṃ, taṃ pahīnanti yaṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassabhedaṃ aññañca taṃsampayuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:740_1: anantappabhedaṃ akusalaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ bodhimūleyeva mayhaṃ pahīnaṃ samūhatanti. Iminā
atk-s0504a:740_3: dasseti. Keci panettha tadaṅgavikkhambhanavivekepi uddharanti. Āgamanīyapaṭipadāya
atk-s0504a:740_4: hi saddhiṃ bhagavatā attano kilesakkhayo idha vuttoti.
atk-s0504a:741_0: Iti bhagavā aparimitakappaparicittaṃ attano pavivekajjhāsayaṃ saddhiṃ nissaraṇajjhāsayena
atk-s0504a:741_1: idāni matthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhito tamajjhāsayaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā attano kilesappahānapaccavekkhaṇamukhena
atk-s0504a:741_2: vibhāveti. Yadatthaṃ panettha satthā ime dve vitakke uddhari, idāni tamatthaṃ dassento
atk-s0504a:741_3: “tasmātiha, bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Bhagavā hi imassa vitakkadvayassa attano bahulasamudācāradassanamukheneva
atk-s0504a:741_4: tattha bhikkhū nivesetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0504a:742_0: Tattha tasmāti yasmā abyāpajjhapavivekābhiratassa me khemapavivekavitakkāyeva bahulaṃ
atk-s0504a:742_1: pavattanti, tasmā. Tihāti nipātamattaṃ. Abyāpajjhārāmā viharathāti sabbasattesu mettāvihārena
atk-s0504a:742_2: karuṇāvihāre na ca abhiramantā viharatha. Tena byāpādassa tadekaṭṭhakilesānañca dūrīkaraṇamāha.
atk-s0504a:742_3: Tesaṃ voti ettha voti nipātamattaṃ. Pavivekārāmā viharathāti kāyādivivekañceva tadaṅgādivivekañcāti
atk-s0504a:742_4: sabbaviveke āramitabbaṭṭhānaṃ katvā viharatha. Imāya mayantiādi yathā nesaṃ khemavitakkassa
atk-s0504a:742_5: pavattanākāradassanaṃ, evaṃ kiṃ akusalantiādi pavivekavitakkassa pavattanākāradassanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:742_6: Tattha yathā anavajjadhamme paripūretukāmena kiṃkusalagavesinā hutvā kusaladhammapariyesanā
atk-s0504a:742_7: kātabbāva, sāvajjadhamme pajahitukāmenāpi akusalapariyesanā kātabbāti āha “kiṃ akusala”ntiādi.
atk-s0504a:742_8: Abhiññāpubbikā hi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanā. Tattha kiṃ akusalanti akusalaṃ
atk-s0504a:742_9: nāma kiṃ, sabhāvato kimassa lakkhaṇaṃ, kāni vā rasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti akusalassa
atk-s0504a:742_10: sabhāvakiccādito paccavekkhaṇavidhiṃ dasseti. Ādikammikavasena cesa vitakko āgato,
atk-s0504a:742_11: kiṃ appahīnaṃ kiṃ pajahāmāti idaṃ padadvayaṃ sekkhavasena. Tasmā kiṃ appahīnanti
atk-s0504a:742_12: kāmarāgasaṃyojanādīsu akusalesu kiṃ akusalaṃ amhākaṃ maggena asamucchinnaṃ? Kiṃ pajahāmāti
atk-s0504a:742_13: kiṃ akusalaṃ samugghātema? Atha vā kiṃ pajahāmāti vītikkamapariyuṭṭhānānusayesu kiṃ
atk-s0504a:742_14: vibhāgaṃ akusalaṃ idāni mayaṃ pajahāmāti attho. Keci pana “kiṃ appahīna”nti paṭhanti.
atk-s0504a:742_15: Tesaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanādivasena anekabhedesu akusalesu kiṃ katamaṃ akusalaṃ, kena katamena
atk-s0504a:742_16: pakārena, katamena vā maggena amhākaṃ appahīnanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:743: Gāthāsu buddhanti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ aviparītaṃ sayambhuñāṇena buddhattā paṭividdhattā buddhaṃ saccavinimuttassa ñeyyassa abhāvato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0504a:745: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:746_0: Ṭhapetvā mahābodhisattaṃ aññehi sahituṃ vahituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā asayhassa sakalassa
atk-s0504a:746_1: bodhisambhārassa mahākaruṇādhikārassa ca sahanato vahanato, tathā aññehi sahituṃ
atk-s0504a:746_2: abhibhavituṃ dukkarattā asayhānaṃ pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ sahanato abhibhavanato, āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādivibhāgāvabodhena
atk-s0504a:746_4: aññehi asayhassa buddhakiccassa sahanato vahanato, tattha vā sādhukāribhāvato asayhasāhinaṃ.
atk-s0504a:746_5: Samudācaranti nanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ, naṃ tathāgatanti vā attho.
atk-s0504a:747_0: Sakaparasantānesu tamasaṅkhātaṃ mohandhakāraṃ nudi khipīti tamonudo. Pāraṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0504a:747_1: gatoti pāragato. Atha vā “mutto moceyya”ntiādinā nayena pavattitassa mahābhinīhārassa
atk-s0504a:747_2: sakalassa vā saṃsāradukkhassa sabbaññuguṇānaṃ pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gatoti pāragato, taṃ
atk-s0504a:747_3: tamonudaṃ pāragataṃ. Tato eva pattipattaṃ buddhaṃ, sīlādiṃ dasabalañāṇādiñca sammāsambuddhehi
atk-s0504a:747_4: pattabbaṃ sabbaṃ pattanti attho. Vasimanti jhānādīsu ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddho paramo āvajjanādivasibhāvo,
atk-s0504a:747_5: ariyiddhisaṅkhāto anaññasādhāraṇo cittavasibhāvo ca assa atthīti vasimā, taṃ vasimaṃ,
atk-s0504a:747_6: vasinanti attho. Sabbesaṃ kāmāsavādīnaṃ abhāvena anāsavaṃ. Kāyavisamādikassa visamassa
atk-s0504a:747_7: vantattā vā visasaṅkhātaṃ sabbaṃ kilesamalaṃ taritvā vā visaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhaṃ
atk-s0504a:747_8: sayaṃ taritvā tāraṇato visantaro taṃ visantaraṃ. Taṇhakkhaye arahattaphale nibbāne
atk-s0504a:747_9: vā vimuttaṃ, ubhayamhi gamanato monasaṅkhātena ñāṇena kāyamoneyyādīhi vā sātisayaṃ
atk-s0504a:747_10: samannāgatattā muniṃ. Munīti hi agāriyamuni, anagāriyamuni, sekkhamuni, asekkhamuni,
atk-s0504a:747_11: paccekamuni, munimunīti anekavidhā munayo. Tattha gihī āgataphalo viññātasāsano agāriyamuni,
atk-s0504a:747_12: tathārūpo pabbajito anagāriyamuni, satta sekkhā sekkhamuni, khīṇāsavo asekkhamuni,
atk-s0504a:747_13: paccekabuddho paccekamuni, sammāsambuddho munimunīti. Ayameva idhādhippeto. Āyatiṃ
atk-s0504a:747_14: punabbhavābhāvato antimaṃ, pacchimaṃ dehaṃ kāyaṃ dhāretīti antimadehadhārī, taṃ antimadehadhāriṃ.
atk-s0504a:747_15: Kilesamārādīnaṃ sammadeva pariccattattā mārañjahaṃ. Tato eva jarāhetusamucchedato
atk-s0504a:747_17: jātimaraṇasokādīnaṃ pāragamanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ tathāgataṃ duve
atk-s0504a:748_0: Iti bhagavā paṭhamagāthāya vitakkadvayaṃ uddisitvā tato dutiyagāthāya pavivekavitakkaṃ
atk-s0504a:748_1: dassetvā idāni khemavitakkaṃ dassetuṃ “sele yathā”ti tatiyagāthamāha. Tattha sele
atk-s0504a:748_2: yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti sele silāmaye ekagghanapabbatamuddhani yathā ṭhito.
atk-s0504a:748_3: Na hi tattha ṭhitassa uddhaṃ gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthi. Tathūpamanti tappaṭibhāgaṃ
atk-s0504a:748_4: selapabbatūpamaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – yathā selapabbatamuddhani ṭhito cakkhumā
atk-s0504a:748_5: puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya, evameva sumedho, sundarapañño sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0504a:748_6: samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ paññāmayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:748_7: jātijarābhibhūtañca janataṃ sattakāyaṃ avekkhati upadhārayati upaparikkhati. Ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:748_8: panettha adhippāyo – yathā hi pabbatapāde samantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā tattha kedārapāḷīsu
atk-s0504a:748_9: kuṭiyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyya, caturaṅgasamannāgatañca andhakāraṃ bhaveyya, athassa
atk-s0504a:748_10: pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato purisassa bhūmippadesaṃ olokayato neva khettaṃ,
atk-s0504a:748_11: na kedārapāḷiyo, na kuṭiyo, na tattha sayitamanussā paññāyeyyuṃ, kuṭīsu pana aggijālamattameva
atk-s0504a:748_12: paññāyeyya, evaṃ dhammamayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sattakāyaṃ olokayato tathāgatassa ye te
atk-s0504a:748_13: akatakalyāṇā sattā, te ekavihāre dakkhiṇapasse nisinnāpi buddhañāṇassa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti,
atk-s0504a:748_14: rattiṃ khittasarā viya honti. Ye pana katakalyāṇā veneyyapuggalā, te evassa dūrepi
atk-s0504a:748_15: ṭhitā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, so aggi viya himavantapabbato viya ca vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:750: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:751: Evametasmiṃ sutte gāthāsu ca bhagavā attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā dassesi.
atk-s0504a:754_0: 39. Dutiye pariyāyenāti ettha pariyāya-saddo “madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotveva naṃ dhārehī”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:754_1: desanāyaṃ āgato. “Atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo, yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno
atk-s0504a:754_2: vadeyya – akiriyavādo samaṇo gotamo”tiādīsu kāraṇe. “Kassa nu kho, ānanda, ajja pariyāyo
atk-s0504a:754_3: bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu vāre. Idha pana vārepi kāraṇepi vaṭṭati, tasmā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:754_4: tathāgatassa dve dhammadesanā yathārahaṃ kāraṇena bhavanti, vārena vāti ayamettha
atk-s0504a:754_5: attho. Bhagavā hi veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ kadāci “ime dhammā kusalā, ime, dhammā akusalā.
atk-s0504a:754_6: Ime dhammā sāvajjā, ime dhammā anavajjā. Ime sevitabbā, ime na sevitabbā”tiādinā
atk-s0504a:754_7: kusalākusaladhamme vibhajanto kusaladhammehi akusaladhamme asaṅkarato paññāpento
atk-s0504a:754_8: “pāpaṃ pāpakato passathā”ti dhammaṃ deseti. Kadāci “pāṇātipāto, bhikkhave, āsevito
atk-s0504a:754_10: yo sabbalahuko pāṇātipāto, so appāyukasaṃvattaniko”tiādinā ādīnavaṃ pakāsento pāpato
atk-s0504a:755_0: Bhavantīti honti pavattanti. Pāpaṃ pāpakato passathāti sabbaṃ pāpadhammaṃ diṭṭheva
atk-s0504a:755_1: dhamme āyatiñca ahitadukkhāvahato lāmakato passatha. Tattha nibbindathāti tasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:755_3: pakatipabhassarassa pasannassa ca cittassa pabhassarādibhāvavināsanato saṃkilesikaṃ,
atk-s0504a:755_4: punappunaṃ bhavadukkhanibbattanato ponobbhavikaṃ, saheva darathehi pariḷāhehi vattanato
atk-s0504a:755_5: sadarathaṃ, dukkhasseva vipaccanato dukkhavipākaṃ, aparimāṇampi kālaṃ anāgate jātijarāmaraṇanibbattanato
atk-s0504a:755_7: ādīnave, tassa ca pahāne ānisaṃse sammapaññāya passantā nibbindatha nibbedaṃ āpajjatha.
atk-s0504a:755_8: Nibbindantā ca vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggādhigamena pāpato virajjatha ceva vimuccatha
atk-s0504a:755_9: ca. Maggena vā samucchedavirāgavasena virajjatha, tato phalena paṭippassaddhivimuttivasena
atk-s0504a:755_10: vimuccatha. Atha vā pāpanti lāmakato pāpaṃ. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yaṃ aniccadukkhādibhāvena
atk-s0504a:755_11: kucchitaṃ ariyehi jigucchanīyaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ pāpetīti pāpaṃ. Kiṃ pana taṃ? Tebhūmakadhammajātaṃ.
atk-s0504a:755_12: Yathāvuttena atthena pāpakato disvā tattha aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato,
atk-s0504a:755_13: aghato, ābādhatotiādinā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentā nibbindatha. Ayaṃ dutiyāti yāthāvato
atk-s0504a:755_14: ahitānatthavibhāvanaṃ paṭhamaṃ upādāya tato vivecanaṃ ayaṃ dutiyā dhammadesanā.
atk-s0504a:756_0: Gāthāsu buddhassāti sabbaññubuddhassa. Sabbabhūtānukampinoti sabbepi satte mahākaruṇāya
atk-s0504a:756_1: anukampanasabhāvassa. Pariyāyavacananti pariyāyena kathanaṃ desanaṃ. Passāti parisaṃ
atk-s0504a:756_2: ālapati, parisajeṭṭhakaṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ. Keci panāhu “attānameva sandhāya bhagavā
atk-s0504a:756_3: ‘passā’ti avocā”ti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ pāpake virajjatha rāgaṃ pajahathāti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:759_0: 40. Tatiye pubbaṅgamāti sahajātavasena, upanissayavasena cāti dvīhi ākārehi pubbaṅgamā
atk-s0504a:759_1: purassarā padhānakāraṇaṃ. Na hi avijjāya vinā akusaluppatti atthi. Samāpattiyāti
atk-s0504a:759_2: samāpajjanāya sabhāvapaṭilābhāya, pavattiyāti attho. Tattha akusalappavattiyā ādīnavappaṭicchādanena
atk-s0504a:759_3: ayonisomanasikārassa paccayabhāvena appahīnabhāvena ca akusaladhammānaṃ upanissayabhāvo dissati.
atk-s0504a:760_0: Evaṃ byādhimaraṇādidukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato sabbāpi gatiyo idha duggatiyo. Atha
atk-s0504a:760_1: vā rāgādikilesehi dūsitā gatiyo kāyavacīcittānaṃ pavattiyoti duggatiyo, kāyavacīmanoduccaritāni.
atk-s0504a:760_2: Asmiṃ loketi idha loke manussagatiyaṃ vā. Paramhi cāti tato aññāsu gatīsu. Avijjāmūlikā
atk-s0504a:760_3: sabbāti tā sabbāpi duccaritassa vipattiyo vuttanayena avijjāpubbaṅgamattā avijjāmūlikā
atk-s0504a:761_0: Yatoti yasmā avijjāhetu avijjāya nivuto hutvā. Pāpicchoti avijjāya paṭicchāditattā
atk-s0504a:761_1: pāpicchatāya ādīnave apassanto asantaguṇasambhāvanavasena kohaññādīni karonto pāpiccho,
atk-s0504a:761_2: lobheneva atricchatāpi gahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Anādaroti lokādhipatino ottappassa abhāvena
atk-s0504a:761_3: sabrahmacārīsu ādararahito. Tatoti tasmā avijjāpāpicchatāahirikānottappahetu. Pasavatīti
atk-s0504a:761_4: kāyaduccaritādibhedaṃ pāpaṃ upacinati. Apāyaṃ tena gacchatīti tena tathā pasutena
atk-s0504a:762_0: Tasmāti yasmā ete evaṃ sabbaduccaritamūlabhūtā sabbaduggatiparikkilesahetubhūtā ca
atk-s0504a:762_1: avijjādayo, tasmā icchañca, lobhañca, avijjañca, casaddena ahirikānottappañca virājayaṃ
atk-s0504a:762_2: samucchedavasena pajahaṃ. Kathaṃ virājetīti āha? Vijjaṃ uppādayanti, vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0504a:762_3: ca, maggapaṭipāṭiyā ca, ussakkitvā arahattamaggavijjaṃ attano santāne uppādayanto.
atk-s0504a:762_4: Sabbā duggatiyoti sabbāpi duccaritasaṅkhātā duggatiyo, vaṭṭadukkhassa vā adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
atk-s0504a:762_5: dukkhā, sabbā pañcapi gatiyo jahe pajaheyya samatikkameyya. Kilesavaṭṭappahāneneva
atk-s0504a:766_0: 41. Catutthe suparihīnāti suṭṭhu parihīnā. Ye ariyāya paññāya parihīnāti ye sattā
atk-s0504a:766_1: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayapaṭivijjhanena catusaccapaṭivijjhanena ca kilesehi
atk-s0504a:766_2: ārakā ṭhitattā ariyāya parisuddhāya vipassanāpaññāya ca maggapaññāya ca parihīnā,
atk-s0504a:766_3: te lokiyalokuttarāhi sampattīhi ativiya parihīnā mahājānikā. Ke pana teti? Ye kammāvaraṇena
atk-s0504a:766_4: samannāgatā. Te hi micchattaniyatabhāvato ekantena parihīnā aparipuṇṇā mahājānikā.
atk-s0504a:766_5: Tenāha “duggati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti. Vipākāvaraṇasamaṅginopi parihīnā. Atha vā sukkapakkhe
atk-s0504a:766_6: aparihīnā nāma tividhāvaraṇavirahitā sammādiṭṭhikā kammassakatañāṇena ca samannāgatā.
atk-s0504a:767_0: Gāthāsu paññāyāti nissakkavacanaṃ, vipassanāñāṇato maggañāṇato ca parihānenāti. Sāmivacanaṃ
atk-s0504a:767_1: vā etaṃ, yathāvuttañāṇassa parihānenāti, uppādetabbassa anuppādanameva cettha parihānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:767_2: Niviṭṭhaṃ nāmarūpasminti nāmarūpe upādānakkhandhapañcake “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0504a:767_3: abhiniviṭṭhaṃ ajjhositaṃ, tato eva idaṃ saccanti maññatīti “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti
atk-s0504a:768_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya saṃkilesapakkhaṃ dassetvā idāni yassā anuppattiyā nāmarūpasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:768_1: maññanābhinivesehi kilesavaṭṭaṃ vattati, tassā uppattiyā vaṭṭassa upacchedoti paññāya
atk-s0504a:768_2: ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento “paññā hi seṭṭhā lokasmi”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0504a:769_0: Tattha lokasminti saṅkhāralokasmiṃ. Sammāsambuddho viya sattesu, saṅkhāresu paññāsadiso
atk-s0504a:769_1: dhammo natthi. Paññuttarā hi kusalā dhammā, paññāya ca siddhāya sabbe anavajjadhammā
atk-s0504a:769_2: siddhā eva honti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sammādiṭṭhissa sammāsaṅkappo pahotī”tiādi. Yā
atk-s0504a:769_3: panettha paññā adhippetā, sā seṭṭhāti thomitā. Yathā ca sā pavattati, taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0504a:769_4: “yāyaṃ nibbedhagāminī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho – yā ayaṃ paññā anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ
atk-s0504a:769_5: lobhakkhandhādiṃ nibbijjhantī padālentī gacchati pavattatīti nibbedhagāminī, yāya
atk-s0504a:769_6: ca tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu sattanikāyesu khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbattisaṅkhātāya
atk-s0504a:769_7: jātiyā taṃnimittassa ca kammabhavassa parikkhayaṃ pariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ arahattañca
atk-s0504a:769_8: sammā aviparītaṃ jānāti sacchikaroti, ayaṃ sahavipassanā maggapaññā seṭṭhā lokasminti.
atk-s0504a:770_0: Idāni yathāvuttapaññānubhāvasampanne khīṇāsave abhitthavanto “tesaṃ devā manussā
atk-s0504a:770_1: cā”ti osānagāthamāha. Tassattho – tesaṃ catūsu ariyasaccesu pariññādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ
atk-s0504a:770_2: kiccānaṃ niṭṭhitattā catusaccasambodhena sambuddhānaṃ, sativepullappattiyā satimataṃ,
atk-s0504a:770_4: vā sīlādipāripūrito paṭṭhāya yāva nibbānasacchikiriyāya hāsavedatuṭṭhipāmojjabahulatāya
atk-s0504a:770_6: devā manussā ca pihayanti piyā honti, tabbhāvaṃ adhigantuṃ icchanti “aho paññānubhāvo,
atk-s0504a:770_7: aho vata mayampi edisā evaṃ nittiṇṇasabbadukkhā bhaveyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0504a:773_0: 42. Pañcame sukkāti na vaṇṇasukkatāya sukkā, sukkabhāvāya pana paramavodānāya saṃvattantīti
atk-s0504a:773_1: nipphattisukkatāya sukkā. Sarasenapi sabbe kusalā dhammā sukkā eva kaṇhabhāvapaṭipakkhato.
atk-s0504a:773_2: Tesañhi uppattiyā cittaṃ pabhassaraṃ hoti parisuddhaṃ. Dhammāti kusalā dhammā. Lokanti
atk-s0504a:773_3: sattalokaṃ. Pālentīti ādhārasandhāraṇena mariyādaṃ ṭhapentā rakkhanti. Hirī ca ottappañcāti
atk-s0504a:773_4: ettha hiriyati hiriyitabbena, hiriyanti etenāti vā hirī. Vuttampi cetaṃ “yaṃ hiriyati
atk-s0504a:773_5: hiriyitabbena, hiriyati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0504a:773_6: hirī”ti. Ottappati ottappitabbena, ottappanti etenāti vā ottappaṃ. Vuttampicetaṃ
atk-s0504a:773_7: “yaṃ ottappati ottappitabbena, ottappati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā,
atk-s0504a:774_0: Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī, bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ. Attādhipateyyā hirī,
atk-s0504a:774_1: lokādhipateyyaṃ ottappaṃ. Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ.
atk-s0504a:775_0: Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti – jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā,
atk-s0504a:775_1: vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā, sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā, bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0504a:775_2: “Pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ na jātisampannānaṃ kammaṃ, hīnajaccānaṃ kevaṭṭādīnaṃ kammaṃ,
atk-s0504a:775_3: mādisassa jātisampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ tāva jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0504a:775_4: pāṇātipātādipāpakammaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā “pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ daharehi
atk-s0504a:775_5: kattabbakammaṃ, mādisassa vaye ṭhitassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ vayaṃ
atk-s0504a:775_6: paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpakammaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā “pāpakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:775_7: nāmetaṃ dubbalajātikānaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0504a:775_8: na yutta”nti evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpakammaṃ akaronto hiriṃ
atk-s0504a:775_9: samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā “pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ andhabālānaṃ kammaṃ, na paṇḍitānaṃ, mādisassa
atk-s0504a:775_10: paṇḍitassa bahussutassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0504a:775_11: pāṇātipātādipāpakammaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ
atk-s0504a:775_12: catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti. Samuṭṭhāpetvā ca pana attano citte hiriṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0504a:775_13: pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ hirī ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā nāma hoti.
atk-s0504a:776: Kathaṃ ottappaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma? “Sace tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ karissasi, catūsu parisāsu garahappatto bhavissasi.
atk-s0504a:779: Paccavekkhanto hi bahiddhāsamuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ ottappaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0504a:780_0: Kathaṃ hirī attādhipateyyā nāma? Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0504a:780_1: katvā “mādisassa saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutavādissa na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0504a:780_2: kātu”nti pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ hirī attādhipateyyā nāma hoti. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0504a:781: “So attānaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhamattānaṃ pariharatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:782: Kathaṃ ottappaṃ lokādhipateyyaṃ nāma? Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:783_0: “Mahā kho panāyaṃ lokasannivāso. Mahantasmiṃ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā
atk-s0504a:783_1: iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno, te dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti,
atk-s0504a:783_2: cetasāpi cittaṃ pajānanti, tepi maṃ evaṃ jānissanti ‘passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ,
atk-s0504a:783_3: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
atk-s0504a:783_4: Santi devatā iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduniyo, tā dūratopi passanti,
atk-s0504a:783_5: āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṃ pajānanti, tāpi maṃ evaṃ jānissanti ‘passatha
atk-s0504a:783_6: bho imaṃ, kulaputtaṃ, saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati
atk-s0504a:783_7: pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti. So lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ katvā akusalaṃ pajahatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:785_0: Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitāti ettha lajjāti lajjanākāro, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitā hirī. Bhayanti
atk-s0504a:785_1: apāyabhayaṃ, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ pāpaparivajjane pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0504a:785_2: hoti. Tattha yathā dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo bhaveyya gūthamakkhito, eko uṇho āditto.
atk-s0504a:785_3: Tesu yathā sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā jigucchanto viññujātiko na gaṇhāti, itaraṃ dāhabhayena,
atk-s0504a:785_4: evaṃ paṇḍito lajjāya jigucchanto pāpaṃ na karoti, ottappena apāyabhīto pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0504a:786_0: Kathaṃ sappatissavalakkhaṇā hirī, vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ? Ekacco
atk-s0504a:786_2: sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti catūhi kāraṇehi tattha gāravena sappatissavalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:786_3: hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti, ekacco attānuvādabhayaṃ, parānuvādabhayaṃ, daṇḍabhayaṃ,
atk-s0504a:786_4: duggatibhayanti catūhi kāraṇehi vajjato bhāyanto vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:786_5: ottappaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti. Ettha ca ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā hirottappānaṃ
atk-s0504a:786_6: tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā, na pana nesaṃ kadāci aññamaññavippayogo. Na hi
atk-s0504a:786_7: lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ, pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0504a:787_0: Ime ce, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyunti bhikkhave, ime dve anavajjadhammā
atk-s0504a:787_1: yadi lokaṃ na rakkheyyuṃ, lokapālakā yadi na bhaveyyuṃ. Nayidha paññāyetha mātāti
atk-s0504a:787_2: idha imasmiṃ loke janikā mātā “ayaṃ me mātā”ti garucittīkāravasena na paññāyetha,
atk-s0504a:787_3: “ayaṃ mātā”ti na labbheyya. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Mātucchāti mātubhaginī. Mātulānīti
atk-s0504a:787_5: saṅkaraṃ, mariyādabhedaṃ vā. Yathā ajeḷakātiādīhi upamaṃ dasseti. Ete hi sattā “ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:787_6: me mātā”ti vā “mātucchā”ti vā garucittīkāravasena na jānanti, yaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya
atk-s0504a:787_7: uppannā, tatthapi vippaṭipajjanti. Tasmā upamaṃ āharanto ajeḷakādayo āhari. Ayañhettha
atk-s0504a:787_8: saṅkhepattho – yathā ajeḷakādayo tiracchānā hirottapparahitā mātādisaññaṃ akatvā
atk-s0504a:787_9: bhinnamariyādā sabbattha sambhedena vattanti, evamayaṃ manussaloko yadi lokapālakadhammā
atk-s0504a:787_10: na bhaveyyuṃ, sabbattha sambhedena vatteyya. Yasmā panime lokapālakadhammā lokaṃ
atk-s0504a:788_0: Gāthāsu yesaṃ ce hiriottappanti ceti nipātamattaṃ. Yesaṃ sattānaṃ hirī ca ottappañca
atk-s0504a:788_1: sabbadāva sabbakālameva na vijjati na upalabbhati. Vokkantā sukkamūlā teti te sattā
atk-s0504a:788_2: kusalamūlapacchedāvahassāpi kammassa karaṇato kusalakammānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtānaṃ hirottappānameva
atk-s0504a:788_3: vā abhāvato kusalato vokkamitvā, apasakkitvā, ṭhitattā vokkantā sukkamūlā, punappunaṃ
atk-s0504a:789_0: Yesañca hiriottappanti yesaṃ pana parisuddhamatīnaṃ sattānaṃ hirī ca ottappañcāti
atk-s0504a:789_1: ime dhammā sadā sabbakālaṃ rattindivaṃ navamajjhimattherakālesu sammā upagamma ṭhitā
atk-s0504a:789_2: pāpā jigucchantā bhāyantā tadaṅgādivasena pāpaṃ pajahantā. Virūḷhabrahmacariyāti
atk-s0504a:789_3: sāsanabrahmacariye maggabrahmacariye ca virūḷhaṃ āpannā, aggamaggādhigamena sabbaso
atk-s0504a:789_4: santakilesatāya santaguṇatāya vā santo, punabbhavassa khepitattā khīṇapunabbhavā hontīti.
atk-s0504a:792_0: 43. Chaṭṭhe atthi, bhikkhaveti kā uppatti? Ekadivasaṃ kira bhagavatā anekapariyāyena
atk-s0504a:792_1: saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā tadupasamanādivasena nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammadesanāya
atk-s0504a:792_2: katāya bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “ayaṃ saṃsāro bhagavatā avijjādīhi kāraṇehi sahetuko
atk-s0504a:792_3: vutto, nibbānassa pana tadupasamassa na kiñci kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tayidaṃ ahetukaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0504a:792_4: saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhatī”ti. Atha bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vimatividhamanatthañceva,
atk-s0504a:792_5: “idha samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ‘nibbānaṃ nibbāna’nti vācāvatthumattameva, natthi hi paramatthato
atk-s0504a:792_6: nibbānaṃ nāma anupalabbhamānasabhāvattā”ti lokāyatikādayo viya vippaṭipannānaṃ bahiddhā
atk-s0504a:792_9: udānavasena idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi. Tathā hi idaṃ suttaṃ udānepi saṅgītaṃ.
atk-s0504a:793_0: Tattha atthīti vijjati paramatthato upalabbhati. Ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatanti
atk-s0504a:793_1: sabbānipi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni. Atha vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0504a:793_2: kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti ajātaṃ. Kāraṇena vinā sayameva na bhūtaṃ
atk-s0504a:793_3: na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti abhūtaṃ. Evaṃ ajātattā abhūtattā ca yena kenaci kāraṇena
atk-s0504a:793_4: na katanti akataṃ. Jātabhūtakatasabhāvo ca nāmarūpādīnaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:793_5: na asaṅkhatasabhāvassa nibbānassāti dassanatthaṃ asaṅkhatanti vuttaṃ. Paṭilomato
atk-s0504a:793_6: vā samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ, tathā na saṅkhataṃ, saṅkhatalakkhaṇarahitanti
atk-s0504a:793_7: ca asaṅkhatanti evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe “siyā nu kho ekeneva
atk-s0504a:793_8: kāraṇena kata”nti āsaṅkāyaṃ “na kenaci kata”nti dassanatthaṃ “akata”nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0504a:793_9: appaccayampi samānaṃ “sayameva nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti āsaṅkāyaṃ tannivattanatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:793_10: “abhūta”nti vuttaṃ. Ayañca etassa asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo sabbena sabbaṃ ajātidhammattāti
atk-s0504a:793_11: dassetuṃ “ajāta”nti vuttanti. Evametesaṃ catunnampi padānaṃ sātthakabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:794_0: Iti bhagavā “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti paramatthato nibbānassa
atk-s0504a:794_1: atthibhāvaṃ vatvā tattha hetuṃ dassento “no cetaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tassāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:794_2: saṅkhepo – bhikkhave, yadi ajātādisabhāvā asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa na siyā, idha
atk-s0504a:794_4: anavasesavaṭṭupasamo na paññāyeyya na upalabbheyya na sambhaveyya. Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:794_5: katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ariyamaggadhammā anavasesato kilese samucchindanti,
atk-s0504a:794_6: tenettha sabbassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa appavatti apagamo nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0504a:795_0: Evaṃ byatirekavasena nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni anvayavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0504a:795_1: “yasmā ca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ vuttatthameva. Ettha ca yasmā “apaccayā dhammā, asaṅkhatā
atk-s0504a:795_2: dhammā. Atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatanaṃ, yattha neva pathavī. Idampi kho ṭhānaṃ duddasaṃ
atk-s0504a:795_3: yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo. Asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:795_4: dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādīhi anekehi suttapadehi “atthi,
atk-s0504a:795_5: bhikkhave, ajāta”nti imināpi suttena nibbānadhātuyā paramatthato sabbhāvo sabbalokaṃ
atk-s0504a:795_6: anukampamānena sammāsambuddhena desito, tasmā na paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. Tattha appaccakkhakārīnampi
atk-s0504a:795_7: viññūnaṃ kaṅkhā vā vimati vā natthi eva. Ye pana abuddhipuggalā, tesaṃ vimativinodanatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:795_8: ayamettha adhippāyaniddhāraṇamukhena yuttivicāraṇā – yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ
atk-s0504a:795_9: kāmānaṃ rūpānañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati, evaṃ
atk-s0504a:795_10: taṃsabhāvānaṃ sabbesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena tabbidhurasabhāvena nissaraṇena
atk-s0504a:795_11: bhavitabbaṃ. Yañcetaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, sā asaṅkhatā dhātu. Kiñca bhiyyo, saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:795_12: vipassanāñāṇaṃ api anulomañāṇaṃ kilese samucchedavasena pajahituṃ na sakkoti, tathā
atk-s0504a:795_13: sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati,
atk-s0504a:795_14: na samucchedavasena. Iti saṅkhatadhammārammaṇassa sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa
atk-s0504a:795_15: kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato tesaṃ samucchedappahānakarassa ariyamaggañāṇassa
atk-s0504a:795_16: tadubhayaviparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, sā asaṅkhatā dhātu. Tathā “atthi,
atk-s0504a:795_17: bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti idaṃ nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakavacanaṃ
atk-s0504a:795_18: aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā. Yañhi bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ aviparītatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:795_19: paramatthanti yathā taṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā, sabbe dhammā
atk-s0504a:795_20: anattā”ti. Tathā nibbānasaddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāravuttisabbhāvato
atk-s0504a:795_21: seyyathāpi sīhasaddo. Atha vā attheva paramatthato asaṅkhatādhātu itaratabbiparītavinimuttasabhāvattā
atk-s0504a:795_22: seyyathāpi pathavīdhātu vedanāti. Evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā
atk-s0504a:796_0: Gāthāsu jātanti jāyanaṭṭhena jātaṃ, jātilakkhaṇappattanti attho. Bhūtanti bhavanaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:796_1: bhūtaṃ, ahutvā sambhūtanti attho. Samuppannanti sahitabhāvena uppannaṃ, sahitehi
atk-s0504a:796_2: dhammehi ca uppannanti attho. Katanti kāraṇabhūtehi paccayehi nibbattitaṃ. Saṅkhatanti
atk-s0504a:796_3: tehiyeva samecca sambhuyya katanti saṅkhataṃ, sabbametaṃ paccayanibbattassa adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:796_4: Niccasārādivirahitato addhuvaṃ. Jarāya maraṇena ca ekanteneva saṅghaṭitaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti
atk-s0504a:796_5: jarāmaraṇasaṅghātaṃ. “Jarāmaraṇasaṅghaṭṭa”ntipi paṭhanti, jarāya maraṇena ca upaddutaṃ
atk-s0504a:796_6: pīḷitanti attho. Akkhirogādīnaṃ anekesaṃ rogānaṃ nīḷaṃ kulāvakanti roganīḷaṃ. Sarasato
atk-s0504a:797_0: Catubbidho āhāro ca taṇhāsaṅkhātā netti ca pabhavo samuṭṭhānaṃ etassāti āhāranettippabhavaṃ.
atk-s0504a:797_1: Sabbopi vā paccayo āhāro. Idha pana taṇhāya nettiggahaṇena gahitattā taṇhāvajjā veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:797_2: Tasmā āhāro ca netti ca pabhavo etassāti āhāranettippabhavaṃ. Āhāro eva vā nayanaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:797_3: pavattanaṭṭhena nettīti evampi āhāranettippabhavaṃ. Nālaṃ tadabhinanditunti taṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ
atk-s0504a:797_4: evaṃ paccayādhīnavuttikaṃ, tato eva aniccaṃ, dukkhañca taṇhādiṭṭhīhi abhinandituṃ
atk-s0504a:798_0: Tassa nissaraṇanti “jātaṃ bhūta”ntiādinā vuttassa tassa sakkāyassa nissaraṇaṃ nikkamo
atk-s0504a:798_1: anupasantasabhāvassa rāgādikilesassa sabbasaṅkhārassa ca abhāvena tadupasamabhāvena
atk-s0504a:798_2: pasatthabhāvena ca santaṃ, takkañāṇassa agocarabhāvato atakkāvacaraṃ, niccaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:798_3: dhuvaṃ, tato eva ajātaṃ asamuppannaṃ, sokahetūnaṃ abhāvato asokaṃ, vigatarāgādirajattā
atk-s0504a:798_4: virajaṃ, saṃsāradukkhaṭṭitehi paṭipajjitabbattā padaṃ, jātiādidukkhadhammānaṃ nirodhahetutāya
atk-s0504a:798_5: nirodho dukkhadhammānaṃ, sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ upasamahetutāya saṅkhārūpasamo, tato eva
atk-s0504a:798_6: accantasukhatāya sukhoti sabbapadehi amatamahānibbānameva thometi. Evaṃ bhagavā paṭhamagāthāya
atk-s0504a:798_7: byatirekavasena, dutiyagāthāya anvayavasena ca nibbānaṃ vibhāvesi.
atk-s0504a:801_0: 44. Sattame dvemāti dve imā. Vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā, nikkhantaṃ vānato, natthi vā ettha
atk-s0504a:801_1: vānaṃ, imasmiṃ vā adhigate vānassa abhāvoti nibbānaṃ, tadeva nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:801_2: sabhāvadhāraṇaṭṭhena ca dhātūti nibbānadhātu. Yadipi tassā paramatthato bhedo natthi,
atk-s0504a:801_3: pariyāyena pana paññāyatīti taṃ pariyāyabhedaṃ sandhāya “dvemā, bhikkhave, nibbānadhātuyo”ti
atk-s0504a:801_4: vatvā yathādhippetappabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “saupādisesā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha taṇhādīhi
atk-s0504a:801_5: phalabhāvena upādīyatīti upādi, khandhapañcakaṃ. Upādiyeva sesoti upādiseso, saha
atk-s0504a:802: Arahanti ārakakileso, dūrakilesoti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0504a:803_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṃ hoti, ārakāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā,
atk-s0504a:803_1: saṃkilesikā ponobbhavikā, sadarā dukkhavipākā, āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0504a:804_0: Khīṇāsavoti kāmāsavādayo cattāropi āsavā arahato khīṇā samucchinnā pahīnā paṭippassaddhā
atk-s0504a:804_1: abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti khīṇāsavo. Vusitavāti garusaṃvāsepi ariyamaggepi
atk-s0504a:804_2: dasasu ariyavāsesupi vasi parivasi parivuṭṭho vuṭṭhavāso ciṇṇacaraṇoti vusitavā.
atk-s0504a:804_3: Katakaraṇīyoti puthujjanakalyāṇakaṃ upādāya satta sekhā catūhi maggehi karaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0504a:804_4: karonti nāma, khīṇāsavassa sabbakaraṇīyāni katāni pariyositāni, natthi uttariṃ karaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0504a:806: Katassa paṭicayo natthi, karaṇīyaṃ na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:807_0: Ohitabhāroti tayo bhārā – khandhabhāro, kilesabhāro, abhisaṅkhārabhāroti. Tassime
atk-s0504a:807_1: tayopi bhārā ohitā oropitā nikkhittā pātitāti ohitabhāro. Anuppattasadatthoti anuppatto
atk-s0504a:807_2: sadatthaṃ, sakatthanti vuttaṃ hoti, kakārassa dakāro kato. Anuppatto sadattho etenāti
atk-s0504a:807_3: anuppattasadattho, sadatthoti ca arahattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tañhi attupanibandhaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:807_4: attano avijahanaṭṭhena attano paramatthena ca attano atthattā sakattho hoti. Parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanoti
atk-s0504a:807_6: imāni satte bhavesu. Bhavaṃ vā bhavena saṃyojenti upanibandhantīti bhavasaṃyojanāni
atk-s0504a:807_7: nāma. Tāni arahato parikkhīṇāni, pahīnāni, ñāṇagginā, daḍḍhānīti parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano.
atk-s0504a:807_8: Sammadaññā vimuttoti ettha sammadaññāti sammā aññāya, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – khandhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:807_9: khandhaṭṭhaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ, dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:807_10: samudayassa pabhavaṭṭhaṃ, nirodhassa santaṭṭhaṃ, maggassa dassanaṭṭhaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā
atk-s0504a:807_11: aniccā”ti evamādibhedaṃ vā sammā yathābhūtaṃ aññāya jānitvā tīrayitvā tulayitvā vibhāvetvā
atk-s0504a:807_12: vibhūtaṃ katvā. Vimuttoti dve vimuttiyo cittassa ca vimutti nibbānañca. Arahā hi
atk-s0504a:807_13: sabbakilesehi vimuttattā cittavimuttiyāpi vimutto, nibbānepi vimuttoti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:808_0: Tassa tiṭṭhanteva pañcindriyānīti tassa arahato carimabhavahetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ yāva
atk-s0504a:808_1: na khīyati, tāva tiṭṭhantiyeva cakkhādīni pañcindriyāni. Avighātattāti anuppādanirodhavasena
atk-s0504a:808_2: aniruddhattā. Manāpāmanāpanti iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ rūpādigocaraṃ. Paccanubhotīti vindati
atk-s0504a:808_3: paṭilabhati. Sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti vipākabhūtaṃ sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedeti
atk-s0504a:809_0: Ettāvatā upādisesaṃ dassetvā idāni saupādisesaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ dassetuṃ “tassa yo”tiādi
atk-s0504a:809_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha tassāti tassa saupādisesassa sato arahato. Yo rāgakkhayoti rāgassa
atk-s0504a:809_2: khayo khīṇākāro abhāvo accantamanuppādo. Esa nayo sesesupi. Ettāvatā rāgādikkhayo
atk-s0504a:810_0: Idhevāti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Sabbavedayitānīti sukhādayo sabbā abyākatavedanā,
atk-s0504a:810_1: kusalākusalavedanā pana pubbeyeva pahīnāti. Anabhinanditānīti taṇhādīhi na abhinanditāni.
atk-s0504a:810_3: appaṭisandhikanirodhena nirujjhissantīti attho. Na kevalaṃ vedayitāniyeva, sabbepi
atk-s0504a:810_4: pana khīṇāsavasantāne pañcakkhandhā nirujjhissanti, vedayitasīsena desanā katā.
atk-s0504a:811_0: Gāthāsu cakkhumatāti buddhacakkhu, dhammacakkhu, dibbacakkhu, paññācakkhu, samantacakkhūti
atk-s0504a:811_1: pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumatā. Anissitenāti taṇhādiṭṭhinissayavasena kañci dhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:811_2: anissitena, rāgabandhanādīhi vā abandhena. Tādināti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena sabbattha
atk-s0504a:811_3: iṭṭhādīsu ekasabhāvatāsaṅkhātena tādilakkhaṇena tādinā. Diṭṭhadhammikāti imasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:811_4: attabhāve bhavā vattamānā. Bhavanettisaṅkhayāti bhavanettiyā taṇhāya parikkhayā.
atk-s0504a:811_5: Samparāyikāti samparāye khandhabhedato parabhāge bhavā. Yamhīti yasmiṃ anupādisesanibbāne.
atk-s0504a:811_6: Bhavānīti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, upapattibhavā sabbaso anavasesā nirujjhanti, na pavattanti.
atk-s0504a:812_0: Teti te evaṃ vimuttacittā. Dhammasārādhigamāti vimuttisārattā imassa dhammavinayassa,
atk-s0504a:812_1: dhammesu sārabhūtassa arahattassa adhigamanato. Khayeti rāgādikkhayabhūte nibbāne
atk-s0504a:812_2: ratā abhiratā. Atha vā niccabhāvato seṭṭhabhāvato ca dhammesu sāranti dhammasāraṃ,
atk-s0504a:812_3: nibbānaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “virāgo seṭṭho dhammānaṃ, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti ca.
atk-s0504a:812_4: Tassa dhammasārassa adhigamahetu khaye sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhaye anupādisesanibbāne
atk-s0504a:812_5: ratā. Pahaṃsūti pajahiṃsu. Teti nipātamattaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:815_0: 45. Aṭṭhame paṭisallānarāmāti tehi tehi sattasaṅkhārehi paṭinivattitvā sallānaṃ paṭisallānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:815_1: ekavihāro ekamantasevitā, kāyavivekoti attho. Taṃ paṭisallānaṃ ramanti rocantīti
atk-s0504a:815_2: paṭisallānarāmā. “Paṭisallānārāmā”tipi pāṭho. Yathā vuttaṃ paṭisallānaṃ āramitabbato
atk-s0504a:815_3: ārāmo etesanti paṭisallānārāmā. Viharathāti evaṃbhūtā hutvā viharathāti attho. Paṭisallāne
atk-s0504a:815_4: ratā niratā sammuditāti paṭisallānaratā. Ettāvatā jāgariyānuyogo, tassa nimittabhūtā
atk-s0504a:815_5: vūpakaṭṭhakāyatā ca dassitā. Jāgariyānuyogo, sīlasaṃvaro, indriyesu, guttadvāratā,
atk-s0504a:815_6: bhojane mattaññutā, satisampajaññanti imehi dhammehi vinā na vattatīti tepi idha
atk-s0504a:816_0: Ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyuttāti attano cittasamathe anuyuttā. Ajjhattaṃ attanoti
atk-s0504a:816_1: ca etaṃ ekatthaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Bhummatthe cetaṃ samathanti anusaddayogena
atk-s0504a:816_2: upayogavacanaṃ. Anirākatajjhānāti bahi anīhatajjhānā avināsitajjhānā vā. Nīharaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:816_3: vināso vāti idaṃ nirākataṃ nāma “thambhaṃ niraṃkatvā nivātavuttī”tiādīsu viya. Vipassanāya
atk-s0504a:816_4: samannāgatāti sattavidhāya anupassanāya yuttā. Sattavidhā anupassanā nāma aniccānupassanā,
atk-s0504a:817_0: Brūhetāro suññāgārānanti vaḍḍhetāro suññāgārānaṃ. Ettha ca “suññāgārāna”nti yaṃkiñci
atk-s0504a:817_2: gahetvā rattindivaṃ suññāgāraṃ pavisitvā bhāvanānuyogavasena nisīdamānā bhikkhū “brūhetāro
atk-s0504a:817_3: suññāgārāna”nti veditabbā. Ekabhūmikādipāsādepi pana vāsaṃ kurumānā jhāyino suññāgārānaṃ
atk-s0504a:818_0: Ettha ca yā “paṭisallānarāmā, bhikkhave, viharatha paṭisallānaratā”ti vūpakaṭṭhakāyatā
atk-s0504a:818_1: vihitā, sā parisuddhasīlassa, na asīlassa avisuddhasīlassa vā tassa rūpārammaṇādito
atk-s0504a:818_2: cittavinivattanasseva abhāvatoti atthato sīlavisuddhi dassitāti vuttovāyamattho.
atk-s0504a:818_4: samannāgatā”ti iminā paññābhāvanā vihitāti lokiyā tisso sikkhā dassitā.
atk-s0504a:819_0: Idāni tāsu patiṭṭhitassa avassaṃbhāviphalaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭisallānarāmāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:819_1: Tattha brūhetānanti vaḍḍhetānaṃ. Dvinnaṃ phalānanti tatiyacatutthaphalānaṃ. Pāṭikaṅkhanti
atk-s0504a:819_2: icchitabbaṃ avassaṃbhāvī. Aññāti arahattaṃ. Tañhi heṭṭhimamaggañāṇehi ñātamariyādaṃ
atk-s0504a:819_3: anatikkamitvā jānanato paripuṇṇajānanattā upari jānanakiccābhāvato ca “aññā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:819_4: Sati vā upādiseseti sati vā kilesūpādisese, pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyye sati. Ñāṇe hi aparipakke
atk-s0504a:819_5: ye tena paripakkena pahātabbakilesā, te na pahīyanti. Taṃ sandhāyāha “sati vā upādisese”ti.
atk-s0504a:819_6: Sati ca kilese khandhābhisaṅkhārā tiṭṭhanti eva. Iti imasmiṃ sutte anāgāmiphalaṃ
atk-s0504a:819_7: arahattanti dve dhammā dassitā. Yathā cettha, evaṃ ito paresu dvīsu suttesu.
atk-s0504a:820_0: Gāthāsu ye santacittāti ye yogāvacarā tadaṅgavasena vikkhambhanavaseva ca samitakilesatāya
atk-s0504a:820_1: santacittā. Nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā, tāya samannāgatattā nipakā. Iminā tesaṃ kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇañāṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:820_2: dasseti. Satimanto ca jhāyinoti ṭhānanisajjādīsu kammaṭṭhānāvijahanahetubhūtāya satiyā
atk-s0504a:820_3: satimanto, ārammaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena jhānena jhāyino. Sammā dhammaṃ vipassanti,
atk-s0504a:820_4: kāmesu anapekkhinoti pubbeyeva “aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā”tiādinā vatthukāmesu kilesakāmesu
atk-s0504a:820_5: ca ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇena anapekkhino anatthikā te pahāya adhigataṃ upacārasamādhiṃ
atk-s0504a:820_6: appanāsamādhiṃ vā pādakaṃ katvā nāmarūpaṃ tassa paccaye ca pariggahetvā kalāpasammasanādikkamena
atk-s0504a:821_0: Appamādaratāti vuttappakārāya samathavipassanābhāvanāya appamajjane ratā abhiratā
atk-s0504a:821_1: tattha appamādeneva rattindivaṃ vītināmentā. Santāti samānā. “Sattā”tipi pāṭho, puggalāti
atk-s0504a:821_2: attho. Pamāde bhayadassinoti nirayūpapattiādikaṃ pamāde bhayaṃ passantā. Abhabbā
atk-s0504a:821_3: parihānāyāti te evarūpā samathavipassanādhammehi maggaphalehi vā parihānāya abhabbā.
atk-s0504a:821_4: Samathavipassanāto hi sampattato na parihāyanti, itarāni ca appattāni pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0504a:821_5: Nibbānasseva santiketi nibbānassa ca anupādāparinibbānassa ca santike eva, na cirasseva
atk-s0504a:824_0: 46. Navame sikkhānisaṃsāti ettha sikkhitabbāti sikkhā, sā tividhā adhisīlasikkhā,
atk-s0504a:824_1: adhicittasikkhā, adhipaññāsikkhāti. Tividhāpi cesā sikkhā ānisaṃsā etesaṃ, na lābhasakkārasilokāti
atk-s0504a:824_2: sikkhānisaṃsā. Viharathāti sikkhānisaṃsā hutvā viharatha, tīsu sikkhāsu ānisaṃsadassāvino
atk-s0504a:824_3: hutvā tāhi sikkhāhi laddhabbaṃ ānisaṃsameva sampassantā viharathāti attho. Paññuttarāti
atk-s0504a:824_4: tāsu sikkhāsu yā adhipaññāsikkhāsaṅkhātā paññā, sā uttarā padhānā visiṭṭhā etesanti
atk-s0504a:824_5: paññuttarā. Ye hi sikkhānisaṃsā viharanti, te paññuttarā bhavantīti. Vimuttisārāti
atk-s0504a:824_6: arahattaphalasaṅkhātā vimutti sāraṃ etesanti vimuttisārā, yathāvuttaṃ vimuttiṃyeva
atk-s0504a:824_7: sārato gahetvā ṭhitāti attho. Ye hi sikkhānisaṃsā paññuttarā ca, na te bhavavisesaṃ
atk-s0504a:824_8: patthenti, apica kho vibhavaṃ ākaṅkhantā vimuttiṃyeva sārato paccenti. Satādhipateyyāti
atk-s0504a:824_9: jeṭṭhakakaraṇaṭṭhena sati adhipateyyaṃ etesanti satādhipateyyā adhipati eva adhipateyyanti
atk-s0504a:824_10: katvā, catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā kāyānupassanādimukhena samathavipassanābhāvanānuyuttāti attho.
atk-s0504a:825_0: Atha vā sikkhānisaṃsāti bhikkhave, evarūpe dullabhakkhaṇapaṭilābhe tividhasikkhāsikkhanameva
atk-s0504a:825_1: ānisaṃsaṃ katvā viharatha, evaṃ viharantā ca paññuttarā paññāya uttarā lokuttarapaññāya
atk-s0504a:825_2: samannāgatā hutvā viharatha, evaṃbhūtā ca vimuttisārā nibbānasārā anaññasārā viharatha.
atk-s0504a:825_3: Tathābhāvassa cāyaṃ upāyo, yaṃ satādhipateyyā viharatha, satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya yuttappayuttā
atk-s0504a:825_4: hotha, sabbattha vā satārakkhena cetasā viharathāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Iti
atk-s0504a:825_5: bhagavā tīsu sikkhāsu bhikkhū niyojento yathā tā sikkhitabbā, yena ca pāripūriṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0504a:825_6: taṃ saṅkhepeneva dassetvā idāni yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamānānaṃ phalavisesadassanena
atk-s0504a:825_7: tassā paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvaṃ pakāsento “sikkhānisaṃsāna”ntiādimāha. Taṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0504a:826_0: Gāthāsu paripuṇṇasikkhanti aggaphalappattiyā parisuddhasikkhaṃ, asekkhanti attho.
atk-s0504a:826_1: Apahānadhammanti ettha pahānadhammā vuccanti kuppā vimuttiyo. Pahānadhammoti hi hānadhammo
atk-s0504a:826_3: pāḷi, so eva attho. Khayo eva antoti khayanto, jātiyā khayanto jātikhayanto, nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:826_4: Khayo vā maraṇaṃ, jātikhayanto nibbānameva, tassa diṭṭhattā jātikhayantadassī.
atk-s0504a:827_0: Tasmāti yasmā sikkhāpāripūriyā ayaṃ jarāpāraṅgamanapariyosāno ānisaṃso, tasmā. Sadāti
atk-s0504a:827_1: sabbakālaṃ. Jhānaratāti lakkhaṇūpanijjhāne, ārammaṇūpanijjhāneti duvidhepi jhāne
atk-s0504a:827_2: ratā, tato eva samāhitā. Māraṃ sasenaṃ abhibhuyyāti kilesasenāya anaṭṭhasenāya ca
atk-s0504a:827_3: sasenaṃ anavasiṭṭhaṃ catubbidhampi māraṃ abhibhavitvā. Devaputtamārassapi hi guṇamāraṇe
atk-s0504a:827_4: sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesā “senā”ti vuccanti. Tathā rogādayo anaṭṭhā maccumārassa. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:828: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
atk-s0504a:829: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
atk-s0504a:831: Sattamī vicikicchā te, makkho thambho ca aṭṭhamo.
atk-s0504a:832: “Lābho siloko sakkāro, micchāladdho ca yo yaso;
atk-s0504a:833: Yo cattānaṃ samukkaṃse, pare ca avajānati.
atk-s0504a:835: Na naṃ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukha”nti. ;
atk-s0504a:838: Na hi no saṅgaraṃ tena, mahāsenena maccunā”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:839: Bhavatha jātimaraṇassa pāragāti jātiyā maraṇassa ca pāragāmino nibbānagāmino bhavathāti.
atk-s0504a:842: 47. Dasame jāgaroti jāgarako vigataniddo jāgariyaṃ anuyutto, rattindivaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanasikāre yuttappayuttoti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:843_1: Idha bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodheti,
atk-s0504a:843_2: rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodheti,
atk-s0504a:843_3: rattiyā majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti pāde pādaṃ accādhāya
atk-s0504a:843_4: sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasi karitvā, rattiyā pacchimaṃ yāmaṃ paccuṭṭhāya
atk-s0504a:843_5: caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodheti. Evaṃ bhikkhu pubbarattāpararattaṃ
atk-s0504a:844_0: Casaddo sampiṇḍanattho, tena vakkhamāne satādibhāve sampiṇḍeti. Assāti siyā, bhaveyyāti
atk-s0504a:844_1: attho. “Jāgaro ca bhikkhu vihareyyā”ti ca paṭhanti. Sabbattha sabbadā ca kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavasena
atk-s0504a:844_2: satiavippavāsena sato sampajānoti sattaṭṭhāniyassa catubbidhassapi sampajaññassa
atk-s0504a:844_3: vasena sampajāno. Samāhitoti upacārasamādhinā appanāsamādhinā ca samāhito ekaggacitto.
atk-s0504a:844_4: Pamuditoti paṭipattiyā ānisaṃsadassanena uttaruttari visesādhigamena vīriyārambhassa
atk-s0504a:844_5: ca amoghabhāvadassanena pamudito pāmojjabahulo. Vippasannoti tato eva paṭipattibhūtāsu
atk-s0504a:844_6: tīsu sikkhāsu paṭipattidesake ca satthari saddhābahulatāya suṭṭhu pasanno. Sabbattha
atk-s0504a:845_0: Tattha kālavipassī ca kusalesu dhammesūti tasmiṃ kāle vipassako, tattha vā kammaṭṭhānānuyoge
atk-s0504a:845_1: kālavipassī kālānurūpaṃ vipassako. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā kalāpasammasanādivasena
atk-s0504a:845_2: sammasanto āvāsādike satta asappāye vajjetvā sappāye sevanto antarā vosānaṃ anāpajjitvā
atk-s0504a:845_3: pahitatto cittassa samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhento sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ aniccānupassanādiṃ
atk-s0504a:845_4: pavattento yasmiṃ kāle vipassanācittaṃ līnaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ dhammavicayavīriyapītisaṅkhātesu,
atk-s0504a:845_5: yasmiṃ pana kāle cittaṃ uddhataṃ hoti, tasmiṃ passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsaṅkhātesu kusalesu
atk-s0504a:845_6: anavajjesu bojjhaṅgadhammesūti evaṃ tattha tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle, tasmiṃ vā kammaṭṭhānānuyoge
atk-s0504a:845_7: kālānurūpaṃ vipassako assāti. Satisambojjhaṅgo pana sabbattheva icchitabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0504a:845_8: “satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti. Ettāvatā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0504a:845_9: desanāya jāgariyaṃ dassetvā yehi dhammehi jāgariyānuyogo sampajjati, te pakāseti.
atk-s0504a:846_0: Evaṃ bhagavā āraddhavipassakassa bhikkhuno saṅkhepeneva saddhiṃ upakārakadhammehi
atk-s0504a:846_1: sammasanacāraṃ dassetvā idāni tathā paṭipajjantassa paṭipattiyā avañjhabhāvaṃ dassento
atk-s0504a:846_3: sabbatthakāni sammodapasādāvahāni, tattha kālavipassanā nāma vipassanāya gabbhaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:846_4: paripākagataṃ. Upakkilesavimutte hi vīthipaṭipanne vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre vahante
atk-s0504a:846_5: yogino uḷāraṃ pāmojjaṃ pasādo ca hoti, tehi ca visesādhigamassa santikeyeva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:851_0: Gāthāsu jāgarantā suṇāthetanti etaṃ mama vacanaṃ ekanteneva pamādaniddāya avijjāniddāya
atk-s0504a:851_1: pabodhanatthaṃ jāgarantā satisampajaññādidhammasamāyogena jāgariyaṃ anuyuttā suṇātha.
atk-s0504a:851_2: Ye suttā te pabujjhathāti ye yathāvuttaniddāya suttā supanaṃ upagatā, te tumhe jāgariyānuyogavasena
atk-s0504a:851_3: indriyabalabojjhaṅge saṅkaḍḍhitvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpentā appamādapaṭipattiyā tato
atk-s0504a:851_4: pabujjhatha atha vā jāgarantāti jāgaranimittā. “Suṇātheta”nti ettha “eta”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:851_5: kiṃ taṃ vacananti āha “ye suttā te pabujjhathā”tiādi. Tattha ye suttāti ye kilesaniddāya
atk-s0504a:851_6: suttā, te tumhe ariyamaggapaṭibodhena pabujjhatha. Suttā jāgaritaṃ seyyoti idaṃ pabodhassa
atk-s0504a:851_7: kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā yathāvuttasupato vuttappakāraṃ jāgaritaṃ jāgaraṇaṃ atthakāmassa
atk-s0504a:851_8: kulaputtassa seyyo pāsaṃsataro hitasukhāvaho, tasmā pabujjhatha. Natthi jāgarato
atk-s0504a:851_9: bhayanti idaṃ tattha ānisaṃsadassanaṃ. Yo hi saddhādīhi jāgaraṇadhammehi samannāgamena
atk-s0504a:851_10: jāgaro jaggati, pamādaniddaṃ na upagacchati, tassa attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ
atk-s0504a:851_11: daṇḍabhayaṃ duggatibhayaṃ jātiādinimittaṃ sabbampi vaṭṭabhayaṃ natthi.
atk-s0504a:852_0: Kālenāti āvāsasappāyādīnaṃ laddhakālena. Soti nipātamattaṃ. Sammā dhammaṃ parivīmaṃsamānoti
atk-s0504a:852_1: vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ sammā ñāyena yathā nibbindanavirajjanādayo
atk-s0504a:852_2: sambhavanti, evaṃ parito vīmaṃsanto, sabbākārena vipassantoti attho. Ekodibhūtoti
atk-s0504a:852_3: eko seṭṭho hutvā udetīti ekodi, samādhi. So ekodi bhūto jāto uppanno etassāti ekodibhūto.
atk-s0504a:852_4: Aggiāhitādisaddānaṃ viya ettha bhūtasaddassa paravacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekodiṃ vā bhūto
atk-s0504a:852_5: pattoti ekodibhūto. Ettha ca ekodīti maggasamādhi adhippeto, “samāhito”ti ettha pana
atk-s0504a:852_6: pādakajjhānasamādhinā saddhiṃ vipassanāsamādhi. Atha vā kālenāti maggapaṭivedhakālena.
atk-s0504a:852_7: Sammā dhammaṃ parivīmaṃsamānoti sammadeva catusaccadhammaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena
atk-s0504a:852_8: vīmaṃsanto, ekābhisamayena abhisamento. Ekodibhūtoti eko seṭṭho asahāyo vā hutvā
atk-s0504a:852_9: udetīti ekodi, catukiccasādhako sammappadhāno. So ekodi bhūto jātoti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-s0504a:852_10: Vihane tamaṃ soti so evaṃbhūto ariyasāvako arahattamaggena avijjātamaṃ anavasesato
atk-s0504a:853_0: Iti bhagavā paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni tattha daḷhaṃ niyojento “tasmā
atk-s0504a:853_1: have”ti osānagāthamāha. Tattha tasmāti yasmā jāgarato satiavippavāsādinā samathavipassanābhāvanā
atk-s0504a:853_2: pāripūriṃ gacchati, anukkamena ariyamaggo pātubhavati, tato cassa sabbaṃ vaṭṭabhayaṃ
atk-s0504a:853_3: natthi, tasmā. Haveti ekaṃsena daḷhaṃ vā. Bhajethāti bhajeyya. Evaṃ jāgariyaṃ bhajanto
atk-s0504a:853_4: ca ātāpibhāvādiguṇayutto bhikkhu saṃyojanāni bhinditvā aggaphalañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ anuttaraṃ
atk-s0504a:853_5: uttararahitaṃ sambodhiṃ phuse pāpuṇeyya. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:856_0: 48. Ekādasame āpāyikāti apāye nibbattissantīti āpāyikā. Tatthāpi niraye nibbattissantīti
atk-s0504a:856_1: nerayikā. Idamappahāyāti idaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ duvidhaṃ pāpasamācāraṃ appajahitvā,
atk-s0504a:856_2: tathāpaṭipattitathāpaggahaṇavasena pavattaṃ vācaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭhiñca appaṭinissajjitvāti
atk-s0504a:856_3: attho. Abrahmacārīti brahmaseṭṭhaṃ caratīti brahmacārī, brahmā vā seṭṭho ācāro etassa
atk-s0504a:856_4: atthīti brahmacārī, na brahmacārīti abrahmacārī, brahmacāripaṭirūpako dussīloti attho.
atk-s0504a:856_6: avikalaṃ. Parisuddhanti upakkilesābhāvena parisuddhaṃ. Amūlakenāti diṭṭhādimūlavirahitena,
atk-s0504a:856_7: diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ parisaṅkitanti imehi codanāmūlehi vajjitena. Abrahmacariyena aseṭṭhacariyena.
atk-s0504a:856_8: Anuddhaṃsetīti “parisuddho aya”nti jānantova pārājikavatthunā dhaṃseti padhaṃseti, codeti akkosati vā.
atk-s0504a:857_0: Gāthāsu abhūtavādīti parassa dosaṃ adisvāva abhūtena tucchena musāvādaṃ katvā paraṃ
atk-s0504a:857_1: abbhācikkhanto. Katvāti yo vā pana pāpakammaṃ katvā “nāhaṃ etaṃ karomī”ti āha. Ubhopi
atk-s0504a:857_2: te pecca samā bhavantīti te ubhopi janā ito paralokaṃ gantvā nirayaṃ upagamanato
atk-s0504a:857_3: gatiyā samānā bhavanti. Tattha gatiyeva nesaṃ paricchinnā, na pana āyu. Bahuñhi pāpaṃ
atk-s0504a:857_4: katvā ciraṃ niraye paccati, parittaṃ katvā appamattakameva kālaṃ. Yasmā pana tesaṃ
atk-s0504a:857_5: ubhinnampi kammaṃ lāmakameva. Tena vuttaṃ “nihīnakammā manujā paratthā”ti. “Paratthā”ti
atk-s0504a:857_6: pana padassa purato “peccā”ti padena sambandho – parattha pecca ito gantvā te nihīnakammā samā bhavantīti.
atk-s0504a:858_0: Evaṃ bhagavā abhūtabbhakkhānavasena bhūtadosapaṭicchādanavasena ca pavattassa musāvādassa
atk-s0504a:858_1: vipākaṃ dassetvā idāni tasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnānaṃ bahūnaṃ pāpabhikkhūnaṃ duccaritakammassa
atk-s0504a:858_2: vipākadassanena saṃvejanatthaṃ dve gāthā abhāsi. Tattha kāsāvakaṇṭhāti kasāvarasapītattā
atk-s0504a:858_3: kāsāvena vatthena paliveṭhitakaṇṭhā. Pāpadhammāti lāmakadhammā. Asaññatāti kāyādīhi
atk-s0504a:858_4: saññamarahitā. Pāpāti tathārūpā pāpapuggalā, pāpehi kammehi upapajjitvā “tassa kāyopi
atk-s0504a:858_5: āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto, saṅghāṭipi ādittā”tiādinā lakkhaṇasaṃyutte vuttanayena
atk-s0504a:859_0: Tatiyagāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yañce bhuñjeyya dussīlo nissīlapuggalo kāyādīhi
atk-s0504a:859_1: asaññato raṭṭhavāsīhi saddhāya dinnaṃ yaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ “samaṇomhī”ti paṭijānanto
atk-s0504a:859_2: gahetvā bhuñjeyya, tato āditto aggivaṇṇo ayoguḷova bhutto seyyo sundarataro. Kiṃkāraṇā?
atk-s0504a:859_3: Tappaccayā hissa ekova attabhāvo jhāyeyya, dussīlo pana hutvā saddhādeyyaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0504a:862_0: 49. Dvādasame dvīhi diṭṭhigatehīti ettha diṭṭhiyova diṭṭhigatāni “gūthagataṃ muttagata”ntiādīsu
atk-s0504a:862_1: viya. Gahitākārasuññatāya vā diṭṭhīnaṃ gatamattānīti diṭṭhigatāni, tehi diṭṭhigatehi.
atk-s0504a:862_2: Pariyuṭṭhitāti abhibhūtā palibuddhā vā. Palibodhattho vāpi hi pariyuṭṭhānasaddo “corā
atk-s0504a:862_3: magge pariyuṭṭhiṃsū”tiādīsu viya. Devāti upapattidevā. Te hi dibbanti uḷāratamehi
atk-s0504a:862_4: kāmaguṇehi jhānādīhi ca kīḷanti, iddhānubhāvena vā yathicchitamatthaṃ gacchanti adhigacchantīti
atk-s0504a:862_5: ca devāti vuccanti. Manassa ussannattā manussā, ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:862_6: yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti. Olīyanti eketi “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti bhavesu
atk-s0504a:862_7: olīyanābhinivesabhūtena sassatabhāvena ekacce devā manussā ca avalīyanti allīyanti
atk-s0504a:862_8: saṅkocaṃ āpajjanti, na tato nissaranti. Atidhāvantīti paramatthato bhinnasabhāvānampi
atk-s0504a:862_9: sabhāvadhammānaṃ yvāyaṃ hetuphalabhāvena sambandho, taṃ aggahetvā nānattanayassapi
atk-s0504a:862_10: gahaṇena tattha tattheva dhāvanti, tasmā “ucchijjati attā ca loko ca, na hoti paraṃ
atk-s0504a:862_11: maraṇā”ti ucchede vā bhavanirodhapaṭipattiyā paṭikkhepadhammataṃ atidhāvanti atikkamanti.
atk-s0504a:862_12: Cakkhumanto ca passantīti casaddo byatireke. Pubbayogasampattiyā ñāṇaparipākena paññācakkhumanto
atk-s0504a:862_13: pana devamanussā teneva paññācakkhunā sassataṃ ucchedañca antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimapaṭipattidassanena
atk-s0504a:862_14: paccakkhaṃ karonti. Te hi “nāmarūpamattamidaṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ, tasmā na sassataṃ,
atk-s0504a:863_0: Evaṃ olīyanādike puggalādhiṭṭhānena uddisituṃ “kathañca, bhikkhave”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:863_1: Tattha bhavāti kāmabhavo, rūpabhavo, arūpabhavo. Aparepi tayo bhavā saññībhavo, asaññībhavo,
atk-s0504a:863_2: nevasaññīnāsaññībhavo. Aparepi tayo bhavā ekavokārabhavo, catuvokārabhavo, pañcavokārabhavoti.
atk-s0504a:863_3: Etehi bhavehi āramanti abhinandantīti bhavārāmā. Bhavesu ratā abhiratāti bhavaratā.
atk-s0504a:863_4: Bhavesu suṭṭhu muditāti bhavasammuditā. Bhavanirodhāyāti tesaṃ bhavānaṃ accantanirodhāya
atk-s0504a:863_5: anuppādanatthāya. Dhamme desiyamāneti tathāgatappavedite niyyānikadhamme vuccamāne.
atk-s0504a:863_6: Na pakkhandatīti sassatābhiniviṭṭhattā saṃkhittadhammattā na pavisati na ogāhati.
atk-s0504a:863_7: Na pasīdatīti pasādaṃ nāpajjati na taṃ saddahati. Na santiṭṭhatīti tassaṃ desanāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:863_8: na tiṭṭhati nādhimuccati. Evaṃ sassatato abhinivisanena bhavesu olīyanti.
atk-s0504a:864_0: Aṭṭīyamānāti bhave jarārogamaraṇādīni vadhabandhanacchedanādīni ca disvā saṃvijjanena
atk-s0504a:864_1: tehi samaṅgibhāvena bhavena pīḷiyamānā dukkhāpiyamānā. Harāyamānāti lajjamānā jigucchamānāti
atk-s0504a:864_2: paṭikūlato dahantā. Vibhavanti ucchedaṃ. Abhinandantīti taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanāhi ajjhosāya
atk-s0504a:864_3: nandanti. Yato kira bhotiādi tesaṃ abhinandanākāradassanaṃ. Tattha yatoti yadā. Bhoti
atk-s0504a:864_4: ālapanaṃ. Ayaṃ attāti kārakādibhāvena attanā parikappitaṃ sandhāya vadati. Ucchijjatīti
atk-s0504a:864_5: upacchijjati. Vinassatīti na dissati, vināsaṃ abhāvaṃ gacchati. Na hoti paraṃ maraṇāti
atk-s0504a:864_6: maraṇena uddhaṃ na bhavati. Etaṃ santanti yadetaṃ attano ucchedādi, etaṃ sabbabhavavūpasamato
atk-s0504a:864_7: sabbasantāpavūpasamato ca santaṃ, santattā eva paṇītaṃ, tacchāviparītabhāvato yāthāvaṃ.
atk-s0504a:864_8: Tattha “santaṃ paṇīta”nti idaṃ dvayaṃ taṇhābhinandanāya vadanti, “yāthāva”nti diṭṭhābhinandanāya.
atk-s0504a:865_0: Bhūtanti khandhapañcakaṃ. Tañhi paccayasambhūtattā paramatthato vijjamānattā ca bhūtanti
atk-s0504a:865_1: vuccati. Tenāha “bhūtamidaṃ, bhikkhave, samanupassathā”ti. Bhūtato aviparītasabhāvato
atk-s0504a:865_2: salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca passati. Idañhi khandhapañcakaṃ nāmarūpamattaṃ.
atk-s0504a:865_3: Tattha “ime pathavīādayo dhammā rūpaṃ, ime phassādayo dhammā nāmaṃ, imāni nesaṃ lakkhaṇādīni,
atk-s0504a:865_4: ime nesaṃ avijjādayo paccayā”ti evaṃ sapaccayanāmarūpadassanavasena ceva, “sabbepime
atk-s0504a:865_5: dhammā ahutvā sambhonti, hutvā paṭiventi, tasmā aniccā, aniccattā dukkhā, dukkhattā
atk-s0504a:865_6: anattā”ti evaṃ aniccānupassanādivasena ca passatīti attho. Ettāvatā taruṇavipassanāpariyosānā
atk-s0504a:865_7: vipassanābhūmi dassitā. Nibbidāyāti bhūtasaṅkhātassa tebhūmakadhammajātassa nibbindanatthāya,
atk-s0504a:865_8: etena balavavipassanaṃ dasseti. Virāgāyāti virāgatthaṃ virajjanatthaṃ, iminā maggaṃ
atk-s0504a:865_9: dasseti. Nirodhāyāti nirujjhanatthaṃ, imināpi maggameva dasseti. Nirodhāyāti vā paṭippassaddhinirodhena
atk-s0504a:865_10: saddhiṃ anupādisesanibbānaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cakkhumanto passantīti
atk-s0504a:865_11: evaṃ paññācakkhumanto sapubbabhāgena maggapaññācakkhunā catusaccadhammaṃ passanti.
atk-s0504a:866_0: Gāthāsu ye bhūtaṃ bhūtato disvāti ye ariyasāvakā bhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ bhūtato aviparītasabhāvato
atk-s0504a:866_1: vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya disvā. Etena pariññābhisamayaṃ dasseti. Bhūtassa
atk-s0504a:866_2: ca atikkamanti bhāvanābhisamayaṃ. Ariyamaggo hi bhūtaṃ atikkamati etenāti “bhūtassa
atk-s0504a:866_3: atikkamo”ti vutto. Yathābhūteti aviparītasaccasabhāve nibbāne. Vimuccanti adhimuccanti,
atk-s0504a:866_4: etena sacchikiriyābhisamayaṃ dasseti. Bhavataṇhāparikkhayāti bhavataṇhāya sabbaso
atk-s0504a:867_0: Save bhūtapariñño soti ettha pana saveti nipātamattaṃ. So bhūtapariñño bhūtassa atikkamanūpāyena
atk-s0504a:867_1: maggena bhavataṇhāparikkhayā pariññātakkhandho tato eva yathābhūte nibbāne adhimutto.
atk-s0504a:867_2: Bhavābhaveti khuddake ceva mahante ca, ucchedādidassane vā vītataṇho bhinnakileso.
atk-s0504a:867_3: Bhikkhu bhūtassa upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa vibhavā, āyatiṃ anuppādā
atk-s0504a:867_4: punabbhavaṃ nāgacchati, apaññattikabhāvameva gacchatīti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0504a:868: Iti imasmiṃ vagge ekādasame vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, tatiyacatutthapañcamesu pariyosānasutte ca vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, sesesu vivaṭṭamevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:875_0: 50. Tikanipātassa paṭhame tīṇīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Imānīti abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ. Akusalamūlānīti
atk-s0504a:875_1: paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. Tattha akusalāni ca tāni mūlāni cāti akusalamūlāni.
atk-s0504a:875_3: akusalamūlāni, akusaladhammānaṃ kāraṇānīti attho. Kāraṇañhi yathā hinoti etasmā phalaṃ
atk-s0504a:875_4: pavattatīti hetu, paṭicca etasmā etīti paccayo, pabhavati etasmāti pabhavo, attano
atk-s0504a:875_5: phalaṃ janetīti janakaṃ, samuṭṭhāpetīti samuṭṭhāpakaṃ, nibbattetīti nibbattakanti
atk-s0504a:875_6: ca vuccati. Evaṃ patiṭṭhaṭṭhena mūlanti, tasmā akusalamūlānīti akusalānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanāni,
atk-s0504a:876_0: Keci pana “sāliādīnaṃ sālibījādīni viya maṇippabhādīnaṃ maṇivaṇṇādayo viya ca akusalānaṃ
atk-s0504a:876_1: akusalabhāvasādhako lobhādīnaṃ mūlaṭṭho”ti vadanti. Evaṃ sante akusalacittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu
atk-s0504a:876_2: tesaṃ hetupaccayabhāvo na siyā. Na hi tāni tesaṃ akusalabhāvaṃ sādhenti, na ca paccayā
atk-s0504a:877: “Hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti.
atk-s0504a:878_0: Ahetukassa ca mohassa akusalabhāvo na siyā akusalabhāvasādhakassa mūlantarassa abhāvato.
atk-s0504a:878_1: Athāpi siyā lobhādīnaṃ sabhāvasiddho akusalādibhāvo, taṃsampayuttānaṃ pana lobhādipaṭibaddhoti.
atk-s0504a:878_2: Evampi yathā lobhādīnaṃ, evaṃ alobhādīnampi sabhāvasiddho kusalādibhāvoti alobhādayo
atk-s0504a:878_3: kusalā eva siyuṃ, na abyākatā, na ca honti. Tasmā yathā sampayuttesu, evaṃ mūlesupi
atk-s0504a:878_4: kusalādibhāvo pariyesitabbo. Yonisomanasikārādiko viya hi kusalabhāvassa, ayonisomanasikārādiko
atk-s0504a:878_5: akusalabhāvassa kāraṇanti gahetabbaṃ. Evaṃ akusalabhāvasādhanavasena lobhādīnaṃ mūlaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0504a:878_6: aggahetvā suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanavasena gayhamāne na koci doso. Laddhahetupaccayā
atk-s0504a:878_7: hi dhammā virūḷhamūlā viya pādapā thirā honti suppatiṭṭhitā, heturahitā pana tilabījakādisevālā
atk-s0504a:878_8: viya na suppatiṭṭhitāti hetuādiatthena akusalānaṃ upakārakattā mūlānīti akusalamūlāni.
atk-s0504a:878_9: Yasmā pana mūlena mutto akusalacittuppādo natthi, tasmā tīhi mūlehi sabbo akusalarāsi
atk-s0504a:879_0: Tāni akusalamūlāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “lobho akusalamūla”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha lobhādīsu
atk-s0504a:879_1: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Tattha pana tatiyamaggavajjhā lobhādayo āgatā,
atk-s0504a:880_0: Gāthāyaṃ pāpacetasanti akusaladhammasamāyogato lāmakacittaṃ. Hiṃsantīti attano pavattikkhaṇe
atk-s0504a:880_1: āyatiṃ vipākakkhaṇe ca vibādhenti. Attasambhūtāti attani jātā. Tacasāranti gaṇṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:880_2: veḷunti attho. Samphalanti attano phalaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – khadirasīsapādayo viya
atk-s0504a:880_3: antosāro ahutvā bahisāratāya tacasāranti laddhanāmaṃ veḷuādiṃ yathā attasambhūtameva
atk-s0504a:880_4: phalaṃ hiṃsati vināseti, evameva anto sīlādisārarahitaṃ lāmakacittaṃ puggalaṃ attasambhūtāyeva
atk-s0504a:883_0: 51. Dutiye dhātuyoti attano phalassa sabhāvassa ca dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātuyo. Yañcettha
atk-s0504a:883_1: phalanibbattakaṃ, taṃ attano phalassa sabhāvassa ca, itaraṃ sabhāvasseva dhāraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:883_2: dhātu. Rūpadhātūti rūpabhavo. Dhātuyā āgataṭṭhāne bhavena paricchinditabbaṃ, bhavassa
atk-s0504a:883_3: āgataṭṭhāne dhātuyā paricchinditabbanti idha bhavena paricchedo kathito. Tasmā –
atk-s0504a:884: “Katame dhammā rūpāvacarā? Heṭṭhato brahmalokaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito akaniṭṭhe deve anto karitvā etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā, ime dhammā rūpāvacarā”ti –
atk-s0504a:885: Evaṃ vuttā rūpāvacaradhammā rūpadhātu. Arūpadhātūti arūpabhavo. Idhāpi bhavena paricchedo kathitoti –
atk-s0504a:886_0: “Katame dhammā arūpāvacarā? Heṭṭhato ākāsānañcāyatanūpage deve anto karitvā, uparito
atk-s0504a:886_1: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpage deve anto karitvā, etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā,
atk-s0504a:887: Evaṃ vuttā arūpāvacaradhammā arūpadhātu. Nirodhadhātūti nibbānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:888_0: Aparo nayo – rūpasahitā, rūpapaṭibaddhā, dhammappavatti rūpadhātu, pañcavokārabhavo,
atk-s0504a:888_1: ekavokārabhavo ca, tena sakalo kāmabhavo rūpabhavo ca saṅgahito. Rūparahitā dhammappavatti
atk-s0504a:888_2: arūpadhātu, catuvokārabhavo, tena arūpabhavo saṅgahito. Iti dvīhi padehi tayo bhavā
atk-s0504a:888_3: sabbā saṃsārappavatti dassitā. Tatiyapadena pana asaṅkhatadhātuyeva saṅgahitāti maggaphalāni
atk-s0504a:888_4: idha tikavinimuttadhammā nāma jātā. Keci pana “rūpadhātūti rūpasabhāvā dhammā, arūpadhātūti
atk-s0504a:888_5: arūpasabhāvā dhammāti padadvayena anavasesato pañcakkhandhā gahitā”ti. “Rūpataṇhāya
atk-s0504a:888_6: visayabhūtā dhammā rūpadhātu, arūpataṇhāya visayabhūtā arūpadhātū”ti ca vadanti,
atk-s0504a:888_7: taṃ sabbaṃ idha nādhippetaṃ. Tasmā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:889_0: Gāthāsu rūpadhātuṃ pariññāyāti rūpapaṭibaddhadhammapavattiṃ ñātapariññādīhi tīhi
atk-s0504a:889_1: pariññāhi parijānitvā. Āruppesu asaṇṭhitāti arūpāvacaradhammesu bhavarāgavasena bhavadiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0504a:889_2: ca na patiṭṭhitā anallīnā. “Arūpesu asaṇṭhitā”ti ca paṭhanti, so eva attho. Ettāvatā
atk-s0504a:889_3: tebhūmakadhammānaṃ pariññā vuttā. Nirodhe ye vimuccantīti ye nibbāne ārammaṇabhūte
atk-s0504a:889_5: janā maccuhāyinoti te khīṇāsavajanā maraṇaṃ samatītā.
atk-s0504a:890_0: Evaṃ dhātuttayasamatikkamena amatādhigamaṃ dassetvā “ayañca paṭipadā mayā gatamaggo
atk-s0504a:890_1: ca tumhākaṃ dassito”ti tattha nesaṃ ussāhaṃ janento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha kāyenāti
atk-s0504a:890_2: nāmakāyena maggaphalehi. Phusayitvāti patvā. Nirūpadhinti khandhādisabbūpadhirahitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:890_3: Upadhippaṭinissagganti tesaṃyeva ca upadhīnaṃ paṭinissajjanakāraṇaṃ. Nibbānassa hi
atk-s0504a:890_4: maggañāṇena sacchikiriyāya sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā hontīti taṃ tesaṃ paṭinissajjanakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0504a:890_5: Sacchikatvāti kālena kālaṃ phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena attapaccakkhaṃ katvā anāsavo
atk-s0504a:890_6: sammāsambuddho tameva asokaṃ virajaṃ nibbānapadaṃ deseti. Tasmā tadadhigamāya ussukkaṃ kātabbanti.
atk-s0504a:893_0: 52. Tatiye vedanāti ārammaṇarasaṃ vediyanti anubhavantīti vedanā. Tā vibhāgato dassetuṃ
atk-s0504a:893_1: “sukhā vedanā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sukha-saddo atthuddhāravasena heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0504a:893_2: Dukkha-saddo pana “jātipi dukkhā”tiādīsu dukkhavatthusmiṃ āgato. “Yasmā ca kho, mahāli,
atk-s0504a:893_3: rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkanta”ntiādīsu dukkhārammaṇe. “Dukkho pāpassa
atk-s0504a:893_4: uccayo”tiādīsu dukkhapaccaye. “Yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, na sukarā akkhānena pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0504a:893_5: yāva dukkhā nirayā”tiādīsu dukkhapaccayaṭṭhāne. “Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca
atk-s0504a:894_0: Vacanatthato pana sukhayatīti sukhā. Dukkhayatīti dukkhā. Na dukkhā na sukhāti adukkhamasukhā,
atk-s0504a:894_1: makāro padasandhivasena vutto. Tāsu iṭṭhānubhavanalakkhaṇā sukhā, aniṭṭhānubhavanalakkhaṇā
atk-s0504a:894_3: uppatti pākaṭā, na adukkhamasukhāya. Yadā hi sukhaṃ uppajjati, sakalasarīraṃ bhentaṃ
atk-s0504a:894_4: maddantaṃ pharamānaṃ satadhotasappiṃ khādāpentaṃ viya, satapākatelaṃ makkhentaṃ viya,
atk-s0504a:894_5: ghaṭasahassena pariḷāhaṃ nibbāpayamānaṃ viya ca “aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”nti vācaṃ
atk-s0504a:894_6: nicchārayamānameva uppajjati. Yadā dukkhaṃ uppajjati, sakalasarīraṃ khobhentaṃ maddantaṃ
atk-s0504a:894_7: pharamānaṃ tattaphālaṃ pavesentaṃ viya vilīnatambalohaṃ āsiñcantaṃ viya ca “aho dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:894_8: aho dukkha”nti vippalāpentameva uppajjati. Iti sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ uppatti pākaṭā.
atk-s0504a:895_0: Adukkhamasukhā pana dubbijānā duddīpanā andhakārā avibhūtā. Sā sukhadukkhānaṃ apagame
atk-s0504a:895_1: sātāsātapaṭipakkhavasena majjhattākārabhūtā nayato gaṇhantasseva pākaṭā hoti. Yathā
atk-s0504a:895_2: kiṃ? Yathā pubbāparaṃ sapaṃsuke padese upacaritamaggavasena piṭṭhipāsāṇe migena gatamaggo,
atk-s0504a:896_0: Evamettha sukhadukkhaadukkhamasukhabhāvena tidhā vuttāpi katthaci sukhadukkhabhāvena
atk-s0504a:896_1: dvidhā vuttā. Yathāha – “dvepi mayā, ānanda, vedanā vuttā, pariyāyena sukhā vedanā,
atk-s0504a:896_2: dukkhā vedanā”ti. Katthaci tissopi visuṃ visuṃ sukhadukkhaadukkhamasukhabhāvena “sukhā
atk-s0504a:896_3: vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā, dukkhā vedanā ṭhitidukkhā vipariṇāmasukhā, adukkhamasukhā
atk-s0504a:896_4: vedanā ñāṇasukhā aññāṇadukkhā”ti. Katthaci sabbāpi dukkhabhāvena. Vuttañhetaṃ “yaṃ
atk-s0504a:896_5: kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti vadāmī”ti.
atk-s0504a:897_0: Tattha siyā – yadi tisso vedanā yathā idha vuttā, aññesu ca edisesu suttesu abhidhamme
atk-s0504a:897_1: ca evaṃ avatvā kasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ “yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti vadāmī”ti,
atk-s0504a:897_2: “dvepi mayā, ānanda, vedanā vuttā”ti ca? Sandhāyabhāsitametaṃ, tasmā sā pariyāyadesanā.
atk-s0504a:898: “Saṅkhārāniccataṃ, ānanda, mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ saṅkhāravipariṇāmataṃ, ‘yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasmi”’nti.
atk-s0504a:899: “Dvepi mayā, ānanda, vedanā vuttā pariyāyenā”ti ca.
atk-s0504a:900_0: Ettha hi sukhā adukkhamasukhāti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ vedanānaṃ nippariyāyena dukkhabhāvo
atk-s0504a:900_1: natthi, veneyyajjhāsayena pana tattha nicchandadassanatthaṃ pariyāyena dukkhabhāvo
atk-s0504a:900_2: vuttoti sā tādisī pariyāyadesanā. Ayaṃ pana vedanattayadesanā sabhāvakathāti katvā
atk-s0504a:901_1: So “mā heva”ntissa vacanīyo, yasmā bhagavatā sabbāsaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhabhāvo adhippāyavasena
atk-s0504a:901_2: vutto “saṅkhārāniccataṃ, ānanda, mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ saṅkhāravipariṇāmataṃ ‘yaṃ
atk-s0504a:901_3: kiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasmi”’nti. Yadi panettha vedanattayadesanā pariyāyadesanā
atk-s0504a:901_4: siyā, “idaṃ mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ tisso vedanā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, na panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:902_0: Apicāyameva vattabbo “ko, panāvuso, vedanattayadesanāya adhippāyo”ti? Sace vadeyya
atk-s0504a:902_1: “mudukā dukkhā vedanā sukhā, adhimattā dukkhā, majjhimā adukkhamasukhāti veneyyajjhāsayena
atk-s0504a:902_2: vuttā. Tāsu hi na sattānaṃ sukhādivaḍḍhī”ti. So vattabbo – ko panāvuso dukkhavedanāya
atk-s0504a:902_3: sabhāvo, yena “sabbā vedanā dukkhā”ti vucceyyuṃ? Yadi yāya uppannāya sattā viyogameva
atk-s0504a:902_4: icchanti, so dukkhavedanāya sabhāvo. Yāya ca pana uppannāya sattā aviyogameva icchanti,
atk-s0504a:902_5: yāya na ubhayaṃ icchanti, sā kathaṃ dukkhavedanā siyā? Atha yā attano nissayassa
atk-s0504a:902_6: upaghātakārī, sā dukkhā. Yā anuggahakārī, sā kathaṃ dukkhā siyā. Atha pana yadariyā
atk-s0504a:902_7: dukkhato passanti, so dukkhavedanāya sabhāvo, saṅkhāradukkhatāya vedanaṃ ariyā dukkhato
atk-s0504a:902_8: passanti, sā ca abhiṇhasabhāvāti kathaṃ tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ mudumajjhimādhimattadukkhabhāvo
atk-s0504a:902_9: siyā? Yadi ca saṅkhāradukkhatāya eva vedanānaṃ dukkhabhāvo siyā, “tisso imā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:902_10: dukkhatāyo dukkhadukkhatā, vipariṇāmadukkhatā, saṅkhāradukkhatā”ti ayaṃ dukkhatānaṃ
atk-s0504a:902_11: vibhāgadesanā nippayojanā siyā. Tathā ca sati suttameva paṭibāhitaṃ siyā, purimesu
atk-s0504a:902_12: ca tīsu rūpāvacarajjhānesu mudukā dukkhā vedanāti āpajjati sukhavedanāvacanato. Catutthajjhāne
atk-s0504a:902_13: arūpajjhānesu ca majjhimā, adukkhamasukhavedanāvacanato. Evaṃ sante purimā tisso
atk-s0504a:902_14: rūpāvacarasamāpattiyo catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā arūpasamāpattīhi ca santatarāti āpajjati.
atk-s0504a:902_15: Kathaṃ vā santatarappaṇītatarāsu samāpattīsu dukkhavedanāya adhikabhāvo yujjati?
atk-s0504a:903_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “dukkhe sukhanti saññāvipallāso”ti, taṃ kathanti? Vipariṇāmadukkhatāya
atk-s0504a:903_1: saṅkhāradukkhatāya ca yathābhūtānavabodhena yā ekantato sukhasaññā, yā ca dukkhanimitte
atk-s0504a:903_2: sukhanimittasaññā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evampi “sukhā, bhikkhave, vedanā dukkhato
atk-s0504a:903_3: daṭṭhabbā”ti idaṃ pana kathanti? Idaṃ pana vipariṇāmadassane sanniyojanatthaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:903_4: tassa tattha virāguppattiyā upāyabhāvato sukhavedanāya bahudukkhānugatabhāvato ca.
atk-s0504a:903_5: Tathā hi dukkhassa hetubhāvato anekehi dukkhadhammehi anubaddhattā ca paṇḍitā sukhampi
atk-s0504a:904_0: Evampi nattheva sukhā vedanā, sukhahetūnaṃ niyamābhāvato. Ye hi sukhavedanāya hetusammatā
atk-s0504a:904_1: ghāsacchādanādayo, te eva adhimattaṃ akāle ca paṭiseviyamānā dukkhavedanāya hetubhāvamāpajjanti.
atk-s0504a:904_2: Na ca yeneva hetunā sukhaṃ, teneva dukkhanti yuttaṃ vattuṃ. Tasmā na te sukhahetū,
atk-s0504a:904_3: dukkhantarāpagame pana aviññūnaṃ sukhasaññā yathā cirataraṃ ṭhānādiiriyāpathasamaṅgī
atk-s0504a:904_4: hutvā tadaññairiyāpathasamāyoge mahantañca bhāraṃ vahato bhāranikkhepe ceva vūpasame
atk-s0504a:904_5: ca, tasmā nattheva sukhanti? Tayidaṃ sammadeva sukhahetuṃ apariññāya tassa niyamābhāvaparikappanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:904_6: Ārammaṇamattameva hi kevalaṃ sukhahetuṃ manasikatvā evaṃ vuttaṃ, ajjhattikasarīrassa
atk-s0504a:904_7: avatthāvisesaṃ samuditaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ tadubhayaṃ sukhādihetūti veditabbaṃ. Yādisañca
atk-s0504a:904_8: tadubhayaṃ sukhavedanāya hetu, tādisaṃ na kadācipi dukkhavedanāya hetu hotīti vavatthitā
atk-s0504a:904_9: eva sukhādihetu. Yathā nāma tejodhātu sāliyavaḍākasassādīnaṃ yādisamavatthantaraṃ
atk-s0504a:904_10: patvā sātamadhurabhāvahetu hoti, na tādisameva patvā kadācipi asātaamadhurabhāvahetu
atk-s0504a:905_0: Dukkhāpagameva kadāci sukhavedanantaraṃ upalabbhati. Tattha sukheyeva sukhasaññā,
atk-s0504a:905_1: na dukkhāpagamamatte yathā addhānagamanaparissamakilantassa sambāhane iriyāpathaparivattane
atk-s0504a:905_2: ca, aññathā kālantarepi parissamāpagame tādisī sukhasaññā siyā. Dukkhāpagamamatte
atk-s0504a:905_3: pana sukhanti parikappanā vedanāvisesassa anupalabbhamānattā. Ekanteneva cetaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0504a:905_4: sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, yato paṇītappaṇītāniyeva ārammaṇāni mahatā āyāsena sattā abhipatthayanti,
atk-s0504a:905_5: na ca nesaṃ yena kenaci yathāladdhamattena paccayena patikāraṃ kātuṃ sakkā taṇhuppādenāti.
atk-s0504a:905_6: Vedanāpaccayā hi taṇhāupādi, tathābhāve ca sugandhamadhurasukhasamphassādivatthūnaṃ
atk-s0504a:905_7: itarītarabhāvena sukhavisesasaññā jāyamānā katamassa dukkhavisesassa apagamane ghānajivhākāyadvāresu,
atk-s0504a:905_9: dukkhantarāpagame sukhasaññā, nāpi kevale dukkhāpagamamatteti āgamato yuttitopi vavatthitā
atk-s0504a:905_10: tisso vedanāti bhagavato vedanattayadesanā nītatthāyeva, na neyyatthāti saññāpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:905_11: Evañcetaṃ upeti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce, kammaṃ katvā uyyojetabbo “gaccha yathāsukha”nti.
atk-s0504a:906_0: Evametā aññamaññapaṭipakkhasabhāvavavatthitalakkhaṇā eva tisso vedanā bhagavatā desitā.
atk-s0504a:906_1: Tañca kho vipassanākammikānaṃ yogāvacarānaṃ vedanāmukhena arūpakammaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0504a:906_2: Duvidhañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ, arūpakammaṭṭhānanti. Tattha bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:906_3: kathento saṅkhepamanasikāravasena vā vitthāramanasikāravasena vā catudhātuvavatthānādivasena
atk-s0504a:906_4: vā katheti. Arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ pana kathento phassavasena vā vedanāvasena vā cittavasena
atk-s0504a:906_5: vā katheti. Ekaccassa hi āpāthagate ārammaṇe āvajjato tattha cittacetasikānaṃ paṭhamābhinipāto
atk-s0504a:906_6: phasso taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusanto uppajjamāno pākaṭo hoti, ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantī
atk-s0504a:906_7: uppajjamānā vedanā pākaṭā hoti, ekaccassa taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vijānantaṃ uppajjamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:906_8: pākaṭaṃ hoti. Iti tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena yathāpākaṭaṃ phassādimukhena
atk-s0504a:907_0: Tattha yassa phasso pākaṭo hoti, sopi “na kevalaṃ phassova uppajjati, tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0504a:907_1: tadeva ārammaṇaṃ anubhavamānā vedanāpi uppajjati, sañjānamānā saññāpi, cetayamānā
atk-s0504a:907_2: cetanāpi, vijānamānaṃ viññāṇampi uppajjatī”ti phassapañcamakeyeva pariggaṇhāti. Yassa
atk-s0504a:907_3: vedanā pākaṭā hoti, sopi “na kevalaṃ vedanāva uppajjati, tāya saddhiṃ phusamāno phassopi
atk-s0504a:907_4: uppajjati, sañjānamānā saññāpi, cetayamānā cetanāpi, vijānamānaṃ viññāṇampi uppajjatī”ti
atk-s0504a:907_5: phassapañcamakeyeva pariggaṇhāti. Yassa viññāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, sopi “na kevalaṃ viññāṇameva
atk-s0504a:907_6: uppajjati, tena saddhiṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ phusamāno phassopi uppajjati, anubhavamānā
