atk-s0504a:1143_2: vissaṭṭhavacanatā, sattānaṃ piyamanāpatā, abhijjaparisatā, acchambhitā, duppadhaṃsiyatā,
atk-s0504a:1143_3: parūpakkamena amaraṇatā, mahāparivāratā, suvaṇṇatā, susaṇṭhānatā, appābādhatā, asokatā,
atk-s0504a:1144_0: Adinnādānā veramaṇiyā mahādhanadhaññatā, anantabhogatā, thirabhogatā, icchitānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1144_1: bhogānaṃ khippaṃ paṭilābho, rājādīhi asādhāraṇabhogatā, uḷārabhogatā, tattha tattha
atk-s0504a:1145_0: Abrahmacariyā veramaṇiyā vigatapaccatthikatā, sabbasattānaṃ piyamanāpatā, annapānavatthacchādanādīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:1145_2: abhabbatā, akkodhanatā, saccakāritā, amaṅkutā, ārādhanasukhatā, paripuṇṇindriyatā,
atk-s0504a:1145_3: paripuṇṇalakkhaṇatā, nirāsaṅkatā, appossukkatā, sukhavihāritā, akutobhayatā, piyavippayogābhāvoti
atk-s0504a:1145_4: evamādīni. Yasmā pana micchācārāveramaṇiyā phalānipi ettheva antogadhāni, tasmā (abrahmacariyā veramaṇiyā).
atk-s0504a:1146_1: nātithūlatā, nātikisatā, nātirassatā, nātidīghatā, sukhasamphassatā, uppalagandhamukhatā,
atk-s0504a:1147_1: ñāṇavantatā, sadā upaṭṭhitassatitā, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānavantatā,
atk-s0504a:1147_2: analasatā, ajaḷatā, anummattatā, acchambhitā, asārambhitā, anissukitā, amaccharitā,
atk-s0504a:1147_4: sīlavantatā, ujukatā, akkodhanatā, hirottappasampannatā, ujudiṭṭhitā, mahantatā,
atk-s0504a:1147_5: paṇḍitatā, atthānatthakusalatāti evamādīni phalāni. Evamettha pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīnampi
atk-s0504a:1148_0: Sīlavāti yathāvuttapañcasīlavasena sīlavā. Kalyāṇadhammoti sundaradhammo, saraṇagamanaparidīpitāya
atk-s0504a:1148_1: diṭṭhisampattiyā sampannapaññoti attho. Yo pana putto mātāpitūsu assaddhesu dussīlesu
atk-s0504a:1148_2: ca sayampi tādiso, sopi avajātoyevāti veditabbo. Assaddhiyādayo hi idha avajātabhāvassa
atk-s0504a:1148_3: lakkhaṇaṃ vuttā, te ca tasmiṃ saṃvijjanti. Mātāpitaro pana upādāya puttassa atijātādibhāvo vuccatīti.
atk-s0504a:1149: Yo hoti kulagandhanoti kulacchedako kulavināsako. Chedanattho hi idha gandhasaddo, “uppalagandhapaccatthikā”tiādīsu viya. Keci pana “kuladhaṃsano”ti paṭhanti, so evattho.
atk-s0504a:1150_0: Ete kho puttā lokasminti ete atijātādayo tayo puttā eva imasmiṃ sattaloke puttā nāma,
atk-s0504a:1150_1: na ito vinimuttā atthi. Imesu pana ye bhavanti upāsakā ye saraṇagamanasampattiyā
atk-s0504a:1150_2: upāsakā bhavanti kammassakatāñāṇena kammassa kovidā, te ca paṇḍitā paññavanto, pañcasīladasasīlena
atk-s0504a:1150_3: sampannā paripuṇṇā. Yācakānaṃ vacanaṃ jānanti, tesaṃ mukhākāradassaneneva adhippāyapūraṇatoti
atk-s0504a:1150_4: vadaññū, tesaṃ vā “dehī”ti vacanaṃ sutvā “ime pubbe dānaṃ adatvā evaṃbhūtā, mayā
atk-s0504a:1150_5: pana evaṃ na bhavitabba”nti tesaṃ pariccāgena tadatthaṃ jānantīti vadaññū, paṇḍitānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1150_6: vā kammassakatādidīpakaṃ vacanaṃ jānantīti vadaññū. “Padaññū”ti ca paṭhanti, padāniyā
atk-s0504a:1150_7: pariccāgasīlāti attho. Tato eva vigatamaccheramalattā vītamaccharā. Abbhaghanāti
atk-s0504a:1150_8: abbhasaṅkhātā ghanā, ghanameghapaṭalā vā mutto candoviya, upāsakādiparisāsu khattiyādiparisāsu
atk-s0504a:1153_0: 75. Chaṭṭhe avuṭṭhikasamoti avuṭṭhikameghasamo. Ekacco hi megho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo
atk-s0504a:1153_1: hutvā uṭṭhahitvā thananto gajjanto vijjotanto ekaṃ udakabindumpi apātetvā vigacchati,
atk-s0504a:1153_2: tathūpamo ekacco puggaloti dassento āha “avuṭṭhikasamo”ti. Padesavassīti ekadesavassimeghasamo.
atk-s0504a:1153_3: Padesavassī viyāti hi padesavassī. Ekacco ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhitesu manussesu yathā
atk-s0504a:1153_4: ekacce tementi, ekacce na tementi, evaṃ mandaṃ vassati, tathūpamaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0504a:1153_6: jagatippadese abhivassimeghasamo. Ekacco hi sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pattharitvā sabbatthakameva
atk-s0504a:1153_7: abhivassati, taṃ cātuddīpikamahāmeghaṃ ekaccassa puggalassa upamaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “sabbatthābhivassī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1154_0: Sabbesānanti sabbesaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Na dātā hotīti adānasīlo hoti, thaddhamaccharitāya
atk-s0504a:1154_1: na kassaci kiñci detīti attho. Idāni dānassa khettaṃ deyyadhammañca vibhāgena dassetuṃ
atk-s0504a:1154_2: “samaṇabrāhmaṇā”tiādimāha. Tattha samitapāpasamaṇā ceva pabbajjamattasamaṇā ca bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇā
atk-s0504a:1154_3: ceva jātimattabrāhmaṇā ca idha “samaṇabrāhmaṇā”ti adhippetā. Kapaṇā nāma duggatā
atk-s0504a:1154_4: daliddamanussā. Addhikā nāma pathāvino paribbayavihīnā. Vanibbakā nāma ye “iṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0504a:1154_5: detha kantaṃ manāpaṃ kālena anavajjaṃ udaggacittā pasannacittā, evaṃ dentā gacchatha
atk-s0504a:1154_6: sugatiṃ, gacchatha brahmaloka”ntiādinā nayena dāne niyojentā dānassa vaṇṇaṃ thomentā
atk-s0504a:1154_7: vicaranti. Yācakā nāma ye kevalaṃ “muṭṭhimattaṃ detha, pasatamattaṃ detha, sarāvamattaṃ
atk-s0504a:1154_8: dethā”ti appakampi yācamānā vicaranti. Tattha samaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇena guṇakhettaṃ
atk-s0504a:1154_9: upakārikhettañca dasseti, kapaṇādiggahaṇena karuṇākhettaṃ. Annanti yaṃkiñci khādanīyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1154_10: bhojanīyaṃ. Pānanti ambapānādipānakaṃ. Vatthanti nivāsanapārupanādiacchādanaṃ. Yānanti
atk-s0504a:1154_11: rathavayhādi antamaso upāhanaṃ upādāya gamanasādhanaṃ. Mālāti ganthitāganthitabhedaṃ
atk-s0504a:1154_12: sabbaṃ pupphaṃ. Gandhanti yaṃkiñci gandhajātaṃ pisitaṃ apisitaṃ gandhūpakaraṇañca.
atk-s0504a:1154_13: Vilepananti chavirāgakaraṇaṃ. Seyyāti mañcapīṭhādi ceva pāvārakojavādi ca sayitabbavatthu.
atk-s0504a:1154_14: Seyyaggahaṇena cettha āsanampi gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Āvasathanti vātātapādiparissayavinodanaṃ
atk-s0504a:1155_0: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhaveti vijjamānepi deyyadhamme paṭiggāhakānaṃ evaṃ dātabbavatthuṃ
atk-s0504a:1155_1: sabbena sabbaṃ adento puggalo avassikameghasadiso hoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:1155_2: yathā so megho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo hutvā uṭṭhahitvā na kiñci vassi vigacchati,
atk-s0504a:1155_3: evameva yo uḷāraṃ vipulañca bhogaṃ saṃharitvā gehaṃ āvasanto kassaci kaṭacchumattaṃ
atk-s0504a:1155_4: bhikkhaṃ vā uḷuṅkamattaṃ yāguṃ vā adatvā vigacchati, vivaso maccuvasaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0504a:1155_5: so avuṭṭhikasamo nāma hotīti. Iminā nayena sesesupi nigamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Imesu ca
atk-s0504a:1155_6: tīsu puggalesu paṭhamo ekaṃseneva garahitabbo, dutiyo pasaṃsanīyo, tatiyo, pasaṃsanīyataro.
atk-s0504a:1155_7: Paṭhamo vā ekanteneva sabbanihīno, dutiyo majjhimo, tatiyo uttamoti veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1156_0: Gāthāsu samaṇeti upayogavasena bahuvacanaṃ tathā sesesupi. Laddhānāti labhitvā, samaṇe
atk-s0504a:1156_1: dakkhiṇeyye pavāretvā puṭṭho na saṃvibhajati. Annaṃ pānañca bhojananti annaṃ vā pānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1156_2: vā aññaṃ vā bhuñjitabbayuttakaṃ bhojanaṃ, taṃ na saṃvibhajati. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho
atk-s0504a:1156_3: – yo atthikabhāvena upagate sampaṭiggāhake labhitvā annādinā saṃvibhāgamattampi na
atk-s0504a:1156_4: karoti, kiṃ so aññaṃ dānaṃ dassati, taṃ evarūpaṃ thaddhamacchariyaṃ purisādhamaṃ
atk-s0504a:1157_0: Ekaccānaṃ na dadātīti vijjamānepi mahati dātabbadhamme ekesaṃ sattānaṃ tesu kodhavasena
atk-s0504a:1157_1: vā, deyyadhamme lobhavasena vā na dadāti. Ekaccānaṃ pavecchatīti ekesaṃyeva pana
atk-s0504a:1158_0: Subhikkhavācoti yo upagatānaṃ yācakānaṃ “annaṃ detha, pānaṃ dethā”tiādinā taṃ taṃ
atk-s0504a:1158_1: dāpeti, so sulabhabhikkhatāya subhikkhā vācā etassāti subhikkhavāco. “Subhikkhavassī”tipi
atk-s0504a:1158_2: paṭhanti. Yathā loko subhikkho hoti, evaṃ sabbatthābhivassitamahāmegho subhikkhavassī
atk-s0504a:1158_3: nāma hoti. Evamayampi mahādānehi sabbatthābhivassī subhikkhavassīti. Āmodamāno pakiretīti
atk-s0504a:1158_4: tuṭṭhahaṭṭhamānaso sahatthena dānaṃ dento paṭiggāhakakhette deyyadhammaṃ pakirento
atk-s0504a:1159_0: Idāni naṃ subhikkhavassitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yathāpi megho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho
atk-s0504a:1159_1: – yathā mahāmegho paṭhamaṃ mandanigghosena thanayitvā puna sakalanadīkandarāni ekaninnādaṃ
atk-s0504a:1159_2: karonto gajjayitvā pavassati, sabbatthakameva vārinā udakena thalaṃ ninnañca abhisandanto
atk-s0504a:1159_3: pūreti ekoghaṃ karoti, evameva idha imasmiṃ sattaloke ekacco uḷārapuggalo sabbasamatāya
atk-s0504a:1159_4: so mahāmegho viya vassitabbattā tādiso yathā dhanaṃ uṭṭhānādhigataṃ attano uṭṭhānavīriyābhinibbattaṃ
atk-s0504a:1159_5: hoti, evaṃ analaso hutvā tañca dhammena ñāyena saṃharitvā tannibbattena annena pānena
atk-s0504a:1159_6: aññena ca deyyadhammena patte sampatte vanibbake sammā sammadeva desakālānurūpañceva
atk-s0504a:1162_0: 76. Sattame sukhānīti sukhanimittāni. Patthayamānoti icchamāno ākaṅkhamāno. Sīlanti
atk-s0504a:1162_1: gahaṭṭhasīlaṃ pabbajitasīlañca. Gahaṭṭho ce gahaṭṭhasīlaṃ, pabbajito ce catupārisuddhisīlanti
atk-s0504a:1162_2: adhippāyo. Rakkheyyāti samādiyitvā avītikkamanto sammadeva gopeyya. Pasaṃsā me āgacchatūti
atk-s0504a:1162_3: “mama kalyāṇo kittisaddo āgacchatū”ti icchanto paṇḍito sappañño sīlaṃ rakkheyya.
atk-s0504a:1162_4: Sīlavato hi gahaṭṭhassa tāva “asuko asukakulassa putto sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo saddho
atk-s0504a:1162_5: pasanno dāyako kārako”tiādinā parisamajjhe kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, pabbajitassa
atk-s0504a:1162_6: “asuko nāma bhikkhu sīlavā vattasampanno sorato sukhasaṃvāso sagāravo sappatisso”tiādinā…pe…
atk-s0504a:1163: “Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, sīlavato sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1165: “Ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu – ‘sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo cassaṃ manāpo, garu ca bhāvanīyo cā’ti, sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:1166_0: Bhogā me uppajjantūti ettha gahaṭṭhassa tāva sīlavato kalyāṇadhammassa yena yena
atk-s0504a:1166_1: sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ kappeti – yadi kasiyā, yadi vaṇijjāya, yadi rājaporisena, taṃ
atk-s0504a:1166_2: taṃ yathākālaṃ yathāvidhiñca ativiya appamattabhāvato athassa anuppannā ceva bhogā
atk-s0504a:1166_3: uppajjanti, uppannā ca bhogā phātiṃ gamissanti. Pabbajitassa pana sīlācārasampannassa
atk-s0504a:1166_4: appamādavihārissa sato sīlasampannassa sīlasampadāya appicchatādiguṇesu ca pasannā
atk-s0504a:1166_5: manussā uḷāruḷāre paccaye abhiharanti, evamassa anuppannā ceva bhogā uppajjanti,
atk-s0504a:1166_6: uppannā ca thirā honti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1167: “Puna caparaṃ, gahapatayo, sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1169: “Ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu – ‘lābhī assa cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāna’nti, sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”ti ca –
atk-s0504a:1171_0: Gāthāsu patthayānoti patthayanto. Tayo sukheti tīṇi sukhāni. Vittalābhanti dhanalābhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1171_1: bhoguppattinti attho. Visesato cettha pasaṃsāya cetasikasukhaṃ, bhogehi kāyikasukhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1171_2: itarena upapattisukhaṃ; tathā paṭhamena diṭṭhadhammasukhaṃ, tatiyena samparāyasukhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1172_0: Idāni pasaṃsādikāraṇassa sīlassa viya pasaṃsādīnampi visesakāraṇaṃ pāpamittaparivajjanaṃ
atk-s0504a:1172_2: saṅkiyoti pāpasmiṃ parisaṅkitabbo “addhā iminā pāpaṃ kataṃ vā karissati vā, tathā
atk-s0504a:1172_3: hesa pāpapurisehi saddhiṃ sañcaratī”ti. Assāti imassa pāpajanasevino puggalassa upari,
atk-s0504a:1172_4: assa vā puggalassa avaṇṇo abhūtopi pāpajanasevitāya ruhati virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati
atk-s0504a:1172_5: pattharati. Assāti vā bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ, tasmiṃ puggaleti attho. Sa ve tādisako
atk-s0504a:1172_6: hotīti yo yādisaṃ pāpamittaṃ vā kalyāṇamittaṃ vā bhajati upasevati ca, so puggalo
atk-s0504a:1172_7: bhūmibhāgavasena udakaṃ viya tādisova hoti, pāpadhammo kalyāṇadhammo vā hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0504a:1172_8: Sahavāso hi tādiso; yasmā sahavāso saṃsaggo uparāgo viya phalikamaṇīsu purisaupanissayabhūtaṃ
atk-s0504a:1172_9: puggalākāraṃ gāhāpeti, tasmā pāpapuggalena saha vāso na kātabboti adhippāyo.
atk-s0504a:1173_0: Sevamāno sevamānanti paraṃ pakatisuddhaṃ puggalaṃ kālena kālaṃ attānaṃ sevamānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1173_1: sevamāno bhajamāno pāpapuggalo, tena vā seviyamāno. Samphuṭṭho samphusanti tena pakatisuddhena
atk-s0504a:1173_2: puggalena sahavāsena saṃsaggena samphuṭṭho pāpapuggalo sayampi, tathā taṃ phusanto.
atk-s0504a:1173_3: Saro diddho kalāpaṃ vāti yathā nāma saro visena diddho litto sarakalāpagato sarasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0504a:1173_4: sarakalāpaṃ attanā phuṭṭhaṃ alittampi upalimpati, evaṃ pāpena upalepabhayā dhīroti
atk-s0504a:1173_5: dhitisampannattā dhīro paṇḍitapuriso pāpasahāyo na bhaveyya.
atk-s0504a:1174_0: Pūtimacchaṃ kusaggenāti yathā kucchitabhāvena pūtibhūtaṃ macchaṃ kusatiṇaggena yo
atk-s0504a:1174_1: puriso upanayhati puṭabandhavasena bandhati, tassa te kusā apūtikāpi pūtimacchasambandhena
atk-s0504a:1174_2: pūti duggandhameva vāyanti. Evaṃ bālūpasevanāti evaṃsampadā bālajanūpasevanā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0504a:1174_3: Evaṃ dhīrūpasevanāti yathā asurabhinopi pattā tagarasambandhena surabhiṃ vāyanti,
atk-s0504a:1174_4: evaṃ paṇḍitūpasevanā pakatiyā asīlavato sīlasamādānādivasena sīlagandhavāyanassa kāraṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:1175_0: Tasmāti yasmā akalyāṇamittasevanāya kalyāṇamittasevanāya ca ayaṃ ediso ādīnavo ānisaṃso
atk-s0504a:1175_1: ca, tasmā pattapuṭasseva palāsapuṭassa viya duggandhasugandhavatthusaṃsaggena asādhusādhujanasannissayena
atk-s0504a:1175_2: ca. Ñatvā sampākamattanoti attano dukkhudrayaṃ sukhudrayañca phalanipphattiṃ ñatvā
atk-s0504a:1175_3: jānitvā asante pāpamitte na upaseveyya, sante upasante vantadose pasatthe vā paṇḍite
atk-s0504a:1175_4: seveyya. Tathā hi asanto nirayaṃ nenti, santo pāpenti suggatinti. Iti bhagavā paṭhamagāthāya
atk-s0504a:1175_5: yathāvuttāni tīṇi sukhanimittāni dassetvā tato parāhi pañcahi gāthāhi paṭipakkhaparivajjanena
atk-s0504a:1175_6: saddhiṃ pasaṃsāsukhassa āgamanaṃ dassetvā osānagāthāya tiṇṇampi sukhānaṃ āgamanakāraṇena
atk-s0504a:1178_0: 77. Aṭṭhame bhidurāyanti bhiduro ayaṃ. Kāyoti rūpakāyo. So hi aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca
atk-s0504a:1178_1: samūhaṭṭhena, evaṃ kucchitānaṃ jegucchānaṃ āyo uppattidesotipi kāyo. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho
atk-s0504a:1178_2: – āyanti etthāti āyo. Ke āyanti? Kucchitā kesādayo. Iti kucchitānaṃ āyotipi kāyo.
atk-s0504a:1178_3: Atthato pana catusantativasena pavattamānānaṃ bhūtupādāyadhammānaṃ puñjo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:1178_4: hoti – bhikkhave, ayaṃ catumahābhūtamayo rūpakāyo bhiduro bhedanasīlo bhedanasabhāvo
atk-s0504a:1178_5: khaṇe khaṇe viddhaṃsanasabhāvoti. “Bhindarāya”ntipi pāṭho, so evattho. Viññāṇanti
atk-s0504a:1178_6: tebhūmakaṃ kusalādicittaṃ. Vacanattho pana – taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1178_7: Yañhi sañjānanapajānanavidhuraṃ ārammaṇavijānanaṃ upaladdhi, taṃ viññāṇaṃ. Virāgadhammanti
atk-s0504a:1178_8: virajjanadhammaṃ, palujjanasabhāvanti attho. Sabbe upadhīti khandhūpadhi, kilesūpadhi,
atk-s0504a:1178_9: abhisaṅkhārūpadhi, pañcakāmaguṇūpadhīti ete “upadhīyati ettha dukkha”nti upadhisaññitā
atk-s0504a:1178_11: udayabbayappaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā, jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbasabhāvatāya
atk-s0504a:1178_13: viññāṇañca visuṃ gahetvā puna upadhivibhāgena sabbepi tebhūmakadhamme ekajjhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0504a:1178_15: Kāmañcettha lakkhaṇadvayameva pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ, “yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattā”ti pana vacanato
atk-s0504a:1179_0: Gāthāyaṃ upadhīsu bhayaṃ disvāti upadhīsu bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇavasena bhayaṃ disvā,
atk-s0504a:1179_1: tesaṃ bhāyitabbataṃ passitvā. Iminā balavavipassanaṃ dasseti. Bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇameva
atk-s0504a:1179_2: hi vibhajitvā visesavasena ādīnavānupassanā nibbidānupassanāti ca vuccati. Jātimaraṇamaccagāti
atk-s0504a:1179_3: evaṃ sammasanto vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggena ghaṭetvā maggaparamparāya arahattaṃ patto
atk-s0504a:1179_4: jātimaraṇaṃ atīto nāma hoti. Kathaṃ? Sampatvā paramaṃ santinti paramaṃ uttamaṃ anuttaraṃ
atk-s0504a:1179_5: santiṃ sabbasaṅkhārūpasamaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigantvā. Evaṃbhūto ca kālaṃ kaṅkhati bhāvitattoti
atk-s0504a:1179_7: bhāvitatto maraṇaṃ jīvitañca anabhinandanto kevalaṃ attano khandhaparinibbānakālaṃ
atk-s0504a:1179_8: kaṅkhati udikkhati, na tassa katthaci patthanā hotīti. Tenāha –
atk-s0504a:1184_0: 78. Navame dhātusoti dhātuto. Dhātūti ca ajjhāsayadhātu ajjhāsayasabhāvo adhippeto,
atk-s0504a:1184_1: yo adhimuttītipi vuccati. Saṃsandantīti tāya dhātusabhāgatāya yathādhātu yathāajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1184_2: allīyanti ekato honti. Samentīti tāya eva samānajjhāsayatāya ekacittā hutvā samāgacchanti
atk-s0504a:1184_3: aññamaññaṃ bhajanti upasaṅkamanti, attano rucibhāvakhantidiṭṭhiyo vā tattha tattha
atk-s0504a:1184_4: same karontā pavattanti. Hīnādhimuttikāti hīne kāmaguṇādike adhimutti etesanti hīnādhimuttikā,
atk-s0504a:1184_5: hīnajjhāsayā. Kalyāṇādhimuttikāti kalyāṇe nekkhammādike adhimutti etesanti kalyāṇādhimuttikā,
atk-s0504a:1184_6: paṇītajjhāsayā. Sace hi ācariyupajjhāyā na sīlavanto, antevāsikasaddhivihārikā ca
atk-s0504a:1184_7: sīlavanto, te ācariyupajjhāyepi na upasaṅkamanti, attano sadise sāruppabhikkhūyeva
atk-s0504a:1184_8: upasaṅkamanti. Sace pana ācariyupajjhāyā sīlavanto, itare na sīlavanto, tepi na ācariyupajjhāye
atk-s0504a:1184_9: upasaṅkamanti, attano sadise hīnādhimuttikeyeva upasaṅkamanti. Evaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ
atk-s0504a:1184_10: pana na kevalaṃ etarahi eva, atha kho atītānāgatepīti dassento “atītampi, bhikkhave”tiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:1184_11: Saṅkhepato saṃkilesadhammesu abhiniviṭṭhā hīnādhimuttikā, vodānadhammesu abhiniviṭṭhā kalyāṇādhimuttikā.
atk-s0504a:1185_0: Idaṃ pana dussīlānaṃ dussīlasevanameva, sīlavantānaṃ sīlavantasevanameva, duppaññānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1185_1: duppaññasevanameva, paññavantānaṃ paññavantasevanameva ko niyāmetīti? Ajjhāsayadhātu
atk-s0504a:1185_2: niyāmeti. Sambahulā kira bhikkhū ekasmiṃ gāme bhikkhācāraṃ caranti. Te manussā bahuṃ
atk-s0504a:1185_3: bhattaṃ āharitvā pattāni pūretvā “yathāsabhāgaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti vatvā uyyojesuṃ.
atk-s0504a:1185_4: Bhikkhū āhaṃsu “āvuso, manussā dhātusaṃyuttakamme payojentī”ti. Evaṃ ajjhāsayadhātu
atk-s0504a:1185_5: niyāmetīti. Dhātusaṃyuttena ayamattho dīpetabbo – gijjhakūṭapabbatasmiñhi gilānaseyyāya
atk-s0504a:1185_6: nipanno bhagavā ārakkhatthāya parivāretvā vasantesu sāriputtamoggallānādīsu ekamekaṃ
atk-s0504a:1185_7: attano parisāya saddhiṃ caṅkamantaṃ oloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi “passatha no tumhe,
atk-s0504a:1185_8: bhikkhave, sāriputtaṃ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ caṅkamantanti. Evaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0504a:1185_9: Sabbe kho ete, bhikkhave, bhikkhū mahāpaññā”ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1186_0: Gāthāsu saṃsaggāti saṃkilesato sahavāsādivasena samāyogato, atha vā dassanasaṃsaggo,
atk-s0504a:1186_1: savanasaṃsaggo, samullāpasaṃsaggo, sambhogasaṃsaggo, kāyasaṃsaggoti evaṃ pañcavidhe
atk-s0504a:1186_2: saṃsagge yato kutoci saṃsaggato. Vanatho jātoti kileso uppanno maggena asamūhato.
atk-s0504a:1186_3: Asaṃsaggena chijjatīti saṃsaggapaṭikkhepena kāyavivekādinā pubbabhāge chijjitvā puna
atk-s0504a:1186_4: accantāsaṃsaggena samucchedavivekena chijjati pahīyati. Ettāvatā saṅkhepato hīnādhimuttiyā
atk-s0504a:1187_0: Yasmā pana te saṃsaggā te ca kilesā kosajjavasena uppajjanti ceva vaḍḍhanti ca, na
atk-s0504a:1187_1: vīriyārambhavasena, tasmā hīnādhimuttike kusītapuggale vajjetvā kalyāṇādhimuttike
atk-s0504a:1187_2: āraddhavīriye sevantena asaṃsaggena saṃsaggajo vanatho chinditabboti yathāvuttamatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:1187_3: vitthārato dassento kusītasevanāya tāva ādīnavaṃ pakāsetuṃ “parittaṃ dāru”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:1188_0: Tattha parittaṃ dārunti khuddakaṃ kaṭṭhamayaṃ kullaṃ. Yathā sīde mahaṇṇaveti yathā
atk-s0504a:1188_1: khuddakaṃ kullaṃ āruhitvā mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo tīraṃ appatvā samuddamajjheyeva
atk-s0504a:1188_2: sīdeyya, patitvā macchakacchapabhakkho bhaveyya. Evaṃ kusītaṃ āgamma, sādhujīvīpi
atk-s0504a:1188_3: sīdatīti evameva kusītaṃ vīriyārambharahitaṃ kilesavasikaṃ puggalaṃ nissāya tena
atk-s0504a:1188_4: katasaṃsaggo sādhujīvīpi parisuddhājīvo parisuddhasīlopi samāno hīnasaṃsaggato uppannehi
atk-s0504a:1188_5: kāmavitakkādīhi khajjamāno pāraṃ gantuṃ asamattho saṃsāraṇṇaveyeva sīdati. Tasmāti
atk-s0504a:1188_6: yasmā evaṃ anatthāvaho kusītasaṃsaggo, tasmā taṃ āgamma ālasiyānuyogena kucchitaṃ
atk-s0504a:1188_7: sīdatīti kusītaṃ. Tato eva hīnavīriyaṃ nibbīriyaṃ akalyāṇamittaṃ parivajjeyya. Ekanteneva
atk-s0504a:1188_8: pana kāyavivekādīnañceva tadaṅgavivekādīnañca vasena pavivittehi, tato eva kilesehi
atk-s0504a:1188_9: ārakattā ariyehi parisuddhehi nibbānaṃ paṭipesitattabhāvato pahitattehi ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1188_10: vasena jhāyanato jhāyīhi sabbakālaṃ paggahitavīriyatāya āraddhavīriyehi paṇḍitehi
atk-s0504a:1191_0: 79. Dasame parihānāya saṃvattantīti avuddhiyā bhavanti, maggādhigamassa paripanthāya
atk-s0504a:1191_1: honti. Adhigatassa pana maggassa parihāni nāma natthi. “Tayo dhammā”ti dhammādhiṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0504a:1191_2: uddiṭṭhadhamme puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vibhajanto “idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhū”tiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:1192_0: Tattha kammaṃ āramitabbato ārāmo etassāti kammārāmo. Kamme ratoti kammarato. Kammārāmataṃ
atk-s0504a:1192_1: kammābhiratiṃ anuyutto payuttoti kammārāmatamanuyutto. Tattha kammaṃ nāma itikattabbaṃ
atk-s0504a:1192_2: kammaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – cīvaravicāraṇaṃ, cīvarakaraṇaṃ, upatthambhanaṃ, pattatthavikaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1192_3: aṃsabandhanaṃ, kāyabandhanaṃ, dhamakaraṇaṃ, ādhārakaṃ, pādakathalikaṃ, sammajjanīti
atk-s0504a:1192_4: evamādīnaṃ upakaraṇānaṃ karaṇaṃ, yañca vihāre khaṇḍaphullādipaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ. Ekacco
atk-s0504a:1192_5: hi etāni karonto sakaladivasaṃ etāneva karoti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yo pana etesaṃ
atk-s0504a:1192_6: karaṇavelāyameva etāni karoti, uddesavelāyaṃ uddesaṃ gaṇhāti, sajjhāyavelāyaṃ sajjhāyati,
atk-s0504a:1192_8: karoti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhāne vā pārihāriyakammaṭṭhāne vā, na so kammārāmo nāma. Tassa taṃ –
atk-s0504a:1193: “Yāni kho pana tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni kiṃkaraṇīyāni, tattha dakkho hoti analaso, tatrupāyāya vīmaṃsāya samannāgato, alaṃ kātuṃ alaṃ saṃvidhātu”nti –
atk-s0504a:1195_0: Bhassārāmoti yo bhagavatā paṭikkhittarājakathādivasena rattindivaṃ vītināmeti, ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1195_1: bhasse pariyantakārī na hotīti bhassārāmo nāma. Yo pana rattimpi divāpi dhammaṃ katheti,
atk-s0504a:1195_2: pañhaṃ vissajjeti, ayaṃ appabhasso bhasse pariyantakārīyeva. Kasmā? “Sannipatitānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1195_3: vo, bhikkhave, dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ – dhammī vā kathā, ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo”ti vuttavidhiṃyeva paṭipannoti.
atk-s0504a:1196_0: Niddārāmoti yo yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ, passasukhaṃ, middhasukhaṃ
atk-s0504a:1196_1: anuyuñjati, yo ca gacchantopi nisinnopi ṭhitopi thinamiddhābhibhūto niddāyati, ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1196_2: niddārāmo nāma. Yassa pana karajakāyagelaññena cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati, nāyaṃ niddārāmo, tenevāha –
atk-s0504a:1197_0: “Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, aggivessana, gimhānaṃ pacchime māse pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto
atk-s0504a:1197_1: catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno niddaṃ okkamitā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1198_0: Ettha ca puthujjanakalyāṇakopi sekhotveva veditabbo. Tasmā tassa sabbassapi visesādhigamassa
atk-s0504a:1198_1: itaresaṃ upari visesādhigamassa ca parihānāya vattantīti veditabbaṃ. Sukkapakkhassa
atk-s0504a:1199_0: Gāthāsu uddhatoti cittavikkhepakarena uddhaccena uddhato avūpasanto. Appakiccassāti
atk-s0504a:1199_1: anuññātassapi vuttappakārassa kiccassa yuttappayuttakāleyeva karaṇato appakicco assa
atk-s0504a:1199_3: niddārahito assa. Anuddhatoti bhassārāmatāya uppajjanakacittavikkhepassa abhassārāmo
atk-s0504a:1199_4: hutvā parivajjanena na uddhato vūpasantacitto, samāhitoti attho. Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayattā
atk-s0504a:1204_0: 80. Catutthavaggassa paṭhame akusalavitakkāti akosallasambhūtā vitakkā, micchāvitakkāti
atk-s0504a:1204_1: attho. Anavaññattipaṭisaṃyuttoti ettha anavaññattīti anavaññā parehi attano ahīḷitatā
atk-s0504a:1204_2: aparibhūtatā, “aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyu”nti evaṃ pavatto icchācāro, tāya anavaññattiyā
atk-s0504a:1204_3: paṭisaṃyutto saṃsaṭṭho, taṃ vā ārabbha pavatto anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakko. Tasmā
atk-s0504a:1204_4: “kathaṃ nu kho maṃ pare gahaṭṭhā ceva pabbajitā ca na orakato daheyyu”nti sambhāvanakamyatāya
atk-s0504a:1204_6: cīvarādilābhena ceva sakkārena ca kittisaddena ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭisaṃyutto.
atk-s0504a:1205_0: “Saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi brāhmaṇehi gahapatikehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi
atk-s0504a:1205_1: sahanandī sahasokī, sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu
atk-s0504a:1206_0: Gāthāsu anavaññattiyā paṭisaṃyutto puggalo anavaññattisaṃyutto. Lābhasakkāre gāravo
atk-s0504a:1206_1: etassa, na dhammeti lābhasakkāragāravo. Sukhadukkhesu amā saha bhavāti amaccā, sahāyasadisā
atk-s0504a:1206_2: upaṭṭhākā. Tehi gehasitapemavasena saha nandanasīlo sahanandī amaccehi, iminā parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0504a:1206_3: vitakkaṃ dasseti. Ārā saṃyojanakkhayāti imehi tīhi vitakkehi abhibhūto puggalo saṃyojanakkhayato
atk-s0504a:1206_4: arahattato dūre, tassa taṃ dullabhanti attho.
atk-s0504a:1207_0: Puttapasunti putte ca pasavo ca. Puttasaddena cettha dārādayo; pasusaddena assamahiṃsakhettavatthādayo
atk-s0504a:1207_1: ca saṅgahitā. Vivāheti vivāhakārāpane. Iminā āvāhopi saṅgahito. Saṃharānīti pariggahāni,
atk-s0504a:1207_2: parikkhārasaṅgahānīti attho. “Santhavānī”ti ca paṭhanti, mittasanthavānīti attho.
atk-s0504a:1207_3: Sabbattha hitvāti sambandho. Bhabbo so tādiso bhikkhūti so yathāvuttaṃ sabbaṃ papañcaṃ
atk-s0504a:1207_4: pariccajitvā yathā satthārā vuttāya sammāpaṭipattiyā, tathā passitabbato tādiso saṃsāre
atk-s0504a:1207_5: bhayaṃ ikkhatīti bhikkhu uttamaṃ sambodhiṃ arahattaṃ pattuṃ arahati.
atk-s0504a:1210_0: 81. Dutiye sakkārenāti sakkārena hetubhūtena, atha vā sakkārenāti sakkārahetunā,
atk-s0504a:1210_1: sakkārahetukena vā. Sakkārañhi nissāya idhekacce puggalā pāpicchā icchāpakatā icchācāre
atk-s0504a:1210_2: ṭhatvā “sakkāraṃ nibbattessāmā”ti anekavihitaṃ anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjitvā ito
atk-s0504a:1210_3: cutā apāyesu nibbattanti, apare yathāsakkāraṃ labhitvā tannimittaṃ mānamadamacchariyādivasena
atk-s0504a:1210_4: pamādaṃ āpajjitvā ito cutā apāyesu nibbattanti. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “sakkārena
atk-s0504a:1210_5: abhibhūtā pariyādinnacittā”ti. Tattha abhibhūtāti ajjhotthaṭā. Pariyādinnacittāti
atk-s0504a:1210_6: khepitacittā, icchācārena mānamadādinā ca khayaṃ pāpitakusalacittā. Atha vā pariyādinnacittāti
atk-s0504a:1210_7: parito ādinnacittā, vuttappakārena akusalakoṭṭhāsena yathā kusalacittassa uppattivāro
atk-s0504a:1210_8: na hoti, evaṃ samantato gahitacittasantānāti attho. Asakkārenāti hīḷetvā paribhavitvā
atk-s0504a:1210_9: parehi attani pavattitena asakkārena hetunā, asakkārahetukena vā mānādinā. Sakkārena
atk-s0504a:1210_10: ca asakkārena cāti kehici pavattitena sakkārena kehici pavattitena asakkārena ca.
atk-s0504a:1210_11: Ye hi kehici paṭhamaṃ sakkatā hutvā tehiyeva asārabhāvaṃ ñatvā pacchā asakkatā honti,
atk-s0504a:1210_12: tādise sandhāya vuttaṃ “sakkārena ca asakkārena cā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1211: Ettha sakkārena abhibhūtā devadattādayo nidassetabbā. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1212: “Phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti, phalaṃ veḷuṃ phalaṃ naḷaṃ;
atk-s0504a:1213: Sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti, gabbho assatariṃ yathā”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:1214: Sādhūnaṃ upari katena asakkārena abhibhūtā daṇḍakīrājakāliṅgarājamajjharājādayo nidassetabbā. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1225: Sakkārena ca asakkārena ca abhibhūtā aññatitthiyā nāṭaputtādayo nidassetabbā.
atk-s0504a:1226_0: Gāthāsu ubhayanti ubhayena sakkārena ca asakkārena ca. Samādhi na vikampatīti na
atk-s0504a:1226_1: calati, ekaggabhāvena tiṭṭhati. Kassa pana na calatīti āha “appamādavihārino”ti.
atk-s0504a:1226_2: Yo pamādakaradhammānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā appamādavihārī arahā, tassa. So
atk-s0504a:1226_3: hi lokadhammehi na vikampati. Sukhumadiṭṭhivipassakanti phalasamāpattiatthaṃ sukhumāya
atk-s0504a:1226_4: diṭṭhiyā paññāya abhiṇhaṃ pavattavipassanattā sukhumadiṭṭhivipassakaṃ. Upādānakkhayārāmanti
atk-s0504a:1226_5: catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ khayaṃ pariyosānabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ āramitabbaṃ etassāti upādānakkhayārāmaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1229_0: 82. Tatiye devesūti ṭhapetvā arūpāvacaradeve ceva asaññadeve ca tadaññesu upapattidevesu.
atk-s0504a:1229_1: Devasaddāti devānaṃ pītisamudāhārasaddā. Niccharantīti aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena
atk-s0504a:1229_2: pavattanti. Samayā samayaṃ upādāyāti samayato samayaṃ paṭicca. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
atk-s0504a:1229_3: yasmiṃ kāle ṭhitā te devā taṃ kālaṃ āgamma naṃ passissanti, tato taṃ samayaṃ sampattaṃ
atk-s0504a:1229_4: āgammāti. “Samayaṃ samayaṃ upādāyā”ti ca keci paṭhanti, tesaṃ taṃ taṃ samayaṃ paṭiccāti
atk-s0504a:1229_5: attho. Yasmiṃ samayeti yadā “aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā”tiādinā, “sambādho gharāvāso”tiādinā
atk-s0504a:1229_6: ca kāmesu gharāvāse ca ādīnavā, tappaṭipakkhato nekkhamme ānisaṃsā ca sudiṭṭhā honti,
atk-s0504a:1229_7: tasmiṃ samaye. Tadā hissa ekantena pabbajjāya cittaṃ namati. Ariyasāvakoti ariyassa
atk-s0504a:1229_8: buddhassa bhagavato sāvako, sāvakabhāvaṃ upagantukāmo, ariyasāvako vā avassaṃbhāvī.
atk-s0504a:1229_9: Antimabhavikaṃ sāvakabodhisattaṃ sandhāya ayamārambho. Kesamassuṃ ohāretvāti kese
atk-s0504a:1229_10: ca massuñca ohāretvā apanetvā. Kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvāti kasāyena rattatāya
atk-s0504a:1229_11: kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā
atk-s0504a:1229_12: ca. Agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāya cetetīti agārasmā gharā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1229_13: pabbajjaṃ pabbajeyyanti pabbajjāya ceteti pakappeti, pabbajatīti attho. Ettha ca
atk-s0504a:1229_14: yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati, tañca pabbajjāya natthi,
atk-s0504a:1230_0: Mārenāti kilesamārena. Saṅgāmāya cetetīti yujjhanatthāya cittaṃ uppādeti, māraṃ abhivijetuṃ
atk-s0504a:1230_1: sannayhati. Yasmā pana evarūpassa paṭipajjanakapuggalassa devaputtamāropi antarāyāya
atk-s0504a:1230_2: upakkamati, tasmā tassapi vasena mārenāti ettha devaputtamārenātipi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1230_3: Tassāpi ayaṃ icchāvighātaṃ karissatevāti. Yasmā pana pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya khuraggato
atk-s0504a:1230_4: vā paṭṭhāya sīlāni samādiyanto parisodhento samathavipassanāsu kammaṃ karonto yathārahaṃ
atk-s0504a:1230_5: tadaṅgappahānavikkhambhanappahānānaṃ vasena kilesamāraṃ paripāteti nāma, na yujjhati
atk-s0504a:1230_6: nāma sampahārassa abhāvato, tasmā vuttaṃ “mārena saddhiṃ saṅgāmāya cetetī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1231_0: Sattannanti koṭṭhāsato sattannaṃ, pabhedato pana te sattatiṃsa honti. Kathaṃ? Cattāro
atk-s0504a:1231_1: satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni,
atk-s0504a:1231_2: satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti. Evaṃ pabhedato sattatiṃsavidhāpi satipaṭṭhānādikoṭṭhāsato
atk-s0504a:1231_3: satteva hontīti vuttaṃ “sattanna”nti. Bodhipakkhiyānanti bujjhanaṭṭhena bodhīti laddhanāmassa
atk-s0504a:1231_4: ariyapuggalassa maggañāṇasseva vā pakkhe bhavānaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ, bodhikoṭṭhāsiyānanti
atk-s0504a:1231_5: attho. “Bodhipakkhikāna”ntipi pāṭho, bodhipakkhavantānaṃ, bodhipakkhe vā niyuttānanti
atk-s0504a:1231_7: Vipassanākkhaṇe hi satipaṭṭhānādayo pariyāyena bodhipakkhiyā nāma, maggakkhaṇeyeva
atk-s0504a:1231_8: pana te nippariyāyena bodhipakkhiyā nāma honti.
atk-s0504a:1232_0: Āsavānaṃ khayāti kāmāsavādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ āsavānaṃ khayā. Āsavesu hi khīṇesu sabbe
atk-s0504a:1232_1: kilesā khīṇāyeva honti. Tena arahattamaggo vutto hoti. Anāsavanti āsavavirahitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1232_2: Cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttinti ettha cetovacanena arahattaphalasamādhi, paññāvacanena
atk-s0504a:1232_3: taṃsampayuttā ca paññā vuttā. Tattha samādhi rāgato vimuttattā cetovimutti, paññā
atk-s0504a:1232_4: avijjāya vimuttattā paññāvimuttīti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0504a:1233: “Yo hissa, bhikkhave, samādhi, tadassa samādhindriyaṃ. Yā hissa, bhikkhave, paññā, tadassa paññindriyaṃ. Iti kho, bhikkhave, rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1234_0: Apicettha samathaphalaṃ cetovimutti, vipassanāphalaṃ paññāvimuttīti veditabbā. Diṭṭheva
atk-s0504a:1234_1: dhammeti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāyeva abhivisiṭṭhāya
atk-s0504a:1234_2: paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā aparappaccayena ñatvā. Upasampajja viharatīti pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0504a:1234_3: sampādetvā viharati. Tameva saṅgāmasīsaṃ abhivijiya ajjhāvasatīti māraṃ abhivijinitvā
atk-s0504a:1234_4: vijitavijayattā tena katasaṅgāmasaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa sīsabhūtaṃ arahattaphalasamāpattiissariyaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1234_5: abhibhavanto āvasati, samāpajjati icceva attho. Ime ca devasaddā diṭṭhasaccesu devesu
atk-s0504a:1235_0: Gāthāsu mahantanti sīlādiguṇamahattena mahantaṃ. Vītasāradanti sārajjakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1235_1: abhāvena vigatasārajjaṃ apagatamaṅkubhāvaṃ. Purisājaññāti assādīsu assājānīyādayo
atk-s0504a:1235_2: viya purisesu ājānīyabhūtā uttamapurisā. Dujjayamajjhabhūti pacurajanehi jetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1235_3: kilesavāhiniṃ abhibhavi ajjhotthari. “Ajjayī”tipi paṭhanti, ajinīti attho. Jetvāna
atk-s0504a:1235_4: maccuno senaṃ, vimokkhena anāvaranti lokattayābhibyāpanato diyaḍḍhasahassādivibhāgato
atk-s0504a:1235_5: ca vipulattā aññehi āvarituṃ paṭisedhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca anāvaraṃ, maccuno mārassa
atk-s0504a:1235_6: senaṃ vimokkhena ariyamaggena jetvā yo tvaṃ dujjayaṃ ajayi, tassa namo, te purisājaññāti sambandho.
atk-s0504a:1236_0: Itīti vuttappakārena. Hi-iti nipātamattaṃ. Etaṃ pattamānasaṃ adhigatārahattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ
atk-s0504a:1236_1: devatā namassantīti vuttamevatthaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti. Atha vā itīti iminā kāraṇena.
atk-s0504a:1236_2: Kiṃ pana etaṃ kāraṇaṃ? Namucisenāvijayena pattamānasattaṃ. Iminā kāraṇena taṃ devatā
atk-s0504a:1236_3: namassantīti attho. Idāni taṃ kāraṇaṃ phalato dassetuṃ “tañhi tassa na passanti,
atk-s0504a:1236_4: yena maccuvasaṃ vaje”ti vuttaṃ. Tassattho – yasmā tassa purisājaññassa paṇidhāya
atk-s0504a:1236_5: gavesantāpi devā aṇumattampi taṃ kāraṇaṃ na passanti, yena so maccuno maraṇassa vasaṃ
atk-s0504a:1236_6: vaje upagaccheyya. Tasmā taṃ visuddhidevā namassantīti.
atk-s0504a:1239_0: 83. Catutthe yadāti yasmiṃ kāle. Devoti upapattidevo. Tayo hi devā – sammutidevā,
atk-s0504a:1239_1: upapattidevā, visuddhidevāti. Tesu sammutidevā nāma rājāno khattiyā. Upapattidevā
atk-s0504a:1239_2: nāma cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya taduparidevā. Visuddhidevā nāma khīṇāsavā. Idha pana
atk-s0504a:1239_3: kāmāvacaradevo adhippeto. Tena vuttaṃ “devoti upapattidevo”ti. Devakāyāti devasamūhato,
atk-s0504a:1239_4: devaṭṭhānato vā, devalokatoti attho. Samūhanivāsavācako hi ayaṃ kāyasaddo. Cavanadhammoti
atk-s0504a:1239_5: maraṇadhammo, āyukkhayena vā puññakkhayena vā upaṭṭhitamaraṇoti attho.
atk-s0504a:1240_0: Pañcassa pubbanimittāni pātubhavantīti assa upaṭṭhitamaraṇassa devaputtassa pañca
atk-s0504a:1240_1: maraṇassa pubbanimittāni uppajjanti, pakāsāni vā honti. Mālā milāyantīti tena piḷandhitamālā
atk-s0504a:1240_2: majjhanhikasamaye ātape khittā viya milātā vihatasobhā honti.
atk-s0504a:1241_0: Vatthāni kilissantīti saradasamaye vigatavalāhake ākāse abbhussakkamānabālasūriyasadisappabhāni
atk-s0504a:1241_1: nānāvirāgavaṇṇāni tena nivatthapārutavatthāni taṃ khaṇaṃyeva kaddame khipitvā madditāni
atk-s0504a:1242_0: Kacchehi sedā muccantīti suparisuddhajātimaṇi viya susikkhitasippācariyaracitasuvaṇṇapaṭimā
atk-s0504a:1242_1: viya ca pubbe sedamalajallikārahitasarīrassa tasmiṃ khaṇe ubhohi kacchehi sedadhārā
atk-s0504a:1242_2: sandanti paggharanti. Na kevalañca kacchehiyeva, sakalasarīratopi panassa sedajalakaṇṇikā
atk-s0504a:1242_3: muccatiyeva, yena āmuttamuttājālagavacchito viya tassa kāyo hoti.
atk-s0504a:1243_0: Kāye dubbaṇṇiyaṃ okkamatīti pubbe paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yathānubhāvaṃ ekayojanaṃ
atk-s0504a:1243_1: dviyojanaṃ yāva dvādasayojanamattampi padesaṃ ābhāya pharitvā vijjotamāno kāyo hoti
atk-s0504a:1243_2: khaṇḍiccapāliccādivirahito, na sītaṃ na uṇhaṃ upaghātakaṃ, devadhītā soḷasavassuddesikā
atk-s0504a:1243_3: viya hoti, devaputto vīsativassuddesiko viya, taṃ khaṇaṃyeva nippabhe nitteje kāye
atk-s0504a:1244_0: Sake devo devāsane nābhiramatīti attano accharāgaṇehi saddhiṃ kīḷanaparicaraṇakadibbāsane
atk-s0504a:1244_1: na ramati, na cittassādaṃ labhati. Tassa kira manussagaṇanāya sattahi divasehi maraṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:1244_2: bhavissatīti imāni pubbanimittāni pātubhavanti. So tesaṃ uppattiyā “evarūpāya nāma
atk-s0504a:1244_3: sampattiyā vinā bhavissāmī”ti balavasokābhibhūto hoti. Tenassa kāye mahāpariḷāho
atk-s0504a:1244_4: uppajjati, tena sabbato gattehi sedā muccanti. Cirataraṃ kālaṃ aparicitadukkho taṃ
atk-s0504a:1244_5: adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto ekacco “dayhāmi dayhāmī”ti kandanto paridevanto katthaci assādaṃ
atk-s0504a:1244_6: alabhanto vijappanto vilapanto tahiṃ tahiṃ āhiṇḍati. Ekacco satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā kāyavācāhi
atk-s0504a:1244_7: vikāraṃ akarontopi piyavippayogadukkhaṃ asahanto vihaññamāno vicarati.
atk-s0504a:1245_0: Imāni pana pubbanimittāni yathā loke mahāpuññānaṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃyeva ukkāpātabhūmicālacandaggāhādīni
atk-s0504a:1245_1: nimittāni paññāyanti, na sabbesaṃ; evameva mahesakkhadevānaṃyeva paññāyati. Uppannāni
atk-s0504a:1245_2: ca tāni “imāni maraṇassa pubbanimittāni nāmā”ti keci devā jānanti, na sabbe. Tattha
atk-s0504a:1245_3: yo mandena kusalakammena nibbatto, so “idāni ko jānāti, ‘kuhiṃ nibbattissāmī”’ti
atk-s0504a:1245_4: bhāyati. Yo pana mahāpuñño, so “bahuṃ mayā dānaṃ dinnaṃ, sīlaṃ rakkhitaṃ, puññaṃ
atk-s0504a:1245_5: upacitaṃ, ito cutassa me sugatiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā”ti na bhāyati na vikampati. Evaṃ upaṭṭhitapubbanimittaṃ
atk-s0504a:1245_6: pana taṃ gahetvā devatā nandanavanaṃ pavesenti sabbadevalokesu nandanavanaṃ atthiyeva.
atk-s0504a:1246_0: Tīhi vācāhi anumodentīti idāni vuccamānehi tīhi vacanehi anumodenti, modaṃ pamodaṃ
atk-s0504a:1246_1: uppādenti, assāsenti, abhivadanavasena vā taṃkhaṇānurūpaṃ pamodaṃ karonti. Keci pana
atk-s0504a:1246_2: “anumodentī”ti padassa “ovadantī”ti vadanti. Itoti devalokato. Bhoti ālapanaṃ. Sugatinti
atk-s0504a:1246_3: sundaragatiṃ, manussalokaṃ sandhāya vadanti. Gacchāti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena upehi.
atk-s0504a:1247_0: Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ tadā tehi devehi tassa “ito bho sugatiṃ gacchā”tiādinā vattabbavacane
atk-s0504a:1247_1: bhagavatā vutte aññataro nāmagottena apākaṭo tassaṃ parisāyaṃ nisinno anusandhikusalo
atk-s0504a:1247_2: eko bhikkhu “ete sugatiādayo bhagavatā avisesato vuttā avibhūtā, handa te vibhūtatare
atk-s0504a:1247_3: kārāpessāmī”ti etaṃ “kiṃnu kho, bhante”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Saddhādiguṇavisesapaṭilābhakāraṇato
atk-s0504a:1247_4: devūpapattihetuto ca manussattaṃ devānaṃ abhisammatanti āha “manussattaṃ kho bhikkhu
atk-s0504a:1248_0: Sugatigamanasaṅkhātanti “sugatigamana”nti sammā kathitaṃ, vaṇṇitaṃ thomitanti attho.
atk-s0504a:1248_1: Yaṃ manussabhūtoti ettha yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, tena paṭilabhatīti ettha paṭilabhanakiriyā
atk-s0504a:1248_2: āmasīyati, yo saddhāpaṭilābhoti attho. Manussabhūtoti manussesu uppanno, manussabhāvaṃ
atk-s0504a:1248_3: vā patto. Yasmā devaloke uppannānaṃ tathāgatassa dhammadesanā yebhuyyena dullabhā
atk-s0504a:1248_4: savanāya, na tathā manussānaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “manussabhūto”ti. Tathāgatappavedite
atk-s0504a:1248_5: dhammavinayeti tathāgatena bhagavatā desite sikkhattayasaṅgahe sāsane. Tañhi dhammato
atk-s0504a:1248_6: anapetattā dhammo ca, āsayānurūpaṃ vineyyānaṃ vinayanato vinayo cāti dhammavinayo,
atk-s0504a:1248_7: upanissayasampattiyā vā dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ apparajakkhajātikaṃ vinetīti
atk-s0504a:1248_8: dhammavinayo. Dhammeneva vā vinayo, na daṇḍasatthehīti dhammavinayo, dhammayutto
atk-s0504a:1248_9: vā vinayoti dhammavinayo, dhammāya vā saha maggaphalanibbānāya vinayoti dhammavinayo,
atk-s0504a:1248_10: mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādidhammato vā pavatto vinayoti dhammavinayo. Dhammo vā bhagavā
atk-s0504a:1248_11: dhammabhūto dhammakāyo dhammassāmī, tassa dhammassa vinayo, na takkiyānanti dhammavinayo,
atk-s0504a:1248_12: dhamme vā maggaphale nipphādetabbavisayabhūte vā pavatto vinayoti dhammavinayoti
atk-s0504a:1249_0: Saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”tiādinā saddhaṃ uppādeti. Saddho
atk-s0504a:1249_1: hi imasmiṃ dhammavinaye yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthe
atk-s0504a:1249_3: sattānaṃ upabhogasukhaṃ āvahati, khuppipāsādidukkhaṃ paṭibāhati, dhanadāliddiyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1249_4: vūpasameti, muttādiratanapaṭilābhahetu hoti, lokasantatiñca āvahati; evaṃ lokiyalokuttarā
atk-s0504a:1249_5: saddhāpi yathāsambhavaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ vipākasukhamāvahati, saddhādhurena paṭipannānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1251: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:1252_0: Evaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhassa suladdhalābhatā veditabbā. Yasmā panāyaṃ saddhāpaṭilābho
atk-s0504a:1252_1: anugāmiko anaññasādhāraṇo sabbasampattihetu, lokiyassa ca hiraññasuvaṇṇādidhanalābhassa
atk-s0504a:1252_2: kāraṇaṃ. Saddhoyeva hi dānādīni puññāni katvā uḷāruḷāravittūpakaraṇāni adhigacchati,
atk-s0504a:1252_3: tehi ca attano paresañca atthameva sampādeti. Assaddhassa pana tāni anatthāvahāni
atk-s0504a:1252_4: honti, idha ceva samparāye cāti, evampi saddhāya suladdhalābhatā veditabbā. Tathā hi –
atk-s0504a:1260: Anekesu ṭhānesu anekehi kāraṇehi saddhā saṃvaṇṇitā.
atk-s0504a:1261_0: Idāni yāya saddhāya sāsane kusaladhammesu suppatiṭṭhito nāma hoti niyāmokkantiyā,
atk-s0504a:1261_1: taṃ saddhaṃ dassetuṃ “sā kho panassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha assāti imassa bhaveyyāti
atk-s0504a:1261_2: attho. Niviṭṭhāti abhiniviṭṭhā cittasantānaṃ anupaviṭṭhā. Mūlajātāti jātamūlā. Kiṃ
atk-s0504a:1261_3: pana saddhāya mūlaṃ nāma? Saddheyyavatthusmiṃ okappanahetubhūto upāyamanasikāro.
atk-s0504a:1261_5: cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni mūlāni veditabbāni. Patiṭṭhitāti ariyamaggādhigamena kenaci
atk-s0504a:1261_6: akampanīyabhāvena avaṭṭhitā. Tenevāha “daḷhā asaṃhāriyā”ti. Daḷhāti thirā. Asaṃhāriyāti
atk-s0504a:1261_7: kenaci saṃharituṃ vā hāpetuṃ vā apanetuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyā. Iti te devā tassa sotāpattimaggasamadhigamaṃ
atk-s0504a:1261_8: āsīsantā evaṃ vadanti. Attano devaloke kāmasukhūpabhogārahameva hi ariyapuggalaṃ
atk-s0504a:1262_0: Gāthāsu puññakkhayamaraṇampi jīvitindriyupacchedeneva hotīti āha “cavati āyusaṅkhayā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1262_1: Anumodatanti anumodantānaṃ. Manussānaṃ sahabyatanti manussehi sahabhāvaṃ. Saha byetīti
atk-s0504a:1262_2: sahabyo, sahapavattanako, tassa bhāvo sahabyatā. Niviṭṭhassāti niviṭṭhā bhaveyya.
atk-s0504a:1262_3: Yāvajīvanti yāva jīvitappavattiyā, yāva parinibbānāti attho.
atk-s0504a:1263_0: Appamāṇanti sakkaccaṃ bahuṃ uḷāraṃ bahukkhattuñca karaṇavasena pamāṇarahitaṃ. Nirūpadhinti
atk-s0504a:1263_1: kilesūpadhirahitaṃ, suvisuddhaṃ nimmalanti attho. Yasmā pana te devā mahaggatakusalaṃ
atk-s0504a:1263_2: na icchanti kāmalokasamatikkamanato, kāmāvacarapuññameva icchanti, tasmā evamettha
atk-s0504a:1263_3: attho veditabbo – “ito devalokato cuto manussesu uppajjitvā viññutaṃ patto kāyaduccaritādiṃ
atk-s0504a:1263_4: sabbaṃ duccaritaṃ pahāya kāyasucaritādiṃ sabbaṃ sucaritaṃ uḷāraṃ vipulaṃ upacinitvā
atk-s0504a:1263_5: ariyamaggena āgatasaddho bhavāhī”ti. Yasmā pana lokuttaresu paṭhamamaggaṃ dutiyamaggampi
atk-s0504a:1263_6: vā icchanti attano devalokūpapattiyā anativattanato, tasmā tesampi vasena “appamāṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:1263_8: upacchedena appamāṇaṃ, sattamabhavato vā uppajjanārahassa khandhūpadhissa taṃnibbattakaabhisaṅkhārūpadhissa
atk-s0504a:1263_9: taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesūpadhissa ca pahānena tesaṃ anibbattanato nirupadhisaṅkhātanibbānasannissitattā ca nirupadhīti.
atk-s0504a:1264_0: Evaṃ accantameva apāyadvārapidhāyakaṃ kammaṃ dassetvā idāni saggasampattinibbattakakammaṃ
atk-s0504a:1264_1: dassetuṃ “tato opadhika”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha opadhikanti upadhivepakkaṃ attabhāvasampattiyā
atk-s0504a:1264_2: ceva bhogasampattiyā ca nibbattakanti attho. Upadhīti hi attabhāvo vuccati. Yathāha
atk-s0504a:1264_4: Kāmaguṇāpi. Yathāha “upadhīhi narassa socanā”ti. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – upadhīyati
atk-s0504a:1264_5: ettha sukhadukkhanti upadhi, attabhāvo kāmaguṇā ca. Upadhikaraṇaṃ sīlaṃ etassa, upadhiṃ
atk-s0504a:1264_6: vā arahatīti opadhikaṃ, puññaṃ, taṃ bahuṃ uḷāraṃ katvā. Kathaṃ? Dānena. Dānañhi itarehi
atk-s0504a:1264_7: sukaranti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Dānenāti vā padena abhayadānampi vuttaṃ, na āmisadānamevāti
atk-s0504a:1264_8: sīlassāpi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā pana te devā asurakāyahāniṃ ekanteneva devakāyapāripūriñca
atk-s0504a:1264_9: icchanti, tasmā tassa upāyaṃ dassentā “aññepi macce saddhamme, brahmacariye nivesayā”ti
atk-s0504a:1264_10: dhammadāne niyojenti. Yadā vidūti yasmiṃ kāle devā devaṃ cavantaṃ vidū vijāneyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:1264_11: tadā imāya yathāvuttāya anukampāya dukkhāpanayanakamyatāya “deva, ime devakāye punappunaṃ
atk-s0504a:1267_0: 84. Pañcame loketi ettha tayo lokā – sattaloko, saṅkhāraloko, okāsalokoti. Tesu indriyabaddhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1267_1: rūpadhammānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānañca santānavasena vattamānānaṃ samūho
atk-s0504a:1267_2: sattaloko, pathavīpabbatādibhedo okāsaloko, ubhayepi khandhā saṅkhāraloko. Tesu sattaloko
atk-s0504a:1267_3: idha adhippeto. Tasmā loketi sattaloke. Tatthāpi na devaloke, na brahmaloke, manussaloke.
atk-s0504a:1267_4: Manussalokepi na aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe, imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe. Tatrāpi na sabbaṭṭhānesu,
atk-s0504a:1267_5: “puratthimāya disāya gajaṅgalaṃ nāma nigamo, tassa aparena mahāsālā, tato paraṃ paccantimā
atk-s0504a:1267_6: janapadā, orato majjhe; puratthimadakkhiṇāya disāya sallavatī nāma nadī, tato paraṃ
atk-s0504a:1267_7: paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe; dakkhiṇāya disāya setakaṇṇikaṃ nāma nigamo, tato
atk-s0504a:1267_8: paraṃ paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe; pacchimāya disāya thūṇaṃ nāma brāhmaṇagāmo,
atk-s0504a:1267_9: tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe; uttarāya disāya usiraddhajo nāma pabbato,
atk-s0504a:1267_10: tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe”ti evaṃ paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate
atk-s0504a:1267_11: vitthārato aḍḍhateyyayojanasate parikkhepato navayojanasate majjhimadese uppajjati
atk-s0504a:1267_12: tathāgato. Na kevalañca tathāgatova paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asītimahātherā buddhamātā
atk-s0504a:1267_13: buddhapitā cakkavattirājā aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ettheva uppajjanti.
atk-s0504a:1267_14: Idha pana tathāgatavāreyeva sabbatthakavasena ayaṃ nayo labbhati, itaresu ekadesavasena.
atk-s0504a:1268_0: Uppajjamānā uppajjantīti idaṃ pana ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva, uppajjantā bahujanahitatthāya
atk-s0504a:1268_1: uppajjanti, na aññena kāraṇenāti evamettha attho veditabbo. Evarūpañhettha saddalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:1269_0: Apica uppajjamāno nāma uppajjati nāma uppanno nāmāti ayaṃ pabhedo veditabbo. Tathāgato
atk-s0504a:1269_1: hi mahābhinīhāraṃ karonto, buddhakare dhamme pariyesanto, pāramiyo pūrento, pañca
atk-s0504a:1269_2: mahāpariccāge pariccajanto, ñātatthacariyaṃ caranto, lokatthacariyaṃ, buddhatthacariyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1269_3: koṭiṃ pāpento, pāramiyo pūretvā tusitabhavane tiṭṭhanto, tato otaritvā carimabhave
atk-s0504a:1269_4: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanto, agāramajjhe vasanto, abhinikkhamanto, mahāpadhānaṃ padahanto,
atk-s0504a:1269_5: paripakkañāṇo bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhamento paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranto,
atk-s0504a:1269_6: majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhento, pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā
atk-s0504a:1269_7: anekākāraṃ sabbasaṅkhāre sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhanto yāva anāgāmiphalaṃ
atk-s0504a:1269_8: sacchikarontopi uppajjamāno eva nāma, arahattamaggakkhaṇe uppajjati nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe
atk-s0504a:1269_9: pana uppanno nāma. Buddhānañhi sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīnaṃ uppādanakiccaṃ
atk-s0504a:1269_10: atthi, saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi buddhaguṇarāsi āgatova nāma hoti. Tasmā
atk-s0504a:1269_11: te nibbattasabbakiccattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppannā nāma honti. Idha arahattaphalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:1269_12: sandhāya “uppajjatī”ti vutto. Uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho.
atk-s0504a:1270_0: Sāvakopi khīṇāsavo sāvakabodhiyā hetubhūte puññasambhāre sambharanto pubbayogaṃ pubbacariyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1270_1: gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento carimabhave nibbattanto anukkamena viññutaṃ patvā saṃsāre
atk-s0504a:1270_2: ādīnavaṃ disvā pabbajjāya cetayamāno pabbajjaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā sīlādīni paripūrento
atk-s0504a:1270_3: dhutadhamme samādāya vattamāno jāgariyaṃ anuyuñjanto ñāṇāni nibbattento vipassanaṃ
atk-s0504a:1270_4: paṭṭhapetvā heṭṭhimamagge adhigacchantopi uppajjamāno eva nāma, arahattamaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0504a:1270_5: uppajjati nāma, arahattaphalakkhaṇe pana uppanno nāma. Sekkho pana pubbūpanissayato
atk-s0504a:1270_6: paṭṭhāya yāva gotrabhuñāṇā uppajjamāno nāma, paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe uppajjati nāma, paṭhamaphalakkhaṇato
atk-s0504a:1270_7: paṭṭhāya uppanno nāma. Ettāvatā “tayome, bhikkhave, puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjantī”ti
atk-s0504a:1271_0: Idāni bahujanahitāyātiādīsu bahujanahitāyāti mahājanassa hitatthāya. Bahujanasukhāyāti
atk-s0504a:1271_1: mahājanassa sukhatthāya. Lokānukampāyāti sattalokassa anukampaṃ paṭicca. Katarasattalokassāti?
atk-s0504a:1271_2: Yo tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā dhammaṃ paṭivijjhati, amatapānaṃ pivati, tassa.
atk-s0504a:1271_4: brahmakoṭiyo dhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu. Evaṃ yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā dhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:1271_5: paṭividdhasattānaṃ gaṇanā natthi, mahāsamayasuttantadesanāyaṃ maṅgalasuttaṃ, cūḷarāhulovādaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1271_6: samacittadesanāyanti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu abhisamayaṃ pattasattānaṃ paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0504a:1271_7: Evametassa aparimāṇassa sattalokassa anukampāya. Sāvakassa pana arahato sekkhassa
atk-s0504a:1271_8: ca lokānukampāya uppatti dhammasenāpatiādīhi dhammabhaṇḍāgārikādīhi ca desitadesanāya
atk-s0504a:1271_9: paṭivedhappattasattānaṃ vasena, aparabhāge ca mahāmahindattherādīhi desitadesanāya
atk-s0504a:1271_10: paṭividdhasaccānaṃ vasena, yāvajjatanā ito paraṃ anāgate ca sāsanaṃ nissāya saggamokkhamaggesu
atk-s0504a:1272_0: Apica bahujanahitāyāti bahujanassa hitatthāya, nesaṃ paññāsampattiyā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikahitūpadesakoti.
atk-s0504a:1272_2: Lokānukampāyāti lokassa anukampanatthāya, mettākaruṇāsampattiyā mātāpitaro viya lokassa
atk-s0504a:1272_3: rakkhitā gopitāti. Atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti idha devamanussaggahaṇena
atk-s0504a:1272_4: bhabbapuggale veneyyasatte eva gahetvā tesaṃ nibbānamaggaphalādhigamāya tathāgatassa
atk-s0504a:1272_5: uppatti dassitā paṭhamavāre, dutiyatatiyavāresu pana arahato sekkhassa ca vasena
atk-s0504a:1272_6: yojetabbaṃ. Tattha atthāyāti iminā paramatthāya, nibbānāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Hitāyāti
atk-s0504a:1272_7: taṃsampāpakamaggatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttariṃ hitaṃ nāma
atk-s0504a:1272_8: natthi. Sukhāyāti phalasamāpattisukhatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti, tato uttari sukhābhāvato.
atk-s0504a:1272_9: Vuttañhetaṃ “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti.
atk-s0504a:1273_0: Tathāgatotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto. Vijjācaraṇasampannotiādīsu tissopi
atk-s0504a:1273_1: vijjā bhayabherave āgatanayena, chapi vijjā chaḷabhiññāvasena, aṭṭhapi vijjā ambaṭṭhasutte
atk-s0504a:1273_2: āgatāti vijjāhi, sīlasaṃvarādīhi, pannarasahi caraṇadhammehi ca, anaññasādhāraṇehi
atk-s0504a:1273_3: sampanno samannāgatoti vijjācaraṇasampanno. Sobhanagamanattā, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā,
atk-s0504a:1273_4: sammā gatattā, sammā gadattā ca sugato. Sabbathā viditalokattā lokavidū. Natthi etassa
atk-s0504a:1273_5: uttaroti anuttaro. Purisadamme purisaveneyye sāreti vinetīti purisadammasārathi.
atk-s0504a:1273_6: Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsatīti satthā. Sabbassāpi neyyassa
atk-s0504a:1273_7: sabbappakārena sayambhuñāṇena buddhattā buddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana
atk-s0504a:1274_0: So dhammaṃ deseti ādi…pe… pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0504a:1274_1: hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti. Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento
atk-s0504a:1274_2: ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti. Kathaṃ? Ekagāthāpi hi samantabhaddakattā dhammassa
atk-s0504a:1274_3: paṭhamapādena ādikalyāṇā, dutiyatatiyehi majjhekalyāṇā, pacchimena pariyosānakalyāṇā.
atk-s0504a:1274_4: Ekānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ nidānena ādikalyāṇaṃ, nigamanena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesena
atk-s0504a:1274_5: majjhekalyāṇaṃ. Nānānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ paṭhamena anusandhinā ādikalyāṇaṃ, pacchimena
atk-s0504a:1274_6: pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesehi majjhekalyāṇaṃ. Sakalopi vā sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena
atk-s0504a:1274_7: sīlena ādikalyāṇo, samathavipassanāmaggaphalehi majjhekalyāṇo, nibbānena pariyosānakalyāṇo.
atk-s0504a:1274_8: Sīlasamādhīhi vā ādikalyāṇo, vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo, phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo.
atk-s0504a:1274_9: Buddhasubuddhatāya vā ādikalyāṇo, dhammasudhammatāya majjhekalyāṇo, saṅghasuppaṭipattiyā
atk-s0504a:1274_10: pariyosānakalyāṇo. Taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā
atk-s0504a:1274_11: vā ādikalyāṇo, paccekabodhiyā majjhekalyāṇo, sāvakabodhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. Suyyamāno
atk-s0504a:1274_12: cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo, paṭipajjiyamāno
atk-s0504a:1274_13: samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi sukhameva āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo, tathāpaṭipanno
atk-s0504a:1274_14: ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti
atk-s0504a:1274_15: pariyosānakalyāṇo. Nāthappabhavattā ca pabhavasuddhiyā ādikalyāṇo, atthasuddhiyā
atk-s0504a:1274_16: majjhekalyāṇo, kiccasuddhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. Tena vuttaṃ “so dhammaṃ deseti ādi…pe…
atk-s0504a:1275_0: Yaṃ pana bhagavā dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti,
atk-s0504a:1275_1: nānānayehi dīpeti, taṃ yathānurūpaṃ atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ, byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1275_2: Saṅkāsana, pakāsana, vivaraṇa, vibhajana, uttānīkaraṇa paññattiatthapadasamāyogato
atk-s0504a:1275_5: vā sātthaṃ, dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāvisayato sabyañjanaṃ. Paṇḍitavedanīyato parikkhakajanappasādakanti
atk-s0504a:1275_6: sātthaṃ, saddheyyato lokiyajanappasādakanti sabyañjanaṃ. Gambhīrādhippāyato sātthaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1275_7: uttānapadato sabyañjanaṃ. Upanetabbassa abhāvato sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvena kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1275_8: apanetabbassa abhāvato niddosabhāvena parisuddhaṃ, apica paṭipattiyā adhigamabyattito
atk-s0504a:1275_10: paripuṇṇaṃ, nirupakkilesato nittharaṇatthāya pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca parisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1275_11: sikkhattayapariggahitattā brahmabhūtehi seṭṭhehi caritabbato tesaṃ cariyabhāvato
atk-s0504a:1275_12: ca brahmacariyaṃ. Tasmā “sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ…pe… pakāsetī”ti vuccati. Paṭhamoti gaṇanānupubbato
atk-s0504a:1276_0: Tasseva satthu sāvakoti tasseva yathāvuttaguṇassa satthu sammāsambuddhassa dhammadesanāya
atk-s0504a:1276_1: savanante jāto dhammasenāpatisadiso sāvako, na pūraṇādi viya paṭiññāmattena satthu
atk-s0504a:1276_2: sāvako. Pāṭipadoti paṭipadāsaṅkhātena ariyamaggena ariyāya jātiyā jāto bhavoti pāṭipado,
atk-s0504a:1276_3: aniṭṭhitapaṭipattikicco paṭipajjamānoti attho. Suttageyyādi pariyattidhammo bahuṃ
atk-s0504a:1276_4: suto etenāti bahussuto. Pātimokkhasaṃvarādisīlena ceva āraññikaṅgādidhutaṅgavatehi
atk-s0504a:1276_5: ca upapanno sampanno samannāgatoti sīlavatūpapanno. Iti bhagavā “lokānukampā nāma
atk-s0504a:1276_6: hitajjhāsayena dhammadesanā, sā ca imesu eva tīsu puggalesu paṭibaddhā”ti dasseti.
atk-s0504a:1277_0: Gāthāsu tassanvayoti tasseva satthu paṭipattiyā dhammadesanāya ca anugamanena tassanvayo
atk-s0504a:1277_1: anujāto. Avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā saparasantānesu dhammālokasaṅkhātāya pabhāya
atk-s0504a:1277_2: karaṇato pabhaṅkarā. Dhammamudīrayantāti catusaccadhammaṃ kathentā. Apāpurantīti
atk-s0504a:1277_3: ugghāṭenti. Amatassa nibbānassa. Dvāraṃ ariyamaggaṃ. Yogāti kāmayogādito. Satthavāhenāti
atk-s0504a:1277_4: veneyyasatthavāhanato bhavakantāranittharaṇato satthavāho, bhagavā, tena satthavāhena.
atk-s0504a:1277_5: Sudesitaṃ maggamanukkamantīti tena sammā desitaṃ ariyamaggaṃ tassa desanānusārena
atk-s0504a:1277_6: anugacchanti paṭipajjanti. Idhevāti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0504a:1280_0: 85. Chaṭṭhe asubhānupassīti asubhaṃ anupassantā dvattiṃsākāravasena ceva uddhumātakādīsu
atk-s0504a:1280_1: gahitanimittassa upasaṃharaṇavasena ca kāyasmiṃ asubhaṃ asubhākāraṃ anupassakā hutvā
atk-s0504a:1280_2: viharatha. Ānāpānassatīti ānāpāne sati, taṃ ārabbha pavattā sati, assāsapassāsapariggāhikā
atk-s0504a:1280_3: satīti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ “ānanti assāso, no passāso. Pānanti passāso, no assāso”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:1281_0: Voti tumhākaṃ. Ajjhattanti idha gocarajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ. Parimukhanti abhimukhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1281_1: Sūpaṭṭhitāti suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ānāpānassati ca tumhākaṃ kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0504a:1281_2: suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā hotūti. Atha vā parimukhanti pariggahitaniyyānaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1281_3: – “parīti pariggahaṭṭho, mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho, satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho, tena vuccati
atk-s0504a:1282_2: dassento “sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassino viharathā”ti āha. Tattha aniccaṃ, aniccalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1282_3: aniccānupassanā, aniccānupassīti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Hutvā, abhāvato, udayabbayayogato,
atk-s0504a:1282_4: tāvakālikato, niccapaṭikkhepato ca khandhapañcakaṃ aniccaṃ nāma. Tassa yo hutvā abhāvākāro,
atk-s0504a:1282_5: taṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ nāma. Taṃ ārabbha pavattā vipassanā aniccānupassanā. Taṃ aniccanti
atk-s0504a:1282_6: vipassako aniccānupassī. Ettha ca ekādasavidhā asubhakathā paṭhamajjhānaṃ pāpetvā,
atk-s0504a:1282_7: soḷasavatthukā ca ānāpānakathā catutthajjhānaṃ pāpetvā, vipassanākathā ca vitthārato
atk-s0504a:1282_8: vattabbā, sā pana sabbākārato visuddhimagge kathitāti tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:1283_1: Tattha subhāya dhātuyāti subhabhāve, subhanimitteti attho. Rāgānusayoti subhārammaṇe
atk-s0504a:1283_2: uppajjanāraho kāmarāgānusayo. So kesādīsu uddhumātakādīsu vā asubhānupassīnaṃ asubhanimittaṃ
atk-s0504a:1283_3: gahetvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0504a:1283_4: adhigatena anāgāmimaggena pahīyati, sabbaso samucchindīyatīti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0504a:1283_5: “asubhā bhāvetabbā kāmarāgassa pahānāyā”ti. Bāhirāti bahiddhāvatthukattā anatthāvahattā
atk-s0504a:1283_6: ca bāhirā bahibhūtā. Vitakkāsayāti kāmasaṅkappādimicchāvitakkā. Te hi appahīnā āsayānugatā
atk-s0504a:1283_7: sati paccayasamavāye uppajjanato vitakkāsayāti vuttā. Kāmavitakko cettha kāmarāgaggahaṇena
atk-s0504a:1283_8: gahito evāti tadavasesā vitakkā eva vuttāti veditabbā. Vighātapakkhikāti dukkhabhāgiyā,
atk-s0504a:1283_9: icchāvighātanibbattanakā vā. Te na hontīti te pahīyanti. Byāpādavitakko, vihiṃsāvitakko,
atk-s0504a:1283_10: ñātivitakko, janapadavitakko, amarāvitakko, anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0504a:1283_11: vitakko, parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakkoti aṭṭha, kāmavitakkena saddhiṃ navavidhā
atk-s0504a:1283_12: mahāvitakkā ānāpānassatisamādhinā tannissitāya ca vipassanāya pubbabhāge vikkhambhitā.
atk-s0504a:1283_13: Taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigatena ariyamaggena yathārahaṃ anavasesato pahīyanti. Vuttampi
atk-s0504a:1284_0: Yā avijjā, sā pahīyatīti yā saccasabhāvapaṭicchādinī sabbānatthakārī sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0504a:1284_1: mūlabhūtā avijjā, sā aniccānupassīnaṃ viharataṃ samucchijjati. Idaṃ kira bhagavatā
atk-s0504a:1284_2: aniccākārato vuṭṭhitassa sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavassa vasena vuttaṃ. Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho
atk-s0504a:1284_3: – tebhūmakesu sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccādito sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vipassantānaṃ yadā
atk-s0504a:1284_4: aniccanti pavattamānā vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā maggena ghaṭīyati, anukkamena arahattamaggo
atk-s0504a:1284_5: uppajjati, tesaṃ aniccānupassīnaṃ viharataṃ avijjā anavasesato pahīyati, arahattamaggavijjā
atk-s0504a:1284_6: uppajjatīti. Aniccānupassīnaṃ viharatanti idaṃ aniccalakkhaṇassa tesaṃ pākaṭabhāvato
atk-s0504a:1284_7: itarassa lakkhaṇadvayassa gahaṇe upāyabhāvato vā vuttaṃ, na pana ekasseva lakkhaṇassa
atk-s0504a:1284_8: anupassitabbato. Vuttañhetaṃ “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti. Aparampi
atk-s0504a:1284_9: vuttaṃ “aniccasaññino hi, meghiya, anattasaññā saṇṭhāti, anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1285_0: Gāthāsu ānāpāne paṭissatoti ānāpānanimittasmiṃ paṭi paṭi sato, upaṭṭhitassatīti attho.
atk-s0504a:1285_1: Passanti āsavakkhayañāṇacakkhunā saṅkhārūpasamaṃ nibbānaṃ passanto. Ātāpī sabbadāti
atk-s0504a:1285_2: antarāvosānaṃ anāpajjitvā asubhānupassanādīsu satataṃ ātāpī yuttappayutto, tato eva
atk-s0504a:1285_3: yato vāyamamāno, niyato vā sammattaniyāmena tattha sabbasaṅkhārasamathe nibbāne arahattaphalavimuttiyā
atk-s0504a:1288_0: 86. Sattame dhammānudhammapaṭipannassāti ettha dhammo nāma navavidho lokuttaradhammo,
atk-s0504a:1288_1: tassa dhammassa anudhammo sīlavisuddhiādi pubbabhāgapaṭipadādhammo, taṃ dhammānudhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:1288_2: paṭipannassa adhigantuṃ paṭipajjamānassa. Ayamanudhammo hotīti ayaṃ anucchavikasabhāvo
atk-s0504a:1288_3: patirūpasabhāvo hoti. Veyyākaraṇāyāti kathanāya. Dhammānudhammapaṭipannoyanti yanti
atk-s0504a:1288_4: karaṇatthe paccattavacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yena anudhammena taṃ dhammānudhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:1288_5: paṭipannoti byākaramāno sammadeva byākaronto nāma siyā, na tatonidānaṃ viññūhi garahitabbo
atk-s0504a:1288_6: siyāti. Yanti vā kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, tenetaṃ dasseti “yadidaṃ dhammasseva bhāsanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1288_7: dhammavitakkasseva ca vitakkanaṃ tadubhayābhāve ñāṇupekkhāya, ayaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipannassa
atk-s0504a:1288_8: bhikkhuno tathārūpo ayanti kathanāyānurūpahetu anucchavikakāraṇaṃ. Bhāsamāno dhammaṃyeva
atk-s0504a:1288_9: bhāseyyāti kathento ce dasakathāvatthudhammaṃyeva katheyya, na tappaṭipakkhamahicchatādiadhammaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1289_0: “Yāyaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya
atk-s0504a:1289_1: upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati. Seyyathidaṃ – appicchakathā,
atk-s0504a:1289_2: santuṭṭhikathā, pavivekakathā, asaṃsaggakathā, vīriyārambhakathā, sīlakathā, samādhikathā,
atk-s0504a:1289_3: paññākathā, vimuttikathā, vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā, evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī
atk-s0504a:1290: Abhisallekhikāya kathāya lābhī eva hi taṃ bhāseyya. Etena kalyāṇamittasampadā dassitā.
atk-s0504a:1291_1: paripūressāmī”ti uparūpari ussāho abhivaḍḍhissati. So pana vitakko sīlādīnaṃ anupakāradhamme
atk-s0504a:1291_2: vajjetvā upakāradhamme anubrūhanavasena hānabhāgiyabhāvaṃ apanetvā ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvepi
atk-s0504a:1291_3: aṭṭhatvā visesabhāgiyataṃ nibbedhabhāgiyatañca pāpanavasena pavattiyā anekappabhedo
atk-s0504a:1291_4: veditabbo. No adhammavitakkanti kāmavitakkaṃ no vitakkeyyāti attho. Tadubhayaṃ vā
atk-s0504a:1291_5: panāti yadetaṃ paresaṃ anuggahaṇatthaṃ dhammabhāsanaṃ attano anuggahaṇatthaṃ dhammavitakkanañca

atk-s0504a:1291_8: upekkhako hutvā vipassanāyameva kammaṃ karonto vihareyya. Vipassanampi ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0504a:1291_9: tatthapi saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇavasena upekkhako yāva vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggena ghaṭīyati,
atk-s0504a:1291_10: tāva yathā taṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā vahati, tathā vihareyya sato sampajānoti.
atk-s0504a:1292_0: Gāthāsu samathavipassanādhammo āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti dhammārāmo. Tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0504a:1292_1: dhamme ratoti dhammarato. Tasseva dhammassa punappunaṃ vicintanato dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1292_2: taṃ dhammaṃ āvajjento, manasi karontoti attho. Anussaranti tameva dhammaṃ uparūparibhāvanāvasena
atk-s0504a:1292_3: anussaranto. Atha vā vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā paresaṃ desanāvasena sīlādidhammo āramitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:1292_4: ārāmo etassāti dhammārāmo. Tatheva tasmiṃ dhamme rato abhiratoti dhammarato. Tesaṃyeva
atk-s0504a:1292_5: sīlādidhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanto kāmavitakkādīnaṃ okāsaṃ adatvā nekkhammasaṅkappādidhammaṃyeva
atk-s0504a:1292_6: anuvicintanato dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ vā pana oḷārikato dahanto ajjhupekkhitvā
atk-s0504a:1292_7: samathavipassanādhammameva uparūpari bhāvanāvasena anussaranto anubrūhanavasena pavattento.
atk-s0504a:1292_8: Saddhammāti sattatiṃsappabhedā bodhipakkhiyadhammā navavidhalokuttaradhammā ca na
atk-s0504a:1292_9: parihāyati, na cirasseva taṃ adhigacchatīti attho.
atk-s0504a:1293_0: Idāni tassa anussaraṇavidhiṃ dassento “caraṃ vā”tiādimāha. Tattha caraṃ vāti bhikkhācāravasena
atk-s0504a:1293_1: caṅkamanavasena ca caranto vā. Yadi vā tiṭṭhanti tiṭṭhanto vā nisinno vā, uda vā
atk-s0504a:1293_2: sayanti sayanto vā. Evaṃ catūsupi iriyāpathesu. Ajjhattaṃ samayaṃ cittanti yathāvutte
atk-s0504a:1293_3: kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocarajjhatte attano cittaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ vūpasamanavasena
atk-s0504a:1293_4: pajahanavasena samayaṃ samento. Santimevādhigacchatīti accantasantiṃ nibbānameva pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0504a:1296_0: 87. Aṭṭhame akusalavitakkāti akosallasambhūtā vitakkā. Andhakaraṇātiādīsu yassa sayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1296_1: uppajjanti, taṃ yathābhūtadassananivāraṇena andhaṃ karontīti andhakaraṇā. Na paññācakkhuṃ
atk-s0504a:1296_2: karontīti acakkhukaraṇā. Aññāṇaṃ karontīti aññāṇakaraṇā. Paññānirodhikāti kammassakatāpaññā,
atk-s0504a:1296_3: jhānapaññā, vipassanāpaññāti imā tisso paññā appavattikaraṇena nirodhentīti paññānirodhikā.
atk-s0504a:1296_4: Aniṭṭhaphaladāyakattā dukkhasaṅkhātassa vighātassa pakkhe vattantīti vighātapakkhikā.
atk-s0504a:1297_0: Kāmavitakkoti kāmapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko. So hi kilesakāmasahito hutvā vatthukāmesu
atk-s0504a:1297_1: pavattati. Byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko byāpādavitakko. Vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko
atk-s0504a:1297_2: vihiṃsāvitakko. Ime dve ca sattesupi saṅkhāresupi uppajjanti. Kāmavitakko hi piyamanāpe
atk-s0504a:1297_3: satte vā saṅkhāre vā vitakkentassa uppajjati, byāpādavitakko appiye amanāpe satte
atk-s0504a:1297_4: vā saṅkhāre vā kujjhitvā olokanakālato paṭṭhāya yāva nāsanā uppajjati, vihiṃsāvitakko
atk-s0504a:1297_5: saṅkhāresu na uppajjati, saṅkhārā dukkhāpetabbā nāma natthi, “ime sattā haññantu
atk-s0504a:1297_6: vā bajjhantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu”nti cintanakāle pana sattesu uppajjati.
atk-s0504a:1298: Imeyeva pana kāmasaṅkappādayo. Atthato hi kāmavitakkādīnaṃ kāmasaṅkappādīnañca nānākaraṇaṃ natthi, taṃsampayuttā pana saññādayo kāmasaññādayo. Kāmadhātuādīnaṃ pana yasmā pāḷiyaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1299_0: “Kāmapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko…pe… micchāsaṅkappo, ayaṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, sabbepi
atk-s0504a:1299_1: akusalā dhammā kāmadhātu. Byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko…pe… micchāsaṅkappo, ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1299_2: vuccati byāpādadhātu. Dasasu āghātavatthūsu cittassa āghāto paṭighāto…pe… anattamanatā
atk-s0504a:1299_3: cittassa, ayaṃ vuccati byāpādadhātu. Vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko micchāsaṅkappo,
atk-s0504a:1299_4: ayaṃ vuccati vihiṃsādhātu. Idhekacco pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā
atk-s0504a:1299_5: rajjuyā vā aññataraññatarena satte viheṭheti, ayaṃ vihiṃsādhātū”ti –
atk-s0504a:1301_0: Tattha dve kathā sabbasaṅgāhikā ca asambhinnā ca. Tattha kāmadhātuyā gahitāya itarā
atk-s0504a:1301_1: dvepi gahitā nāma honti. Tato pana nīharitvā ayaṃ byāpādadhātu, ayaṃ vihiṃsādhātūti
atk-s0504a:1301_2: dassetīti ayaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikā nāma. Kāmadhātuṃ kathento pana bhagavā byāpādadhātuṃ
atk-s0504a:1301_3: byāpādadhātuṭṭhāne, vihiṃsādhātuṃ vihiṃsādhātuṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāva avasesaṃ kāmadhātu
atk-s0504a:1302_0: Sukkapakkhe vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko nekkhammavitakko.
atk-s0504a:1302_1: So asubhapubbabhāge kāmāvacaro hoti, asubhajjhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ
atk-s0504a:1302_2: katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro. Abyāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko abyāpādavitakko.
atk-s0504a:1302_3: So mettāpubbabhāge kāmāvacaro hoti, mettājhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0504a:1302_4: uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro. Avihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko avihiṃsāvitakko. So
atk-s0504a:1302_5: karuṇāpubbabhāge kāmāvacaro, karuṇājjhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle
atk-s0504a:1302_6: lokuttaro. Yadā pana alobho sīsaṃ hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā honti. Yadā mettā
atk-s0504a:1302_7: sīsaṃ hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā honti. Yadā karuṇā sīsaṃ hoti, tadā itare
atk-s0504a:1303_0: Imeyeva pana nekkhammasaṅkappādayo. Atthato hi nekkhammavitakkādīnaṃ nekkhammasaṅkappādīnañca
atk-s0504a:1303_1: nānākaraṇaṃ natthi, taṃsampayuttā pana saññādayo nekkhammasaññādayo. Nekkhammadhātuādīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:1304_0: “Nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko saṅkappo, ayaṃ vuccati nekkhammadhātu, sabbepi
atk-s0504a:1304_1: kusalā dhammā nekkhammadhātu. Abyāpādapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko saṅkappo, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0504a:1304_2: abyāpādadhātu. Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettācetovimutti, ayaṃ vuccati abyāpādadhātu.
atk-s0504a:1304_3: Avihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko saṅkappo – ayaṃ vuccati avihiṃsādhātu. Yā sattesu
atk-s0504a:1304_4: karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇācetovimutti – ayaṃ vuccati avihiṃsādhātū”ti. –
atk-s0504a:1305: Āgatattā viseso labbhati. Idhāpi sabbasaṅgāhikā, asambhinnāti dve kathā vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
atk-s0504a:1306_0: Gāthāsu vitakkayeti vitakkeyya. Nirākareti attano santānato nīhareyya vinodeyya,
atk-s0504a:1306_1: pajaheyyāti attho. Save vitakkāni vicāritāni, sameti vuṭṭhīva rajaṃ samūhatanti yathā
atk-s0504a:1306_2: nāma gimhānaṃ pacchime māse pathaviyaṃ samūhataṃ samantato uṭṭhitaṃ rajaṃ mahato
atk-s0504a:1306_3: akālameghassa vassato vuṭṭhi ṭhānaso vūpasameti, evameva so yogāvacaro vitakkāni
atk-s0504a:1306_4: micchāvitakke ca vicāritāni taṃsampayuttavicāre ca sameti vūpasameti samucchindati.
atk-s0504a:1306_5: Tathābhūto ca vitakkūpasamena cetasā sabbesaṃ micchāvitakkānaṃ upasamanato vitakkūpasamena
atk-s0504a:1306_6: ariyamaggacittena. Idheva diṭṭheva dhamme, santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ, samajjhagā samadhigato hotīti.
atk-s0504a:1311: Janā saṅgamma mantenti, mañca tañca kimantara”nti. –
atk-s0504a:1312: Ādīsu kāraṇe āgato. “Addasā maṃ, bhante, aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe. “Apicāyaṃ tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare.
atk-s0504a:1315_0: Ādīsu uttarisāṭake. “Yassantarato na santi kopā”tiādīsu citte. Idhāpi citte eva daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:1315_1: Tasmā antare citte bhavā antarā. Yasmiṃ santāne uppannā, tassa malinabhāvakaraṇato
atk-s0504a:1315_2: malā. Tattha malaṃ nāma duvidhaṃ – sarīramalaṃ, cittamalanti. Tesu sarīramalaṃ sedajallikādi
atk-s0504a:1315_3: sarīre nibbattaṃ, tattha laggaṃ āgantukarajañca, taṃ udakenapi nīharaṇīyaṃ, na tathā
atk-s0504a:1315_4: saṃkilesikaṃ. Cittamalaṃ pana rāgādisaṃkilesikaṃ, taṃ ariyamaggeheva nīharaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1319: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:1320_0: Tenāha bhagavā “cittasaṃkilesā, bhikkhave, sattā saṃkilissanti, cittavodānā visujjhantī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1320_1: Tasmā bhagavā idhāpi cittamalavisodhanāya paṭipajjitabbanti dassento “tayome, bhikkhave, antarāmalā”ti āha.
atk-s0504a:1321_0: Yathā cete lobhādayo sattānaṃ citte uppajjitvā malinabhāvakarā nānappakārasaṃkilesavidhāyakāti
atk-s0504a:1321_1: antarāmalā, evaṃ ekato bhuñjitvā, ekato sayitvā, otāragavesī amittasattu viya citte
atk-s0504a:1321_2: eva uppajjitvā sattānaṃ nānāvidhaanatthāvahā, nānappakāradukkhanibbattakāti dassento
atk-s0504a:1322_0: Tattha dvīhi ākārehi lobhādīnaṃ amittādibhāvo veditabbo. Verīpuggalo hi antaraṃ labhamāno
atk-s0504a:1322_1: attano verissa satthena vā sīsaṃ pāteti, upāyena vā mahantaṃ anatthaṃ uppādeti. Ime
atk-s0504a:1322_2: ca lobhādayo paññāsirapātanena yonisampaṭipādanena ca tādisaṃ tato balavataraṃ anatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:1322_3: nibbattenti. Kathaṃ? Cakkhudvārasmiñhi iṭṭhādīsu ārammaṇesu āpāthagatesu yathārahaṃ
atk-s0504a:1322_4: tāni ārabbha lobhādayo uppajjanti, ettāvatāssa paññāsiraṃ pātitaṃ nāma hoti. Sotadvārādīsupi
atk-s0504a:1322_5: eseva nayo. Evaṃ tāva paññāsirapātanato amittādisadisatā veditabbā. Lobhādayo pana
atk-s0504a:1322_6: kammanidānā hutvā aṇḍajādibhedā catasso yoniyo upanenti. Tassa yoniupagamanamūlakāni
atk-s0504a:1322_7: pañcavīsati mahābhayāni dvattiṃsa kammakaraṇāni ca āgatāneva honti. Evaṃ yonisampaṭipādanatopi
atk-s0504a:1322_8: nesaṃ amittādisadisatā veditabbā. Iti lobhādayo amittādisadisatāya cittasambhūtatāya
atk-s0504a:1322_9: ca “antarāamittā”tiādinā vuttā. Apica amittehi kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ lobhādayo karonti,
atk-s0504a:1322_10: amittādibhāvo ca lobhādīhi jāyatīti tesaṃ amittādibhāvo veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1323: “Diso disaṃ yantaṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ;
atk-s0504a:1324: Micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, pāpiyo naṃ tato kare”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:1325: Gāthāsu attano paresañca anatthaṃ janetīti anatthajanano. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1326_0: “Yadapi luddho abhisaṅkharoti kāyena vācāya manasā tadapi akusalaṃ; yadapi luddho
atk-s0504a:1326_1: lobhena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto parassa asatā dukkhaṃ uppādeti vadhena vā bandhena
atk-s0504a:1326_2: vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā pabbājanāya vā balavamhi balattho iti, tadapi akusalaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1326_3: itissame lobhajā lobhanidānā lobhasamudayā lobhapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavantī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1328_0: “Ratto kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti,
atk-s0504a:1328_1: parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti, cetasikampi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ
atk-s0504a:1329_0: Cittappakopanoti cittasaṅkhobhano. Lobho hi lobhanīye vatthusmiṃ uppajjamāno cittaṃ
atk-s0504a:1329_1: khobhento pakopento vipariṇāmento vikāraṃ āpādento uppajjati, pasādādivasena pavattituṃ
atk-s0504a:1329_2: na deti. Bhayamantarato jātaṃ, taṃ jano nāvabujjhatīti taṃ lobhasaṅkhātaṃ antarato
atk-s0504a:1329_3: abbhantare attano citteyeva jātaṃ anatthajananacittappakopanādiṃ bhayaṃ bhayahetuṃ
atk-s0504a:1330_0: Luddho atthaṃ na jānātīti attatthaparatthādibhedaṃ atthaṃ hitaṃ luddhapuggalo yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0504a:1330_1: na jānāti. Dhammaṃ na passatīti dasakusalakammapathadhammampi luddho lobhena abhibhūto
atk-s0504a:1330_2: pariyādinnacitto na passati paccakkhato na jānāti, pageva uttarimanussadhammaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1331: “Ratto kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attatthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti, paratthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti, ubhayatthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānātī”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:1332_0: Andhatamanti andhabhāvakaraṃ tamaṃ. Yanti yattha. Bhummatthe hi etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1332_1: Yasmiṃ kāle lobho sahate abhibhavati naraṃ, andhatamaṃ tadā hotīti. Yanti vā kāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1332_2: Yasmā lobho uppajjamāno naraṃ sahate abhibhavati, tasmā andhatamaṃ tadā hotīti yojanā,
atk-s0504a:1332_3: ya-ta-saddānaṃ ekantasambandhabhāvato. Atha vā yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, “lobho sahate”ti
atk-s0504a:1332_4: ettha yadetaṃ lobhassa sahanaṃ abhibhavanaṃ vuttaṃ. Etaṃ andhabhāvakarassa tamassa
atk-s0504a:1332_5: gamanaṃ uppādoti attho. Atha vā yaṃ naraṃ lobho sahate abhibhavati, tassa andhatamaṃ
atk-s0504a:1332_6: tadā hoti, tato ca luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:1333_0: Yo ca lobhaṃ pahantvānāti yo pubbabhāge tadaṅgavasena vikkhambhanavasena ca yathārahaṃ
atk-s0504a:1333_1: samathavipassanāhi lobhaṃ pajahitvā tathā pajahanahetu lobhaneyye dibbepi rūpādike
atk-s0504a:1333_2: upaṭṭhite na lubbhati, balavavipassanānubhāvena lobho pahīyate tamhāti tasmā ariyapuggalā
atk-s0504a:1333_3: ariyamaggena lobho pahīyati pajahīyati, accantameva pariccajīyati. Yathā kiṃ? Udabindūva
atk-s0504a:1333_4: pokkharāti paduminipaṇṇato udakabindu viya. Sesagāthānampi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1335_0: “Yadapi duṭṭho abhisaṅkharoti kāyena vācāya manasā tadapi akusalaṃ; yadapi duṭṭho
atk-s0504a:1335_1: dosena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto parassa asatā dukkhaṃ uppādeti vadhena vā bandhena
atk-s0504a:1335_2: vā jāniyā vā garahāya vā pabbājanāya vā balavamhi balattho iti, tadapi akusalaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1335_3: Itissame dosajā dosanidānā dosasamudayā dosapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavantī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1337_0: “Duṭṭho kho, brāhmaṇa, dosena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti,
atk-s0504a:1337_1: parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti cetasikampi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1339: “Duṭṭho kho, brāhmaṇa, dosena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attatthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti, paratthampi yathābhūtaṃ na pajānāti, ubhayatthampi yathā bhūtaṃ na pajānātī”ti –
atk-s0504a:1341_0: Tathā mohassa “yadapi mūḷho abhisaṅkharoti kāyena vācāya manasā”tiādinā, “mūḷho kho,
atk-s0504a:1341_1: brāhmaṇa, mohena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attabyābādhāyapi cetetī”tiādinā, “attatthampi
atk-s0504a:1341_2: yathābhūtaṃ na pajānātī”tiādinā ca āgatasuttapadānusārena veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:1342_0: Tālapakkaṃva bandhanāti tālaphalaṃ viya usumuppādena vaṇṭato, tatiyamaggañāṇuppādena
atk-s0504a:1342_1: tassa cittato doso pahīyati, pariccajīyatīti attho. Mohaṃ vihanti so sabbanti so
atk-s0504a:1342_2: ariyapuggalo sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ mohaṃ catutthamaggena vihanti vidhamati samucchindati.
atk-s0504a:1342_3: Ādiccovudayaṃ tamanti ādicco viya udayaṃ uggacchanto tamaṃ andhakāraṃ.
atk-s0504a:1345_0: 89. Dasame tīhi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehi abhibhūtoti kā uppatti? Devadatte hi avīcimahānirayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1345_1: paviṭṭhe devadattapakkhiyā aññatitthiyā ca “samaṇena gotamena abhisapito devadatto
atk-s0504a:1345_2: pathaviṃ paviṭṭho”ti abbhācikkhiṃsu. Taṃ sutvā sāsane anabhippasannā manussā “siyā
atk-s0504a:1345_3: nu kho etadevaṃ, yathā ime bhaṇantī”ti āsaṅkaṃ uppādesuṃ. Taṃ pavattiṃ bhikkhū bhagavato
atk-s0504a:1345_4: ārocesuṃ. Atha bhagavā “na, bhikkhave, tathāgatā kassaci abhisapaṃ denti, tasmā na
atk-s0504a:1345_5: devadatto mayā abhisapito, attano kammeneva nirayaṃ paviṭṭho”ti vatvā tesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ
atk-s0504a:1345_6: paṭisedhento imāya aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0504a:1346_0: Tattha asaddhammehīti asataṃ dhammehi, asantehi vā dhammehi. Atekicchoti buddhehipi
atk-s0504a:1346_1: anivattanīyattā avīcinibbattiyā tikicchābhāvato atekiccho, atikicchanīyoti attho.
atk-s0504a:1346_2: Asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyena pavattā pāpā icchā etassāti pāpiccho, tassa bhāvo
atk-s0504a:1346_3: pāpicchatā, tāya. “Ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmi, saṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”ti tassa icchā uppannā.
atk-s0504a:1346_4: Kokālikādayo pāpā lāmakā mittā etassāti pāpamitto, tassa bhāvo pāpamittatā, tāya.
atk-s0504a:1346_5: Uttarikaraṇīyeti jhānābhiññāhi uttarikaraṇīye adhigantabbe maggaphale anadhigate
atk-s0504a:1346_6: sati eva, taṃ anadhigantvāti attho. Oramattakenāti appamattakena jhānābhiññāmattena.
atk-s0504a:1346_7: Visesādhigamenāti uttarimanussadhammādhigamena. Antarāti vemajjhe. Vosānaṃ āpādīti
atk-s0504a:1346_8: akatakiccova samāno “katakiccomhī”ti maññamāno samaṇadhammato vigamaṃ āpajji. Iti
atk-s0504a:1346_9: bhagavā iminā suttena visesato puthujjanabhāve ādīnavaṃ pakāsesi bhāriyo puthujjanabhāvo,
atk-s0504a:1346_10: yatra hi nāma jhānābhiññāpariyosānā sampattiyo nibbattetvāpi anekānatthāvahaṃ nānāvidhaṃ
atk-s0504a:1347_0: Gāthāsu māti paṭisedhe nipāto. Jātūti ekaṃsena. Kocīti sabbasaṅgāhakavacanaṃ. Lokasminti
atk-s0504a:1347_1: sattaloke. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “imasmiṃ sattaloke koci puggalo ekaṃsena pāpiccho mā
atk-s0504a:1347_2: hotū”ti. Tadamināpi jānātha, pāpicchānaṃ yathā gatīti pāpicchānaṃ puggalānaṃ yathā
atk-s0504a:1347_3: gati yādisī nipphatti, yādiso abhisamparāyo, taṃ imināpi kāraṇena jānāthāti devadattaṃ
atk-s0504a:1347_4: nidassento evamāha. Paṇḍitoti samaññātoti pariyattibāhusaccena paṇḍitoti ñāto. Bhāvitattoti
atk-s0504a:1347_5: sammatoti jhānābhiññāhi bhāvitacittoti sambhāvito. Tathā hi so pubbe “mahiddhiko
atk-s0504a:1347_6: godhiputto, mahānubhāvo godhiputto”ti dhammasenāpatināpi pasaṃsito ahosi. Jalaṃva
atk-s0504a:1347_7: yasasā aṭṭhā, devadattoti vissutoti attano kittiyā parivārena jalanto viya obhāsento
atk-s0504a:1347_8: viya ṭhito devadattoti evaṃ vissuto pākaṭo ahosi. “Me sutta”ntipi pāṭho, mayā sutaṃ
atk-s0504a:1347_9: sutamattaṃ, katipāheneva atathābhūtattā tassa taṃ paṇḍiccādi savanamattamevāti attho.
atk-s0504a:1348_0: So samānamanuciṇṇo, āsajja naṃ tathāgatanti so evaṃbhūto devadatto “buddhopi sakyaputto,
atk-s0504a:1348_1: ahampi sakyaputto, buddhopi samaṇo, ahampi samaṇo, buddhopi iddhimā, ahampi iddhimā,
atk-s0504a:1348_2: buddhopi dibbacakkhuko, ahampi dibbacakkhuko, buddhopi dibbasotako, ahampi dibbasotako,
atk-s0504a:1348_3: buddhopi cetopariyañāṇalābhī, ahampi cetopariyañāṇalābhī, buddhopi atītānāgatapaccuppanne
atk-s0504a:1348_4: dhamme jānāti, ahampi te jānāmī”ti attano pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā sammāsambuddhaṃ attanā
atk-s0504a:1348_5: samasamaṭṭhapanena samānaṃ āpajjanto “idānāhaṃ buddho bhavissāmi, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0504a:1348_6: pariharissāmī”ti abhimārapayojanā tathāgataṃ āsajja āsādetvā viheṭhetvā. “Pamādamanujīno”tipi
atk-s0504a:1348_7: paṭhanti. Tassattho “vuttanayena pamādaṃ āpajjanto pamādaṃ nissāya bhagavatā saddhiṃ
atk-s0504a:1348_8: yugaggāhacittuppādena saheva jhānābhiññāhi anujīno parihīno”ti. Avīcinirayaṃ patto,
atk-s0504a:1348_9: catudvāraṃ bhayānakanti jālānaṃ tattha uppannasattānaṃ vā nirantaratāya “avīcī”ti
atk-s0504a:1348_10: laddhanāmaṃ catūsu passesu catumahādvārayogena catudvāraṃ atibhayānakaṃ mahānirayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1353_0: Aduṭṭhassāti aduṭṭhacittassa. Dubbheti dūseyya. Tameva pāpaṃ phusatīti tameva aduṭṭhadubbhiṃ
atk-s0504a:1353_1: pāpapuggalaṃ pāpaṃ nihīnaṃ pāpaphalaṃ phusati pāpuṇāti abhibhavati. Bhesmāti vipulabhāvena
