atk-s0504a:1353_2: gambhīrabhāvena ca bhiṃsāpento viya, vipulagambhīroti attho. Vādenāti dosena. Vihiṃsatīti
atk-s0504a:1353_3: bādhati āsādeti. Vādo tamhi na rūhatīti tasmiṃ tathāgate parena āropiyamāno doso
atk-s0504a:1353_4: na ruhati, na tiṭṭhati, visakumbho viya samuddassa, na tassa vikāraṃ janetīti attho.
atk-s0504a:1354_0: Evaṃ chahi gāthāhi pāpicchatādisamannāgatassa nirayūpagabhāvadassanena dukkhato aparimuttataṃ
atk-s0504a:1354_2: mitta”nti osānagāthamāha. Tassattho – yassa sammā paṭipannassa maggānugo paṭipattimaggaṃ
atk-s0504a:1354_3: anugato sammā paṭipanno appicchatādiguṇasamannāgamena sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa khayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1354_4: pariyosānaṃ pāpuṇeyya. Tādisaṃ buddhaṃ vā buddhasāvakaṃ vā paṇḍito sappañño, attano
atk-s0504a:1354_5: mittaṃ kubbetha tena mettikaṃ kareyya, tañca seveyya tameva payirupāseyyāti.
atk-s0504a:1355: Iti imasmiṃ vagge chaṭṭhasattamasuttesu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, itaresu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1360_0: 90. Pañcamavaggassa paṭhame aggappasādāti ettha ayaṃ aggasaddo ādikoṭikoṭṭhāsaseṭṭhesu
atk-s0504a:1360_1: dissati. Tathā hesa “ajjatagge, samma dovārika, āvarāmi dvāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīnaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1360_2: Ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gata”nti ca ādīsu ādimhi dissati. “Teneva aṅgulaggena
atk-s0504a:1360_3: taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ parāmaseyya. Ucchaggaṃ veḷagga”nti ca ādīsu koṭiyaṃ. “Ambilaggaṃ vā
atk-s0504a:1360_4: madhuraggaṃ vā tittakaggaṃ vā. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena
atk-s0504a:1360_5: vā bhājetu”nti ca ādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho
atk-s0504a:1360_6: ca uttamo ca pavaro ca. Aggohamasmi lokassā”ti ca ādīsu seṭṭhe. Svāyamidhāpi seṭṭheyeva
atk-s0504a:1360_7: daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā aggesu seṭṭhesu pasādā, aggabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā vā pasādā aggappasādāti attho.
atk-s0504a:1361_0: Purimasmiñca atthe aggasaddena buddhādiratanattayaṃ vuccati. Tesu bhagavā tāva asadisaṭṭhena,
atk-s0504a:1361_1: guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena, asamasamaṭṭhena ca aggo. So hi mahābhinīhāraṃ dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:1361_2: pavicayañca ādiṃ katvā tehi bodhisambhāraguṇehi ceva buddhaguṇehi ca sesajanehi asadisoti
atk-s0504a:1361_3: asadisaṭṭhena aggo. Ye cassa guṇā mahākaruṇādayo, te sesasattānaṃ guṇehi visiṭṭhāti
atk-s0504a:1361_4: guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi sabbasattuttamatāya aggo. Ye pana purimakā sammāsambuddhā sabbasattehi
atk-s0504a:1361_5: asamā, tehi saddhiṃ ayameva rūpakāyaguṇehi ceva dhammakāyaguṇehi ca samoti asamasamaṭṭhenapi
atk-s0504a:1361_6: aggo. Tathā dullabhapātubhāvato acchariyamanussabhāvato bahujanahitasukhāvahato adutiyaasahāyādibhāvato
atk-s0504a:1361_7: ca bhagavā loke aggoti vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:1362: “Ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ, katamassa ekapuggalassa? Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
atk-s0504a:1364: “Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujana…pe… sammāsambuddho.
atk-s0504a:1365_0: “Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati, adutiyo asahāyo appaṭimo appaṭisamo
atk-s0504a:1365_1: appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo asamo asamasamo dvipadānaṃ aggo. Katamo ekapuggalo? Tathāgato
atk-s0504a:1366_1: ca aggā. Tathā hi tesaṃ svākkhātatādisuppaṭipannatādiguṇavisesehi aññadhammasaṅghā
atk-s0504a:1366_2: sadisā appataranihīnā vā natthi, kuto seṭṭhā. Sayameva ca pana tehi visiṭṭhaguṇatāya
atk-s0504a:1366_4: ca te. Yadaggena hi bhagavā dullabhapātubhāvo, tadaggena dhammasaṅghāpīti. Acchariyādibhāvepi
atk-s0504a:1366_5: eseva nayo. Evaṃ aggesu seṭṭhesu uttamesu pavaresu guṇavisiṭṭhesu pasādāti aggappasādā.
atk-s0504a:1367_0: Dutiyasmiṃ pana atthe yathāvuttesu aggesu buddhādīsu uppattiyā aggabhūtā pasādā aggappasādā.
atk-s0504a:1367_1: Ye pana ariyamaggena āgatā aveccappasādā, te ekanteneva aggabhūtā pasādāti aggappasādā.
atk-s0504a:1367_2: Yathāha “idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hotī”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:1367_3: Aggavipākattāpi cete aggappasādā. Vuttañhi “agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko”ti.
atk-s0504a:1368_0: Yāvatāti yattakā. Sattāti pāṇino. Apadāti apādakā. Dvipadāti dvipādakā. Sesapadadvayepi
atk-s0504a:1368_1: eseva nayo. Vā-saddo samuccayattho, na vikappattho. Yathā “anuppanno vā kāmāsavo
atk-s0504a:1368_2: uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhatī”ti ettha anuppanno ca uppanno cāti attho.
atk-s0504a:1368_3: Yathā ca “bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāyā”ti ettha bhūtānañca
atk-s0504a:1368_4: sambhavesīnañcāti attho. Yathā ca “aggito vā udakato vā mithubhedato vā”ti ettha
atk-s0504a:1368_5: aggito ca udakato ca mithubhedato cāti attho, evaṃ “apadā vā…pe… aggamakkhāyatī”ti
atk-s0504a:1368_6: etthāpi apadā ca dvipadā cāti sampiṇḍanavasena attho daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “vā-saddo
atk-s0504a:1369_0: Rūpinoti rūpavanto. Na rūpinoti arūpino. Saññinoti saññāvanto. Na saññinoti asaññino.
atk-s0504a:1369_1: Nevasaññināsaññino nāma bhavaggapariyāpannā. Ettāvatā ca kāmabhavo, rūpabhavo, arūpabhavo,
atk-s0504a:1369_2: ekavokārabhavo, catuvokārabhavo, pañcavokārabhavo, saññībhavo, asaññībhavo, nevasaññīnāsaññībhavoti
atk-s0504a:1369_3: navavidhepi bhave satte anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dassesi dhammarājā. Ettha hi rūpiggahaṇena
atk-s0504a:1369_4: kāmabhavo rūpabhavo pañcavokārabhavo ekavokārabhavo ca dassito, arūpiggahaṇena arūpabhavo
atk-s0504a:1369_5: catuvokārabhavo ca dassito. Saññībhavādayo pana sarūpeneva dassitā. Apadādiggahaṇena
atk-s0504a:1370_0: Kasmā panettha yathā adutiyasutte “dvipadānaṃ aggo”ti dvipadānaṃ gahaṇameva akatvā
atk-s0504a:1370_1: apadādiggahaṇaṃ katanti? Vuccate – adutiyasutte tāva seṭṭhataravasena dvipadaggahaṇameva
atk-s0504a:1370_2: kataṃ. Imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahuppadesu na uppajjati,
atk-s0504a:1370_3: dvipadesuyeva uppajjati. Kataresu dvipadesu? Manussesu ceva devesu ca. Manussesu
atk-s0504a:1370_4: uppajjamāno sakalalokaṃ vase vattetuṃ samattho buddho hutvā uppajjati. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1370_5: pana “tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ vase vattetuṃ samattho”ti vuttaṃ. Devesu uppajjamāno
atk-s0504a:1370_6: dasasahassilokadhātuṃ vase vattanako mahābrahmā hutvā uppajjati, so tassa kappiyakārako
atk-s0504a:1370_7: vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati. Iti tatopi seṭṭhataravasenesa “dvipadānaṃ aggo”ti tattha
atk-s0504a:1370_8: vutto, idha pana anavasesapariyādānavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Yāvattakā hi sattā attabhāvapariyāpannā
atk-s0504a:1370_9: apadā vā…pe… nevasaññīnāsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatīti. Niddhāraṇe
atk-s0504a:1370_10: cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, makāro padasandhikaro. Aggo akkhāyatīti padavibhāgo.
atk-s0504a:1371_0: Aggo vipāko hotīti agge sammāsambuddhe pasannānaṃ yo pasādo, so aggo seṭṭho uttamo
atk-s0504a:1371_1: koṭibhūto vā, tasmā tassa vipākopi aggo seṭṭho uttamo koṭibhūto uḷāratamo paṇītatamo
atk-s0504a:1371_2: hoti. So pana pasādo duvidho lokiyalokuttarabhedato. Tesu lokiyassa tāva –
atk-s0504a:1372: “Ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0504a:1375: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa.
atk-s0504a:1376: “Sataṃ hatthī sataṃ assā, sataṃ assatarī rathā;
atk-s0504a:1379_0: “Sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, buddhaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho,
atk-s0504a:1379_1: devānaminda, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ
atk-s0504a:1379_2: upapajjanti. Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti – dibbena āyunā, dibbena vaṇṇena,
atk-s0504a:1379_3: dibbena sukhena, dibbena yasena, dibbena ādhipateyyena, dibbehi rūpehi, dibbehi saddehi,
atk-s0504a:1379_4: dibbehi gandhehi, dibbehi rasehi, dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī”ti –
atk-s0504a:1380_0: Evamādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena pasādassa phalavisesayogo veditabbo. Tasmā so apāyadukkhavinivattanena
atk-s0504a:1380_1: saddhiṃ sampattibhavesu sukhavipākadāyakoti daṭṭhabbo. Lokuttaro pana sāmaññaphalavipākadāyako
atk-s0504a:1380_2: vaṭṭadukkhavinivattako ca. Sabbopi cāyaṃ pasādo paramparāya vaṭṭadukkhaṃ vinivattetiyeva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1381_0: “Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako attano saddhaṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ
atk-s0504a:1381_1: samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0504a:1381_2: cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti. Ujugatacittassa pāmojjaṃ jāyati,
atk-s0504a:1381_3: pamuditassa pīti jāyati…pe… nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1382_0: Dhammāti sabhāvadhammā. Saṅkhatāti samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katāti saṅkhatā, sappaccayadhammā.
atk-s0504a:1382_1: Hetūhi paccayehi ca na kehici katāti asaṅkhatā, appaccayanibbānaṃ. Saṅkhatānaṃ paṭiyogibhāvena
atk-s0504a:1382_2: “asaṅkhatā”ti puthuvacanaṃ. Virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatīti tesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1382_3: yo virāgasaṅkhāto asaṅkhatadhammo, so sabhāveneva saṇhasukhumabhāvato santatarapaṇītatarabhāvato
atk-s0504a:1382_4: gambhīrādibhāvato madanimmadanādibhāvato ca aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaranti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:1382_5: Yadidanti nipāto, yo ayanti attho. Madanimmadanotiādīni sabbāni nibbānavevacanāniyeva.
atk-s0504a:1382_6: Tathā hi taṃ āgamma mānamadapurisamadādiko sabbo mado nimmadīyati pamaddīyati, kāmapipāsādikā
atk-s0504a:1382_7: sabbā pipāsā vinīyati, kāmālayādikā sabbepi ālayā samugghātīyanti, sabbepi kammavaṭṭakilesavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭā
atk-s0504a:1382_8: upacchijjanti, aṭṭhasatabhedā sabbāpi taṇhā khīyati, sabbepi kilesā virajjanti, sabbaṃ
atk-s0504a:1382_9: dukkhaṃ nirujjhati, tasmā madanimmadano…pe… nirodhoti vuccati. Yā panesā taṇhā bhavena
atk-s0504a:1382_10: bhavaṃ, phalena kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati. Taṃ vānaṃ ettha
atk-s0504a:1382_11: natthi, etasmiṃ vā adhigate ariyapuggalassa na hotīti nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1386: “Sādhu kho, devānaminda, dhammaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti. Dhammaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda, evamidhekacce…pe… dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī”ti –
atk-s0504a:1387_0: Evamādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena dhamme pasādassa phalavisesayogo veditabbo. Evamettha
atk-s0504a:1388: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1390_0: Saṅghā vā gaṇā vāti janasamūhasaṅkhātā yāvatā loke saṅghā vā gaṇā vā. Tathāgatasāvakasaṅghoti
atk-s0504a:1390_2: Tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatīti attano sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiādiguṇavisesena tesaṃ saṅghānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1390_3: aggo seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti vuccati. Yadidanti yāni imāni. Cattāri purisayugānīti
atk-s0504a:1390_4: yugaḷavasena paṭhamamaggaṭṭho paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷaṃ, yāva catutthamaggaṭṭho
atk-s0504a:1390_5: catutthaphalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugāni. Aṭṭha purisapuggalāti
atk-s0504a:1390_6: purisapuggalavasena eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho eko paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭha
atk-s0504a:1390_7: purisapuggalā. Ettha ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthāni etāni padāni, veneyyavasena
atk-s0504a:1390_8: panevaṃ vuttaṃ. Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti yānimāni yugavasena cattāri purisayugāni,
atk-s0504a:1390_9: pāṭekkato aṭṭha purisapuggalā, esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho.
atk-s0504a:1391_0: Āhuneyyotiādīsu ānetvā hunitabbanti āhunaṃ, dūratopi āgantvā sīlavantesu dātabbanti
atk-s0504a:1391_1: attho. Catunnaṃ paccayānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Mahapphalabhāvakaraṇato taṃ āhunaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ
atk-s0504a:1391_2: yuttoti āhuneyyo. Atha vā dūratopi āgantvā sabbaṃ sāpateyyampi ettha hunitabbaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1391_3: sakkādīnampi āhavanaṃ arahatīti vā āhavanīyo. Yo cāyaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ āhavanīyo nāma
atk-s0504a:1391_4: aggi, yattha hutaṃ mahapphalanti tesaṃ laddhi, so ce hutassa mahapphalatāya āhavanīyo,
atk-s0504a:1391_5: saṅghova āhavanīyo. Saṅghe hutañhi mahapphalaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:1392: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane;
atk-s0504a:1394: Sā eva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ huta”nti. ;
atk-s0504a:1395: Tayidaṃ nikāyantare “āhavanīyo”ti padaṃ idha “āhuneyyo”ti iminā padena atthato ekaṃ, byañjanato pana kiñcimattameva nānaṃ, tasmā evamatthavaṇṇanā katā.
atk-s0504a:1396_0: Pāhuneyyoti ettha pana pāhunaṃ vuccati disāvidisato āgatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ ñātimittānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1396_1: atthāya sakkārena paṭiyattaṃ āgantukadānaṃ, tampi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe pāhunake
atk-s0504a:1396_2: saṅghasseva dātuṃ yuttaṃ. Tathā hesa ekabuddhantarepi dissati abbokiṇṇañca. Ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1396_3: panettha padattho – “piyamanāpattakarehi dhammehi samannāgato”ti evaṃ pāhunamassa
atk-s0504a:1396_4: dātuṃ yuttaṃ, pāhunañca paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti pāhuneyyo. Yesaṃ pana pāhavanīyoti pāḷi,
atk-s0504a:1396_5: tesaṃ yasmā saṅgho pubbakāraṃ arahati, tasmā saṅgho sabbapaṭhamaṃ ānetvā ettha hunitabbanti
atk-s0504a:1396_6: pāhavanīyo, sabbappakārena vā āhavanaṃ arahatīti pāhavanīyo. Svāyamidha teneva atthena
atk-s0504a:1397_0: “Dakkhiṇā”ti paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbadānaṃ, taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ arahati dakkhiṇāya
atk-s0504a:1397_1: vā hito mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena visodhanatoti dakkhiṇeyyo. Ubho hatthe sirasi patiṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0504a:1397_2: sabbalokena kariyamānaṃ añjalikammaṃ arahatīti añjalikaraṇīyo. Anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ
atk-s0504a:1397_3: lokassāti sabbalokassa asadisaṃ puññavirūhanaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā hi rattasālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1397_4: vā virūhanaṭṭhānaṃ “rattasālikkhettaṃ yavakkhetta”nti vuccati, evaṃ saṅgho sadevakassa
atk-s0504a:1397_5: lokassa puññavirūhanaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṅghaṃ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhanibbattakāni
atk-s0504a:1397_6: puññāni virūhanti, tasmā saṅgho anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa. Idhāpi –
atk-s0504a:1400: “Sādhu kho, devānaminda, saṅghaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho devānaminda…pe… dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī”ti –
atk-s0504a:1401_0: Ādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena saṅghe pasādassa phalavisesayogo, tenassa aggatā aggavipākatā
atk-s0504a:1401_1: ca veditabbā. Tathā anuttariyapaṭilābho sattamabhavādito paṭṭhāya vaṭṭadukkhasamucchedo
atk-s0504a:1402_0: Gāthāsu aggatoti agge ratanattaye, aggabhāvato vā pasannānaṃ. Aggaṃ dhammanti aggasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0504a:1402_3: vijānantānaṃ. Evaṃ sādhāraṇato aggappasādavatthuṃ dassetvā idāni asādhāraṇato taṃ
atk-s0504a:1402_4: vibhāgena dassetuṃ “agge buddhe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pasannānanti aveccappasādena
atk-s0504a:1402_5: itarappasādena ca pasannānaṃ adhimuttānaṃ. Virāgūpasameti virāge upasame ca, sabbassa
atk-s0504a:1402_6: rāgassa sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantavirāgahetubhūte accantaupasamahetubhūte cāti attho.
atk-s0504a:1403_0: Aggasmiṃ dānaṃ dadatanti agge ratanattaye dānaṃ dentānaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajantānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1403_1: Tattha dharamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā parinibbutañca
atk-s0504a:1403_2: bhagavantaṃ uddissa dhātucetiyādike upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā buddhe dānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1403_3: dadanti nāma. “Dhammaṃ pūjessāmā”ti dhammadhare puggale catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā
atk-s0504a:1403_4: pūjentā sakkarontā dhammañca ciraṭṭhitikaṃ karontā dhamme dānaṃ dadanti nāma. Tathā
atk-s0504a:1403_5: ariyasaṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā taṃ uddissa itarasmimpi
atk-s0504a:1403_6: tathā paṭipajjantā saṅghe dānaṃ dadanti nāma. Aggaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti evaṃ ratanattaye
atk-s0504a:1403_7: pasannena cetasā uḷāraṃ pariccāgaṃ uḷārañca pūjāsakkāraṃ pavattentānaṃ divase divase
atk-s0504a:1403_8: aggaṃ uḷāraṃ kusalaṃ upacīyati. Idāni tassa puññassa aggavipākatāya aggabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0504a:1403_9: “aggaṃ āyū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha aggaṃ āyūti dibbaṃ vā mānusaṃ vā aggaṃ uḷāratamaṃ
atk-s0504a:1403_10: āyu. Pavaḍḍhatīti uparūpari brūhati. Vaṇṇoti rūpasampadā. Yasoti parivārasampadā.
atk-s0504a:1403_11: Kittīti thutighoso. Sukhanti kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ. Balanti kāyabalaṃ ñāṇabalañca.
atk-s0504a:1404_0: Aggassa dātāti aggassa ratanattayassa dātā, atha vā aggassa deyyadhammassa dānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1404_1: uḷāraṃ katvā tattha puññaṃ pavattetā. Aggadhammasamāhitoti aggena pasādadhammena
atk-s0504a:1404_2: dānādidhammena ca samāhito samannāgato acalappasādayutto, tassa vā vipākabhūtehi
atk-s0504a:1404_3: bahujanassa piyamanāpatādidhammehi yutto. Aggappatto pamodatīti yattha yattha sattanikāye
atk-s0504a:1404_4: uppanno, tattha tattha aggabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ adhigato, aggabhāvaṃ vā lokuttaramaggaphalaṃ
atk-s0504a:1407_0: 91. Dutiyaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena desitaṃ. Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṃ
atk-s0504a:1407_1: nigrodhārāme viharante bhikkhū āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ senāsanāni paññāpentā pattacīvarāni
atk-s0504a:1407_2: paṭisāmentā sāmaṇerā ca lābhabhājanīyaṭṭhāne sampattasampattānaṃ lābhaṃ gaṇhantā
atk-s0504a:1407_3: uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā bhagavā bhikkhū paṇāmesi. Te kira sabbeva navā
atk-s0504a:1407_4: adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ. Taṃ ñatvā mahābrahmā āgantvā “abhinandatu, bhante,
atk-s0504a:1407_5: bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgha”nti tesaṃ paṇāmitabhikkhūnaṃ anuggaṇhanaṃ yāci. Bhagavā tassa
atk-s0504a:1407_6: okāsaṃ akāsi. Atha mahābrahmā “katāvakāso khomhi bhagavatā”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-s0504a:1407_7: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Atha bhagavā “bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū”ti ānandattherassa
atk-s0504a:1407_8: ākāraṃ dassesi. Atha te bhikkhū ānandattherena pakkositā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0504a:1407_9: sārajjamānarūpā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Bhagavā tesaṃ sappāyadesanaṃ vīmaṃsanto “ime
atk-s0504a:1407_10: āmisahetu paṇāmitā, piṇḍiyālopadhammadesanā nesaṃ sappāyā”ti cintetvā “antamidaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1408_0: Tatrāyaṃ antasaddo “santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā pubbantakappikā pubbantānudiṭṭhino”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:1408_1: koṭṭhāse āgato. “Antamakāsi dukkhassa, antavā ayaṃ loko parivaṭumo”tiādīsu paricchede.
atk-s0504a:1408_2: “Haritantaṃ vā pathantaṃ vā selantaṃ vā”tiādīsu mariyādāyaṃ. “Antaṃ antaguṇa”ntiādīsu
atk-s0504a:1408_3: sarīrāvayave “caranti loke parivārachannā, anto asuddhā bahi sobhamānā”tiādīsu citte.
atk-s0504a:1408_4: “Appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṃvaḍḍhāni
atk-s0504a:1410: Eraṇḍo anto rukkhānaṃ, tayo antā samāgatā”ti. –
atk-s0504a:1411_0: Ādīsu lāmake. Idhāpi lāmake eva daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā antamidaṃ bhikkhave jīvikānanti
atk-s0504a:1411_1: bhikkhave idaṃ jīvikānaṃ antaṃ pacchimaṃ lāmakaṃ, sabbanihīnaṃ jīvitanti attho. Yadidaṃ
atk-s0504a:1411_2: piṇḍolyanti yaṃ idaṃ piṇḍapariyesanena bhikkhācariyāya jīvikaṃ kappentassa jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1411_3: Ayaṃ panettha padattho – piṇḍāya ulatīti piṇḍolo, tassa kammaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ, piṇḍapariyesanena jīvikāti attho.
atk-s0504a:1412_0: Abhisāpoti akkoso. Kupitā hi manussā attano paccatthikaṃ “pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0504a:1412_1: kapālahattho piṇḍaṃ pariyesamāno careyyāsī”ti akkosanti. Atha vā “kiṃ tuyhaṃ akātabbaṃ
atk-s0504a:1412_2: atthi, yo tvaṃ evaṃ balavīriyūpapannopi hirottappaṃ pahāya kapaṇo piṇḍolo vicarasi
atk-s0504a:1412_3: pattapāṇī”ti evampi akkosantiyeva. Tañca kho etanti taṃ etaṃ abhisapampi samānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1412_4: piṇḍolyaṃ. Kulaputtā upenti atthavasikāti mama sāsane jātikulaputtā ca ācārakulaputtā
atk-s0504a:1412_5: ca atthavasikā kāraṇavasikā hutvā kāraṇavasaṃ paṭicca upenti upagacchanti.
atk-s0504a:1413_0: Rājābhinītātiādīsu ye rañño santakaṃ khāditvā raññā bandhanāgāre bandhāpitā palāyitvā
atk-s0504a:1413_1: pabbajanti, te raññā bandhanaṃ abhinītattā rājābhinītā nāma. Ye pana corehi aṭaviyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1413_2: gahetvā ekaccesu māriyamānesu ekacce “mayaṃ sāmi tumhehi vissaṭṭhā gehaṃ anajjhāvasitvā
atk-s0504a:1413_3: pabbajissāma, tattha tattha yaṃ yaṃ buddhapūjādipuññaṃ karissāma, tato tato tumhākaṃ
atk-s0504a:1413_4: pattiṃ dassāmā”ti tehi vissaṭṭhā pabbajanti, te corābhinītā nāma corehi māretabbataṃ
atk-s0504a:1413_5: abhinītattā. Ye pana iṇaṃ gahetvā paṭidātuṃ asakkontā palāyitvā pabbajanti, te iṇaṭṭā
atk-s0504a:1413_6: nāma. Tañca kho etaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ kulaputtā mama sāsane neva rājābhinītā…pe… na ājīvikāpakatā
atk-s0504a:1413_7: upenti, apica kho “otiṇṇamhā jātiyā…pe… paññāyethā”ti upentīti padasambandho.
atk-s0504a:1414_0: Tattha otiṇṇamhāti otiṇṇā amhā. Jātiyātiādīsu tamhi tamhi sattanikāye khandhānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1414_1: paṭhamābhinibbatti jāti, paripāko jarā, bhedo maraṇaṃ. Ñātirogabhogasīladiṭṭhibyasanehi
atk-s0504a:1414_2: phuṭṭhassa santāpo anto nijjhānaṃ soko, tehi phuṭṭhassa vacīvippalāpo paridevo. Aniṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbapaṭihatakāyassa
atk-s0504a:1414_3: kāyapīḷanaṃ dukkhaṃ, āghātavatthūsu upahatacittassa cetopīḷanaṃ domanassaṃ. Ñātibyasanādīhi
atk-s0504a:1414_4: eva phuṭṭhassa paridevenapi adhivāsetuṃ asamatthassa cittasantāpasamuṭṭhito bhuso
atk-s0504a:1414_5: āyāso upāyāso. Etehi jātiādīhi otiṇṇā dukkhotiṇṇā, tehi jātiādidukkhehi anto anupaviṭṭhā.
atk-s0504a:1414_6: Dukkhaparetāti tehi dukkhadukkhavatthūhi abhibhūtā. Jātiādayo hi dukkhassa vatthubhāvato
atk-s0504a:1414_7: dukkhā, dukkhabhāvato ca sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā dukkhāti. Appeva nāma…pe…
atk-s0504a:1414_8: paññāyethāti imassa sakalassa vaṭṭadukkharāsissa paricchedakaraṇaṃ osānakiriyā api nāma paññāyeyya.
atk-s0504a:1415_0: So ca hoti abhijjhālūti idaṃ yo kulaputto “dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī”ti pubbe cittaṃ
atk-s0504a:1415_1: uppādetvā pabbajito aparabhāge taṃ pabbajjaṃ tathārūpaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, taṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0504a:1415_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha abhijjhālūti parabhaṇḍānaṃ abhijjhāyitā. Tibbasārāgoti balavarāgo.
atk-s0504a:1415_3: Byāpannacittoti byāpādena pūtibhūtattā vipannacitto. Paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappoti tikhiṇasiṅgo
atk-s0504a:1415_4: viya caṇḍagoṇo paresaṃ upaghātavasena duṭṭhacitto. Muṭṭhassatīti bhattanikkhittakāko
atk-s0504a:1415_5: viya, maṃsanikkhittasunakho viya ca naṭṭhassati, idha kataṃ ettha na sarati. Asampajānoti
atk-s0504a:1415_6: nippañño khandhādiparicchedarahito. Asamāhitoti caṇḍasote baddhanāvā viya asaṇṭhito.
atk-s0504a:1415_7: Vibbhantacittoti panthāruḷhamigo viya bhantamano. Pākatindriyoti yathā gihī saṃvarābhāvena
atk-s0504a:1415_8: pariggahaparijane olokenti asaṃvutindriyā, evaṃ asaṃvutindriyo hoti.
atk-s0504a:1416_0: Chavālātanti chavānaṃ daḍḍhaṭṭhāne alātaṃ. Ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagatanti pamāṇena
atk-s0504a:1416_1: aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ ubhato dvīsu koṭīsu ādittaṃ majjhe gūthamakkhitaṃ. Neva gāmeti sace
atk-s0504a:1416_2: hi taṃ yuganaṅgalagopānasipakkhapāsakādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā assa gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:1416_3: phareyya. Sace khettakuṭiyā kaṭṭhattharamañcakādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā assa,
atk-s0504a:1416_4: araññe kaṭṭhatthaṃ phareyya. Yasmā pana ubhayatthāpi na sakkā, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1416_5: Tathūpamāhanti tathūpamaṃ chavālātasadisaṃ ahaṃ imaṃ yathāvuttapuggalaṃ vadāmi. Gihibhogā
atk-s0504a:1416_6: ca parihīnoti yo agāre vasantehi gihīhi dāyajje bhājiyamāne aññathā ca bhogo laddhabbo
atk-s0504a:1416_7: assa, tato ca parihīno. Sāmaññatthañcāti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā pariyattipaṭivedhavasena
atk-s0504a:1416_8: pattabbaṃ sāmaññatthañca na paripūreti. Imaṃ pana upamaṃ satthā na dussīlassa vasena
atk-s0504a:1416_9: āhari, parisuddhasīlassa pana alasassa abhijjhādīhi dosehi dūsitacittassa puggalassa
atk-s0504a:1417_0: Gāthāsu gihibhogāti kāmasukhasambhogato. Parihīnoti jīno. Sāmaññatthanti paṭivedhabāhusaccañceva
atk-s0504a:1417_1: pariyattibāhusaccañca. Tādiso hi asutaṃ sotuṃ sutaṃ pariyodāpetuṃ na sakkoti alasabhāvato.
atk-s0504a:1417_2: Duṭṭhu bhagoti dubbhago, alakkhiko kāḷakaṇṇipuriso. Paridhaṃsamānoti vinassamāno.
atk-s0504a:1417_3: Pakiretīti vikireti viddhaṃseti. Sabbametaṃ bhāvino sāmaññatthassa anuppādanameva
atk-s0504a:1417_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Chavālātaṃva nassatīti so tādiso puggalo yathāvuttaṃ chavālātaṃ
atk-s0504a:1417_5: viya kassaci anupayujjamāno eva nassati ubhato paribhaṭṭhabhāvato. Evaṃ “kāyavācāhi
atk-s0504a:1417_6: akatavītikkamopi cittaṃ avisodhento nassati, pageva katavītikkamo dussīlo”ti tassa
atk-s0504a:1417_7: apāyadukkhabhāgibhāvadassanena dussīle ādīnavaṃ dassetvā tato satte vivecetukāmo
atk-s0504a:1420_0: 92. Tatiye saṅghāṭikaṇṇeti cīvarakoṭiyaṃ. Gahetvāti parāmasitvā. Anubandho assāti
atk-s0504a:1420_1: anugato bhaveyya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu attano hatthena
atk-s0504a:1420_2: mayā pārutassa sugatamahācīvarassa kaṇṇe parāmasanto viya maṃ anugaccheyya, evaṃ
atk-s0504a:1420_3: mayhaṃ āsannataro hutvā vihareyyā”ti. Pāde pādaṃ nikkhipantoti gacchantassa mama
atk-s0504a:1420_4: pāde pādaṃ nikkhittaṭṭhāne pāduddhāraṇānantaraṃ attano pādaṃ nikkhipanto. Ubhayenāpi
atk-s0504a:1420_5: “ṭhānagamanādīsu avijahanto sabbakālaṃ mayhaṃ samīpe eva vihareyya cepī”ti dasseti.
atk-s0504a:1420_6: So ārakāva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassāti so bhikkhu mayā vuttaṃ paṭipadaṃ apūrento mama
atk-s0504a:1420_7: dūreyeva, ahañca tassa dūreyeva. Etena maṃsacakkhunā tathāgatadassanaṃ rūpakāyasamodhānañca
atk-s0504a:1420_8: akāraṇaṃ, ñāṇacakkhunāva dassanaṃ dhammakāyasamodhānameva ca pamāṇanti dasseti. Tenevāha
atk-s0504a:1420_9: “dhammañhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati, dhammaṃ apassanto na maṃ passatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1420_10: Tattha dhammo nāma navavidho lokuttaradhammo. So ca abhijjhādīhi dūsitacittena na
atk-s0504a:1420_11: sakkā passituṃ, tasmā dhammassa adassanato dhammakāyañca na passatīti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1421: “Kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? Yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati so maṃ passati; yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1424: Yojanasateti yojanasate padese, yojanasatamatthaketi attho. Sesaṃ vuttavipariyāyena veditabbaṃ. Ariyamaggādhigamavasena cassa anabhijjhāluādibhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:1425_0: Gāthāsu mahicchoti kāmesu tibbasārāgatāya mahāiccho. Vighātavāti paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappatāya
atk-s0504a:1425_1: sattesu āghātavasena mahicchatāya icchitālābhena ca vighātavā. Ejānugoti ejāsaṅkhātāya
atk-s0504a:1425_2: taṇhāya dāso viya hutvā taṃ anugacchanto. Rāgādikilesapariḷāhābhibhavena anibbuto.
atk-s0504a:1425_3: Rūpādivisayānaṃ abhikaṅkhanena giddho. Passa yāvañca ārakāti anejassa nibbutassa
atk-s0504a:1425_4: vītagedhassa sammāsambuddhassa okāsavasena samīpepi samāno mahiccho vighātavā ejānugo
atk-s0504a:1425_5: anibbuto giddho bālaputhujjano dhammasabhāvato yattakaṃ dūre, tassa so dūrabhāvo
atk-s0504a:1425_6: passa, vattumpi na sukaranti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1430_0: Dhammamabhiññāyāti catusaccadhammaṃ abhiññāya aññāya ñātatīraṇapariññāhi yathārahaṃ
atk-s0504a:1430_1: pubbabhāge jānitvā. Dhammamaññāyāti tameva dhammaṃ aparabhāge maggañāṇena pariññādivasena
atk-s0504a:1430_2: yathāmariyādaṃ jānitvā. Paṇḍitoti paṭivedhabāhusaccena paṇḍito. Rahadova nivāte cāti
atk-s0504a:1430_3: nivātaṭṭhāne rahado viya anejo kilesacalanarahito upasammati, yathā so rahado nivātaṭṭhāne
atk-s0504a:1430_4: vātena anabbhāhato sannisinnova hoti, evaṃ ayampi sabbathāpi paṭippassaddhakileso
atk-s0504a:1430_6: hoti. Anejoti so evaṃ anejādisabhāvo arahā anejādisabhāvassa sammāsambuddhassa okāsato
atk-s0504a:1430_7: dūrepi samāno dhammasabhāvato adūre santike evāti.
atk-s0504a:1433_0: 93. Catutthe anudahanaṭṭhena aggi, rāgo eva aggi rāgaggi. Rāgo hi uppajjamāno satte
atk-s0504a:1433_1: anudahati jhāpeti, tasmā “aggī”ti vuccati. Itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo. Tattha yathā
atk-s0504a:1433_2: aggi yadeva indhanaṃ nissāya uppajjati, taṃ nidahati, mahāpariḷāho ca hoti, evamimepi
atk-s0504a:1433_3: rāgādayo yasmiṃ santāne sayaṃ uppannā, taṃ nidahanti, mahāpariḷāhā ca honti dunnibbāpayā.
atk-s0504a:1433_4: Tesu rāgapariḷāhena santattahadayānaṃ icchitālābhadukkhena maraṇappattānaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1433_5: pamāṇaṃ natthi. Ayaṃ tāva rāgassa anudahanatā. Dosassa pana anudahanatāya visesato
atk-s0504a:1433_6: manopadosikā devā, mohassa anudahanatāya khiḍḍāpadosikā devā ca nidassanaṃ. Mohavasena
atk-s0504a:1433_7: hi tesaṃ satisammoso hoti, tasmā khiḍḍāvasena āhāravelaṃ ativattentā kālaṃ karonti.
atk-s0504a:1433_8: Ayaṃ tāva rāgādīnaṃ diṭṭhadhammiko anudahanabhāvo. Samparāyiko pana nirayādīsu nibbattāpanavasena
atk-s0504a:1433_9: ghorataro duradhivāso ca. Ayañca attho ādittapariyāyena vibhāvetabbo.
atk-s0504a:1434_0: Gāthāsu kāmesu mucchiteti vatthukāmesu pātabyatāvasena mucchaṃ bālyaṃ pamādaṃ micchācāraṃ
atk-s0504a:1434_1: āpanne. Byāpanneti byāpannacitte dahatīti sambandho. Nare pāṇātipātinoti idaṃ dosaggissa.
atk-s0504a:1434_2: Ariyadhamme akovideti ye khandhāyatanādīsu sabbena sabbaṃ uggahaparipucchāya manasikārarahitā
atk-s0504a:1434_3: ariyadhammassa akusalā, te sammohena abhibhūtā visesena sammūḷhā nāmāti vuttā. Ete
atk-s0504a:1434_4: aggī ajānantāti “ete rāgaggiādayo idha ceva samparāye ca anudahantī”ti ajānantā pariññābhisamayavasena
atk-s0504a:1434_5: pahānābhisamayavasena ca appaṭivijjhantā. Sakkāyābhiratāti sakkāye upādānakkhandhapañcake
atk-s0504a:1434_6: taṇhādiṭṭhimānanandanābhiratā. Vaḍḍhayantīti punappunaṃ uppajjanena vaḍḍhayanti ācinanti.
atk-s0504a:1434_7: Nirayanti aṭṭhavidhaṃ mahānirayaṃ, soḷasavidhaṃ ussadanirayanti sabbampi nirayaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1434_8: Tiracchānañca yoniyoti tiracchānayoniyo ca. Asuranti asurakāyaṃ pettivisayañca vaḍḍhayantīti sambandho.
atk-s0504a:1435_0: Ettāvatā rāgaggiādīnaṃ idha ceva samparāye ca anudahanabhāvadassanamukhena vaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0504a:1435_1: dassetvā idāni nesaṃ nibbāpanena vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ “ye ca rattindivā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1435_2: Tattha yuttāti bhāvanānuyogavasena yuttā. Kattha? Sammāsambuddhasāsane. Tena aññasāsane
atk-s0504a:1435_3: rāgaggiādīnaṃ nibbāpanābhāvaṃ dasseti. Tathā hi anaññasādhāraṇaṃ tesaṃ nibbāpanavidhiṃ
atk-s0504a:1439_0: Āha. Tattha asubhasaññinoti dvattiṃsākāravasena ceva uddhumātakādivasena ca asubhabhāvanānuyogena
atk-s0504a:1439_1: asubhasaññino. Mettāyāti “so mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti
atk-s0504a:1439_2: vuttāya mettābhāvanāya. Ettha ca asubhajjhānañca pādakaṃ katvā nibbattitaanāgāmimaggena
atk-s0504a:1439_3: rāgaggidosaggīnaṃ nibbāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Paññāyāti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya.
atk-s0504a:1439_4: Tenevāha “yāyaṃ nibbedhagāminī”ti. Sā hi kilesakkhandhaṃ vinivijjhantī gacchati pavattatīti
atk-s0504a:1439_5: nibbedhagāminīti vuccati. Asesaṃ parinibbantīti arahattamaggena asesaṃ rāgaggiādiṃ
atk-s0504a:1439_6: nibbāpetvā saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā ṭhitā paññāvepullappattiyā nipakā pubbeva
atk-s0504a:1439_7: sammappadhānena sabbaso kosajjassa suppahīnattā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena akilāsubhāvena
atk-s0504a:1439_8: ca rattindivamatanditā carimakacittanirodhena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā asesaṃ
atk-s0504a:1439_9: parinibbanti. Tato ca asesaṃ nissesaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ accaguṃ atikkamaṃsu.
atk-s0504a:1440_0: Evaṃ ye rāgaggiādike nibbāpenti, tesaṃ anupādisesanibbānena nibbutiṃ dassetvā idāni
atk-s0504a:1440_1: paṭividdhaguṇehi thomento osānagāthamāha. Tattha ariyaddasāti ariyehi buddhādīhi
atk-s0504a:1440_2: passitabbaṃ kilesehi vā ārakattā ariyaṃ nibbānaṃ, ariyaṃ catusaccameva vā diṭṭhavantoti
atk-s0504a:1440_3: ariyaddasā. Vedassa maggañāṇassa, tena vā vedena saṃsārassa pariyosānaṃ gatāti vedaguno.
atk-s0504a:1440_4: Sammadaññāyāti sammadeva sabbaṃ ājānitabbaṃ kusalādiṃ khandhādiñca jānitvā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:1443_0: 94. Pañcame tathā tathāti tena tena pakārena. Upaparikkheyyāti vīmaṃseyya parituleyya
atk-s0504a:1443_1: sammaseyya vā. Yathā yathāssa upaparikkhatoti yathā yathā assa bhikkhuno upaparikkhantassa.
atk-s0504a:1443_2: Bahiddhā cassa viññāṇaṃ avikkhittaṃ avisaṭanti bahiddhā rūpādiārammaṇe uppajjanakavikkhepābhāvato
atk-s0504a:1443_3: avikkhittaṃ samāhitaṃ, tato eva avisaṭaṃ siyā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bhikkhave, yena
atk-s0504a:1443_4: yena pakārena imassa āraddhavipassakassa bhikkhuno upaparikkhato saṅkhāre sammasantassa
atk-s0504a:1443_5: pubbe samāhitākārasallakkhaṇavasena samathanimittaṃ gahetvā sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ
atk-s0504a:1443_6: sammasanañāṇaṃ pavattentassa attano vipassanācittaṃ kammaṭṭhānato bahiddhā rūpādiārammaṇe
atk-s0504a:1443_7: uppajjanakaṃ na siyā, accāraddhavīriyatāya uddhaccapakkhiyaṃ na siyā, tena tena pakārena
atk-s0504a:1443_8: bhikkhu upaparikkheyya parituleyyāti. Ajjhattaṃ asaṇṭhitanti yasmā vīriye mandaṃ
atk-s0504a:1443_9: vahante samādhissa balavabhāvato kosajjābhibhavena ajjhattaṃ gocarajjhattasaṅkhāte
atk-s0504a:1443_10: kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe saṅkocavasena ṭhitattā saṇṭhitaṃ nāma hoti, vīriyasamatāya pana
atk-s0504a:1443_11: yojitāya asaṇṭhitaṃ hoti vīthiṃ paṭipannaṃ. Tasmā yathā yathāssa upaparikkhato viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:1443_12: ajjhattaṃ asaṇṭhitaṃ assa, vīthipaṭipannaṃ siyā, tathā tathā upaparikkheyya. Anupādāya
atk-s0504a:1443_13: na paritasseyyāti yathā yathāssa upaparikkhato “etaṃ mama, eso me attā”ti taṇhādiṭṭhiggāhavasena
atk-s0504a:1443_14: rūpādīsu kañci saṅkhāraṃ aggahetvā tato eva taṇhādiṭṭhiggāhavasena na paritasseyya,
atk-s0504a:1443_15: tathā tathā upaparikkheyyāti sambandho. Kathaṃ pana upaparikkhato tividhampetaṃ siyāti?
atk-s0504a:1443_16: Uddhaccapakkhiye kosajjapakkhiye ca dhamme vajjento vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā pubbeva
atk-s0504a:1443_17: vipassanupakkilesehi cittaṃ visodhetvā yathā sammadeva vipassanāñāṇaṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ
atk-s0504a:1444_0: Iti bhagavā catusaccakammaṭṭhānikassa bhikkhuno anukkamena paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā
atk-s0504a:1444_2: dassetvā idāni tathā visodhite vipassanāñāṇe na cirasseva vipassanaṃ maggena ghaṭetvā
atk-s0504a:1444_4: taṃ vuttanayameva. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ – “āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇadukkhasamudayasambhavo
atk-s0504a:1444_5: na hotī”ti, tassattho – evaṃ vipassanaṃ maggena ghaṭetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā aggamaggena
atk-s0504a:1444_7: sambhavo uppādo ca na hoti, jātisaṅkhāto vā dukkhasamudayo jarāmaraṇasaṅkhāto dukkhasambhavo ca na hoti.
atk-s0504a:1445_0: Gāthāyaṃ sattasaṅgappahīnassāti taṇhāsaṅgo, diṭṭhisaṅgo, mānasaṅgo, kodhasaṅgo, avijjāsaṅgo,
atk-s0504a:1445_1: kilesasaṅgo, duccaritasaṅgoti imesaṃ sattannaṃ saṅgānaṃ pahīnattā sattasaṅgappahīnassa.
atk-s0504a:1445_2: Keci pana “sattānusayā eva satta saṅgā”ti vadanti. Netticchinnassāti chinnabhavanettikassa.
atk-s0504a:1445_3: Vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāroti punappunaṃ jāyanavasena pavattiyā jātihetukattā ca jātibhūto
atk-s0504a:1445_4: saṃsāroti jātisaṃsāro, so bhavanettiyā chinnattā vikkhīṇo parikkhīṇo, tato eva natthi tassa punabbhavoti.
atk-s0504a:1448_0: 95. Chaṭṭhe kāmūpapattiyoti kāmapaṭilābhā kāmapaṭisevanā vā. Paccupaṭṭhitakāmāti
atk-s0504a:1448_1: nibaddhakāmā nibaddhārammaṇā yathā taṃ manussā. Manussā hi nibaddhavatthusmiṃ vasaṃ
atk-s0504a:1448_2: vattenti. Yattha paṭibaddhacittā honti, satampi sahassampi datvā tameva mātugāmaṃ
atk-s0504a:1448_3: ānetvā nibaddhabhogaṃ bhuñjanti. Ekacce ca devā. Cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya hi catudevalokavāsino
atk-s0504a:1448_4: nibaddhavatthusmiṃyeva vasaṃ vattenti. Pañcasikhavatthu cettha nidassanaṃ. Tathā
atk-s0504a:1448_5: ekacce āpāyike nerayike ṭhapetvā sesaapāyasattāpi nibaddhavatthusmiṃyeva vasaṃ vattenti.
atk-s0504a:1448_6: Macchā hi attano macchiyā, kacchapo kacchapiyāti evaṃ sabbepi tiracchānā petā vinipātikā
atk-s0504a:1448_7: ca. Tasmā nerayike ṭhapetvā sesaapāyasatte upādāya yāva tusitakāyā ime sattā paccupaṭṭhitakāmā
atk-s0504a:1448_8: nāma, nimmānaratinoti sayaṃ nimmite nimmāne rati etesanti nimmānaratino. Te hi nīlapītādivasena
atk-s0504a:1448_9: yādisaṃ yādisaṃ rūpaṃ icchanti, tādisaṃ tādisaṃ nimminitvā ramanti āyasmato anuruddhassa
atk-s0504a:1448_10: purato manāpakāyikā devatā viya. Paranimmitavasavattinoti parehi nimmite kāme vasaṃ
atk-s0504a:1448_11: vattentīti paranimmitavasavattino. Tesañhi manaṃ ñatvā pare yathārucitaṃ kāmabhogaṃ
atk-s0504a:1448_12: nimminanti, te tattha vasaṃ vattenti. Kathaṃ te parassa manaṃ jānantīti? Pakatisevanāvasena.
atk-s0504a:1448_13: Yathā hi kusalo sūdo rañño bhuñjantassa yaṃ yaṃ ruccati, taṃ taṃ jānāti, evaṃ pakatiyā
atk-s0504a:1448_14: abhirucitārammaṇaṃ ñatvā tādiseyeva nimminanti, te tattha vasaṃ vattenti, methunasevanādivasena
atk-s0504a:1448_15: kāme paribhuñjanti. Keci pana “hasitamattena olokitamattena āliṅgitamattena hatthaggahaṇamattena
atk-s0504a:1448_16: ca tesaṃ kāmakiccaṃ ijjhatī”ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “etaṃ pana natthī”ti paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1448_17: Na hi kāyena aphusantassa phoṭṭhabbaṃ kāmakiccaṃ sādheti. Channampi kāmāvacaradevānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1451_0: Gāthāsu ye caññeti ye yathāvuttadevehi aññe ca kāmabhogino manussā ceva ekacce apāyūpagā
atk-s0504a:1451_1: ca sabbe te. Itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti imaṃ yathāpaṭiladdhattabhāvañceva, upapattibhavantarasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0504a:1451_2: ito aññathābhāvañcāti dvippabhedaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattare na atikkamanti. Sabbe pariccaje
atk-s0504a:1451_3: kāmeti dibbādibhede sabbepi kāme vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca pariccajeyya. Kilesakāme
atk-s0504a:1451_4: anāgāmimaggena pajahantoyeva hi vatthukāme pariccajati nāma. Piyarūpasātagadhitanti
atk-s0504a:1451_5: piyarūpesu rūpādīsu sukhavedanassādena gadhitaṃ giddhaṃ. Chetvā sotaṃ duraccayanti
atk-s0504a:1451_6: aññehi duraccayaṃ duratikkamaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ arahattamaggena samucchinditvā. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0504a:1454_0: 96. Sattame kāmayogayuttoti pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo kāmayogo, tena yutto kāmayogayutto,
atk-s0504a:1454_1: asamucchinnakāmarāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo bhavayogo, tathā
atk-s0504a:1454_2: jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahagato ca rāgo, tena yutto bhavayogayutto, appahīnabhavarāgoti
atk-s0504a:1454_3: attho. Āgāmīti brahmaloke ṭhitopi paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgamanasīlo.
atk-s0504a:1454_5: manussesu upapajjanasīloti attho. Kāmañcettha kāmayogo itthattaṃ āgamanassa kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1454_6: Yo pana kāmayogayutto, so ekantena bhavayogayuttopi hotīti dassanatthaṃ “kāmayogayutto,
atk-s0504a:1454_7: bhikkhave, bhavayogayutto”ti ubhayampi ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1455_0: Kāmayogavisaṃyuttoti ettha asubhajjhānampi kāmayogavisaṃyogo, taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigato
atk-s0504a:1455_1: anāgāmimaggo ekanteneva kāmayogavisaṃyogo nāma, tasmā tatiyamaggaphale ṭhito ariyapuggalo
atk-s0504a:1455_2: “kāmayogavisaṃyutto”ti vutto. Yasmā pana rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo anāgāmimaggena
atk-s0504a:1455_3: na pahīyati, tasmā so appahīnabhavayogattā “bhavayogayutto”ti vutto. Anāgāmīti kāmalokaṃ
atk-s0504a:1455_4: paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena anāgamanato anāgāmī. Kāmayogavisaṃyogavaseneva hi saddhiṃ
atk-s0504a:1455_6: anāgantvā hoti, tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo. Yassa pana anavasesaṃ bhavayogo
atk-s0504a:1455_7: pahīno, tassa avijjāyogādiavasiṭṭhakilesāpi tadekaṭṭhabhāvato pahīnā eva hontīti,
atk-s0504a:1455_8: so parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano “arahaṃ khīṇāsavo”ti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “kāmayogavisaṃyutto,
atk-s0504a:1455_9: bhikkhave, bhavayogavisaṃyutto arahaṃ hoti khīṇāsavo”ti. Ettha ca kāmayogavisaṃyogo
atk-s0504a:1455_12: vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭhamapadena sotāpannasakadāgāmīhi saddhiṃ sabbo puthujjano
atk-s0504a:1455_13: gahito, dutiyapadena pana sabbo anāgāmī, tatiyapadena arahāti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0504a:1456_0: Gāthāsu ubhayanti ubhayena, kāmayogena, bhavayogena ca saṃyuttāti attho. Sattā gacchanti
atk-s0504a:1456_1: saṃsāranti puthujjanā sotāpannā sakadāgāminoti ime tividhā sattā kāmayogabhavayogānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1456_2: appahīnattā gacchanti saṃsāranti. Tato eva jātimaraṇagāmino honti. Ettha ekabījī,
atk-s0504a:1456_3: kolaṃkolo, sattakkhattuparamoti tīsu sotāpannesu sabbamudu sattakkhattuparamo, so
atk-s0504a:1456_4: aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ na nibbatteti, attano paricchinnajātivasena pana saṃsarati, tathā
atk-s0504a:1456_5: itarepi. Sakadāgāmīsupi yo idha sakadāgāmimaggaṃ patvā devaloke uppajjitvā puna idha
atk-s0504a:1456_6: nibbattati, so attano paricchinnajātivaseneva saṃsarati. Ye pana sakadāgāmino vomissakanayena
atk-s0504a:1456_7: vinā tattha tattha devesuyeva manussesuyeva vā nibbattanti, te uparimaggādhigamāya
atk-s0504a:1456_8: yāva indriyaparipākā punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsarantiyeva. Puthujjane pana vattabbameva
atk-s0504a:1459_0: Kāme pahantvānāti kāmarāgasaṅkhāte kilesakāme anāgāmimaggena pajahitvā. Chinnasaṃsayāti
atk-s0504a:1459_1: samucchinnakaṅkhā, tañca kho sotāpattimaggeneva. Vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ pana catutthamaggassa
atk-s0504a:1459_2: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Arahanto hi idha “chinnasaṃsayā”ti adhippetā. Tenevāha “khīṇamānapunabbhavā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1459_3: Sabbaso khīṇo navavidhopi māno āyatiṃ punabbhavo ca etesanti khīṇamānapunabbhavā.
atk-s0504a:1459_4: Mānaggahaṇena cettha tadekaṭṭhatāya lakkhaṇavasena vā sabbo catutthamaggavajjho kileso
atk-s0504a:1459_5: gahitoti. Khīṇamānatāya ca saupādisesā nibbānadhātu vuttā hoti, khīṇapunabbhavatāya
atk-s0504a:1462_0: 97. Aṭṭhame kalyāṇasīloti sundarasīlo, pasatthasīlo, paripuṇṇasīlo. Tattha sīlapāripūrī
atk-s0504a:1462_1: dvīhi kāraṇehi hoti sammadeva sīlavipattiyā ādīnavadassanena, sīlasampattiyā ca ānisaṃsadassanena.
atk-s0504a:1462_2: Idha pana sabbaparibandhavippamuttassa sabbākāraparipuṇṇassa maggasīlassa phalasīlassa
atk-s0504a:1462_3: ca vasena kalyāṇatā veditabbā. Kalyāṇadhammoti sabbe bodhipakkhiyadhammā adhippetā,
atk-s0504a:1462_4: tasmā kalyāṇā satipaṭṭhānādibodhipakkhiyadhammā etassāti kalyāṇadhammo. Kalyāṇapaññoti
atk-s0504a:1462_5: ca maggaphalapaññāvaseneva kalyāṇapañño. Lokuttarā eva hi sīlādidhammā ekantakalyāṇā
atk-s0504a:1462_6: nāma akuppasabhāvattā. Keci pana “catupārisuddhisīlavasena kalyāṇasīlo, vipassanāmaggadhammavasena
atk-s0504a:1462_7: kalyāṇadhammo, maggaphalapaññāvasena kalyāṇapañño”ti vadanti. Asekkhā eva te sīladhammapaññāti
atk-s0504a:1462_8: eke. Apare pana bhaṇanti – sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ maggaphalasīlaṃ kalyāṇasīlaṃ nāma,
atk-s0504a:1462_9: tasmā “kalyāṇasīlo”ti iminā sotāpanno sakadāgāmī ca gahitā honti. Te hi sīlesu paripūrakārino
atk-s0504a:1462_10: nāma. Anāgāmimaggaphaladhammā aggamaggadhammā ca kalyāṇadhammā nāma. Tattha hi bodhipakkhiyadhammā
atk-s0504a:1462_11: bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. Tasmā “kalyāṇadhammo”ti iminā tatiyamaggaṭṭhato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0504a:1462_12: tayo ariyā gahitā honti. Paññākiccassa matthakappattiyā aggaphale paññā kalyāṇapaññā
atk-s0504a:1462_13: nāma, tasmā paññāvepullappatto arahā “kalyāṇapañño”ti vutto. Evameva puggalā gahitā
atk-s0504a:1462_14: hontīti. Kiṃ iminā papañcena? Aggamaggaphaladhammā idha kalyāṇasīlādayo vuttāti ayamamhākaṃ
atk-s0504a:1462_15: khanti. Dhammavibhāgena hi ayaṃ puggalavibhāgo, na dhammavibhāgoti.
atk-s0504a:1463_0: Kevalīti ettha kevalaṃ vuccati kenaci avomissakatāya sabbasaṅkhatavivittaṃ nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1463_1: tassa adhigatattā arahā kevalī. Atha vā pahānabhāvanāpāripūriyā pariyosānaanavajjadhammapāripūriyā
atk-s0504a:1463_2: ca kalyāṇakaṭṭhena abyāsekasukhatāya ca kevalaṃ arahattaṃ, tadadhigamena kevalī khīṇāsavo.
atk-s0504a:1463_3: Maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ vasitvā pariyosāpetvā ṭhitoti vusitavā. Uttamehi aggabhūtehi
atk-s0504a:1464_0: Sīlavāti ettha kenaṭṭhena sīlaṃ? Sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ. Kimidaṃ sīlanaṃ nāma? Samādhānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1464_1: susīlyavasena kāyakammādīnaṃ avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Atha vā upadhāraṇaṃ, jhānādikusaladhammānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1464_2: patiṭṭhānavasena ādhārabhāvoti attho. Tasmā sīlati, sīletīti vā sīlaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva
atk-s0504a:1464_3: saddalakkhaṇanayena sīlaṭṭho. Apare pana “siraṭṭho sīlaṭṭho, sītalaṭṭho sīlaṭṭho,
atk-s0504a:1464_4: sivaṭṭho sīlaṭṭho”ti niruttinayena atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Tayidaṃ pāripūrito atisayato
atk-s0504a:1464_5: vā sīlaṃ assa atthīti sīlavā, catupārisuddhisīlavasena sīlasampannoti attho. Tattha
atk-s0504a:1464_6: yaṃ jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ, taṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”tiādi vuttanti
atk-s0504a:1465_0: Aparena pana bhaṇanti – ubhayatthāpi pātimokkhasaṃvaro bhagavatā vutto. Pātimokkhasaṃvaro
atk-s0504a:1465_1: eva hi sīlaṃ, itaresu indriyasaṃvaro chadvārarakkhaṇamattameva, ājīvapārisuddhi dhammena
atk-s0504a:1465_3: paribhuñjanamattameva. Nippariyāyena pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīlaṃ. Yassa so bhinno,
atk-s0504a:1465_4: so sīsacchinno puriso viya hatthapāde “sesāni rakkhissatī”ti na vattabbo. Yassa pana
atk-s0504a:1465_5: so arogo, acchinnasīso viya puriso, tāni puna pākatikāni katvā rakkhituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0504a:1465_6: Tasmā sīlavāti iminā pātimokkhasīlameva uddisitvā taṃ vitthāretuṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”tiādi vuttanti.
atk-s0504a:1466_0: Tattha pātimokkhanti sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. Tañhi yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti
atk-s0504a:1466_1: āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhaṃ. Saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro, kāyavācāhi avītikkamo. Pātimokkhameva
atk-s0504a:1466_2: saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro, tena saṃvuto pihitakāyavācoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto.
atk-s0504a:1466_3: Idamassa tasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Viharatīti tadanurūpavihārasamaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1466_4: Ācāragocarasampannoti heṭṭhā pātimokkhasaṃvarassa, upari visesānuyogassa ca upakārakadhammaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1466_5: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti pātimokkhasīlato acavanadhammatāparidīpanaṃ. Samādāyāti
atk-s0504a:1466_6: sikkhāpadānaṃ anavasesato ādānaparidīpanaṃ. Sikkhatīti sikkhāya samaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1467_0: Aparo nayo – kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato puññakiriyāya ca
atk-s0504a:1467_1: dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. Aniccatāya vā
atk-s0504a:1467_2: bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti
atk-s0504a:1467_3: pātī, maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīloti pātī, sattasantāno,
atk-s0504a:1467_4: cittameva vā. Taṃ pātinaṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti pātimokkho. Cittassa hi vimokkhena
atk-s0504a:1467_5: satto vimutto. “Cittavodānā visujjhantī”ti “anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimutta”nti
atk-s0504a:1467_6: ca vuttaṃ. Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti. “Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1467_7: sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ. Tassa pātino sattassa
atk-s0504a:1467_8: taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. “Kaṇṭhekālo”tiādīnaṃ viyassa samāsasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:1468_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttañhi “cittena nīyati loko, cittena
atk-s0504a:1468_1: parikassatī”ti. Tassa pātino mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe
atk-s0504a:1468_2: saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti, taṇhādisaṃkileso. Vuttañhi “taṇhā janeti purisaṃ, taṇhādutiyo
atk-s0504a:1468_3: puriso”ti ca ādi. Tato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkho. Atha vā patati etthāti pāti, cha
atk-s0504a:1468_4: ajjhattikāni bāhirāni ca āyatanāni. Vuttañhi “chasu loko samuppanno, chasu kubbati
atk-s0504a:1468_5: santhava”nti. Tato chaajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkho.
atk-s0504a:1468_6: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato mokkhoti pātimokkho. Atha
atk-s0504a:1468_7: vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā patīti vuccati, muccati etenāti mokkho,
atk-s0504a:1468_8: patino mokkho tena paññattattāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Sabbaguṇānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1468_9: vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttaṭṭhena mokkho cāti patimokkho, patimokkho
atk-s0504a:1468_10: eva pātimokkho. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti mukhametaṃ pamukhameta”nti vitthāro.
atk-s0504a:1469_0: Atha vā paiti pakāre, atīti accantatthe nipāto. Tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti
atk-s0504a:1469_1: pātimokkho. Idañhi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena, samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena
atk-s0504a:1469_2: samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ. Pati pati mokkhoti vā
atk-s0504a:1469_3: patimokkho, tamhā tamhā vītikkamitabbadosato pati paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho. Patimokkho
atk-s0504a:1469_4: eva pātimokkho. Mokkhoti vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa paṭibimbabhūtanti patimokkhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1469_5: Pātimokkhasīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo
atk-s0504a:1469_6: viya hoti yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanatoti patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhaṃ eva pātimokkhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1469_7: Atha vā mokkhaṃ pati vattati mokkhābhimukhanti patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti
atk-s0504a:1470_0: Saṃvarati pidahati etenāti saṃvaro, pātimokkhameva saṃvaroti pātimokkhasaṃvaro. Atthato
atk-s0504a:1470_1: pana tato tato vītikkamitabbato viratiyo cetanā vā, tena pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto
atk-s0504a:1471: “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato sampanno samannāgato. Tena vuccati pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti.
atk-s0504a:1472_0: Viharatīti iriyāpathavihārena viharati, iriyati, vattati. Ācāragocarasampannoti veḷudānādimicchājīvassa
atk-s0504a:1472_1: kāyapāgabbhiyādīnañca akaraṇena, sabbaso anācāraṃ vajjetvā “kāyiko avītikkamo, vācasiko
atk-s0504a:1472_2: avītikkamo”ti evaṃ vuttabhikkhusāruppaācārasampattiyā vesiyādiagocaraṃ vajjetvā piṇḍapātādiatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:1472_3: upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānasaṅkhātagocarena ca sampannattā ācāragocarasampanno. Apica
atk-s0504a:1472_4: yo bhikkhu satthari sagāravo sappatisso sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno
atk-s0504a:1472_5: sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena
atk-s0504a:1472_6: pasāritena okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū
atk-s0504a:1472_7: jāgariyānuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho
atk-s0504a:1472_8: ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati, ayaṃ vuccati ācārasampanno.
atk-s0504a:1473_0: Gocaro pana – upanissayagocaro, ārakkhagocaro, upanibandhagocaroti tividho. Tattha
atk-s0504a:1473_1: dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato vuttalakkhaṇo kalyāṇamitto yaṃ nissāya asutaṃ suṇāti,
atk-s0504a:1473_2: sutaṃ pariyodapeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, diṭṭhiṃ ujukaṃ karoti, cittaṃ pasādeti, yassa
atk-s0504a:1473_3: ca anusikkhanto saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena, paññāya vaḍḍhati, ayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1473_4: upanissayagocaro. Yo bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu
atk-s0504a:1473_5: yugamattadassāvī saṃvuto gacchati, na hatthiṃ olokento, na assaṃ, na rathaṃ, na pattiṃ,
atk-s0504a:1473_6: na itthiṃ, na purisaṃ olokento, na uddhaṃ olokento, na adho olokento, na disāvidisā
atk-s0504a:1473_7: pekkhamāno gacchati, ayaṃ ārakkhagocaro. Upanibandhagocaro pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0504a:1473_8: yattha bhikkhu attano cittaṃ upanibandhati. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0504a:1474: “Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo? Yadidaṃ – cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1475: Iti yathāvuttāya ācārasampattiyā imāya ca gocarasampattiyā samannāgatattā ācāragocarasampanno.
atk-s0504a:1476_0: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti appamattakesu aṇuppamāṇesu asañcicca āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu
atk-s0504a:1476_1: vajjesu bhayadassanasīlo. Yo hi bhikkhu paramāṇumattaṃ vajjaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatarājasadisaṃ
atk-s0504a:1476_2: katvā passati, yopi bhikkhu sabbalahukaṃ dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā passati,
atk-s0504a:1476_3: ayaṃ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī nāma. Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃ kiñci
atk-s0504a:1476_4: sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ samādiyitvā
atk-s0504a:1476_5: sikkhati vattati, pūretīti attho. Iti kalyāṇasīloti iminā pakārena kalyāṇasīlo samāno.
atk-s0504a:1476_6: Puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena hi niddiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ “evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇasīlo
atk-s0504a:1476_8: niddisitukāmena “tesaṃ dhammānaṃ idaṃ sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāna”nti dassetuṃ puna “iti kalyāṇasīlo”ti
atk-s0504a:1476_9: vuttaṃ. Sattannaṃ bodhipakkhiyānantiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Puna kalyāṇasīlotiādi nigamanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1477_0: Gāthāsu dukkaṭanti duṭṭhu kataṃ, duccaritanti attho. Hirimananti hirimantaṃ hirisampannaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1477_1: sabbaso pāpapavattiyā jigucchanasabhāvanti attho. Hirimananti vā hirisahitacittaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1477_2: Hiriggahaṇeneva cettha ottappampi gahitanti veditabbaṃ. Hirottappaggahaṇena ca sabbaso
atk-s0504a:1477_3: duccaritābhāvassa hetuṃ dassento kalyāṇasīlataṃ hetuto vibhāveti. Sambodhīti ariyañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1477_4: taṃ gacchanti bhajantīti sambodhigāmino, bodhipakkhikāti attho. Anussadanti rāgussadādirahitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1477_6: yathā yathā pubbe vuttaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ tādisanti attho. Dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhassa,
atk-s0504a:1477_7: vaṭṭadukkhahetuno vā. Idheva khayamattanoti āsavakkhayādhigamena attano vaṭṭadukkhahetuno
atk-s0504a:1477_8: samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa idheva imasmiṃyeva attabhāve khayaṃ anuppādaṃ pajānāti,
atk-s0504a:1477_9: vaṭṭadukkhasseva vā idheva carimakacittanirodhena khayaṃ khīṇabhāvaṃ pajānāti. Tehi
atk-s0504a:1477_10: dhammehi sampannanti tehi yathāvuttasīlādidhammehi samannāgataṃ. Asitanti taṇhādiṭṭhinissayānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1477_11: pahīnattā asitaṃ, katthaci anissitaṃ. Sabbalokassāti sabbasmiṃ sattaloke. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:1480_0: 98. Navame dānanti dātabbaṃ, savatthukā vā cetanā dānaṃ, sampattipariccāgassetaṃ
atk-s0504a:1480_1: adhivacanaṃ. Āmisadānanti cattāro paccayā deyyabhāvavasena āmisadānaṃ nāma. Te hi
atk-s0504a:1480_2: taṇhādīhi āmasitabbato āmisanti vuccanti. Tesaṃ vā pariccāgacetanā āmisadānaṃ. Dhammadānanti
atk-s0504a:1480_3: idhekacco “ime dhammā kusalā, ime dhammā akusalā, ime dhammā sāvajjā, ime dhammā
atk-s0504a:1480_4: anavajjā, ime viññugarahitā, ime viññuppasatthā; ime samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya
atk-s0504a:1480_5: saṃvattanti, ime hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī”ti kusalākusalakammapathe vibhajanto
atk-s0504a:1480_6: kammakammavipāke idhalokaparaloke paccakkhato dassento viya pākaṭaṃ karonto akusalehi
atk-s0504a:1480_7: dhammehi nivattāpento, kusalesu dhammesu patiṭṭhāpento, dhammaṃ deseti, idaṃ dhammadānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1480_8: Yo pana “ime dhammā abhiññeyyā, ime pariññeyyā, ime pahātabbā, ime sacchikātabbā,
atk-s0504a:1480_9: ime bhāvetabbā”ti saccāni vibhāvento amatādhigamāya paṭipattidhammaṃ deseti, idaṃ
atk-s0504a:1480_10: sikhāppattaṃ dhammadānaṃ nāma. Etadagganti etaṃ aggaṃ. Yadidanti yaṃ idaṃ dhammadānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1480_11: vuttaṃ, etaṃ imesu dvīsu dānesu aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ. Vivaṭṭagāmidhammadānañhi nissāya
atk-s0504a:1480_12: sabbānatthato parimuccati, sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkamati. Lokiyaṃ pana dhammadānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1480_13: sabbesaṃ dānānaṃ nidānaṃ sabbasampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0504a:1482: Sabbaratiṃ dhammaratī jināti, taṇhakkhayo sabbadukkhaṃ jinātī”ti. –
atk-s0504a:1484_0: Sādhāraṇabhogitādhippāyena attanā paribhuñjitabbato catupaccayato sayameva abhuñjitvā
atk-s0504a:1484_1: paresaṃ saṃvibhajanaṃ āmisasaṃvibhāgo. Sādhāraṇabhogitādhippāyeneva attanā viditassa
atk-s0504a:1484_2: adhigatassa dhammassa appossukko ahutvā paresaṃ upadeso dhammasaṃvibhāgo. Catūhi
atk-s0504a:1484_3: paccayehi catūhi ca saṅgahavatthūhi paresaṃ anuggaṇhanaṃ anukampanaṃ āmisānuggaho.
atk-s0504a:1484_4: Vuttanayeneva dhammena paresaṃ anuggaṇhanaṃ anukampanaṃ dhammānuggaho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:1485_0: Gāthāsu yamāhu dānaṃ paramanti yaṃ dānaṃ cittakhettadeyyadhammānaṃ uḷārabhāvena paramaṃ
atk-s0504a:1485_1: uttamaṃ, bhogasampattiādīnaṃ vā pūraṇato phalanato, parassa vā lobhamacchariyādikassa
atk-s0504a:1485_2: paṭipakkhassa maddanato hiṃsanato “parama”nti buddhā bhagavanto āhu. Anuttaranti
atk-s0504a:1485_3: yaṃ dānaṃ cetanādisampattiyā sātisayapavattiyā aggabhāvena aggavipākattā ca uttararahitaṃ
atk-s0504a:1485_4: anuttarabhāvasādhanaṃ cāti āhu. Yaṃ saṃvibhāganti etthāpi “paramaṃ anuttara”nti padadvayaṃ
atk-s0504a:1485_5: ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Avaṇṇayīti kittayi, “bhojanaṃ, bhikkhave, dadamāno dāyako paṭiggāhakānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1485_6: pañca ṭhānāni detī”tiādinā, “evaṃ ce, bhikkhave, sattā jāneyyuṃ dānasaṃvibhāgassa
atk-s0504a:1485_7: vipāka”ntiādinā ca pasaṃsayi. Yathā pana dānaṃ saṃvibhāgo ca paramaṃ anuttarañca
atk-s0504a:1485_8: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “aggamhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha aggamhīti sīlādiguṇavisesayogena
atk-s0504a:1485_9: seṭṭhe anuttare puññakkhette sammāsambuddhe ariyasaṅghe ca. Pasannacittoti kammaphalasaddhāya
atk-s0504a:1485_10: ratanattayasaddhāya ca cittaṃ pasādento okappento. Cittasampattiyā hi khettasampattiyā
atk-s0504a:1485_11: ca parittepi deyyadhamme dānaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ hoti mahājutikaṃ mahāvipphāraṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1487: Tathāgate vā sambuddhe, atha vā tassa sāvake”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:1488_0: Viññūti sappañño. Pajānanti sammadeva dānaphalaṃ dānānisaṃsaṃ pajānanto. Ko na yajetha
atk-s0504a:1488_1: kāleti yuttappattakāle ko nāma dānaṃ na dadeyya? Saddhā, deyyadhammo, paṭiggāhakāti
atk-s0504a:1488_2: imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammukhibhūtakāleyeva hi dānaṃ sambhavati, na aññathā, paṭiggāhakānaṃ vā dātuṃ yuttakāle.
atk-s0504a:1489_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya āmisadānasaṃvibhāgānuggahe dassetvā idāni dhammadānasaṃvibhāgānuggahe
atk-s0504a:1489_1: dassetuṃ “ye ceva bhāsantī”ti dutiyagāthamāha. Tattha ubhayanti “bhāsanti suṇantī”ti
atk-s0504a:1489_2: vuttā desakā paṭiggāhakāti ubhayaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – ye sugatassa bhagavato
atk-s0504a:1489_3: sāsane saddhamme pasannacittā vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā desenti paṭiggaṇhanti ca,
atk-s0504a:1489_6: Kīdisānaṃ? Ye appamattā sugatassa sāsane. Ye ca –
atk-s0504a:1492_0: Saṅkhepato evaṃ pakāsite sammāsambuddhassa sāsane ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ appamattā adhisīlasikkhādayo
atk-s0504a:1492_1: sakkaccaṃ sampādenti. Tesaṃ visujjhati, arahattaphalavisuddhiyā ativiya vodāyatīti.
atk-s0504a:1495_0: 99. Dasame dhammenāti ñāyena, sammāpaṭipattisaṅkhātena hetunā kāraṇena. Yāya hi paṭipadāya
atk-s0504a:1495_1: tevijjo hoti, sā paṭipadā idha dhammoti veditabbā. Kā pana sā paṭipadāti? Caraṇasampadā
atk-s0504a:1495_2: ca vijjāsampadā ca. Tevijjanti pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇādīhi tīhi vijjāhi samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0504a:1495_4: Nāññaṃ lapitalāpanamattenāti aññaṃ jātimattabrāhmaṇaṃ aṭṭhakādīhi lapitamattavippalapanamattena
atk-s0504a:1495_5: brāhmaṇaṃ na paññāpemīti. Atha vā lapitalāpanamattenāti mantānaṃ ajjhenaajjhāpanamattena.
atk-s0504a:1495_6: Ubhayathāpi yaṃ pana brāhmaṇā sāmavedādivedattayaajjhenena tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0504a:1495_7: taṃ paṭikkhipati. Bhagavatā hi “paramatthato atevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃyeva cete bhovādino
atk-s0504a:1495_8: avijjānivutā ‘tevijjo brāhmaṇo’ti vadanti, evaṃ pana tevijjo brāhmaṇo hotī”ti dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0504a:1495_9: tathā bujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0504a:1496_0: Tattha yasmā vijjāsampanno caraṇasampannoyeva hoti caraṇasampadāya vinā vijjāsampattiyā
atk-s0504a:1496_1: abhāvato, tasmā caraṇasampadaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā vijjāsīseneva brāhmaṇaṃ paññāpetukāmo
atk-s0504a:1496_2: “dhammenāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ paññāpemī”ti desanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā “kathañcāhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1496_3: bhikkhave, dhammena tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ paññāpemī”ti kathetukamyatāya pucchaṃ katvā
atk-s0504a:1496_4: puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vijjattayaṃ vibhajanto “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū”tiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:1497_0: Tattha anekavihitanti anekavidhaṃ, anekehi vā pakārehi pavattitaṃ, saṃvaṇṇitanti
atk-s0504a:1497_1: attho. Pubbenivāsanti samanantarātītabhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthakkhandhasantānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1497_2: Nivutthanti ajjhāvutthaṃ anubhūtaṃ, attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhaṃ, nivutthadhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:1497_3: vā nivutthaṃ, gocaranivāsena nivutthaṃ, attano viññāṇena viññātaṃ paraviññāṇaviññātampi
atk-s0504a:1497_4: vā chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇādīsu. Anussaratīti “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”ti evaṃ jātipaṭipāṭivasena
atk-s0504a:1497_5: anugantvā sarati, anudeva vā sarati, citte abhininnāmite parikammasamanantaraṃ sarati.
atk-s0504a:1498_0: Seyyathidanti āraddhappakāradassanatthe nipāto. Teneva yvāyaṃ pubbenivāso āraddho
atk-s0504a:1498_1: hoti, tassa pakāraṃ dassento “ekampi jāti”ntiādimāha. Tattha ekampi jātinti ekampi
atk-s0504a:1498_2: paṭisandhimūlakaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ. Esa nayo
atk-s0504a:1498_3: dvepi jātiyotiādīsu. Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappetiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo,
atk-s0504a:1498_4: vaḍḍhamāno vivaṭṭakappo. Tattha saṃvaṭṭena saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī gahito hoti tammūlakattā,
atk-s0504a:1498_5: vivaṭṭena ca vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī. Evañhi sati yāni tāni “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, kappassa
atk-s0504a:1498_6: asaṅkhyeyyāni. Katamāni cattāri? Saṃvaṭṭo, saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī, vivaṭṭo, vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī”ti
atk-s0504a:1498_7: vuttāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni, tāni pariggahitāni honti.
atk-s0504a:1499_0: Tattha tayo saṃvaṭṭā – tejosaṃvaṭṭo, āposaṃvaṭṭo, vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti. Tisso saṃvaṭṭasīmā
atk-s0504a:1499_1: – ābhassarā, subhakiṇhā, vehapphalāti. Yadā kappo tejena saṃvaṭṭati, ābhassarato
atk-s0504a:1499_2: heṭṭhā agginā ḍayhati. Yadā udakena saṃvaṭṭati, subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā udakena vilīyati.
atk-s0504a:1499_3: Yadā vātena saṃvaṭṭati, vehapphalato heṭṭhā vātena viddhaṃsiyati. Vitthārato pana
atk-s0504a:1499_4: koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ ekato vinassati. Iti evarūpo ayaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranto
atk-s0504a:1499_5: bhikkhu anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe anussarati.
atk-s0504a:1500_0: Tattha amutrāsinti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe amumhi bhave vā yoniyā vā gatiyā vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā
atk-s0504a:1500_1: vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā ahamahosiṃ. Evaṃnāmoti tisso vā phusso vā. Evaṃgottoti
atk-s0504a:1500_2: gotamo vā kassapo vā. Evaṃvaṇṇoti odāto vā sāmo vā. Evamāhāroti sālimaṃsodanāhāro
atk-s0504a:1500_3: vā pavattaphalabhojano vā. Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti anekappakārānaṃ kāyikacetasikānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1500_4: sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānaṃ vā sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī. Evamāyupariyantoti evaṃ
atk-s0504a:1500_6: So tato cuto amutra udapādinti sohaṃ tato bhavato yonito gatito viññāṇaṭṭhitito sattāvāsato
atk-s0504a:1500_7: sattanikāyato vā cuto puna amukasmiṃ nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse
atk-s0504a:1500_8: sattanikāye vā udapādiṃ. Tatrāpāsinti atha tatrapi bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā
atk-s0504a:1500_9: sattāvāse sattanikāye vā puna ahosiṃ. Evaṃnāmotiādi vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:1501_0: Atha vā yasmā “amutrāsi”nti idaṃ anupubbena ārohantassa attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ
atk-s0504a:1501_1: yathābalaṃ saraṇaṃ, “so tato cuto”ti paṭinivattantassa paccavekkhaṇaṃ, tasmā “idhūpapanno”ti
atk-s0504a:1501_2: imissā idhūpapattiyā anantaraṃ “amutra udapādi”nti vuttaṃ. Tatrāpāsinti tatrapi bhave…pe…
atk-s0504a:1501_3: sattanikāye vā āsiṃ. Evaṃnāmoti datto vā mitto vā, evaṃgottoti vāseṭṭho vā kassapo
atk-s0504a:1501_4: vā. Evaṃvaṇṇoti kāḷo vā odāto vā. Evamāhāroti sudhāhāro vā sāliodanādiāhāro vā. Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti
atk-s0504a:1501_5: dibbasukhappaṭisaṃvedī vā mānusasukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī vā. Evamāyupariyantoti evaṃ
atk-s0504a:1501_6: taṃtaṃparamāyupariyanto. So tato cutoti sohaṃ tato bhavādito cuto. Idhūpapannoti
atk-s0504a:1501_7: idha imasmiṃ carimabhave manusso hutvā upapanno nibbatto.
atk-s0504a:1502_0: Itīti evaṃ. Sākāraṃ sauddesanti nāmagottādivasena sauddesaṃ, vaṇṇādivasena sākāraṃ.
atk-s0504a:1502_1: Nāmagottena hi sattā “tisso gotamo”ti uddisīyanti, vaṇṇādīhi “sāmo odāto”ti nānattato
atk-s0504a:1502_2: paññāyanti. Tasmā nāmagottaṃ uddeso, itare ākārā. Ayamassa paṭhamā vijjā adhigatāti
atk-s0504a:1502_3: ayaṃ iminā bhikkhunā paṭhamaṃ adhigamavasena paṭhamā, viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā adhigatā
atk-s0504a:1502_4: sacchikatā hoti. Kiṃ panāyaṃ viditaṃ karoti? Pubbenivāsaṃ. Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa
atk-s0504a:1502_5: aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tassa paṭicchādakamoho vuccati. Tamoti sveva moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:1502_6: tamoti vuccati. Ālokoti sā eva vijjā obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena āloko. Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti
atk-s0504a:1502_7: ayaṃ attho, sesaṃ pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. Yojanā panettha – ayaṃ kho tena bhikkhunā vijjā
atk-s0504a:1502_8: adhigatā, tassa adhigatavijjassa avijjā vihatā, vinaṭṭhāti attho. Kasmā? Yasmā vijjā
atk-s0504a:1503_0: Yathā tanti ettha yathāti opammatthe, tanti nipātamattaṃ. Satiyā avippavāsena appamattassa.
atk-s0504a:1503_1: Vīriyātāpena ātāpino. Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa pesitacittassāti
atk-s0504a:1503_2: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā
atk-s0504a:1503_3: vihaññeyya, vijjā uppajjeyya, tamo vihaññeyya, āloko uppajjeyya; evameva tassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0504a:1503_4: avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā, tamo vihato, āloko uppanno, tassa padhānānuyogassa
atk-s0504a:1504_0: Dibbena cakkhunāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Visuddhenāti cutūpapātadassanena
atk-s0504a:1504_1: diṭṭhivisuddhihetubhāvato visuddhaṃ. Yo hi cutimattameva passati na upapātaṃ, so
atk-s0504a:1504_2: ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo upapātamattameva passati na cutiṃ, so navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0504a:1504_3: gaṇhāti. Yo pana tadubhayaṃ passati, so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati,
atk-s0504a:1504_4: tasmāssa taṃ dassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhihetu hoti, tadubhayampāyaṃ buddhaputto passati.
atk-s0504a:1504_6: vā visuddhaṃ. Yathāha “vicikicchā cittassa upakkilesoti – iti viditvā vicikicchaṃ
atk-s0504a:1504_7: cittassa upakkilesaṃ pajahiṃ, amanasikāro…pe… thinamiddhaṃ, chambhitattaṃ, uppillaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1504_8: duṭṭhullaṃ, accāraddhavīriyaṃ, atilīnavīriyaṃ, abhijappā, nānattasaññā, atinijjhāyitattaṃ
atk-s0504a:1504_9: rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkileso”ti evaṃ vuttehi ekādasahi upakkilesehi anupakkiliṭṭhattā
atk-s0504a:1504_10: visuddhaṃ. Manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanena atikkantamānusakaṃ, maṃsacakkhuṃ
atk-s0504a:1504_11: vā atikkantattā atikkantamānusakaṃ. Tena dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena.
atk-s0504a:1504_12: Satte passatīti manussamaṃsacakkhunā viya satte passati dakkhati āloketi.
atk-s0504a:1505_0: Cavamāne upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunāpi daṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0504a:1505_1: na sakkā. Ye pana āsannacutikā idāni cavissanti, te cavamānā. Ye ca gahitapaṭisandhikā
atk-s0504a:1505_2: sampatinibbattā vā, te upapajjamānāti adhippetā. Te evarūpe cavamāne upapajjamāne
atk-s0504a:1505_3: ca passatīti dasseti. Hīneti mohanissandayuttattā hīnānaṃ jātikulabhogādīnaṃ vasena
atk-s0504a:1505_4: hīḷite paribhūte. Paṇīteti amohanissandayuttattā tabbiparīte. Suvaṇṇeti adosanissandayuttattā
atk-s0504a:1505_6: Abhirūpe virūpetipi attho. Sugateti sugatigate, alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane.
atk-s0504a:1505_7: Duggateti duggatigate, lobhanissandayuttattā vā dalidde appannapānabhojane. Yathākammūpageti
atk-s0504a:1505_8: yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ, tena tena upagate. Tattha purimehi “cavamāne”tiādīhi dibbacakkhukiccaṃ
atk-s0504a:1506_0: Tassa ca ñāṇassa ayaṃ uppattikkamo – idha bhikkhu heṭṭhā nirayābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0504a:1506_1: nerayike satte passati mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavamāne, idaṃ dassanaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇakiccameva.
atk-s0504a:1506_2: So ca evaṃ manasi karoti “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantī”ti,
atk-s0504a:1506_3: athassa “idaṃ nāma katvā”ti taṃkammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. Tathā upari devalokābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0504a:1506_4: ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nandanavanamissakavanaphārusakavanādīsu satte passati dibbasampattiṃ
atk-s0504a:1506_5: anubhavamāne, idampi dassanaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇakiccameva. So evaṃ manasi karoti “kiṃ
atk-s0504a:1506_6: nu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavantī”ti? Athassa “idaṃ nāma katvā”ti
atk-s0504a:1506_7: taṃkammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati, idaṃ yathākammūpagañāṇaṃ nāma. Imassa visuṃ parikammaṃ
atk-s0504a:1506_8: nāma natthi. Yathā cimassa, evaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇassapi. Dibbacakkhupādakāneva hi imāni
atk-s0504a:1506_9: dibbacakkhunā saheva ijjhanti. Kāyaduccaritenātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a:1506_10: Idha vijjāti dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjā. Avijjāti sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhicchādikā avijjā.
atk-s0504a:1507: Tatiyavāre vijjāti arahattamaggañāṇavijjā. Avijjāti catusaccappaṭicchādikā avijjā. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva. Evaṃ khotiādi nigamanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1508_0: Gāthāsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yo yathāvuttaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ aveti avagacchati, vuttanayena
atk-s0504a:1508_1: pākaṭaṃ katvā jānāti. “Yovedī”tipi pāṭho, yo avedi viditaṃ katvā ṭhitoti attho. Chabbīsatidevalokasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0504a:1508_2: saggaṃ catubbidhaṃ apāyañca vuttanayeneva dibbacakkhunā passati. Athoti tato paraṃ
atk-s0504a:1508_3: jātikkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ nibbānameva vā patto adhigato. Tato eva abhiññā abhivisiṭṭhāya
atk-s0504a:1508_4: maggapaññāya jānitabbaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ jānitvā kiccavosānena vosito niṭṭhānappatto.
atk-s0504a:1508_5: Moneyyadhammasamannāgamena muni, khīṇāsavo yasmā etāhi yathāvuttāhi tīhi vijjāhi
atk-s0504a:1508_6: samannāgatattā tato tatiyavijjāya sabbathā bāhitapāpattā ca tevijjo brāhmaṇo nāma
atk-s0504a:1508_7: hoti. Tasmā tameva ahaṃ tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmi, aññaṃ pana lapitalāpanaṃ yajuādimantapadānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1508_8: ajjhāpanaparaṃ tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ na vadāmi, tevijjoti taṃ na kathemīti.
atk-s0504a:1509: Iti imasmiṃ vagge dutiyasutte vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, pañcamaaṭṭhamadasamasuttesu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, itaresu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1516_0: 100. Catukkanipātassa paṭhame ahanti attaniddeso. Yo hi paro na hoti, so niyakajjhattasaṅkhāto
atk-s0504a:1516_1: attā “aha”nti vuccati. Asmīti paṭijānanā. Yo paramatthabrāhmaṇabhāvo “aha”nti vuccamāno,
atk-s0504a:1516_2: tassa attani atthibhāvaṃ paṭijānanto hi satthā “asmī”ti avoca. “Ahamasmī”ti ca yathā
atk-s0504a:1516_3: “ahamasmi brahmā mahābrahmā, seyyohamasmī”ti ca appahīnadiṭṭhimānānusayā puthujjanā
atk-s0504a:1516_4: attano diṭṭhimānamaññanābhinivesavasena abhivadanti, na evaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbaso pana
atk-s0504a:1516_5: pahīnadiṭṭhimānānusayo bhagavā samaññaṃ anatidhāvanto lokasamaññānurodhena veneyyasantānesu
atk-s0504a:1516_6: dhammaṃ patiṭṭhapento kevalaṃ tādisassa guṇassa attani vijjamānataṃ paṭijānanto “ahamasmī”ti
atk-s0504a:1516_7: āha. Brāhmaṇoti bāhitapāpattā brahmassa ca aṇanato brāhmaṇo. Ayañhettha attho – bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:1516_8: ahaṃ paramatthato brāhmaṇosmīti. Bhagavā sabbākāraparipuṇṇassa dānasaṃyamādivatasamādānassa
atk-s0504a:1516_9: niravasesāya tapacariyāya pāraṃ gato sammadeva vusitabrahmacariyavāso sakalavedantagū
atk-s0504a:1516_11: brāhmaṇassa vattā pavattā, suparisuddhassa ca sāsanabrahmacariyassa pavedetā, tasmā
atk-s0504a:1516_12: sabbaso bāhitapāpattā brahmassa ca aṇanato kathanato paramatthena brāhmaṇoti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:1517_0: Iti bhagavā sadevake loke attano anuttaraṃ brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ pavedetvā yāni tāni brāhmaṇadānādīni
atk-s0504a:1517_1: cha kammāni brāhmaṇassa paññāpenti, tesampi suparisuddhānaṃ ukkaṃsato attani saṃvijjamānataṃ
atk-s0504a:1518_0: Tattha yācayogoti yācehi yutto. Yācantīti yācā, yācakā, te panettha veneyyā veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:1518_1: Te hi “desetu, bhante bhagavā, dhammaṃ; desetu, sugato, dhamma”nti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0504a:1518_2: dhammadesanaṃ yācanti. Bhagavā ca tesaṃ icchāvighātaṃ akaronto yathāruci dhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:1518_3: desento dhammadānaṃ detīti yācayogo, sadā sabbakālaṃ tehi avirahito. Atha vā yācayogoti
atk-s0504a:1518_4: yācanayoggo, adhippāyapūraṇato yācituṃ yuttoti attho “yājayogo”tipi pāṭho. Tattha
atk-s0504a:1518_5: yājo vuccati mahādānaṃ, yiṭṭhanti attho. Idha pana dhammadānaṃ veditabbaṃ, yāje niyuttoti
atk-s0504a:1518_6: yājayogā. Sadāti sabbadā, anavaratappavattasaddhammamahādānoti attho. Atha vā yājena
atk-s0504a:1518_7: yojetītipi yājayogo. Tividhadānasaṅkhātena yājena satte yathārahaṃ yojeti, tattha
atk-s0504a:1518_8: dāne niyojetīti attho. “Yājayogo satata”ntipi paṭhanti. Payatapāṇīti parisuddhahattho.
atk-s0504a:1518_9: Yo hi dānādhimutto āmisadānaṃ dento sakkaccaṃ sahatthena deyyadhammaṃ dātuṃ sadā
atk-s0504a:1518_10: dhotahatthoyeva hoti, so “payatapāṇī”ti vuccati. Bhagavāpi dhammadānādhimutto sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0504a:1518_11: sabbakālaṃ dhammadāne yuttappayuttoti katvā vuttaṃ “payatapāṇī”ti. “Sadā”ti ca padaṃ
atk-s0504a:1518_12: imināpi saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ “sadā payatapāṇī”ti. Avibhāgena hi satthā veneyyalokassa
atk-s0504a:1518_13: saddhammadānaṃ sadā sabbakālaṃ pavattento tattha yuttappayutto hutvā viharati.
atk-s0504a:1519_0: Aparo nayo – yogo vuccati bhāvanā. Yathāha “yogā ve jāyate bhūrī”ti. Tasmā yājayogoti
atk-s0504a:1519_1: yājabhāvanaṃ, pariccāgabhāvanaṃ anuyuttoti attho. Bhagavā hi abhisambodhito pubbe
atk-s0504a:1519_2: bodhisattabhūtopi karuṇāsamussāhito anavasesato dānaṃ paribrūhento tattha ukkaṃsapāramippatto
atk-s0504a:1519_3: hutvā abhisambodhiṃ pāpuṇi, buddho hutvāpi tividhaṃ dānaṃ paribrūhesi visesato dhammadānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1519_4: parepi tattha niyojesi. Tathā hi so veneyyayācakānaṃ kassaci saraṇāni adāsi, kassaci
atk-s0504a:1519_5: pañca sīlāni, kassaci dasa sīlāni, kassaci catupārisuddhisīlaṃ, kassaci dhutadhamme,
atk-s0504a:1519_6: kassaci cattāri jhānāni, kassaci aṭṭha samāpattiyo, kassaci pañcābhiññāyo, cattāro
atk-s0504a:1519_7: magge, cattāri sāmaññaphalāni, tisso vijjā, catasso paṭisambhidāti evamādilokiyalokuttarabhedaṃ
atk-s0504a:1519_8: guṇadhanaṃ dhammadānavasena yathādhippāyaṃ dento pare ca “dethā”ti niyojento pariccāgabhāvanaṃ
atk-s0504a:1520_0: Payatapāṇīti vā āyatapāṇī, hatthagataṃ kiñci dātuṃ “ehi gaṇhā”ti pasāritahattho viya
atk-s0504a:1520_1: ācariyamuṭṭhiṃ akatvā saddhammadāne yuttappayuttoti attho. Payatapāṇīti vā ussāhitahattho,
atk-s0504a:1520_2: āmisadānaṃ dātuṃ ussāhitahattho viya dhammadāne katussāhoti attho. Antimadehadharoti
atk-s0504a:1520_4: Avusitavato hi vasalakaraṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ appahānena vasalādisamaññā gati āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā
atk-s0504a:1520_5: siyā. Tena bhagavā attano accantavusitabrāhmaṇabhāvaṃ dasseti. Anuttaro bhisakko
atk-s0504a:1520_6: sallakattoti duttikicchassa vaṭṭadukkharogassa tikicchanato uttamo bhisakko, aññehi
atk-s0504a:1520_7: anuddharaṇīyānaṃ rāgādisallānaṃ kantanato samucchedavasena samuddharaṇato uttamo
atk-s0504a:1520_8: sallakantanavejjo. Iminā nippariyāyato brāhmaṇakaraṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ attani patiṭṭhitānaṃ
atk-s0504a:1521_0: Tassa me tumhe puttāti tassa evarūpassa mama tumhe, bhikkhave, puttā atrajā hotha.
atk-s0504a:1521_1: Orasāti urasi sambandhā. Yathā hi sattānaṃ orasaputtā atrajā visesena pitusantakassa
atk-s0504a:1521_2: dāyajjassa bhāgino honti, evametepi ariyapuggalā sammāsambuddhassa dhammassavanante
atk-s0504a:1521_3: ariyāya jātiyā jātā. Tassa santakassa vimuttisukhassa ariyadhammaratanassa ca ekaṃsabhāgiyatāya
atk-s0504a:1521_4: orasā. Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena ariyabhūmiṃ okkamamānā okkantā ca
atk-s0504a:1521_5: ariyasāvakā satthu ure vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya nippariyāyena “orasaputtā”ti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0504a:1521_6: arahanti. Tathā hi te bhagavatā āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiādivolokanena vajjānucintanena
atk-s0504a:1521_7: ca hadaye katvā vajjato nivāretvā anavajje patiṭṭhapentena sīlādidhammasarīraposanena
atk-s0504a:1521_8: saṃvaḍḍhitā. Mukhato jātāti mukhato jātāya dhammadesanāya ariyāya jātiyā jātattā
atk-s0504a:1521_9: mukhato jātā. Atha vā anaññasādhāraṇato sabbassa kusaladhammassa mukhato pātimokkhato
atk-s0504a:1521_10: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāsaṅkhātato vimokkhamukhato vā ariyamaggajātiyā jātātipi mukhato
atk-s0504a:1521_11: jātā. Sikkhattayasaṅgahe sāsanadhamme ariyamaggadhamme vā jātāti dhammajā. Teneva
atk-s0504a:1521_12: dhammena nimmitā māpitāti dhammanimmitā. Satidhammavicayādi dhammadāyādā, na lābhasakkārādi
atk-s0504a:1521_13: āmisadāyādā, dhammadāyādā no āmisadāyādā hothāti attho.
atk-s0504a:1522_0: Tattha dhammo duvidho – nippariyāyadhammo, pariyāyadhammoti. Āmisampi duvidhaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1522_1: nippariyāyāmisaṃ, pariyāyāmisanti. Kathaṃ? Maggaphalanibbānappabhedo hi navavidho
atk-s0504a:1522_2: lokuttaradhammo nippariyāyadhammo, nibbattitadhammoyeva, na kenaci pariyāyena kāraṇena
atk-s0504a:1522_3: vā lesena vā dhammo. Yaṃ panidaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissitaṃ kusalaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco
atk-s0504a:1522_4: vivaṭṭaṃ patthento dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0504a:1522_5: vatthupūjaṃ karoti, dhammaṃ suṇāti, deseti, jhānasamāpattiyo nibbatteti, evaṃ karonto
atk-s0504a:1522_6: anupubbena nippariyāyaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ paṭilabhati, ayaṃ pariyāyadhammo. Tathā cīvarādayo
atk-s0504a:1522_7: cattāro paccayā nippariyāyāmisameva, na aññena pariyāyena vā kāraṇena vā lesena vā
atk-s0504a:1522_8: āmisaṃ. Yaṃ panidaṃ vaṭṭagāmikusalaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco vaṭṭaṃ patthento sampattibhavaṃ
atk-s0504a:1522_9: icchamāno dānaṃ deti…pe… samāpattiyo nibbatteti, evaṃ karonto anupubbena devamanussasampattiyo
atk-s0504a:1523: Tattha nippariyāyadhammopi bhagavatoyeva santako. Bhagavatā hi kathitattā bhikkhū maggaphalanibbānāni adhigacchanti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1524: “So, hi, brāhmaṇa, bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā…pe… maggānugā ca panetarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1525: “So, hāvuso, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto, vattā pavattā, atthassa ninnetā, amatassa dātā, dhammassāmī tathāgato”ti ca.
atk-s0504a:1526_0: Pariyāyadhammopi bhagavatoyeva santako. Bhagavatā hi kathitattā eva jānanti “vivaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0504a:1526_1: patthetvā dānaṃ dento…pe… samāpattiyo nibbattento anukkamena amataṃ nibbānaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1526_2: Nippariyāyāmisampi bhagavatoyeva santakaṃ. Bhagavatā hi anuññātattāyeva bhikkhūhi
atk-s0504a:1526_3: jīvakavatthuṃ ādiṃ katvā paṇītacīvaraṃ laddhaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:1527: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gahapaticīvaraṃ. Yo icchati, paṃsukūliko hotu. Yo icchati, gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyatu. Itarītarenapāhaṃ, bhikkhave, santuṭṭhiṃyeva vaṇṇemī”ti.
atk-s0504a:1528_0: Evaṃ itarepi paccayā bhagavatā anuññātattā eva bhikkhūhi paribhuñjituṃ laddhā. Pariyāyāmisampi
atk-s0504a:1528_1: bhagavatoyeva santakaṃ. Bhagavatā hi kathitattā eva jānanti “sampattibhavaṃ patthento
atk-s0504a:1528_2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ…pe… samāpattiyo nibbattetvā anukkamena pariyāyāmisaṃ dibbasampattiṃ
atk-s0504a:1528_3: manussasampattiñca paṭilabhatī”ti. Yadeva yasmā nippariyāyadhammopi pariyāyadhammopi
atk-s0504a:1528_4: nippariyāyāmisampi pariyāyāmisampi bhagavatoyeva santakaṃ, tasmā tattha attano sāmibhāvaṃ
atk-s0504a:1528_5: dassento tattha ca yaṃ seṭṭhataraṃ accantahitasukhāvahaṃ tattheva ne niyojento evamāha
atk-s0504a:1528_6: “tassa me tumhe puttā orasā…pe… no āmisadāyādā”ti.
atk-s0504a:1529_0: Iti bhagavā paripuṇṇavatasamādānaṃ tapacariyaṃ sammadeva vusitabrahmacariyaṃ suvisuddhavijjācaraṇasampannaṃ
atk-s0504a:1529_1: anavasesavedantapāraguṃ bāhitasabbapāpaṃ satataṃ yācayogaṃ sadevake loke anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvappattaṃ
atk-s0504a:1529_2: attano paramatthabrāhmaṇabhāvaṃ ariyasāvakānañca attano orasaputtādibhāvaṃ pavedesi.
atk-s0504a:1529_3: Bhagavā hi “sīhoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti
atk-s0504a:1529_4: ettha sīhasadisaṃ, “puriso maggakusaloti kho, tissa, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti
atk-s0504a:1529_6: sallakattoti kho, sunakkhatta, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti ettha vejjasadisaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1529_7: “brāhmaṇoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti ettha brāhmaṇasadisaṃ
atk-s0504a:1529_8: attānaṃ kathesi. Idhāpi brāhmaṇa sadisaṃ katvā kathesi.
atk-s0504a:1530_0: Idāni yehi dānādīhi yuttassa ito bāhirakabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇakiccaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ maññanti,
atk-s0504a:1530_1: tehi attano dānādīnaṃ aggaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ pakāsetuṃ “dvemāni, bhikkhave, dānānī”tiādi
atk-s0504a:1530_2: āraddhaṃ. Tattha yāgāti mahāyaññā, mahādānānīti attho, yāni “yiṭṭhānī”tipi vuccanti.
atk-s0504a:1531_0: Gāthāyaṃ ayajīti adāsi. Amaccharīti sabbamacchariyānaṃ bodhimūleyeva suppahīnattā
atk-s0504a:1531_1: maccherarahito. Sabbabhūtānukampīti mahākaruṇāya sabbasatte piyaputtaṃ viya anuggaṇhanasīlo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:1537_0: 101. Dutiye appānīti parittāni. Sulabhānīti sukhena laddhabbāni, yattha katthaci
atk-s0504a:1537_1: vā sakkā hoti laddhuṃ. Anavajjānīti vajjarahitāni niddosāni āgamanasuddhito kāyamaṇḍanādikilesavatthubhāvābhāvato
atk-s0504a:1537_2: ca. Tattha sulabhatāya pariyesanadukkhassa abhāvo dassito, appatāya pariharaṇadukkhassapi
atk-s0504a:1537_3: abhāvo dassito, anavajjatāya agarahitabbatāya bhikkhusāruppabhāvo dassito hoti. Appatāya
atk-s0504a:1537_4: vā parittāsassa avatthutā, sulabhatāya gedhāya avatthutā, anavajjatāya ādīnavavasena
atk-s0504a:1537_5: nissaraṇapaññāya vatthutā dassitā hoti. Appatāya vā lābhena na somanassaṃ janayanti,
atk-s0504a:1537_6: sulabhatāya alābhena na domanassaṃ janayanti, anavajjatāya vippaṭisāranimittaṃ aññāṇupekkhaṃ
atk-s0504a:1538_0: Paṃsukūlanti rathikāsusānasaṅkārakūṭādīsu yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā
atk-s0504a:1538_1: abbhuggataṭṭhena paṃsukūlaṃ viyāti paṃsukūlaṃ, paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti
atk-s0504a:1538_2: paṃsukūlanti evaṃ laddhanāmaṃ rathikādīsu patitanantakāni uccinitvā katacīvaraṃ.
atk-s0504a:1538_3: Piṇḍiyālopoti jaṅghapiṇḍiyā balena caritvā ghare ghare ālopamattaṃ katvā laddhabhojanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1538_4: Rukkhamūlanti vivekānurūpaṃ yaṃkiñci rukkhasamīpaṃ. Pūtimuttanti yaṃkiñci gomuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1538_5: Yathā hi suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo pūtikāyova evaṃ abhinavampi muttaṃ pūtimuttameva. Tattha
atk-s0504a:1538_6: keci gomuttabhāvitaṃ haritakīkhaṇḍaṃ “pūtimutta”nti vadanti, pūtibhāvena āpaṇādito
atk-s0504a:1538_7: vissaṭṭhaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ apariggahitaṃ yaṃkiñci bhesajjaṃ pūtimuttanti adhippetanti apare.
atk-s0504a:1539_0: Yato khoti paccatte nissakkavacanaṃ, yaṃ khoti vuttaṃ hoti. Tena “tuṭṭho hotī”ti
atk-s0504a:1539_1: vuttakiriyaṃ parāmasati. Tuṭṭhoti santuṭṭho. Idamassāhanti yvāyaṃ catubbidhena yathāvuttena
atk-s0504a:1539_2: paccayena appena sulabhena santoso, idaṃ imassa bhikkhuno sīlasaṃvarādīsu aññataraṃ
atk-s0504a:1539_3: ekaṃ sāmaññaṅgaṃ samaṇabhāvakāraṇanti ahaṃ vadāmi. Santuṭṭhassa hi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ
atk-s0504a:1539_4: suparipuṇṇaṃ hoti, samathavipassanā ca bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. Atha vā sāmaññaṃ
atk-s0504a:1539_5: nāma ariyamaggo. Tassa saṅkhepato dve aṅgāni – bāhiraṃ, ajjhattikanti. Tattha bāhiraṃ
